targetString: Isbarbar dhig ahaan, dhimashada SARS ee Nofeembar 2002 waa 10% oo kamid ah 8,096 ee kiisaska la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Marka la barbardhigo, dhimashada SARS Noofambar 2002 waxay ahayd 10% 8,096 kiis oo la xaqiijiyey.

sourceString: For MERS, based on a demographic study in June 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases.
targetString: MERS ahaan, ayadoo la tixraacayo tirakoob daraasadeed ee Juun 2012, dhimashada waxay ahayd 37% kamid ah 2,494 kiis oo la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Dhanka MERS, oo ku salaysan cilmi-baadhis tirakoob bishii Juun 2012, dhimashadu waxay ahayd 37% 2,494 xaaladood oo la xaqiijiyey.

sourceString: An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4.
targetString: Daraasad hore ayaa shegtay in R0 ee SARS-CoV uu ka sareeyay 6.47 oo leh 95% barta kalsoonida (CI) ee 5.71-7.23, halka R0 ga SRAS-CoV kaliya loo dheexaysiiyay laga bilaabo 2 ilaa 4.
translated: Daraasad hore ayaa lagu sheegay in R0 ee SARS-CoV-2 uu ahaa mid aad u sarreeya ilaa 6.47 oo leh 95% kalsoonida (CI) ee 5.71-7.23, halka R0 ee SARS-CoV uu u dhexeeyay 2 ilaa 4.

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: Isbarbar dhiga SARS-CoV-2 ee MERS-CoV-2 iyo SARA-CoV ayadoo la tixraacayo calaamadahooda, dhimashadooda,  iyo R0 ayaa lagu soo bandhigay jadwalka Table1.1.
translated: Isbarbardhigga SARS-CoV-2 ee MERS-CoV iyo SARA-CoV ee ku saabsan astaamahooda, dhimashadooda, iyo R0 ayaa lagu soo bandhigay Shaxda1.1.

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: Jaantusyada sare waxay soo jeedinayaan in SARS-CoV-2 in uu leeyahay awood aad u saraysa oo u ku faafi karo marka la barbar dhigo MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV, lakiin ka dhimasha yar yahay labada danbe.
translated: Tirooyinka kore waxay soo jeedinayaan in SARS-CoV-2 ay leedahay awood ka sareysa faafitaanka MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV, laakiin way ka yar tahay dhimashada labada dambe.

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, aad ayay u adagtahay in la xakameeyo safmarka SARS-CoV-2 marka la barbar dhigo kuwa kale sida MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV.
translated: Markaa, aad bay ugu adag tahay in la xakameeyo faafitaanka SARS-CoV-2 marka loo eego kuwa MERS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: Kooxeynta hadda socota ayaa badanaa dhacda qoys isku mid ah ama hal goob ama hal gaari sida markab safar ah.
translated: Bilawga isku dhafan waxay inta badan ka dhacaan isku qoys ama isku imaatin ama baabuur sida markab dalxiis.

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: Bukaanada leh taariikh safar ama daganaasho gudaha Wuhan ama  goobaha kale ee la saameeyay ama la macaamilay dad caabuqa qaba ama bukaano labadii isbuuc ee hadda ahaa ka hor inta uusan bilaaban.
translated: Bukaan-socodka badanaa waxay leeyihiin taariikh socdaal ama degganaansho Wuhan ama meelaha kale ee ay dhibaatadu saameysey ama la xiriiray shakhsiyaadka ama bukaannada cudurka qaba labadii toddobaad ee la soo dhaafay ka hor bilowga.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaate, waxaa lasoo war galiyay in ay dadka qaadi karaan fayraska ayagoo oo aan waxa calaamada ah muujinaynin wax ka badan labo isbuuc iyo bukaanada la la daweeyay ee laga saaray isbitaalka way qaadi karaan fayraska mar kale, taas oo walaacinaysa in la dheereeyo waqtiga karantiilka.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa la sheegay in dadku ay qaadi karaan fayraska calaamado la'aan in ka badan laba toddobaad oo bukaannada laga soo saaro isbitaallada ay mar kale qaadi karaan fayraska, taas oo soo diraysa qaylo-dhaan si loo kordhiyo waqtiga karantiil.

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: Bukaanada waxay leeyihiin tirada unugyada udhaw dhiiga cas oo caadi ah ama hoos u dhacay (gaar ahaan  unugyada dhiiga cas) marxalada hore.
translated: Bukaan-socodka waxay leeyihiin tiro caadi ah ama la dhimay oo ah unugyada dhiigga cad ee durugsan (gaar ahaan lymphocytes) marxaladda hore.

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, hoos u dhaca tirada dhiiga cad <4x109/L   oo ay ku jiraan tirada dhiiga cad 1×109/L, iyo kor u qaadista heerka  aspartate aminotransferase iyo verimia ayaa laga helay 1,099 bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, lymphopenia oo leh tirada unugyada dhiiga cad <4×109/L oo ay ku jiraan tirinta lymphocyte <1×109/L,iyo sare u kaca heerarka aminotransferase aspartate iyo viremia ayaa laga helay 1,099 COVID-19 bukaan ah.

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: Heerka dheecaanka beerka iyo murqaha iyo myoglobin ayaa lagu kordhiyay dhiiga bukaanada qaar, iyo borotiinka falcelinta badan ee C iyo faaritaanka dhiiga cas ayaa lagu kordhiyay dhiiga inta badan bukaanada.
translated: Heerarka enzymes ee beerka iyo muruqa iyo myoglobin ayaa ku kordhay dhiigga bukaanada qaarkood, iyo borotiinka C-reactive iyo sedimentation erythrocyte ayaa ku kordhay dhiigga bukaanada intooda badan.

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: Bukaanada kiisaska khatarta ah leh, heerka D-dimmer, hoos udhaca wax soo saarka fibrin ee ku jira dhiiga , ayaa  kor loo qaaday, iyo tirada dhiiga cad oo si hormar leh hoos loogu dhigay
translated: Bukaannada qaba xaaladaha daran, heerka D-dimer, oo ah wax soo saarka naafaynta fibrin ee ku jira dhiigga, ayaa sare loo qaaday, iyo tirada lymphocyte si tartiib tartiib ah ayaa loo dhimay.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Ciladaha sawirista feedhaha ayaa laga helay in badan bukaanada COVID-19 ayagoo lagu astaameeyay hoosas yar oo lab gees ah ama iftiin la'aanta wadnaha.
translated: Waxyaalaha aan caadiga ahayn ee shucaaca xabadka ayaa laga helaa inta badan bukaanada COVID-19 waxaana ka muuqda hadhka laba geesoodka ah ama muraayadaha dhulka ee sambabada.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Bukaanada badanaa waxaa dhaca burunkiito isu eeg, dhaawac ba'an oo wadnaha ah, calaamdo dhibaato ba'aan oo ah  hab-neefsiga (ARDS).
translated: Bukaan-jiifka badanaa waxaa ku dhaca oof wareen-cuncun, dhaawac ba'an oo sambabada ah, iyo xanuunka neef-mareenka ee degdega ah (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Marka ARDS ay dhacaan, barar aan la xakamayn karin, isu aruurida dheecaano, .iyo burooyiin koraya ayaa si khatar ah khalkhal galiya neefsashada
translated: Marka ay ARDS dhacdo, bararka aan la xakameynin, ururinta dareeraha, iyo fibrosis horusocod ah ayaa si ba'an wax u dhimaya sarrifka gaaska.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Ciladaha shaqayn la'aanta xubnaha ee type-I and type-II pneumocytes   waxay hoos u dhigayaan heerka hoos udhigaaysha oo waxay waliba kor uqaadaan xiisada aaga, midaas oo hoos u dhigaysa awooda wadnaha uu ku kala fidhi lahaa taas tusmaynaysa khatar dhimashada wadnaha.
translated: Qallafsanaanta nooca-I iyo nooca-II pneumocytes waxay hoos u dhigtaa heerka dulsaarka waxayna kordhisaa xiisadda dusha sare, sidaas darteed hoos u dhigista awoodda sambabada si ay u ballaariso oo ay sare u qaaddo khatarta burburka sambabada.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, natiijooyinka ugu xun ee ee sawir ka qaadida d
translated: Sidaa darteed, natiijooyinka shucaaca laabta ee ugu xun ayaa inta badan barbar socda heerka ugu daran ee cudurka.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: 18kii Febraayo, 2020, taxliilin shaybaar ee COVID-19 ayaa muujisay ciribtirka pneumocytes, samayska xuubka hyaline, iyo isdhexgalitaanka unugyada dhiiga cad, iyo unugyada syncytial oo xudumo badan leh ee wadnaha bukaanka kaasoo u dhintay cudurka, joogtada baaritaanada shaybaar ee caabuq fayras iyo ARDSiyo ayaa la mid ah bukaanada SARS iyo MERS.
translated: Febraayo 18, 2020, falanqaynta cudurrada faafa ee ugu horreysa ee COVID-19 waxay muujisay desquamation ee pneumocytes, samaynta xuubka hyaline, galitaanka lymphocyte interstitial, iyo unugyada syncytial multinucleated ee sambabada bukaanka u dhintay cudurka, oo la jaan qaadaya pathology-ga caabuqa fayraska iyo ARDS oo la mid ah kan bukaanka SARS iyo MERS.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Ogaanshaha SARS-CoV-2 RNA iyadoo loo marayo silsiladda falcelinta ee reverse-transcriptase polymerase (RT-PCR) ayaa loo isticmaali jiray shuruuda .ugu weyn ee baadhitaanka COVID-19
translated: Ogaanshaha SARS-CoV-2 RNA iyada oo loo sii marayo reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) ayaa loo adeegsaday sida shuruudaha ugu weyn ee ogaanshaha COVID-19.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Si kasta ha haate, sababtoo ah qiimaha sare ee beenta ah, taasoo xawli galin karta cudurka saf-mareenka ah, muujimaha caafimaad ahaaneed ee la bilaabay in loo isticmaalo baadhitaanada (kaas oo aan si gaar ah la isugu halayn karin RT-PCR) gudaha Shiinaha Febraayo 13, 2020.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, heerka sare ee been-abuurka ah awgeed, kaas oo soo dedejin kara faafitaanka, astaamaha caafimaad ayaa bilaabay in loo isticmaalo ogaanshaha (oo aan hadda ku tiirsanayn RT-PCR) gudaha Shiinaha Febraayo 13, 2020.

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: .Xaalad la mid ah ayaa ku dhacday sidoo kale oo laga baadhayo SARS
translated: Xaalad la mid ah ayaa sidoo kale ku dhacday ogaanshaha SARS.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, isku dhafka taariikhda xudurka,muujimaha caafimaad ahaaned, tijaabooyinka shaybaar iyo natiijoyinka sawirtaan ayaa ah kuwa aasaasi ah oo lama huraan ah si looga dhigo baadhtaanka ku wax tar leh.
translated: Sidaa darteed, isku-darka taariikhda cudurrada, calaamadaha bukaan-socodka, shaybaarka shaybaarka, iyo natiijooyinka shucaaca ayaa lagama maarmaan u ah samaynta baaritaan wax ku ool ah.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: Febraayo 14, 2020, kooxda Feng Zhang ayaa qeexay boqotokool ka loo isticmaalayo farsamadda SHERLOCK ee ku salayn CRISPR si loo ogaado SARS-CoV-2, kasoo ogaada samayska SARS-CoV-2 RNA jajabka 20 x 10- 18mol/L ilaa 200 x 10- 18 mol/L (10-100 nuqul microliter kasta oo suaal ah) ayadoo la isticmaalayo ul dheer in ka yar hal saac ayada oo aan loo baahnayn qalabayn weyn.
translated: Febraayo 14, 2020, kooxda Feng Zhang waxay qeexday borotokoolka adeegsiga farsamada ku saleysan CRISPR ee SHERLOCK si loo ogaado SARS-CoV-2, taasoo soo saarta jajabyada SARS-CoV-2 RNA synthetic ee 20 × 10-18 mol/L ilaa 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 koobi halkii microliter ee gelinta) iyadoo la isticmaalayo dipstick in ka yar saacad iyada oo aan u baahnayn qalab faahfaahsan.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Si rajo leh, farsamadda cusub ayaa si lama filaan ah kor ugu qaadi karta  xasaasiyada iyo ku haboonaanta hadii lagu xaqiijiyo tijaabooyinka caafimaad.
translated: Waxaan rajeyneynaa, farsamada cusubi waxay si weyn u wanaajin kartaa dareenka iyo raaxaysiga haddii lagu xaqiijiyo shaybaarada kiliinikada.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Sababta ah khibrad la'aanta ee CoV cusub, dhakgaatiirtu waxay badanaa siin karaan uun bukaanada COVID-19 daryeel tageero ahaaneed, halka ay isku dayayaan daaweyno kala duwan taaso horey loo isticmaalay ama lasoo jeediyay ka hor daaweynta ee CoV yada kale sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV iyo cudurada fayska ah (Jadwadka (Table20.2).
translated: Waayo-aragnimada la'aanta CoV-ga cusub awgeed, takhaatiirtu waxay inta badan siin karaan daryeel taageero ah bukaannada COVID-19, iyagoo isku dayaya noocyo kala duwan oo daawayn ah oo horay loo isticmaalay ama loo soo jeediyay daawaynta CoV-yada kale sida SARS-CoV iyo MERS- CoV iyo cudurrada kale ee fayraska (Shaxda (Shaxda2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Daawaywaha ayaa waxaa ka mid ah suurtagalnimadda in hadda lagu daweeyo daawooyinka la dagaalankan fayraska, xakameeyayaasha awoodda difaaca, steroid yo, plasma da bukaanada bogsaday, daawada China iyo taageero maskax ahaaneed.
translated: Daawayntan waxaa ka mid ah daawaynta hadda jirta iyo kuwa suurtogalka ah ee leh dawooyinka fayraska, difaaca jirka, steroids, balasmaha bukaannada la soo kabsaday, daawada Shiinaha, iyo taageerada nafsaaniga ah.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Xataa plasma ha bukaanada bogsaday ayaa lasoo jeediyay inn loo isticmaalo daawo ahaan.
translated: Xitaa balaasmaha bukaanada soo kabsaday ayaa la soo jeediyay in loo isticmaalo daawaynta.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Shirkadaha daawooyinka sameeya ayaa ku tartamaya in ay hagaajinya antiboodhiyo iyo talaalo looga hortago fayraska.
translated: Shirkadaha dawooyinka ayaa u tartamaya inay soo saaraan unugyada difaaca jirka iyo tallaalada ka hortagga fayraska.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 badanaa wuxuu ku dhacaa wadnaha bilawga hore sidoo kale wuxuu ku dhacaa ku awooda yar, xubnaha kale ee qeexa ACE2, habka    sidaxiidhmaha caloosha iyo kalyaha.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 badanaa waxay weerartaa sambabada bilawga waxayna u badan tahay inay sidoo kale weerarto, ilaa heer ka yar, xubnaha kale ee muujiya ACE2, sida habka caloosha iyo mindhicirka iyo kelyaha.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Si kasta hanoqotee, shaqayn la'aanta habka neefsiga iyo dhimashadooda ayaa ah cabsida ugu weyn ee bukaanka oo ah mida ugu weyn ee sababta dhimashada.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, shaqayn la'aanta neef-mareenka iyo guul-darrida ayaa ah khatarta ugu weyn ee bukaanka iyo sababta ugu weyn ee dhimashada.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, taageerada neefsiga waa mid halis ah in ay ka baaba'aan calaamaduhu oo ay nafna badbaadiso oo ay ku jiraan guud ahaan ku daaweynta oksijiinka,qulqulka oksijiin badan, iyadoo oo aan qalab lagalin si neef loo siiyo, iyo iyadoo qalab farsamo ahaan la galinayo sii neef loo siiyo ayadoo ku xiran halista cudurka.
translated: Sidaa darteed, taageerada neefsashada ayaa muhiim ah si loo yareeyo calaamadaha loona badbaadiyo nolosha waxaana ka mid ah daaweynta ogsijiinta guud, socodka hawada sare ee ogsijiinta, hawo aan fiicneyn, iyo hawo farsamo oo faafa oo ku xiran darnaanta cudurka.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Bukaanada qaba calaamadaha halista ah ee hab neefsiga waa in lagu kaaba extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO). kaas oo ah hab la cusboonaysiiyay ee farsamada mariinka xididaha shaqada gabay oo loo isticmaalo daaweynta hawl gabka xidida dhiiga wadnaha geeyo oo  nafta halis galiya ama hawl gabka habka neefsiga
translated: Bukaanka qaba calaamadaha neef-mareenka ee daran waa in lagu taageero oksijiinta xuubabka ka baxsan (ECMO), farsamada wadnaha sambabada oo wax laga beddelay ee loo isticmaalo daawaynta wadnaha ama neefsashada oo nafta halis gelisa.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer,  joogtaynta dheelitirka electrolyte, ka hortagista iyo daawaynta caabuqyada heerka sare iyo caabuqa hawlgabiya unugyada, iyo difaacista shaqada halbawlaha muhiimka ah ayaa sidoo kale u ah aasaasi bukaanada SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, ilaalinta dheelitirka elektrolytka, ka hortagga iyo daaweynta caabuqa labaad iyo shoogga septica, iyo ilaalinta hawlaha xubnaha muhiimka ah ayaa sidoo kale lama huraan u ah bukaannada SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Waxaa la ogaaday in cytokine storm uu ka dhasho falcelin xad dhaaf ah oo ka yimaada nidaamka difaaca jirka ee bukaanada SARS iyo MERS.
translated: Waxaa la og yahay in duufaanta cytokine ay ka dhalato falcelin xad dhaaf ah oo nidaamka difaaca ee bukaannada SARS iyo MERS.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Cytokine storm waa nooc falcelinta xanuunka nidaamsan oo ay ka dambayso sii daynta taxane cytokine ah oo ay ku jiraan TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
translated: Duufaanta Cytokine waa nooc ka mid ah jawaab-celinta caabuqa ee habaysan ee lagu muujiyo sii-deynta cytokines taxane ah oo ay ku jiraan TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, iyo MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: cytokine-yadan waxay sababaan inay unugyada difaacu ii daayaan tira badan oo radical ah kuwaas oo ah sababta u wayn ee ARDS iyo hawlgabka unugyo badan.
translated: Cytokines-yadani waxay kiciyaan unugyada difaaca si ay u sii daayaan tiro aad u badan oo ah xagjirayaal xor ah kuwaas oo ah sababta ugu weyn ee ARDS iyo xubnaha badan ee fashilka.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Hoos u dhigida difaca jirka wuxuu aasaasi u yahay daawaynta cytokine storms, gaar ahaan bukaanada liita.
translated: Immunosuppression ayaa lagama maarmaan u ah daaweynta duufaannada cytokine, gaar ahaan bukaannada daran.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Corticosteroid iyo tocilizumb, waa anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, waxaa loo isticmaalay in lagu daweeyo cytokine dhaqaaqa.
translated: Corticosteroids iyo tocilizumab, anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, ayaa loo isticmaalay in lagu daweeyo duufaanka cytokine.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Daawaynta difaac yareeyaha kale ee dhaqaaq cytokine waxaa ku ira xakamaynta unug tooska ah ee T ee falcelinta difaaca; awditaanka IFN-y, IL-1, iyo TNF; xanibida JAK; blinatumomab; cadaadiyaha cytokine kaas oo tusaya 4; iyo xanibaha HDAC.
translated: Daawaynta kale ee difaaca jirka ee loogu talagalay duufaanta cytokine waxaa ka mid ah habaynta jawaabta difaaca unugga ee T unug; xannibaadda IFN-γ, IL-1, iyo TNF; Joojinta JAK; blinatummab; xakamaynta calaamadaha cytokine 4; iyo HDAC inhibitors.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Steroids, difaac yareeye ahaan, waxaa si balaadhan loogu isticmaalay daawaynta SARS si hoos loogu dhigo ba'naanta dhaawaca xanuunka.
translated: Steroids, sida immunosuppressants, ayaa si weyn loogu isticmaalay daawaynta SARS si loo yareeyo darnaanta dhaawaca bararka.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, steroid-yada waxbadan laga qaatay faaiido maysan u lahayn dhaawaca ba'an ee sanbabada ee bukaanada SARS iyo COVID-19.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, steroids ee qiyaasta sare faa'iido uma yeelan dhaawaca sambabada daran ee bukaannada SARS iyo COVID-19.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Taa badalkeed, waxay sababi karaan saamayn dhinac kale oo ba'an, gaar ahaan avascular osteonecrosis, iyadoo si wayn u saamaynaysa saadaalinta sababta cudurka.
translated: Taa baddalkeeda, waxay keeni karaan waxyeelo daran, gaar ahaan avascular osteonecrosis, oo si weyn u saameeya saadaasha.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Si lamid ah, xaaladaha gaaban ee corticosteroids ee daawooyinka hoos ilaa dhexaad ayaa lagu taliyay in loo isticmaalo si taxadar leh bukaanada aadka u il daran ee COVID-19.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, koorsooyinka gaagaaban ee corticosteroids ee qiyaaso hoose ilaa dhexdhexaad ayaa lagu taliyay in si taxadar leh loogu isticmaalo bukaanada aadka u xanuunsan ee COVID-19.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: Waqtiga qoraalka, ma jiraan daawayn fayruus ka hortag oo shaqaynaysa oo la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Waqtiga qorista, lama xaqiijin daawaynta ka hortagga fayraska.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee,  daawada xididka layska siiyo ee ay la socoto remdesivir, oo ah nucleotide analog, ayaa la ogaaday  in guul lagaga gaaray bukaanada Maraykanka ee qaba COVID-19.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, maamulka xididada ee leh remdesivir, analooga nucleotide, ayaa lagu ogaaday inay waxtar u leedahay bukaan Mareykan ah oo qaba COVID-19.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir waa daawo fayruus ka hortag oo cusub oo ay soo saareen Gilead horaan ay ugu talagaleen daweynta cudurada ay sababeen Ebola iyo fayruusyada Marlburg.
translated: Remdesivir waa dawo cusub oo ka hortagta fayraska oo ay u diyaarisay Gilecaad markii hore si loogu daweeyo cudurrada ay sababaan fayrasyada Ebola iyo Marlburg.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Mar danbe, remdesivir wuxuu sido kale muujiyay xakamayn suurtagal ah ee fayruusyada gal xariga RNA ee kale oo ay ku jiraan fayruusyada MERS iyo SARS.
translated: Ka dib, remdesivir waxa kale oo uu muujiyay ka hortagga suurtagalka ah ee fayraska RNA ee kale ee xidhan sida MERS iyo fayrasyada SARS.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Iyadoo kuwan lagu salaynayo, Gilead wuxuu goobta keenay Shiinaha si ay u sameeyaan dhawr tijaabo oo ku saabsan dadkuu ku dhacay SARS-CoV-2, natiijooyinka aad ayaa loo raaynayaa.
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan kuwan, Gilecaad waxay siisay xarunta Shiinaha si ay ugu sameyso labo tijaabo shaqsiyaadka uu ku dhacay SARS-CoV-2, natiijaduna waa mid si weyn loo sugayo.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, iyo ribavirin waxaa lasoo jeediyay inay yihiin daawaynta suurtagalka ah ee bukaanada qaba calaamadaha xanuunka neef-mareenka ba'an.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, iyo ribavirin ayaa loo soo jeediyay inay yihiin daawayn macquul ah oo loogu talagalay bukaanada leh calaamadaha neefsashada ee degdega ah.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Shuban, lalabo, mantag, dhaawaca wadnaha, iyo falcelino kasii daran ayaa dhici kara iyagoo la socdo daawayn laysu geeyay oo ledh lopinavir/ritonavir.
translated: Shuban, lallabbo, matag, dhaawac beerka ah, iyo falcelinno kale oo xun ayaa dhici kara ka dib daawaynta la isku daray ee lopinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Isdhexgalka daawayntan ay la leedahay daawooyinka kale ee loo isticmaalay bukaanada waa in si taxadar leh loo korjoogteeyaa.
translated: Is dhexgalka daawayntan iyo daawooyinka kale ee loo isticmaalo bukaanada waa in si taxadar leh loola socdo.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: Plasma laga keenay bukaanada bogsooday iyo jiilka antibody
translated: Plasma oo ka timid bukaanada soo kabsaday iyo jiilka lidka ku ah unugyada

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Soo ururinta dhiiga bukaanada ka bogsaday cudur fidaya si loogu daaweeyo bukaanada kale ee la xanuunsan isla cudurkii mise si looga hortago dadka caafimaadka qaba inuu cudurku ku dhaco waxay lahayd taariikh dheer.
translated: Uruurinta dhiiga bukaanada ka soo kabsaday cudurada faafa si loogu daweeyo bukaanada kale ee la ildaran xanuunka ama si looga ilaaliyo shaqsiyaadka caafimaadka qaba inay qaadaan cudurka ayaa ah mid soo jireen ah.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Xaqiiqdii, bukaanada bogsaday inta badan waxay leeyihiin heer sare oo antibody-yaal ah kaas oo ay kaga difaacayaan caabuqa dhiigooda.
translated: Runtii, bukaannada bogsaday waxay inta badan leeyihiin heerar aad u sarreeya oo ka-hortagga cudur-sidaha dhiiggooda.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Antibody-yaasha waxaa weeye immunoglobin (Ig) ay soo saareen dhiiga cad ee B si ay ula dagaalamaan caabuqyada iyo shay'yada kale ee banaanka ka yimaada waxayna aqoonsadaan cuf gaar ah oo ku jria caabuqa si toos ah ayayna u dilaan.
translated: Unugyada difaaca jirka waa immunoglobulin (Ig) oo ay soo saarto B-lymphocytes si ay ula dagaallamaan cudur-sidaha iyo walxaha kale ee ajnabiga ah waxayna aqoonsadaan unugyo gaar ah oo ku jira cudur-sidaha waxayna si toos ah uga takhalusaan.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Ayado kusalaysan midan, plasma ayaa laga aruuriyay dhiiga koox bukaana ah kuwaas oo ka bogsaday COVID-19 waxaana lagu duray 10 bukaan oo aad u xanuunsanaa.
translated: Iyada oo taas lagu salaynayo, balaasmaha ayaa laga soo ururiyay dhiigga koox bukaanno ah oo ka soo kabsaday COVID-19 waxaana lagu duray 10 bukaan oo aad u xanuunsan.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Calaamadahooda way kasoo reeyeen  24 saacadood gudahood, waxaana waheliya barar hoos u dhacay iyo awooda fayraska iyo kor u qaadista oksijiinka dhiiga ku jira.
translated: Calaamaduhu waxay soo roonaadeen 24 saacadood gudahood, oo ay weheliso bararka oo yaraada iyo culeysyada fayraska iyo hagaajinta qoyaanka oksijiinta ee dhiigga.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaate, cadaynta iyo qeexida waa muhiim si loo soo jeediyo hab si  baahsan loo isticmaalo ka hor inta daaweynta gaarka ah aan wali lasoo saarin.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, xaqiijinta iyo caddaynta ayaa lagama maarmaan u ah soo jeedinta habka isticmaalka ballaaran ka hor inta aan weli la soo saarin daaweyn gaar ah.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, saamaynta daaweynta la siiyay, dhibaatooyinka qaar ayaa la halmaala plasma ga waa in la tixgaliyaa si taxadar leh.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, marka la eego saameynta daaweynta, qaar ka mid ah faa'iido darrada la xiriirta balaasmaha waa in si taxadar leh loo tixgeliyaa.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, anti-bodhiga wuxuu si xad dhaaf ah u kicin karaa jawaab celinta habka difaaca jirka oo wuxuu sababi karaa calaamadaha siidaynta cytokine, taas oo suurta gal ah in sunteeda nafta halis galiso.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, unugyada difaaca jirka waxay kor u qaadi karaan jawaabta difaaca waxayna sababi karaan cytokine release syndrome, taas oo suurtogal ah inay tahay sun nafta halis gelisa.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Anti-bodhiga jidhka ku jiraa ayaa ah badaana mid hooseeya, baahinda loo qabo plasma na waa mid balaaran si ay u daaweyso bukaanada xanuunsan.
translated: Isku-duubnaanta unugyada difaaca jirka ee dhiigga ayaa badanaa ah mid hooseeya, iyo baahida loo qabo balaasmaha ayaa ah mid weyn si loo daweeyo bukaannada aadka u xanuunsan.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Way adagtahay in la sameeyo oo lasoo saaro anti-boodhiyo gaar ah si dagdag ah oo ku filan si loo la dagaalamo cudurka saf-mareenka ah ee aduunka ku baahay.
translated: Way adag tahay in la horumariyo oo la soo saaro unugyada difaaca jirka si degdeg ah oo ku filan si loola dagaallamo faafitaanka caalamiga ah.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Siaas awgeed,  way adagtahay in si toos ah looga saaro unugyada B bukaanada bogsaday oo la cadeeyo lambarka hida sidaha iyadoo la galinayo anti-bo0dhiyo wax tar leh ama shaashad leh anti-boodhiyo wax tar leh kaaso lagula dagaalmi karo borotiinka fayrask aasaaska u ah.
translated: Sidaa darteed, waxaa aad u muhiim ah oo wax ku ool ah in unugyada B laga sooco bukaannada la soo kabsaday oo la aqoonsado codesyada hidde-sideyaasha ee wax ku ool ah ka-hortagga unugyada ama shaashadda unugyada difaaca waxtarka leh ee ka hortagga borotiinnada muhiimka ah ee fayraska.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: .Habkan, waxaan qiyaasi karnaa soo saarista anti-boodhiga
translated: Sidan, waxaan si sahal ah kor ugu qaadi karnaa wax soo saarka unugyada difaaca jirka.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: TCM ayaa loo isticmaaalay in lagu daweeyo cuduro kala duwan gudaha Shiinaha kumanaan sanno.
translated: TCM waxa Shiinaha lagu daweeyay cuduro kala duwan kumanaan sano.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Si kasta ha ahaatee, saamaynteeda wax si aad ah ugu tiirsantahay isku dhafnaanta  qaabka kasoo isbadalla asagoo ku tiirsan baadhitaanka cudurka oo ku salaysan fikradaha TCM.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, saameynteedu waxay inta badan ku tiirsan tahay isku darka qaybo badan oo qaacido ah oo kala duwan iyadoo ku xiran ogaanshaha cudurka ee ku saleysan aragtiyaha TCM.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Shayyaasha badanaa waxtarka leh waa kuwa aan la aqoon ama waa kuwa  feeg ah oo way adagtahay in lasoo saaro oo la xaqiijiyo shayyaashaas oo kale ama isku dhafka ugu wanaagsan.
translated: Inta badan qaybaha waxtarka leh ayaa ah kuwo aan la garanayn ama aan caddayn sababtoo ah way adag tahay in la soo saaro oo la xaqiijiyo qaybahaas ama isku-darkooda ugu fiican.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: Hadda, sababtoo ah la'aanta daaweyn waxtar leh oo khaas u ah COVID-19, TCM ayaa noqotay ikhtiyaarka ugu wayn ee daaweynta bukaanada kuwaas oo qaba calaamado yaryar ilaa kuwa dhexe ama kuwa kasoo kabsaday heerar halis ah.
translated: Waqtigan xaadirka ah, la'aanta daawaynta waxtarka leh ee gaarka ah ee COVID-19 awgeed, TCM waxay noqotay mid ka mid ah daawaynta beddelka weyn ee bukaannada leh calaamadaha fudud iyo kuwa dhexdhexaadka ah ama kuwa ka soo kabsaday marxalado daran.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules ayaa loo arkay in ay waxtar u leeyihiin daaweynta COVID-19
translated: Tusaale ahaan, kaabsoosha Shu Feng Jie Du iyo kaabsaloyinka Lian Hua Qing Wen ayaa la ogaaday inay waxtar u leeyihiin daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Heerka daawada ugu sareeya ee daaweynta COVID-19 ayaa lagu arkay gobolo badan oo Shiinaha ah kuwaas oo isticmaalay TCM 87% bukaanadooda, oo ay ku jiraan Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), iyo Hunan (50%), halka gobolka Hubei, oo isticmaashay TCM oo kaliya 30% oo kamid ah bukaankooda COVID-19, ay heleen heerka ugu hooseeyay ee dawada (13%).
translated: Heerarka daawaynta ugu sareysa ee daaweynta bukaannada COVID-19 ayaa lagu arkay dhowr gobol oo Shiinaha ah kuwaas oo isticmaalay TCM 87% bukaannadooda, oo ay ku jiraan Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), iyo Hunan (50%), halka Hubei Gobolka, oo isticmaalay TCM ku dhawaad 30% bukaannadiisa COVID-19, ayaa lahaa heerka ugu hooseeya ee daawaynta (13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqtee, midan waa isbarbar dhig aad u yar xun sida ay asbaabo kale saameeyaan sida tirada iyo halista bukaanada waa in lagu daraa qiimaynta.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, tani waa isbarbardhig qalafsan maadaama arrimo badan oo saameyn leh sida tirada iyo darnaanta bukaannada ay tahay in lagu daro qiimeynta.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: Febraayo 18,2020, Boli Zhang iyo kuwa  ay shaqa wadaag yihiin ayaa daabacay daraasad isbarbar dhigaya daaweynta daawada reer galbeedka (WM) kaliya iyoisku dhafka daaweynta WM iyo TCM.
translated: Febraayo 18, 2020, Boli Zhang iyo asxaabtiisa ayaa daabacay daraasad ay ku barbar dhigayaan daawaynta reer galbeedka (WM) oo keliya iyo daawaynta la isku daray ee WM iyo TCM.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Waxay arkeen waqtiyada u jirkaaga u baahna kaso kabsashada heerkulka, calaamadaha oo aan muuqan, iyo daaweynta ayaa si wax ku ool ah uga gaabnaa kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego koxda WM oo kaliya.
translated: Waxay ogaadeen in wakhtiyada loo baahan yahay soo kabashada heerkulka jidhka, calaamada luminta, iyo isbitaal dhigista ay aad uga gaaban yihiin kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego kooxda WM kaliya.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Si cajiib ah, heerka soo xumaanaya ee dadka calaamadaha muujiyay (heer fudud ilaa heer halis ah) ayaa ahaa mid si wax ku ool ah uga hooseeya kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego kooxda WM kaliya (7.4)% oo kasoo horjeeda 46%) dhimashaduna way ka hooseysay kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego MW oo kaliya (8.8% oomka soo horjeeda 39%).
translated: Waxa ugu cajiibsan, heerka calaamadaha ka sii daraya (laga bilaabo iftiinka ilaa daran) aad ayuu uga hooseeyaa kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego kooxda WM kaliya (7.4% marka loo eego 46.2%) dhimashaduna way ka hoosaysay kooxda WM+TCM marka loo eego WM kaliya kooxda (8.8% marka loo eego 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, waxtarka iyo bad-qabka TCM wali waxay sugaysaa tijaabooyin aad loo xakameeyay  siyaabo badan iyo xarumo badan.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxtarka iyo badbaadada TCM ayaa wali sugaya tijaabooyin si wanaagsan loo xakameeyay oo miisaan weyn iyo xarumo badan ah.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxay noqon doontaa mid soo jiidasho leh in astaameeyo ficilada farsamada mashiin ahaaneed iyo in la cadeeyo waxtarka shayyaasha daaweynta ee TCM ama isku dhafkooda hadii ay suuragal tahay.
translated: Waxa kale oo ay noqon doontaa mid xiiso leh in lagu sifeeyo habka ficilada oo la caddeeyo qaybaha waxtarka leh ee daaweynta TCM ama isku-darkooda haddii ay suurtogal tahay.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Bukaanada looga shakiyay ama kuwa qaba COVID-19 badanaa waxay la tacaalaan cabsida weyn ee cudurkan faafida badan iyo waliba u dhimashada cudurka, sidoo kale dadka karantiilan  waxay la tacaalaan caajis, kalinimo, iyo xanaaq.
translated: Bukaanka laga shakisan yahay ama la xaqiijiyey in COVID-19 ay badi la kulmaan cabsi weyn oo ah cudurka aadka u faafa iyo xitaa dilaaga ah, iyo dadka la karantiilay sidoo kale waxay la kulmaan caajis, kalinimo, iyo xanaaq.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, calaamadaha caabuqa sida qandho, oksijiin la'aanta jidhka, iyo qufac sidoo kale saamaynta ba'an ee daaweynta  sida hurdo la'aanta oo ay sababtay corticosteroids ayaa sababi kara walaac badan iyo xanuun dimirka ah
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, calaamadaha caabuqa sida qandho, hypoxia, iyo qufaca iyo sidoo kale saameynta xun ee daaweynta sida hurdo la'aanta ay keento corticosteroids waxay u horseedi kartaa walaac badan iyo murugo maskaxeed.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Marxaladaha hore ee dilaaca SARS, qaybo xanuunad dhimirka oo ay ku jiraan isla hadal joogta ah, walaaca, cabsida, asalka cudurada dhimirka, calaamadaha waalida, cudurada sababa dagaan la'aan masxakeed iyo waliba isdilid ayaa lasoo sheegay.
translated: Wajigii hore ee faafitaanka SARS, cudurro nafsiyeed oo kala duwan oo ay ka mid yihiin niyad-jab joogto ah, walaac, weeraro argagaxa, xamaasad maskaxeed, calaamadaha nafsaaniga ah, delirium, iyo xitaa isdilka ayaa la soo sheegay.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Tabagalka xiriirada qasabka ah iyo kariintiilida, iyadoo ka mid ka jawaab celinta  caafimaadka dad weynaha ee dilaacitaanka  COVID-19, ayaa ka dhigi kara dadka kuwa aad uga walaacsan oo dambiile ku ah saamaynta kusaabsan cudurkan faafida badan, iyo dhaleecaynta qoysaskooda iyo asxaabtooda.
translated: Baafinta xiriirka qasabka ah iyo karantiil, iyada oo qayb ka ah jawaabaha caafimaadka bulshada ee dillaaca COVID-19, waxay dadka ka dhigi kartaa welwel iyo dambiile badan oo ku saabsan saameynta faafitaanka, karantiilka, iyo ceebeynta qoysaskooda iyo asxaabtooda.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, daryeelka caafimaadka maskexeed waa in la siiyo bukaanada COVID-19, dadka laga shakisanyahay, iyo dadka la macaamilay kuwaas iyo waliba dad waynaha kuwaas oo u baahan.
translated: Markaa, daryeelka caafimaadka dhimirka waa in la siiyaa bukaannada COVID-19, shakhsiyaadka la tuhunsan yahay, iyo dadka iyaga la xidhiidha iyo sidoo kale dadweynaha guud ee u baahan.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Tageerada baadhitaanada shaybaar waa in lagu daro samaynta kooxyo isku dhaf ah ee caafimaadka maskaxda, isgaarsiin cad ee la socodsiinta dilaaca iyo qorshayaasha daaweynta SARS-CoV-2 oo joogta ah hufana iyo isticmaalida qalabyo elektoroniga ah oo xirfad leh iyo dhaqan galinta ka taxadarida kala isu dhawaanshaha midba midka kle.
translated: Taageerada nafsiyeedka waa in ay ku jirtaa samaynta kooxo kala duwan oo caafimaadka dhimirka ah, isgaarsiin cad oo joogto ah oo sax ah oo ku saabsan faafitaanka SARS-CoV-2 iyo qorshooyinka daawaynta iyo adeegsiga aaladaha elektiroonigga ah ee xirfadleyda ah iyo codsiyada si looga fogaado xiriir dhow oo dhexmara midba midka kale.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Talaalo waxtar leh ayaa aasaas u ah la dagaalanka silsiladda ka gudbinta kudurka illaha cudurka ee xayawaan iyo bina adam qaba caabuqa ilaa iyo xanuun qaadaha u nugul iyo badanaa kordhinta daaweynta fayraska iyadoo la xakamaynayo cuduradda saf-mareenka ah ee sababeen fayrasyada soo baxaya.
translated: Tallaal wax ku ool ah ayaa lagama maarmaan u ah joojinta silsiladda gudbinta ee ka imanaysa kaydadka xoolaha iyo bini'aadamka cudurka qaba ilaa dadka u nugul martida waxayna inta badan kaabayaan daaweynta fayraska ee xakamaynta cudurrada faafa ee ay keenaan fayrasyada soo baxaya.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Dadaalo ayaa sameeyay sidii loo samayn lahaa talaalo ku salayn borotiin S si ay u dhaliso muddo-dheer iyo dhexdhexaadin awood leh ee anti-boodhiyada iyo/ama ka difaacida SARS-CoV difaaca jirka.
translated: Waxaa la sameeyay dadaallo lagu horumarinayo tallaallada borotiinka ku saleysan ee S si loo dhaliyo difaaca jirka ee muddada dheer iyo awoodda ka hortagga iyo/ama difaaca ka hortagga SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Talaalada la dagaalanka fayraska ayaa lagu qiimeeyay  nooc xayaawaan ah ee SARS
translated: Tallaalada si toos ah loo dhimay ayaa lagu qiimeeyay qaababka xayawaanka ee SARS.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, waxtarka ay ku dhex leedahay dadka talaalkan qaatay ee dadka da'da ah iyo qaybaha khatar la loolanka ah iyo ka ilaalinta ka qaadiska  caabuqa fayraska xoolaha ayaa wali  ah in la goaamiyo inta aan la bilaabin daraasad caafimaad ahaaneed
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxtarka in vivo ee musharixiinta tallaalka ee shakhsiyaadka da'da ah iyo moodooyinka halista ah iyo ka-hortagga fayraska zoonotic weli lama go'aamin ka hor intaan daraasad caafimaad la billaabin.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Tani waxaa sabab u ah SARS wuxuu hoos udhacay 17 sano ka hor oo majiraan kiisas cusub oo ila hadda lasoo sheegay.
translated: Tani waxay u badan tahay sababtoo ah SARS waxay dhimatay 17 sano ka hor ilaa hadda kiis cusubna lama soo sheegin.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Marka la barbar dhigo, kiisaska aan joogtada ahayn iyo qaybo MERS ah waxa wadaan in ay ku dhacaan Barigga Dhexe oo ay kusii faafan gobolo kale ayagoo leh illo xollo ka qaaditaanka cudurka oo joogto ah ee gudaha goobahaas.
translated: Taas bedelkeeda, kiisas goos goos ah iyo kooxo MERS ah ayaa ka sii socda Bariga Dhexe oo ku faafaya gobollo kale taas oo ay ugu wacan tahay joogteynta ilaha zoonotic ee meelaha cidhiidhiga ah.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Waxaa lasoo saaray istaraatijiyo talaalis oo loogu talagalay MERS ayadoo loo isticmaalayo fayras aan shaqaynayn, DNA plasmid yo, qalabka hida sidaha lagu qaado, nanoparticles, shayyaal la mid ah fayras iyo isku dhafyada cutubyada yar ee borotiin kuwa qaar na waxaa lagu qimeeyay cutub xayawaan ah.
translated: Xeeladaha tallaalka ayaa loo sameeyay MERS iyadoo la adeegsanayo fayras aan dhaq-dhaqaaq lahayn, plasmids DNA-ga, fayraska fayraska, nanoparticles, qaybo u eg fayraska iyo borotiinnada dib-u-dhaqaajinta iyo qaar ayaa lagu qiimeeyay qaababka xayawaanka.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Soo saarista talaal bad-qab iyo wartar lehoo lagula dagaalamo SARS-CoV-2 ee loogu talagalay dadka aan qabin difaac jireed oo kufilan ayaa ah mid dagdag ah iyo  ah shaqa adag si loo xakameeyo saf-mareenka socda.
translated: Horumarinta tallaal badbaado leh oo wax ku ool ah oo ka dhan ah SARS-CoV-2 ee shakhsiyaadka aan iska difaacin waa hawl degdeg ah oo muhiim ah oo lagu xakameynayo faafitaanka socda.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqtee, way adagtahay in laga adkaado dhibaatooyinka sababtoo ah mudadda dheer (celcelis ahaan ah 18 bilood) ee loo baahnaa hormarinta talaalka iyo kala duwaanasha jiraa ee CoV yada.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, way adag tahay in laga gudbo dhibaatada sababtoo ah wakhtiga dheer (celcelis ahaan 18 bilood) ee looga baahan yahay horumarinta tallaalka iyo kala duwanaanshaha firfircoon ee CoVs.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Sida cudurka cusub, COVID-19 ayaa uun bilaabay in uu kasoo muuqdo si cad baadhitaanada caafimaad oo dhamaystiran kumanaan bukaano ah.
translated: Sida cudur cusub, COVID-19 wuxuu hadda bilaabay inuu muujiyo koorsadiisa caafimaad ee buuxda kumanaan bukaan ah.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Kiisaska badanaa, bukaanadu waxay si tartiib tartiib ah uga soo kabtaan la'aanta caqabadaha xanuunada hore.
translated: Inta badan, bukaanku si tartiib tartiib ah ayey u soo kabsan karaan iyada oo aan la hayn.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, ku la mid ah SARS iyo MERS, COVID-19 sidoo kale waa cudur la xariira siyaadida dadka cuduro dheeraad ah qaba iyo  dhimasha bukaan socodka qaba  kiisaska cakiran.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, si la mid ah SARS iyo MERS, COVID-19 waxa kale oo lala xidhiidhiyaa cudurrada sare iyo dhimashada bukaannada qaba kiisas daran.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed dhisida qaab fikir ka dhiibashada daryeelka cafimaad ee cudurka ayaa u ah aasaas hay'adaha daryeelka caafimaad in ay muhiimad siiyaan adeegooda, gaar ahaan goobaha khayraadka ku yaryahay.
translated: Sidaa darteed, in la dhiso qaabka saadaasha cudurka ayaa lama huraan u ah hay'adaha daryeelka caafimaadku in ay mudnaanta siiyaan adeegyadooda, gaar ahaan meelaha kheyraadku xaddidan yahay.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo daraasaadka caafimaadka ee lasoo sheegay ilaa hadda, qodobada soo socda waxay saamayn karaan ama lala xiriirin karaan fikrad daryeelka caafimaad ee bukaanada xanuunka COVID-19 (Jadwalka 33):
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan daraasadaha caafimaad ee la soo sheegay illaa hadda, arrimahan soo socda ayaa laga yaabaa inay saameeyaan ama la xiriiriyaan saadaasha bukaannada COVID-19 (Shaxda (Shaxda 33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Da'da: Da'du waxay ahayd qodobka ugu muhiimsan ee sababta xanuunka SARS, kaas oo sidoo kale run u ah COVID-19.
translated: Da'da: Da'du waxay ahayd qodobka ugu muhiimsan ee saadaasha SARS, taas oo sidoo kale run u ah COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: COVID-19 inta badan wuxuu ku dhacaa da'da 30-65 iyadoo 47.7% kamid ah bukaanada ay ka waynyihiin 50 daraasad lagu sameeyay 8,866 kiisas sida kor lagu xusay.
translated: COVID-19 wuxuu inta badan ku dhacay da'da 30-65 iyadoo 47.7% bukaannadaas ay ka weyn yihiin 50 jir daraasad lagu sameeyay 8,866 xaaladood sida kor lagu sharaxay.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Bukaanada u baahnaa daryeelka dedegga waxay u badnaayeen inay horay ula tacaalayeen xanuuna kale iyo xaalada ba'an waxayna si wayn uga waynaayeen kuwa aan lahayn (da'da dhexe ee 66 la barbardhigay 51), taas oo soo jeedinaysa da'da inay tahay qodob sabab u ah natiijada bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Bukaannada u baahday daryeelka degdega ah waxay aad ugu dhow yihiin inay yeeshaan cudurrada laf-dhabarka iyo dhibaatooyinka waxayna aad uga da'weynayeen kuwa aan samayn (da'da dhexe ee 66 iyo 51), iyagoo soo jeedinaya da'da inay tahay arrin saadaalin u ah natiijada bukaannada COVID-19.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Galmada: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu ku dhacay rag badan marka loo eego haweenka (0./100,000 la barbardhigay 0.27/100,000) sida kor lagu xusay.
translated: Galmada: SARS-CoV-2 waxa uu ku dhacay in ka badan ragga ragga ah (0.31/100,000 marka loo eego 0.27/100,000), sida kor lagu sharaxay.

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: daryeelka degdegga ayaa u badan inay la xanuunsadaan dhaawac wadnaha oo daran iyo wadna garaac aan caadi ahayn.
translated: Cudurrada iyo dhibaatooyinka: Bukaanka qaba COVID-19 ee u baahan daryeelka degdega ah waxay aad ugu dhowdahay inay la kulmaan dhaawac ba'an oo wadnaha ah iyo arrhythmia.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Dhacdooyinka wadnaha ayaa sidoo kale ahaa sababta ugu wayn ee dhimashada bukaanada SARS.
translated: Dhacdooyinka wadnaha ayaa sidoo kale ahaa sababta ugu weyn ee dhimashada bukaannada SARS.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Waxaa lasoo sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 inuu sidoo kale ku dhagi karo ACE2-posittive cholangiocytes, kaas oo sababi kara hawlgabka wadnaha ee bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Waxaa la sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 ay sidoo kale ku xidhi karto ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, taas oo u horseedi karta shaqada beerka ee bukaanada COVID-19.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Waxay tahay in la ogaado in da'da iyo xanuuka sii jira ay si xoogan isula xiriiraan ayna isfaragelin karaan.
translated: Waxaa xusid mudan in da'da iyo cudurrada hoose ay si xooggan isugu xiran yihiin lagana yaabo in midba midka kale farageliyo.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Natiijooyinka aan caadiga ahayn ee shaybaarka: heerka borotiinka ka falceliya C (CRP)  ee dhiiga ayaa ka turjumaya ba'naanta xanuunka unuga mise dhaawaca waxaana lasoo jeediyay inuu yahay qodob xanuun sababe suurtagal ah, falcelinta daawaynta, iyo ugu dambayn bogsasho.
translated: Natiijooyinka shaybaarka aan caadiga ahayn: Heerka borotiinka C-reactive (CRP) ee dhiiga ayaa ka tarjumaya darnaanta caabuqa ama dhaawaca unugyada waxaana loo soo jeediyay inay noqoto arrin suurtagal ah oo saadaalisa cudurka, ka jawaab celinta daaweynta, iyo soo kabashada ugu dambeysa.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Xiriirka heerka CRP uu la leeyahay ba'naanta iyo sababta cudurka COVID-19 ayaa sidoo kale lasoo jeediyay.
translated: Isku-xidhka heerka CRP ee darnaanta iyo saadaasha COVID-19 ayaa sidoo kale la soo jeediyay.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) kor u kacay, aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), iyo creatine kinase (CK) ayaa sidoo kale laga yaaba inay caawiyaan saadaalinta natiijada.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), iyo creatine kinase (CK) ayaa sidoo kale caawin kara saadaalinta natiijada.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Enzyme-yadan waxaa si qotodheer loogu qeexay dhawr halbawle, gaar ahaan wadnaha iyo beerka, waxaana la sii daayaa waqtiga dhaawaca unuga.
translated: Enzymes-yadan ayaa si weyn loogu muujiyaa xubno badan, gaar ahaan wadnaha iyo beerka, waxaana la sii daayaa inta lagu jiro dhaawaca unugyada.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Sidaa daraadeed, waa calaamado dhaqameed lagu garto hawlgabka wadnaha mise beerka.
translated: Sidaa darteed, waxay calaamad dhaqameed u yihiin cilladaha wadnaha ama beerka.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Calaamadaha caafimaad ee ugu wayn: raajada laabta iyo waqtiga ay ku imaanayaan calaamadaha caafimaad waa in loo tixgaliyaa iyadoo ay la socoto arimaha kale si loo saadaaliyo natiijada iyo xaaladaha xun ee COVID-19.
translated: Calaamadaha ugu waaweyn ee bukaan-socodka: Shucaaca laabta iyo horumarka ku meel gaarka ah ee calaamadaha bukaan-socodka waa in lala tixgaliyaa arrimaha kale ee saadaalinta natiijooyinka iyo dhibaatooyinka COVID-19.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Isticmaalka steroids: sida kor lagu xusay, steroids waa hoos u dhigaha difaaca jirka oo si caada ah loogu isticmaalo daawayn caawinta loogu talagalay cudurada caabuqa si loo yareeyo ba'naanta dhaawaca xanuunka.
translated: Isticmaalka steroids: Sida kor lagu sharaxay, steroids waa difaac difaac oo caadi ahaan loo isticmaalo daawaynta adjunctive ee cudurada faafa si loo yareeyo darnaanta dhaawaca bararka.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Maadaama daawo culus oo corticosteroid ah si balaaran loogu isticmaalay bukaanada SARS, kuwa badan oo ka bogsaday waxay la xanuunsadeen avascular osteonecrosis oo leh naafanimo nolol dheer iyo tayo nolol oo hoosaysa.
translated: Maadaama qiyaasta sare ee corticosteroids si weyn loogu isticmaalay bukaannada SARS ee daran, qaar badan oo ka badbaaday ayaa la soo darsay osteonecrosis xididdada dhiigga oo leh naafo nolosha dheer ah iyo tayada nolosha oo liidata.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Sidaa daaadeed, hadii loo baahdo, steroids waa in loo isticmaalaa xad hooseeya iyo waqti gaaban bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Markaa, haddii loo baahdo, steroids waa in lagu isticmaalo qiyaas yar iyo muddo gaaban bukaannada COVID-19.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Buuqa maskaxda: sida kor lagu xusay, inta lagu jiro dilaacitaanka COVID-19 bukaanada badan ayaa la xanuunsaday isla hadal xad dhaaf ah maadama ay inta badan ku jiraan mudooyin dheer oo karantiil ah iyo daganaasho la'aan xad dhaaf waxayna arkeen dhimashada xubnaha qoyska ugu dhaw iyo bukaanada asxaabtooda ah.
translated: Cadaadiska maskaxda: Sida kor lagu sharaxay, intii lagu jiray faafitaanka COVID-19 bukaanno badan ayaa la soo deristay walaac aan caadi ahayn maadaama ay inta badan u adkeysanayeen muddo dheer oo karantiil ah iyo hubanti la'aan aad u daran oo ay goob joog u ahaayeen dhimashada xubnaha qoyska iyo bukaanada kale.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Waa muhiim in la siiyo la talin nafsi ahaaneed iyo taageero mudo dheer si loo caawiyo bukaanadan inay ka bogsadaan isla hadalka ayna ku noqdaan nolosha caadiga ahayd.
translated: Waa lama huraan in la bixiyo la-talin nafsi ah iyo taageero waqti dheer ah si loo caawiyo bukaannadan inay ka soo kabtaan walaaca oo ay dib ugu soo laabtaan nolosha caadiga ah.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay daraasooyinka tirakobka bulshada ilaa hadda, COVID-19 wuxuu u muuqdaa inuu leeyahay xaalado xanuun oo ka duwan mida SARS.
translated: Marka loo eego daraasaadka tirakoobka ilaa hadda, COVID-19 wuxuu u muuqdaa inuu leeyahay astaamo faafa oo ka duwan SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer inuu ku tarmayo neefmareenka hoose, SARS-CoV-2 ayaa si waxtar leh ugu tarmaya aaga sare ee neefmareenka oo sababaya calaamad la'aan ama mid  fudud wajiga hore ee caabuqa, si lamid ah CoV-yada kale ee sababa hargabyada.
translated: Marka lagu daro ku-noqoshada mareenka neef-mareenka hoose, SARS-CoV-2 waxay si hufan ugu soo celin kartaa mareenka neef-mareenka sare oo waxay sababi kartaa calaamado khafiif ah ama aan lahayn wajiga hore ee caabuqa, oo la mid ah CoV-yada kale ee keena hargabka caadiga ah.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Sidaa daraadeed, bukaanada xanuunka qaaday wajiha hore mise mudada aan la garankarin wuxuu soo saari karaa tiro wayn oo fayras ah xilliga hawlaha maalinlaha ah, ee sababaya adayg wayn ee xakamaynta safmareenka.
translated: Sidaa darteed, bukaannada cudurka qaba marxaladda hore ama xilliga soo-jiidashada waxay soo saari karaan xaddi badan oo fayras ah inta lagu jiro hawl maalmeedka, taasoo dhibaato weyn ku keenta xakameynta faafitaanka.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, gudbinta SARS-CoV waxaa la ogaaday inuu dhaco marka bukaanada ay aad u xanuunsanayaan, halka gudbinta inta badan aysan dhicin wajiga hore.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, gudbinta SARS-CoV waxaa loo tixgeliyey inay dhacdo marka bukaannada ay aad u jiran yihiin, halka gudbinta badankeeda aysan dhicin wajigii hore.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Sidaa daraadeed, dilaaca COVID-19 ee hadda aad ayuu u daranyahay una adagyahay in la xakameeyo marka loo eego dilaacii SARS.
translated: Markaa, dillaaca hadda ee COVID-19 aad ayuu uga daran yahay oo ay adag tahay in la xakameeyo marka loo eego dillaaca SARS.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Dadaalo wayn ayaa hadda ka socda Shiinaha oo ay kamid yihiin xayiraada wuhan iyo magaalooyinka u dhaw iyo karantiilka socda ee ku dhawaad dhamaan bulshada iyadoo la raaynayo in la carqaladeeyo gudbitaanka SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Dadaalo waaweyn ayaa hadda ka socda Shiinaha oo ay ku jiraan xirida Wuhan iyo magaalooyinka ku xeeran iyo karantiil joogto ah oo ku dhawaad dhammaan dadka iyadoo la rajeynayo in la joojiyo gudbinta SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Inkastoo ficiladani ay si wayn u dhaawacayaan dhaqalaha iyo qaybaha kale ee dalka, tirada bukaanada cusub hoos ayay u dhacaysaa, taas oo tusaysa hoos u dhaca safmareenka.
translated: Inkasta oo falalkani ay si weyn u dhaawaceen dhaqaalaha iyo qaybaha kale ee dalka, haddana tirada bukaannada cusub ayaa hoos u dhacaya, taas oo muujinaysa hoos u dhaca cudurka.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Qiyaasta ugu rajada wayn waxaa weeye in dilaacu uu dhamaan doono dhamaadka Maarso iyo in waiga dhaqaala hoos u dhacuna uu joogi doono 3-4 bilood.
translated: Qiyaasta ugu rajada badan ayaa ah in dillaaca uu dhammaan doono Maarso iyo marxaladda hoos u dhigista waxay socon doontaa 3-4 bilood.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, khabiiro kale sidaas uma rao wayna.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, khubarada kale qaarkood maaha kuwo rajo leh.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter, et al., wuxuu qiyaasay in COVID-19, kaas oo muuqda ilaa xad inuu ka caabuq waynyhay SARS, uusan dhamaanayn 2020.
translated: Paul Hunter, et al., Waxay ku qiyaaseen in COVID-19, oo u muuqda inuu si aad ah uga faafayo SARS, uusan dhammaan doonin 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Xanuunka safmareenka iyo wuxuu soo jeediyay in SARS-CoV-2 uu ku dhici karo saddex meelo meel kamid ah bulshada caalamka.
translated: Ira Longini, et al., Waxay dejisay qaab lagu saadaaliyo natiijada cudurka waxayna soo jeedisay in SARS-CoV-2 ay qaadsiin karto saddex-meelood laba meelood dadka adduunka.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Koox reer Kanada ah ayaa soo sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 laga helay labadaba dheecaanada sanka iyo dhuunta ee bukaanada bogsaday ee ka baxay isbitaalka 2 todobaad ka hor, taas oo tusaysa in fayruuska cusub ee la aqoonsaday uu noqon karo dhacdo wareeg ah oo lamid ah influenza.
translated: Koox Canadian ah ayaa soo warisay in SARS-CoV-2 laga helay labadaba turbinate-ka iyo dhuunta bukaannada kuwaas oo soo kabsaday oo ka tagay cusbitaalka 2 toddobaad ka hor, taas oo muujinaysa in fayraska cusub ee la aqoonsaday uu noqon karo xaalad wareeg ah oo la mid ah hargabka.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, calaamadaha ballanta leh ayaa ka dhacay Shinaha iyadoo laga tixraacayo hoos u dhaca tirada kiisaska cusub, taas oo mtusaysa istaraatiijiyadaha hadda in laga yaabo inay shaqaynayeen.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, calaamado rajo leh ayaa ka dhacay Shiinaha oo ku saleysan hoos u dhaca tirada kiisaska cusub, taasoo muujineysa in xeeladaha hadda jira laga yaabo inay shaqeynayeen.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Ebola ayaa asal ahaan la saadaaliyay inuu sababi karo milyan kiisas halka nus milyan kale ay dhimanayaan.
translated: Ebola ayaa markii hore la saadaaliyay inuu sababi karo ilaa hal milyan oo xaaladood oo ay u dhinteen nus milyan qof.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, iyadoo loo marayo karantiil adag iyo ka soocitaan, cudurka ugu dambayn waa la xakameeyay.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, iyada oo loo marayo karantiil adag iyo go'doomin, cudurka ayaa ugu dambeyntii la xakameeyey.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Waa suuragal, si lamid ah SARS-CoV, in uu SARS-CoV-2 uu daciifi karo xaga qaadsiinta iyo ugu dambayn inuu dhiman karo ama uu noqdo fayruus caabuq yar oo uu la noolaan karo bini'aadanka.
translated: Waa suurtogal, si la mid ah SARS-CoV, in SARS-CoV-2 laga yaabo inay ku daciifto faafitaanka oo aakhirka u dhintaan ama noqdaan fayras cudur-sidee yar oo la nool bini'aadamka.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Barbardhiga safmareenka CoVID-19 kuwa SARS iyo MERS ayaa lagu muuiyay hoos (Jaantuuska 55).
translated: Isbarbardhigga faafitaanka COVID-19 iyo kan SARS iyo MERS ayaa hoos lagu bixiyay (Jaantus.55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ayaa si wayn loogu gudbin karaa qufaca iyo hindhisada, iyo suurtagal ahaan sidoo kale taabashada tooska ah ee shay'yada uu fadareeyay fayruuska.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 si aad ah ayaa loogu kala qaadaa qufaca ama hindhisada, iyo suurtogalnimada sidoo kale taabashada tooska ah ee walxaha uu fayrasku wasakheeyey.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Fayruuska waxaa sidoo kale laga helay saxarada, taas oo keenaysa suurtaglnimo cusub oo ah inuu ka gudbo saxarada una gudbo afka.
translated: Fayraska ayaa sidoo kale laga helay saxarada, taas oo kor u qaadaysa suurtogalnimada cusub ee saxarada ilaa afka.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Daraasad dhawayd oo laga sameeyay 138 kiisas ayaa sheegtay in 41% kamid ah kiisaska ay suurtagal tahay inuu sabbay caabuqa nosocomial, iyadoo ay kamid yihiin 17 bukaan oo xanuuno kale horay u qbay iyo 40 daryeelayaasha caafimaadka bixiya.
translated: Daraasad dhowaan la sameeyay oo lagu sameeyay 138 xaaladood ayaa lagu sheegay in 41% kiisaska ay suurtogal tahay in ay sababeen caabuqyada isbitaallada, oo ay ku jiraan 17 bukaan oo qaba cudurro kale oo hore iyo 40 daryeel-caafimaad.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Sidaa awgeed, taxaddar wayn waa in loo isticmaala si loo ilaaliyo bini'aadanka, gaar ahaan daryeelayaasha caafimaadka bixiya, shaqaalaha bulshaha, xubnaha qoyska, asxaabta, iyo waliba goobjoogayaasha xiriirka la leh nukaanada mise dadka xanuunka qaaday.
translated: Haddaba, taxaddar weyn waa in loo adeegsadaa si loo ilaaliyo bini'aadamka, gaar ahaan bixiyeyaasha daryeelka caafimaadka, shaqaalaha bulshada, xubnaha qoyska, asxaabta, iyo xitaa kuwa u taagan la xiriirka bukaannada ama dadka cudurka qaba.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Talaabada ugu horaysay ee difaaca ee loo isticmaali karo in hoos loogu dhigo khatarta caabuqa waa in loo maro in la xidho maaskarada wajiga; labadaba isticmaalka maaskarada qaliinka iyo maaskarada naqas siinta N95 (taxanaha #1860 yadii) wuxuu caawinayaa xakamaynta faafitaanka fayruusyada.
translated: Habka ugu horreeya ee difaaca ee loo isticmaali karo in lagu yareeyo khatarta caabuqa waa iyada oo la xidho maaskaro wejiga; labadaba isticmaalka waji-xidhka qaliinka iyo waji-xidhka neefsiga ee N95 (taxane # 1860-aadkii) ayaa gacan ka geysta xakamaynta fiditaanka fayraska.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Masarada afka lagu daboosho ee qaliinka waxay ka hortagayaan dhibcaha dareeraha ee ka imanaya  qof ay suurtagal tahay inuu qabo caabuqa oo kasoo qaadey safar hawada ah ama taabasha goob, halkaas oo aysan qof kale u gudbaynin.
translated: Maaskaro wajiga qalliinka ah ayaa ka hortagaya dhibco dareere ah oo ka yimaada qofka cudurkan laga yaabo inuu ku safro hawada ama ay ku dhegaan sagxadaha alaabta, halkaas oo ay u gudbin karaan kuwa kale.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, kaliya N95 ( taxane # 1860 yo) masarada afka lagu duubto waxay ilaalin karaan nuugista fayras aad u yaryar sida 10 ilaa 80 nm xilliga neefsashada, awood ahaan 5% kaliya oo fayraska ah ayaa awoodo in uu u gudbo si dhamaystiran; SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu la mid yahay SARS-CoV dhinaca xajmiga labadooduna  qiyaas ahaan waaa 85 nm.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, kaliya N95 (taxane # 1860) maaskaro ah ayaa ka ilaalin kara neefsashada virions sida yar 10 ilaa 80 nm, iyada oo kaliya 5% virions ay awoodaan inay si buuxda u galaan; SARS-CoV-2 waxay la mid tahay cabbirka SARS-CoV oo labaduba waa qiyaastii 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Madaama ay walxaha yariiska ah ka gudbi karaan xataa shan masarka afka lagu daboosha ah ee qaliinada oo la isdulsaaray, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad ee si toos ula macaamilaya bukaanada waxaa ku qasab ah in ay xirtaan N95 (taxanaha # 1860 yadii) masarka afka lagu daboosha lakiin ma aha masarada afka lagu daboosho ee qaliinka.
translated: Maaddaama ay qaybo ka mid ah soo geli karaan xitaa shan waji-xidho qalliin oo la isku dhejiyay, bixiyeyaasha daryeelka caafimaadka ee xidhiidhka tooska ah la leh bukaanka waa inay xidhaan maaskaro N95 (taxane # 1860 ah) laakiin maaha maaskaro qalliin.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Waxaa dheer masarka afka lagu xirto, bixiyayaasha daryeelka caafimaad waa in ay xirtaan dhar ayagoo dhan la dhan oo difaaca si  loo sii dhimo taabashada fayruusyada.
translated: Maaskarada ka sokow, bixiyeyaasha daryeelka caafimaadku waa inay xidhaan goonno go'doon ah si ay u yareeyaan xidhiidhka fayraska.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Fayruusyadu qofka waxay ka gali karaan indhaha.
translated: Fayrasyadu sidoo kale waxay qofka ku qaadi karaan indhaha.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
