translated: Labada xaaladoodba, dadka martida loo yahay ayaa si dabiici ah u buka oo waa martigeliyaha dabiiciga ah ee HCoV ama fayraska waalidka.

sourceString: In contrast, if the HCoV is newly introduced to an intermediate host right before or around its introduction to humans, it is not well adapted to the new host and is often pathogenic.
targetString: Taa badelkeeda, hadii HCoV si cusub loogu gudbiyo xanuun qaade dhexdhexaad ah waxyar ka hor misane u dhawaadka marka loo gudbinayo aadanaha, si fiican ulama qabsanin xanuun qaadaha cusub inta badane jeermis ayuu leeyahay.
translated: Taas bedelkeeda, haddii HCoV-ga cusub lagu soo bandhigo martigeliyaha dhexe ka hor ama agagaarka horudhaciisa bini'aadamka, si fiican ulama qabsan martigeliyaha cusub oo badanaa waa cudur-sidaha.

sourceString: This intermediate host can serve as the zoonotic source of human infection and play the role of an amplifying host by allowing the virus to replicate transiently and then transmitting it to humans to amplify the scale of human infection.
targetString: Xanuun sidaha dhexdhexaadka ah wuxuu noqon karaa isha cudurada xoolaha ee bini aadamka qaadsiiyaan ee caabuqa aadanaha wuxuuna ciyaari karaaa doorka xoojinta xanuun sidaha isagoo u ogolaanaya fayraska inuu tarmo mudo gaaban kadibna oo uu ugudbo bini aadamka si uu u xoojiyo ballaca caabuqa aadanaha.
translated: Martigeliyaha dhexe wuxuu u adeegi karaa sida isha zoonotic ee caabuqa bini'aadamka wuxuuna ciyaaraa doorka martigeliyaha xoojinta isagoo u oggolaanaya fayrasku inuu si ku meel gaar ah u soo celiyo ka dibna u gudbiyo bini'aadamka si uu u kordhiyo miisaanka caabuqa aadanaha.

sourceString: An HCoV can undergo a dead-end infection if it cannot sustain its transmission within the intermediate host.
targetString: HCoV wuxuu mari karaa caabuq daba dhaamada hadii uusan ku noolaan karin xanuun sidaha dhexdhexaadka ah.
translated: HCoV-gu waxa uu mari karaa caabuq-dhamaadka-dhamaadka ah haddii aanu sii wadi karin gudbintiisa dhex-dhexaadiyaha.

sourceString: On the contrary, HCoVs can also adapt to the intermediate host and even establish long-term endemicity.
targetString: Taas kasoo horjeedkeeda, HCoVs waxay sidoo kale la qabsan karaan xanuun qaadaha dhexe iyo waliba inay abaabulaan meel gooni ku eekaansho muddo dheer.
translated: Taa lidkeeda, HCoVs waxay sidoo kale la qabsan karaan martigeliyaha dhexdhexaadka ah waxayna xitaa dhisi karaan ciribtirka muddada-dheer.

sourceString: In this case, the intermediate host becomes a natural reservoir host.
targetString: Xaaaladan oo kale, xanuun qaadaha dhexe wuxuu noqonayaa kaydiye xanuun qaade dabiici ah.
translated: Xaaladdan oo kale, martida dhexdhexaadka ah waxay noqotaa martigeliyaha kaydka dabiiciga ah.

sourceString: Epidemiological data revealed retrospectively that the index case of SARS had a contact history with game animals.
targetString: Xogta daraasaadka cudurada safmareenka ah waxay muujisay si dib u eegis ah in kiiska ugu horeeyay ee SARS uu xiriir taariikheed la lahaa xoolaha la xanaaneeyo.
translated: Xogta cudurrada faafa ayaa dib u daaha ka qaaday in kiiska tusaha ee SARS uu xiriir la lahaa xayawaanka ugaadha.

sourceString: Subsequent seroprevalence investigations indicated that animal traders had a higher prevalence of anti-SARS-CoV IgG compared with that of the general population.
targetString: Baaritaanadii isku xigay ee heerka jeermiska waxay muujiyeen in ganacsatada xooluhu ay lahaayeen baahsanaan wayn ee ka hortaga SARS-CoV igG marka loo barbardhigo mida bulsha guud.
translated: Baadhitaannada seroprevalence ee xiga waxay muujiyeen in ganacsatadu ay aad ugu badnaayeen ka-hortagga SARS-CoV IgG marka la barbar dhigo tan dadweynaha.

sourceString: Masked palm civets (Paguma larvata) and a racoon dog in live animal markets were first identified to carry SARS-CoV-like viruses that are almost identical to SARS-CoV.
targetString: Bisad baadiyaha daboolan (Paguma larvata) iyo ey duureedka ee yaala suuqyada xoolaha nool ayaa markii ugu horaysay loo aqoonsaday inay xambaarsanyihiin fayruusyo u eg SARS-CoV kuwaas oo inta badan lamid ah SARS-CoV.
translated: Xirmooyinka timirta ee wajiga daboolan (Paguma larvata) iyo eyga racoon ee suuqyada xoolaha nool ayaa markii ugu horreysay loo aqoonsaday inay wataan fayrasyada SARS-CoV-la mid ah oo ku dhow inay la mid yihiin SARS-CoV.

sourceString: This was indirectly supported by the fact that no further SARS was reported after killing all civets in the markets.
targetString: Tan waxaa si dadban u taageeray xaqiiqda ah in SARS sii badan aan laga soo sheegin kadib dilitaanka dhamaan bisad baadiyaashii joogay suuqa.
translated: Tan waxaa si dadban u taageeray in aan SARS dambe la soo sheegin ka dib markii la laayay dhammaan xashiishka suuqyada.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa lasoo sheegay bisad baadiyaha daboolan ee jooga hawdka mise beeraha ee aan la kulmin suuqyada xoolaha nool ayaa si balaaran looga waayay SARS-CoV, iyadoo soo jeedinaysa in bisad baadiyaha daboolan ay noqon karaan kaliya xanuun qaadaha xoojinaya ee dhexdhexaaadka ah laakiinse aysan ahayn kaydka dabiiciga ah ee SARS-CoV.
translated: Si kastaba ha noqotee, waxaa la soo wariyay in timirta daboolan ee duurka ama beeraha iyada oo aan la soo bandhigin suuqyada xoolaha nool ay si weyn uga xun yihiin SARS-CoV, iyagoo soo jeedinaya in timirta timireed ee maaskarada ah laga yaabo inay u adeegto oo keliya martigeliyaha xoojinta dhexdhexaadka ah laakiin maaha kaydka dabiiciga ah ee SARS. -CoV.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: Si xusid mudan, maadaama 80% xoolaha kala duwan ee suuqyada Guangzhou ay leeyihiin ka hortagga jirka ee ka hortagga SARS-CoV, suurtagalnimada in noolayaal dhawr ah ee naasalayda yaryar ay sidoo kale noqon karaa xanuun qaadayaal xoojinaya oo dhexdhexaad ah ee SARS-CoV meesha lagama saari karo.
translated: Waxaa xusid mudan, maadaama 80% xoolaha kala duwan ee suuqyada Guangzhou ay leeyihiin unugyada ka-hortagga SARS-CoV, suurtagalnimada in noocyada kala duwan ee naasleyda yaryar ay sidoo kale u adeegi karaan marti-geliyaha dhexdhexaadka ah ee SARS-CoV lagama saari karo.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Dhamaan kuwan waxay u muuqdaan inay yihiin dhmaadka xanuun qaadaha SARS-CoV.
translated: Dhammaan kuwan waxay u muuqdaan inay yihiin martigaliyayaasha dhammaadka-dhamaadka ah ee SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: Raadin isku xigtay ee xanuun qaadaha xoolaha dabiiciga ahee SARS-CoV wuxuu daaha ka rogay CoV fiidmaar oo si aad ah ugu dhaw, oo loo yaqaan SARS-la xiriirka Phinolophus Cov ka iidmaarta HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), kaas oo ka jira kabaha fardaha fiidmaaraha Shiinaha.
translated: Raadinta xigtay ee xayawaanka dabiiciga ah ee SARS-CoV ayaa daaha ka qaaday fiidmeerta isku dhow ee CoV, oo loo yaqaan SARS-xiriirka Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), kaas oo ku jira fiidmeerta fardaha Shiinaha.

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: Fiidmeerooyinkaani waxay qabaan ka hortaga jirka ee SARS-CoV iyo taxanaha genome ee SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
translated: Fiidmeerahani waxay u fiican yihiin unugyada ka-hortagga-SARS-CoV iyo taxanaha hiddo-wadaha ee SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Tan iyo CoV yada kale ee fiidmaarta waxaa wadaagaan 88-92% taxanaha nucleotide ee isu eg ee leh SARS-CoV.
translated: Tani iyo fiidmeerta kale ee CoVs waxay wadaagaan 88-92% isku xigxiga isku xigxiga nucleotide ee SARS-CoV.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: Daraasaadkan waxay u gogol xaareen fikrada cusub ee ah in fiidmaruhu ay kayd u yihiin jeermisyada ku dhaca aadanaha ee soo ifbaxaya.
translated: Daraasadahani waxay aasaas u noqdeen fikradda cusub ee fiidmeerta ay martigeliyaan cudur-sidaha aadanaha ee soo baxaya.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: Dhawr SARS oo u eg CoVs (SL-CoVs) ayaa sidoo kale laga ogaaday fiidmeerta, laakiin midna marka laga reebo hal WIV1 oo la qaabeeyay ayaa loo aqoonsan karaa fayras nool.
translated: Dhawr SARS u eg CoVs (SL-CoVs) ayaa sidoo kale laga aqoonsaday fiidmeerta, laakiin midna marka laga reebo hal WIV1 loo qoondeeyay ayaa loo karantiilaa sida fayras nool.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Dheecaan u badelaha 2  ee angiotensin ka aadanaha (ACE2) ayaa loo aqoonsaday inuu yahay dareemaha SARS-CoV.
translated: Angiotensin-ka bini'aadamka ee beddela enzyme 2 (ACE2) waxaa loo yaqaanaa inuu yahay soo-dhoweeyaha SARS-CoV.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: WIV1 laga keenay tijaabooyinka saxarada fiidmaarta ayaa lagu ogaaday inay u isticmaalaan fiidmaarta, bisada baadiyaha ku nool iyo ACE2 ga bini'aadanka dareeme ahaan galitaanka unuga.
translated: WIV1 oo laga soo qaatay muunada saxarada ee fiidmeerta ayaa la muujiyay in loo isticmaalo fiidmeerta, civet iyo ACE2 biniaadmi ah sidii soo-qabteyaasha gelitaanka unugga.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: Si xiiso leh, sera ga bukaanada kasoo bogsanaya SARS ayaa awooday inay ka takhalusaan WIV1.
translated: Si xiiso leh, sera of convalescent bukaannada SARS ayaa awooday inay ka takhalusaan WIV1.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: Ilaa xad, WIV1 waxay matashaa quruumaha hore ee si dhaw isula xiriira ee SARS-CoV ee laga helo fiidmeerta, iyagoo wadaagaya 95% taxanaha nucleotide ee xirnaantooda iswada.
translated: Ilaa hadda, WIV1 waxay ka dhigan tahay awoowaha aadka ugu dhow ee SARS-CoV ee fiidmeerta, wadaaga 95% isku xigxiga nucleotide.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Albeit isu eekaanshaha wayn ee u dhaxeeya labadan fayruusyo, waxaa si guud loo aaminsanyahay in WIV1 uusan ahayn asalka dhaw ee fayruuska SARS-CoV oo fiidmaaruhuna aysan ahayn ahayn kaydka xanuun qaadaha ugu dhaw ee SARS-CoV.
translated: In kasta oo ay isku mid yihiin labadan fayras, waxaa guud ahaan la rumeysan yahay in WIV1 uusan ahayn fayraska waalidka ee SARS-CoV isla markaana fiidmeerta aysan ahayn martigeliyaha kaydka degdegga ah ee SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: Falanqaynta daraasaadka asalka noolaha waxay MERS-CoV isku koox ka dhigaysaa kooxda lamidka ah iidmaadta CoV-HKU4 iyo fiidmaarta CoV-HKU5.
translated: Falanqaynta phylogenetic waa MERS-CoV oo isku koox ah sida fiidmeerta CoV-HKU4 iyo fiidmeerta CoV-HKU5.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: Fiid-meerta CoV-HKU4 iyo MERS-CoV waxay isla isticmaalaan xanuun-sidaha hal dareeme, dipeptidyl peptisase 4 (DPP4), oo loogu talagalay mareenka fayraska.
translated: Fiidmeerta CoV-HKU4 iyo MERS-CoV waxay ka faa'iidaystaan isla soo-dhoweeyaha martida loo yahay, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), gelitaanka fayraska.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: RNA ga ku tiirsan RNA polymerase ee MERS-CoV ayaa barasha ahaanta ayaa kooxeyn u dhaw kuwa lamid ka ah ee fiid-meerta beta-CoV yada lagu arkay Yurub iyo Afrika.
translated: RNA-ku-tiirsanaanta RNA polymerase ee taxanaha MERS-CoV waxay si dabiici ah ugu dhow yihiin dhiggooda fiidmeerta beta-CoVs ee laga aqoonsaday Yurub iyo Afrika.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: Ilaa hada, majiraan wax MERS-CoV oo nool oo laga heli karo fiid-meerta duurjoogta ah.
translated: Ilaa hadda, MERS-CoV nool lagama heli karo fiidmeerta duurjoogta ah.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MES-CoV iyo fiid-meerta ugu dhaw ee la xiriira CoV-HKU25 waxay wadaagaan keli ah 87% nucleotide oo asal ahaan isku mid iskuna xiga.
translated: MERS-CoV iyo fiidmeerkeeda xiga ee CoV-HKU25 waxay wadaagaan kaliya 87% isku xigxiga isku xigxiga nucleotide.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, fiid-meertu waxaa laga yaabaa in aysan ahayn u kaydiyaha xanuun-sidaha ugu dhaw ee cudurka MERS-CoV.
translated: Sidaa darteed, fiidmeerta waxaa laga yaabaa inaysan ahayn martigeliyaha kaydka degdega ah ee MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: Dinaca kale, daraasaddo laga sameeyay gudaha Bariga Dhexe ayaa tusinaysa in geela dhaqashada hal kurus leh laga helay duffaaca jirka oo u gaar ah dhexdhexaadinaya MERS-CoV, geelaas asalkiisu yahay Bariga Dhexe waxaa la mid ah kuwo dalal badanaa Afrikaanka ah.
translated: Dhanka kale, daraasado laga sameeyay Bariga Dhexe ayaa muujiyay in geela dhogorta leh ay seropositive ka yihiin unugyada difaaca jirka ee MERS-CoV, oo la mid ah geela asal ahaan ka soo jeeda Bariga Dhexe ee dalal badan oo Afrikaan ah.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: MERS-CoV ee sida tooska ah ugu eeg fayraska laga helay bina aadamka ayaa waxaa laga helay baadhitaano lagu sameeyay geela, intaas waxaa dheer in uu geeli muujiyay in uu ka nabad qabo kaydiyaasha xanuun sidaha MERS-CoV
translated: Nool MERS-CoV oo la mid ah fayraska laga helay bini'aadamka ayaa laga soocay sanka sanka ee geela dhogorta leh, taas oo sii tusinaysa in geelu u adeego sidii kaydka badbaadada ee MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxaa xusitaan mudan in guud ahaan calaamadaha fudud balse sii daynta weyn fayraska lagu arkay geela tijaaba ahaan kuwa qaba caabuqa MERS-CoV.
translated: Waxa kale oo xusid mudan in guud ahaan calaamadaha khafiifka ah laakiin daadinta fayrasku aad u weyn lagu arkay geela si tijaabo ah looga qaaday MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: Waxaa xusitaan mudan, in geela caabuqa qaaday uusan kasoo daynin fayrasyada kaliga dariiqa neef-mareenka balse sidoo kale kasoo daayay dariiqa saxarada, kaas oo ah dariiqa ugu weyn ee fiid-meerta kasoo daysay fayrasyada.
translated: Waxaa xusid mudan, geela cudurka qaba kuma daadiyo fayrasyada ma aha oo kaliya dariiqa neefsashada laakiin sidoo kale marin saxarada iyo afka, kaas oo sidoo kale ah dariiqa ugu muhiimsan ee fayrasku ka daadiyo fiidmeerta.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, suaalaha wali way jiraan madaama kiisas badan oo MERS ah oo la xaqiijiyay aysan tariikh la macaamilid aysan la lahayn geela ka hor bilawga calaamadaha, waxaa macquul in ay sababtay gudbinta bina aadamka dhexdiisa ah ama dariiqyo gudbineed oo aan la ogayn oo ku lug leh xayawaan aan la ogayn kaas oo MERS-CoV hoy ka dhigtay.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, su'aalaha ayaa weli taagan maadaama kiisas badan oo la xaqiijiyay oo MERS ah aysan lahayn taariikh xiriir ah oo geela ka hor inta aysan calaamaduhu bilaabmin, oo si macquul ah loogu nisbaynayo gudbinta bini'aadamka- bini'aadamka ama dariiqyada gudbinta aan la garanayn ee ku lug leh noocyada xayawaanka aan la aqoonsan ee ku xiran MERS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu la wadaaga 96.2% isku mid ahaanshaha asal ahaaneed ee nucleotide ka fiid-meerta CoV RaTG13 oo laga karantiilay fiid-meeraha Rhinolophuw affinis.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 waxay la wadaagtaa 96.2% nucleotide homology oo leh fiidmeerta CoV RaTG13 oo ka go'doonsan fiidmeerta Rhinolophus affinis.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: Sida kiisaska SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, kala duwanaanshaha is xigxiga ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 ayaa ah sidoo kale ah mid si wayn loogu maleeyo in xiriir waalidnimo ka dheexeeyo.
translated: Sida xaaladaha SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, kala duwanaanshaha isku xigxiga ee u dhexeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 aad bay u weyn tahay in lagu meeleeyo xidhiidhka waalidka.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: Midaas waa in la dhaho, fiid-meeraha ma aha u kaydiyaha cudur-sidaha (yaasha) ee SARS-CoV-2 ilaa laga helo mustaqbalka kuwa la mid ah fiid-meero CoV yada .
translated: Taasi waa in la yiraahdo, fiidmeerta waxaa laga yaabaa inaysan ahayn martigeliyaha kaydka kaydka ee SARS-CoV-2 haddii aan mustaqbalka la helin wax isku mid ah CoVs.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: Waxaa suurtagal ah, in xayaawanka xanuun-sidayaasha ee SARS-CoV-2 ay ka tirsanyihiin noolaha duurjoogta la gato oo la qasho ee lagu gado Dukaamadada waaweyn ee Suuqa Huanan SeaFood, kaas oo kiisaskii ugu horeeyay ee COVID-19 la halmaalay, ayaado tusinaysa dhacdada saxda ah ee u gudbinta xayawaaneed ee bina aadamka.
translated: Malaha, martigaliyayaasha xayawaanka dhexdhexaadka ah ee SARS-CoV-2 waa inay ka mid noqdaan noocyada duurjoogta ah ee lagu iibiyo laguna dilo Suuqa Jumlada Badweynta Huanan, oo qaar badan oo ka mid ah kiisaska ugu horreeya ee COVID-19 lala xiriiriyay, taasoo muujineysa xayawaan macquul ah-ilaa- dhacdo gudbinta aadanaha.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Daraasaddo  badan oo hada la sameeyay oo ah barashada hida sidaha oo isku xiga ayaa soo jeedisay koox  naasalay yar ah oo halis ah oo loo yaqaan pangolins (Manis Javanica) in ay noqon karaan sidoo kale asalka faraca beta-CoV yada la xariira SARS-CoV-2
translated: Daraasado dhowr ah oo dhowaan la sameeyay oo ku saleysan isku xigxiga metagenomic ayaa soo jeediyay in koox naasley yar yar oo halis ah oo loo yaqaan pangolins (Manis javanica) ay sidoo kale qaadi karaan beta-CoVs awoowayaasha ee la xiriira SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoV kan cusub ee hida sidaha pangolines ka waxay la wadaagaan SARS-CoV-2 85-92% ee isku mid ahaansha asal ahaaneed ee shaxda nucleotide
translated: Genomy-yadan cusub ee pangolin CoV waxay wadaagaan 85-92% isku xigxiga isku xigxiga nucleotide ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Si kasta ha noqotee, waxay si siman oo aad ugu dhaw xiriir ula leeyihiin RatG13 qiyaas ahaan 90% aqoonsashada heerka shaxda ee nucleotide.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxay si isku mid ah ula xiriiraan RaTG13 oo leh qiyaastii 90% aqoonsiga heerka isku xigxiga nucleotide.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: Waxay u qaybiyaan laba farac ahaaneed oo hoose ee SARS-CoV-2 sida fayrasyada ee habka kal saarida, mid la wadaaga dareemayaal isku dhagan (RBD) SARS-CoV-2, oo leh 97.4%  ee aqoonsiga shaxda amino asidh.
translated: Waxay u kala qaybsan yihiin laba qaybood oo hoose oo ah fayrasyada SARS-CoV-2-la mid ah ee geedka phylogenetic, mid ka mid ah kaas oo wadaaga aagga xidhidhiyaha soo-dhowaynta la midka ah (RBD) ee SARS-CoV-2, oo leh 97.4% aqoonsiga taxanaha amino acid.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: Isbarbardhigida muqaal ahaaneed ee SARS-CoV-2 ee RBD yada iyo RaTG13 ayaa aad ukala duwan,  inkastoo uu jiro heer sare oo ah isku mid ahaanshaha  asal ahaaneed oo balaaran ee shaxda hida sidaha.
translated: Marka la barbardhigo, RBD-yada SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 waa kuwo aad u kala duwan, in kasta oo ay ka sarreeyaan isku xigxiga genome-ga.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Daraasad hore oo lagu sameeyay pangolins xanuunan ayaa sido kale kuso warantay ogaanshaha fayras faafitaan badan oo laga helay sambal laga qaaday wadnaha, kaas oo isu badalay in uu la xariiro SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Daraasad hore oo lagu sameeyay pangolins-ka buka ayaa sidoo kale sheegtay in laga helay xuubka fayraska ee sambabada sambabada, kuwaas oo isu rogay inay la mid yihiin SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: Daraasadan oo laga soo qaatay habab oo la isu keenay iyo daaweynta gacan ahaaneed si loo soo saaro taxanaha qayb  ahaaneed ee hida sidaha oo ka kooban ku dhawaad 86.3% oo ah dheerarka-buuxa ee hida sidaha  fayraska
translated: Daraasadani waxay qaadatay habab kala duwan oo isku-ururin ah iyo hab-nadiifinta gacanta si ay u abuurto taxane genome qayb ah oo ka kooban qiyaastii 86.3% ee genome-ka viral-ka oo dhan.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Meesha kama saari karno suurtagalnimadda in uu yahay mid kamid ah qaadaha xanuunka SARS-CoV-2
translated: Ma ka saari karno suurtagalnimada in pangolin uu yahay mid ka mid ah martigeliyaha xayawaanka dhexdhexaadka ah ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Si kasta hanoqotee, waqti xaadirkan majiraan wax cadaymaha sii toos ah u tageeraya asalka ee ah SARS-CoV-2 ee pangolin sababtoo ah kala duwanaanshaha isku xiga ee SAR-CoV-2 iyo SARS-CoV-2 ee pangolin kaaso xariir la leh beta-CoVs.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, hadda ma jiraan wax caddayn ah oo taageeraya asal pangolin toos ah ee SARS-CoV-2 sababtuna tahay kala duwanaanshaha isku xigxiga ee u dhexeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo pangolin SARS-CoV-2 ee la xidhiidha beta-CoVs.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Intaa waxaa dheer, masaafada u dhaxaysa SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 ayaa xataa aad uga gaaban mida u dhaxaysa SARs-CoV-2 iyo SARS-CoV-2 pangolin ee la xariira beta-CoVs.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, masaafada u dhaxaysa SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 xitaa way ka gaaban tahay ta u dhaxaysa SARS-CoV-2 iyo pangolin SARS-CoV-2 ee la xidhiidha beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: Dariiqa isbadalka noolaha ee SARS-CoV-2 ee fiid-meeraha, pangolins, iyo naasalayda kale ayaa wali la wadaa badhitaanadooda.
translated: Dariiqa korriinka ee SARS-CoV-2 ee fiidmeerta, pangolins iyo naasleyda kale ayaa weli ah in la aasaaso.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: Halka laga helay isku eekaanshaha asal ahaaneed ee u saraysay RBD yada ee u dhaxaysa SARS-CoV-2 iyo qarandida,SARS-CoV-2 ee la xariira beta-CoV yada iyo RaTG13 waxay wadaagaan isku mid ahaanshaha asal ahaaneed ee hida sidaha oo balaaran.
translated: Halka isku xigxiga isku xigxiga ugu sarreeya laga helay RBD-yada u dhexeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-la xidhiidha beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 iyo RaTG13 waxay wadaagaan isku xigxiga genome-ballaaran ee ugu sarreeya.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: Waxaa si aad ah loogu malaynayaa isu eekaanshaha laga helay RBD yada ee SARS-CoV-2 ga pangolin ee la xariira beta-CoV yada iyo SARS-CoV-2 taas oo laga keenay xulasho-dhexdhexaadin ahaaneed ee qiimaynada isku midka ah.
translated: Waa wax aad loo mala-awaalayo in heerka sare ee isku ekaanshaha u dhexeeya RBD-yada pangolin SARS-CoV-2-la xiriira beta-CoVs iyo SARS-CoV-2 uu horseedo isbeddel-dhexdhexaadin dhexdhexaadin ah.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: Soo jeedinta kale ayaa doorbidaysa dib isugu dhafka SARS-CoV-2 ga pangolin ee la xariira beta-CoV iyo RaTG13 iyo xayawaanka duur-joogta ah ee saddexaad.
translated: Soo jeedin liddi ku ah ayaa door ah dib-u-habaynta u dhaxaysa pangolin SARS-CoV-2-la xidhiidha beta-CoV iyo RaTG13 ee noocyada xayawaanka duurjoogta ah ee saddexaad.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: Si xoog ah u wadista qiimaynta, dib isugu dhafka ayaa si aad ugu faafaya beta-CoV yada.
translated: Sida xoogga kobcinta, dib-u-habaynta ayaa ku baahsan beta-CoVs.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kooxda ka go'aan garista wali way ku maqanyihiin asalka xanuunada xooluhu qaadsiiyaan bina aadamka ee SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Xeerbeegtida ayaa wali ka maqan asalka zoonotic-ka ee SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: Kasokow HCoVs-ka jeermiska badan, asalka cudurada ay xooluhu bina aadamka qaadsiiyaan ee HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 iyo HCoV-HkU1 ayaa sidoo kale la darsay.
translated: Ka sokow HCoV-yada cudur-sidaha aadka u faafa, asalka zoonotic ee HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 iyo HCoV-HKU1 ayaa sidoo kale la darsay.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: Cadaynta daraasaadka kala saarida noolaha ayaa muujinaya in HCoV-NL63 iyo HCoV-229E ay labaduba kaso farcameen CoV ka fiid-meerta, halka asalka fayrasyada HCoV-OC43 iyo HCoV-HKU1 laga helay jiirka.
translated: Caddaynta phylogenetic waxay muujisay in labada HCoV-NL63 iyo HCoV-229E laga yaabo inay ka soo jeedaan CoVs fiidmeerta, halka fayraska waalidka ee HCoV-OC43 iyo HCoV-HKU1 laga helay jiirka.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Waxaa lasoo sheegay in fiid-meerta CoV oo loo yaqaan ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) oo lagu arkay Waqooyiga Maraykanka in fiid-meer saddex midab leh ay muujisay xiriir aad u dhaw HCoV-Nl63.
translated: Waxaa la sheegay in fiidmeerta CoV ee lagu magacaabo ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) laga helay fiidmeerta saddex midab ee Waqooyiga Ameerika ay muujisay xiriir dhow oo ay la leedahay HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, HCoV-229E in uu hida sida ahaan la xiriiro CoV kale ee fiid-meerta, kaas oo loo yaqaan Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, taas oo lagu arkay Ghana, halka nooc geel ah na looga shakiyay inuu yahay xanuun-side dhexdhexaad ah.
translated: Dhanka kale, HCoV-229E waxay hidde ahaan xiriir la leedahay Fiidmeerta kale ee CoV, oo lagu magacaabo Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, kaas oo laga helay Ghana, halka geela sidoo kale looga shakisan yahay inuu yahay martigeliyaha dhexe.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: Cadaymo ahaan, aqoonta hada ah ee asal ahaanta xoolaha ee la ogaaday HCoV yada ayaa lagu soo koobay Jaantuska 1 iyo Shaxda 2.
translated: Si loo caddeeyo, aqoonta hadda jirta ee asalka xayawaanka ee HCoV-yada la yaqaan ayaa lagu soo koobay Jaantuska 1 iyo Shaxda 2.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: Taxliilinta daraasaadka kala saarida noolaha ayaa bixiyay cadaymo ah in dhacdooyinka tariikheed ee isu gudbinta noolaha dhexdooda ee HCoV yada.
translated: Falanqaynta phylogenetic waxay bixisay caddaynta dhacdooyinka gudbinta noocyada kala duwan ee HCoVs ee taariikhda.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: Markii HcOV-OC43 uu usoo gudbay noolaha in caabuqa ku rido bina aadamka kaas oo laga keenay xoolaha dab-joogta ah kudhawaadkii 1890, caabuqa neef-mareenka ee caalamiga ah ayaa la diwaan galiyay.
translated: Markii HCoV-OC43 ay ka gudubtay noocyada si ay bini'aadamka uga qaadaan xoolaha guriga ku dhawaad 1890, masiibo caabuqa neef-mareenka ayaa la duubay.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: .Taariikhda gudbinta HCoV-229E ee noolaha dhexdiisa ayaa si fiican u cadayn
translated: Taariikhda gudbinta noocyada kala duwan ee HCoV-229E aad ayay u caddahay.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: Waxaa la ogaaday in fiid-meerta alpha-CoV yada ayaa si aad u dhaw xiriir ula leedahay HCoV-229E.
translated: Bat alfa-CoVs oo si dhow ula xidhiidha HCoV-229E ayaa la helay.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: Iyaga dhexdooda waxaa jira alpaca alpha-CoV.
translated: Inta u dhaxaysa waxaa jira alpaca alfa-CoV.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: Cadaymo badan ayaa taageeraya in uu fayraska fiid-meerta u ga gudbo bina adamka si toos ah
translated: Dhowr xariiq oo caddayn ah ayaa taageeraya gudbinta fayraska fiidmeerta si toos ah bini'aadamka.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: Ugu horeyn, bina aadamka balse ma aha alpacas kuwa u dhaw in ay la macaamilaan fiid-meeraha  la wadaaga deegaan nololkeeda.
translated: Marka hore, bini'aadamka laakiin aan alpacas ahayn waxaa laga yaabaa inay xiriir la yeeshaan fiidmeerta goob deegaan oo la wadaago.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: .Taas badalkeed, bina aadamka la macaamil dhaw ayuu la leeyahay alpacas
translated: Taa beddelkeeda, bini'aadamku waxay xiriir dhow la leeyihiin alpacas.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: Labaad, HCoV-229E ee la xariira alpha-CoV yada fiid-meerta ayaa ka duwan wax jeermis ahna aan ku lahayn fiid-meeraha, halka alpaca alpha-CoV oo sababay dilaaca cudurka neef-mareenka ee xayawaanka caabuqa ku dhacay.
translated: Midda labaad, fiidmeerta la xiriirta HCoV-229E ee alfa-CoVs way kala duwan yihiin oo aan cudur-sidaha lahayn fiidmeerta, halka alpaca alfa-CoV ay sababtay cudur neef-mareenka oo ka dillaacay xayawaanka cudurka qaba.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: Ugu dambeyn, alpaca alpha-CoV laga ma helin xayawaanka duur-joogta ah.
translated: Ugu dambeyntiina, alpaca alpha-CoV lagama helin xayawaanka duurjoogta ah.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, suurtagalnimada lagama saari karo meesha in alpacas uu ka helo HCoV-229E ee la xariira alpha-CoV ee bina aadamka.
translated: Markaa, suurtogalnimada lagama saari karo in alpacas ay ka helaan alfa-CoV-ga la xidhiidha HCoV-229E ee aadanaha.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: Xaqiiq ahaan, fiidmaaruhu waa isha tooska ah ee fayruusyada jeermiska leh ee aadanaha oo ay kamid yihiin fayraska rabies, fayraskaa Ebola, fayraska Nipah iyo fayraska Hendra.
translated: Dhab ahaantii, fiidmeertu waa isha tooska ah ee fayrasyada cudur-sidaha bini'aadamka oo ay ku jiraan fayraska raabiyada, fayraska Ebola, fayraska Nipah iyo fayraska Hendra.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: Sidaas darteed mid aad loola yaabo maahan in fiidmaaaruhu ay u gudbin karaan HCoV-229E bini'aadanka si toos ah.
translated: Sidaa darteed wax lala yaabo maaha in fiidmeerta ay si toos ah ugu gudbin karaan HCoV-229E aadanaha.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Taas si lamidah, halka alpha-CoV yada fiidmaartu ay yihiin barkada hiddaha ee HCoV-229E, alpacas iyo geela halka kurus leh ayaa ahaan kara xanuun side dhexdhexaad ah oo u gudbiya fayruusyada bini'aadanka, sida saxda ah sida xaalada MERS-CoV.
translated: Haddii kale, halka fiidmeerta alfa-CoVs ay u adeegto sida barkada hiddaha ee HCoV-229E, alpacas iyo geela dromedary ayaa laga yaabaa inay u adeegaan martigeliyayaal dhexdhexaad ah oo u gudbiya fayrasyada aadanaha, sida saxda ah ee MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: MERS-CoV ayaa ah tusaale heer sare ee gudbinta noolayaasha ka gudbaya fiidmaaraha una gudbaya geela halka kurus leh iyo ka an ka gudbaya geela halka kurus leh una gudbaya bini'aadanka.
translated: MERS-CoV waxa ay u adeegtaa tusaale aad u wanaagsan oo ah isku-gudbinta noocyada kala duwan ee fiidmeerta ilaa geela dhogorta ah iyo geela dhogorta leh ee u gudba dadka.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: Asalka isbadelka ee MERS-CoV ee ka yimid fiidmaaraha ayaa loo yaqaanay aqoonsigiisa hore waxaana sidoo kale xoojiyay natiijooyinka isxiga.
translated: Asalkii kobaca ee MERS-CoV ee ka yimid fiidmeerta waxaa lagu yaqaan aqoonsigiisa bilowga ah waxaana sidoo kale lagu xoojiyay natiijooyinkii xigay.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Waa caadi in fiidmaaruhu ay keenaan meel wayn oo fayraska qani ku ah ee isdhexgalka noolayaasha iswaydaarsiga qaybaha hiddaha iyo u gudbinta noolayaasha isdhex gala.
translated: Waa wax iska cad in fiidmeerta ay bixiso noocyo badan oo fayras ah oo loogu talagalay isdhaafsiga jajabyada hiddaha iyo gudbinta noocyada kala duwan.

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: Cimri dheerida, kooxaha sida baahsan u dagay, isdhexgalka bulshada ee isu dhaw iyo awooda xooga leh ee duulitaanka ayaa ah dhamaan xaaladaha u fiican fiidmaaraha inay ahaadaan 'fayruus faafiye' ku haboon.
translated: Cimri dheer, deegaan aad u cufan, is-dhexgal bulsho oo dhow iyo awood duullimaadeed oo xooggan ayaa dhammaantood ah shuruudo wanaagsan oo fiidmeerku u noqon karo 'fayraska fidiyaha' ku habboon.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, MERS-CoV ayaa ku dhacay geela halka kurus leh toboneeyo sano gudahood.
translated: Dhanka kale, MERS-CoV waxaa lagu soo bandhigay geela dhogorta leh muddo tobanaan sano ah.

sourceString: It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host.
targetString: Waxay si fiican ula qabsadeen geelashan kuwaas oo ka badelmay xanuun side dhexdhexaad ah una badelmay kayd xanuun side dagan oo dabiici ah.
translated: Si fiican ayey ula qabsanaysaa geelaas oo ka soo noqday marti-gal dhexdhexaad ah oo u soo jeestay hoy kayd oo dabiici ah oo deggan.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.
targetString: MERS-CoV wuxuu sababaa cudur aad u khafiif ah wuxuuna joogteeyaa isbeddello aad u yar oo xayawaanadan ku jira.
translated: MERS-CoV wuxuu keenaa cudur aad u fudud wuxuuna ilaaliyaa heerka isbeddelka ee xayawaankan.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.
targetString: Gudbinteeda marmarka ah ee bini'aadanka waa shil bini'aadankuna waxay yihiin xanuun side dhamaad ah ee MERS-CoV maadaama oo gudbinteeda uusan noolan karin.
translated: Sida teel-teel ah ee ay ugu gudbiso bini'aadamka waa shil, bini'aadamkuna waxay ahaanayaan marti-geliyaha dhammaadka-dhamaadka ah ee MERS-CoV maadaama gudbintiisa aan la sii wadi karin.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.
targetString: Kasoo horjeedka doorka geela ee gudbinta MERS-CoV, doorka qarandiyaasha, haday waxa uun jiraan, ee gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 ayaa ka duwan.
translated: Marka la barbardhigo doorka geela ee gudbinta MERS-CoV, doorka pangolins, haddii ay jirto, gudbinta SARS-CoV-2 way ka duwan tahay.

sourceString: Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, beta-CoVs qarandida ayaa saa'id jeermis ugu leh qarandiyaasha.
translated: Gaar ahaan, pangolin beta-CoVs waxay aad ugu nugul yihiin pangolins-yada.

sourceString: They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Waxay noqon karaan xanuun side aan caabuq gudbin ee beta-CoV yada la xiriira SARS-CoV-2, si lamid ah bisadaha baadiyaha ee SARS-CoV.
translated: Waxa laga yaabaa inay noqdaan marti-geliyaha dhammaadka-dhamaadka ah ee SARS-CoV-2-la-xidhiidha beta-CoVs, oo la mid ah civets kiiska SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: Suurtagalnimo dhawr ah ee u gudbitaanka SARS-CoV-2 noolayaasha kalanooca ah isagoo ka gudbaya xoolaha una gudbaya bini'aadanka ayaa ah in lagu tijaabiya ama meesha laga saara marka la samaynayo daraasaadka mustaqbalka.
translated: Dhawr fursadood oo is-dhexgal ah oo SARS-CoV-2 ah oo xoolaha u gudbinaya aadanaha waa in lagu xukumo ama meesha laga saaro daraasadaha mustaqbalka.

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Ugu horayn, fiidmaaruhu waxay noqon karaan kaydka xanuun sidaha SARS-CoV-2 ee fayruuska la xiriira kaas oo inta badan u eg SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Marka hore, fiidmeerta waxay noqon kartaa martigeliyaha kaydka ee fayraska la xidhiidha SARS-CoV-2 ku dhawaad la mid ah SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.
targetString: Bini'aadanka ayaa la wadaagi kara fiidmaaraha doorka deeganka iyagoo u maraya hilib jarjarista mise dhuxul dubista.
translated: Aadamuhu waxa laga yaabaa in ay fiidmeerta la wadaagaan niche-ecoloji iyaga oo goynaya ama qodista dhuxusha.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: Tan labaad, pangolins ayaa noqon kara mid kamid ah xoojiyaha xanuun sidaha dhexe kaas oo fayruuska la xiriira SARS-CoV-2 dhawaan la ogaaday.
translated: Midda labaad, pangolins waxay noqon kartaa mid ka mid ah martigeliyaha xoojinta dhexdhexaadka ah kaas oo fayraska la xiriira SARS-CoV-2 dhawaan lagu soo bandhigay.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: Bini'aadanka ayuu ku dhacaa fayruusku isagoo usoo maraya u gaarsashada iyo isticmaalka hilibka ugaarta.
translated: Bini'aadanku waxa uu fayraska ku qaadaa goynta iyo cunista hilibka ugaarta.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Waa suurtagal in naaslay fara badan oo ay ku jiraan xoolaha guri joogta ah ay u badantahay inuu ku dhaco SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Waa suurtogal in naaslay badan oo ay ku jiraan xayawaanka gurigu ay u nugul yihiin SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.
targetString: Baadhitaan guud oo lagu sameeyay xoolaha gurijoogta iyo duurjoogta ee ku saabsan antibody yada ayaa la damaanad qaaday.
translated: Sahan lagu sameeyo xayawaanka guriga iyo duurjoogta ee unugyada difaaca jirka waa la dammaanad qaaday.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: Tan saddexaad, sida kor lagu sheegay, dib isugu imaatinka iyo la qabsiga SARS-CoV-2 ayaa laga yaabay inuu ku dhacay noole nooc kale oo saddexaad kaas oo xiriir la lahaa labadaba fiidmarta iyo qarandiyaasha.
translated: Saddexaad, sidaan kor ku soo sheegnay, dib-u-habaynta iyo la qabsiga SARS-CoV-2 waxa laga yaabaa inay ku dhacday nooc saddexaad oo xidhiidh la leh fiidmeerta iyo pangolins labadaba.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: Baaritaanka asalka xoolaha SARS-CoV-2 ayaa wali socda.
translated: Raadinta asalka xayawaanka ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa wali socda.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: Marka laga reebo noocyada kala duwan ee xoolaha xanuun sidaha, saddexda qodob ee ugu wayn dhinaca fayruuska ayaa sidoo kale muhiim u ah fududaynta CoV yada inay ka gudbaan xayndaabka noolayaasha kala nooca ah.
translated: Marka laga reebo noocyada kala duwan ee martida xayawaanka, saddex arrimood oo waaweyn oo dhinaca fayraska ah ayaa sidoo kale muhiim u ah fududaynta CoVs si ay uga gudbaan caqabadaha noocyada.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: Ugu horayn, marka loo eego waxaa jira qiyaas wayn ee isbadelka taranka RNA.
translated: Ugu horreyntii, heerarkooda isbeddelka sare ee soo-noqoshada RNA.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: Marka loo barbardhigo fayrasyada kale ee RNA hal xariglaha ah, xadka isbadelka la qiyaasay ee CoVs ayaa loo aqoonsan karaa "mi dhexe" ilaa "mid sare" isagoo leh celcelis ahaan xadka isbedelka oo ah ~10-4 isbadel sanadkiiba meeshi 2, iyadoo ku tirsan wajiga la qabsashada CoV ee xanuun sidaha aan caadiga ahayn.
translated: Marka la barbar dhigo fayrasyada kale ee hal-xidhaale ee RNA, qiyaasaha is beddelka ee CoVs waxaa loo tixgalin karaa inay yihiin "dhexdhexaad" ilaa "sare" iyadoo celcelis ahaan heerka beddelka uu yahay ~ 10-4 beddelka sannadkiiba goobta 2, iyadoo ku xidhan wejiga CoV la qabsiga martigeliyaha novel.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: CoV yada waxay leeyihiin xaqiijin akhris oo exoribonuclease, tirtirida taas oo ay ka dhalato si xad dhaaf ah isbadel sare iyo hoos u dhaca xooga mise taran la'aan.
translated: CoVs waxay leeyihiin caddayn-akhris exoribonuclease, tirtirid taas oo keenta isbedel aad u sarreeya iyo hoos u dhac ama xitaa lama huraan.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Si xiiso leh, nucleotide analogue Remdesivir ayaa lo ogyahay inay hoos u dhigto taranka CoV iyadoo u maraysa xanibida exoribonuclease iyo RNA ku tiirsanaha RNA polymerase.
translated: Waxa xiisaha lihi leh, analoogga nucleotide ee Remdesivir waxaa loo yaqaanaa inuu xakameeyo ku-noqoshada CoV iyada oo la joojinayo exoribonuclease-kan iyo RNA polymerase-ku-tiirsan.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: Remdesivir waa mid kamid waxyaabaha ka hortaga SARS-CoV-2 ee ugu waxtarka leh ee lagu tijaabin doono tijaabooyinka caafimaadka.
translated: Remdesivir waa mid ka mid ah wakiilada ka-hortagga SARS-CoV-2 ee rajo-gelinta leh si loogu tijaabiyo tijaabooyinka caafimaad.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: Si kastaba ha noqotee, xadka isbadelka CoV yada waxay ku dhawaad milyan jeer ka sareeyaan kuwa xanuun sidayaashooda.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, heerarka isku beddelka ee CoVs ayaa qiyaastii hal milyan jeer ka sarreeya kuwa martigeliyayaashooda.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, xadka isbadelka koriin inta badan wuu sareeyaa marka CoV yada aysan si fiican ula qabsan xanuun sidaha.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, heerka isku-bedelka badiyaa wuu sarreeyaa marka CoV-yadu si fiican ula qabsan waayaan martida loo yahay.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: Marka la barbardhgo SARS-CoV ee leh xadka isbedelka sare, xadka isbadelka SARS-CoV-2 ayaa si cad u hooseeya, isagoo soo jeedinayo heer sare oo la qabsiga aadanaha ah.
translated: Marka la barbar dhigo SARS-CoV oo leh heerar isku bedel oo sarreeya, heerka isbeddelka ee SARS-CoV-2 ayaa sida muuqata ka hooseeya, taasoo soo jeedinaysa heer sare oo la qabsiga aadanaha.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: Sida suurtagalka ah, horaan ayuu ula qabsaday xanuun side kale oo u dhaw bini'aadanka.
translated: Malaha, waxaa mar hore la qabsaday martigeliyaha kale ee u dhow bini'aadamka.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 waxaa dheer, inay tani sidoo kale lagu dabaqayo MERS-CoV, kaas oo si fiican ula qabsaday geela halka kurus leh.
translated: Marka lagu daro SARS-CoV-2, tani waxay sidoo kale khuseysaa MERS-CoV, kaas oo si fiican ula qabsanaya geela.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: Aragti ahaan, uma badna in baaba'a hiduhu uu keeni doono talaal iyo fayruusyo ka hortage ka dhan ah SARS-CoV-2 aan shaqaynin si dhakhsa ah.
translated: Fikrad ahaan, uma badna in socodka hidde-sidaha uu keeno tallaalada iyo fayraska ka hortagga SARS-CoV-2 si dhakhso ah waxtarla'aan.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: Marka labaad, RNA genome balaaran ee ku jira CoVs wuxuu ku fidaayaa baco dheeraad ah qaabaynta ee qaabaynta genome hidda-wadayaasha ee isbedelka iyo isu imaatinka, sidaas daraadeed kor u qaadaya fursada isbadelida noolayaasha kala nooca ah, kaas oo u fiican soo ifbaxa CoVs aan caadi ahayn markay xaaaladu noqoto mid ku haboon.
translated: Marka labaad, genome-ka weyn ee RNA ee ku jira CoVs wuxuu ku shaqeeyaa caag dheeri ah oo wax ka beddelka genome-ka ee isbeddellada iyo dib-u-habaynta, taas oo kordhinaysa itimaalka noocyada kala duwan ee kobcinta, taas oo faa'iido u leh soo bixitaanka CoVs-ga cusub marka xaaladuhu noqdaan kuwo habboon.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: Tan waxaa taageeraya qaababka akhriska gaarka ah ee furan ee la heli karo iyo shaqooyinka borotiinka ee la galiyo dhanka dhamaadka 3 ee genome.
translated: Tan waxa taageeray qaab-dhismeedka akhriska ee gaarka ah ee u gaarka ah iyo hawlaha borotiinka ee lagu calaamadeeyay dhinaca 3′ dhammaadka genome-ga.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: Tan saddexaad, CoV yada waxay inta badan si aan cayimnayn u badeshaan naqshada inta laguguda jiro taranka RNA iyadoo loo marayo habka "nuqul ka  samee-dookha" ee gaarka ah.
translated: Seddexaad, CoVs si aan kala sooc lahayn oo joogto ah waxay u beddelaan habraacyada inta lagu jiro ku-noqoshada RNA iyada oo loo marayo hab "koobi-doorasho" gaar ah.

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: Xanuun side  ah mid uu cudurku kusoo laablaabanayo, isbedelka xarkaha wuxuu dhacaa inta badan inta lagu guda jiro nuqul samaynta CoV RNA
translated: Martigeliyaha u adeega sida weelka isku dhafka ah, beddelka xargaha ayaa si joogto ah u dhaca inta lagu jiro qoraalka CoV RNA.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: Dheerar buuxa oo si wayn isugu eeg iyo genomic hoose RNA yaala ayaa dib isugu darsami kara si ay u dhalaan CoV yo cusub.
translated: Dherer buuxa oo aad u sarreeya iyo RNA-yada hoose ayaa dib isugu soo laaban kara si ay u abuuraan CoV-yo cusub.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: Cadaynta dib isugu darsamida dabiiciga ah ee daraasaadka isbedelka noolaha ayaa lagu ogaday in labada HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-OC43, iyo sidoo kale CoV yada xoolaha sida fiidmaarta SL-CoV iyo fiidmaarta CoV-HKU9.
translated: Caddaynta phylogenetic ee dib-u-habaynta dabiiciga ah ayaa laga helay HCoV-HKU1 iyo HCoV-OC43 labadaba, iyo sidoo kale CoV-yada xayawaanka sida fiidmeerta SL-CoV iyo batCoV-HKU9.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: Isdhexgalka xanuun sidaha fayruuska marka loo eego gudbinta
translated: dhexgalka Virus-hosting ee la xidhiidha gudbinta

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: Marka laga soo tago sadexda qodob ee fayraska kor lagu xusay, isdhexgalka fayraska ee leh dareemaha xanuun sidaha wa qodob kale oo muhiim ah oo saamaynaya u gudbita noolaha kala nooca ah.
translated: Saddex arrimood oo fayras ah oo kor lagu sheegay ka sokow, dhexgalka fayraska ee soo-dhoweeyaha martida loo yahay waa arrin kale oo muhiim ah oo saameyn ku leh gudbinta noocyada kala duwan.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: Halkaan, dib isugu imaaatinka SARS-CoV ayaa loo qaadaynaya tusaale caadi ah, kaas oo sidoo kale muujiyay cadaynta xulasho fiican inta lagu guda jiray madalaha gudbinta noolaha kala nooca ah.
translated: Halkan, dib-u-habaynta SARS-CoV waxaa loo qaatay tusaale ahaan tusaale ahaan, kaas oo sidoo kale muujiyay caddaynta xulashada wanaagsan inta lagu jiro dhacdooyinka gudbinta noocyada kala duwan.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo falanqaynta isbarbardhiga ee u dhaxaysa karantiilada bini'aadamka iyo civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV ayaa loo malaynayaaa inuu maro la qabsi dhakhsa ah ee xanuun sidayaasha kala duwan, gaar ahaan markuu la socdo isbadelada RBD ee borotiinka S.
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan falanqaynta isbarbardhigga ee udhaxeysa go'doominta aadanaha iyo civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV waxaa loo maleynayaa inay si dhakhso leh ula qabsato martigaliyayaasha kala duwan, gaar ahaan isbeddellada RBD ee borotiinka S.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: Guud ahaan, RBD ga ku jira borotiinka S ee CoV wuxuu dhexgalaa dareemaha unuga waxaana si xoog leh u xushay falcelinta antibody ga xanuun sidaha.
translated: Guud ahaan, RBD-ga ku jira borotiinka S ee CoV waxa uu la falgalaa soo-dhoweeyaha gacanta waxaana si aad ah u doortay jawaabta antibody-ga martida loo yahay.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: SARS-CoV, RBD gu wuxuu ku jiraa 318aad ilaa 510aad ee amino acid yada ee qaybta S1, taas oo ku dhagta ACE2 bini'aadanka iyo si lamid ah dusha unuga dareemayaasha ee galintaanka fayruuska.
translated: Gudaha SARS-CoV, RBD waxay ku jirtaa 318th ilaa 510th amino acids ee jajabka S1, kaas oo ku xidha ACE2 bini'aadamka iyo sidoo kale qalabeeyayaasha gelitaanka fayraska.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: RBD ga SARS-CoV wuxuu awoodaa inuu aqoonsado soo-galeyaasha ACE2 ee xayawaanno kala duwan, oo ay kamidyihiin fiidmeerta, civet, jiirarka iyo ey duureedka, iyagoo u ogolaanaya fayraska inuu ka gudbo noolayaal kala nooc ah.
translated: RBD ee SARS-CoV waxay awood u leedahay inay aqoonsato soo-dhoweeyayaasha ACE2 ee xayawaanno kala duwan, oo ay ku jiraan fiidmeerta, civet, mouse iyo eyga raccoon, taasoo u oggolaanaysa noocyada kala duwan ee gudbinta fayraska.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Xaqiiq ahaan, kaliya 6 haraa oo amino acid ah ayaa laa arkay inay ka duwanyihiin soocitaanka fayruuska ee bini'aadanka iyo bisada baadiyaha ee RBD 4 kamid ah waxay  ku jiraan naqshada dareeme ku dhagaha si ay u dhexgalaan dareemaha ACE2.
translated: Dhab ahaantii, kaliya 6 hadhaaga amino acid ayaa la arkay inay ka duwan yihiin bini'aadamka iyo go'doominta fayraska civet ee RBD iyo 4 ka mid ah waxay ku yaalaan habka soo-dhoweynta-qabta ee isdhexgalka ACE2.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: SARS-CoV ka bisadaha baadiyaha wuxuu leeyahay isbedelada K479N iyo S457T ee RBD giisa, taas oo kor u qaadi karta rabitaanka inuu xiriir la sameeyo borotiinka spike ee uu la socdo dareemaha aadanaha ee ACE2.
translated: Civet SARS-CoV waxay leedahay isbeddellada K479N iyo S487T ee RBD, taas oo kordhin karta xidhiidhka is dhexgalka borotiinka taranka ee soo-dhoweynta ACE2 ee bini'aadamka.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: Si kale hadii loo dhigo, isbedelka labadan amino acid wuxuu khatar ku yahay la qabsiga fayraska ee bin'aadamka.
translated: Si kale haddii loo dhigo, labadan amino acid beddelka ayaa laga yaabaa inay muhiim u yihiin la qabsiga fayraska ee aadanaha.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Waa wax mudan in la sheego in SARS-CoV-2 uu la wadaago dareemayaasha unugyada lamidka ah SARS-CoV.
translated: Waxaa xusid mudan in SARS-CoV-2 ay la wadaagto isla soo-dhoweeyaha gacanta ee SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: 30% farqiga u dhaxeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo SARS-CoV ee qaybta S1 ee borotiinka S ayaa tusaya ku lug lahaanshaha rabitaanka uu ku dhagayo borotiinkiisa S ACE2 aadanaha ayaa wax ka bedeli kara.
translated: Farqiga 30% ee u dhexeeya SARS-CoV-2 iyo SARS-CoV ee qaybta S1 ee borotiinka S ayaa tilmaamaya in xidhiidhka isku xidhka borotiinka S uu la leeyahay ACE2 bini'aadamka laga yaabo inuu isbedelay.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: Xaqiiq ahaan, daraasad cryo-Em ayaa muujinaysa in 10 - ilaa 20- ay laabmaan rabitaan weyn ee ku dhagistan marka loo eego tan u dhaxaysa ACE2 bin'aadanka  iyo borotiinka S ee SARS-CoV.
translated: Runtii, daraasadda cryo-EM waxay muujineysaa 10- ilaa 20-laab xiriir ka sarreeya ee ku-xidhanaanshahan marka loo eego kan u dhexeeya ACE2 aadanaha iyo borotiinka SARS-CoV S.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale noqon doontaa mid la danaynayo in la ogaado in dareemaha kale ee dusha unuga loo baahan karo gudbinta SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Waxa kale oo ay noqon doontaa mid xiiso leh in la go'aamiyo in mid ka mid ah qaboojiyaha kale looga baahan karo gudbinta SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: Si xiiso leh, HCoV-NL63 ayaa sidoo kale ku dhaga ACE2 balse la jiranka qaybta kale ee S.
translated: Si xiiso leh, HCoV-NL63 sidoo kale waxay ku xidhan tahay ACE2 laakiin leh qayb ka duwan S.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: Waxaa jira dareemayaal HCoV oo kale, sida aminopeptidase N oo loogu talagalay HCoV-229E, iyo 9-O-acetylated sialic acid oo loogu talagalay HCoV-OC43.
translated: Waxaa jira dad badan oo kale oo HCoV ah, sida aminopeptidase N ee HCoV-229E, iyo 9-O-acetylated sialic acid ee HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: Waxaa lagaa yaabaa in ay sababaan la qabsashada CoV yada bina adamka si guul ah kadib isu gudbinta noolaha dhexdiisa ah ee ka imaanaya xayawaanka xanuun sidaha ah.
translated: Waxa kale oo laga yaabaa inay ku xisaabtamaan la qabsiga guusha leh ee CoVs ee bini'aadamka ka dib kala-soocida kala-soocida xayawaankooda.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: Dareemayaashaa unug ahaaneed waxaa dheer, natiijada usii gudbinta HCoV yada ee noolaha-isku midka dhexdiisa  waxaa sidoo kale maamula ku tiirsanaan la'aanta xanuun-side kale iyo asbaabaha xayiraada.
translated: Marka lagu daro soo-dhoweeyayaasha gacanta, natiijada is-dhaafsiga noocyada kala duwan ee HCoVs waxaa sidoo kale xukuma ku-tiirsanaanta martida kale iyo arrimo xaddidan.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: Kala duwanaanshaha borotiinadan xanuun-sidaha ee u dhexeeya bina aadamka iyo kaydiyayaasha xanuun-sidaha HCoVs ee dabiiciga ah sida fiidmeerta, geela halka kuruska leh iyo jiirka ayaa laga yaabaa inay ka qaybqaataan ka hortaga isu gudbinta noolaha isku midka ah.
translated: Kala duwanaanshaha borotiinnada martida loo yahay ee u dhexeeya bini'aadamka iyo martigeliyaha kaydka dabiiciga ah ee HCoVs sida fiidmeerta, geela dhogorta leh iyo jiirka ayaa laga yaabaa inay caqabad ku noqdaan gudbinta noocyada kala duwan.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: HCoV yada way in ay kala wareegan asbaabaha ku tiirsanaan la'aanta xanuun-sidaha oo ay hoos udhigaan asbaabaha xayiraada xanuun-sidaha si ay si guul ah isugu gubiyaan noolaha isku midka ah.
translated: HCoVs waa in ay ka faa'iidaystaan arrimo ku tiirsanaanta martida loo yahay oo ay u rogaan qodobbada xaddidaadda martida loogu talagalay gudbinta noocyada kala duwan ee guuleysta.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: Marka la eego, qeexayaasha molecule ahaaneed ee gudaha goobtan muhiimka ah ee isdhexgalka xanuun-sidaha fayraska waa in la cayimaa lana astaameeya.
translated: Marka tan la eego, go'aamiyaasha molecular ee aaggan muhiimka ah ee isdhexgalka fayraska- martida loo yahay ayaa weli ah in la aqoonsado oo lagu garto.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: Baaritaanka hidde side balaadhan oo aan wasakhaysaneyn ee ku tiirsanaanta xanuun-sidaha iyo asbaabaha xayiraada ee SARS-CoV-2 ayadoo la istcimaalayo heerka xirfada tiknoolaji ee CRISPR ayaa laga yaaba in ay miro dhasho.
translated: Baadhitaanka genome-ballaaran ee aan eex lahayn ee ku-tiirsanaanta martida loo yahay iyo qodobbada xaddidaya ee SARS-CoV-2 iyadoo la adeegsanayo tignoolajiyada casriga ah ee CRISPR waxay noqon kartaa mid miro dhal leh.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: Soo if-bixitaanka HCoV yada cusub: lagu celinayo meeshuu kasoo bilawday.
translated: Soo ifbaxa HCoV-yada cusub: dib ugu noqda eber

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: Kala duwanaanshaha CoV yada fiidmeerta wuxuu siinayaa fursado ku filan soo ifbixitaanka HCoV yo cusub.
translated: Kala duwanaanshaha CoVs ee fiidmeerta ayaa siinaya fursado ku filan soo bixitaanka HCoV-yada cusub.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: Dareenkan, CoVs fiidmeerta waxay u adeegtaa sida hidde sidayaasha dhan HCoVs.
translated: Dareenkan, bat CoVs waxay u adeegaan sidii barkada hidda-wadaha ee HCoVs.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: Intaas waxaa dheer, isbadalka koriin ee xawliga ah iyo dib isku dhafka hida sidaha sidoo kale waxay keenayaan qiimaynta HCoV waxayna u adeegaan laba talaabo oo muhiim hawshan.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, isu-beddelka degdega ah iyo dib-u-habaynta hidde-sidaha waxay sidoo kale kiciyaan horumarka HCoV waxayna u adeegaan sidii laba tallaabo oo muhiim ah habkan.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, helitaanka ama waayitaanka hida sidaha borotiinka qeexa wuxuu suurtagalnayaa inuu sii weyn u cusboonaysiiyaan  isku mid ahaanshaha hida sidaha fayraska
translated: Tusaale ahaan, helida ama luminta hiddo-wadaha cusub ee borotiinka-koodka ayaa awood u leh in ay si weyn wax uga beddelaan phenotypes fayraska.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: Waxaa ka mid ah borotiinada dheeraadka ah ee SARS-CoV, ORF8 ayaa loo maleeyaa in uu muhiim u yahay la qabshada bina'adamka, sida SARS-CoV ka la xariira fayrasyada fiidmeerta loo karantiilay balse la ogaaday in ay soo saaraan borotiinada ORF8 oo kala duwan.
translated: Ka mid ah borotiinnada ku-darka ah ee SARS-CoV, ORF8 waxaa loo maleeyay inay muhiim u tahay la qabsiga bini'aadamka, maadaama fayrasyada fiidmeerta ee SARS-CoV-ku-xiran ay go'doomiyeen laakiin la helay inay dejiyaan borotiinno kala duwan oo ORF8 ah.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: Tirtirida sifooyinka 29-nucleotide ee SARS-CoV yada ayaa laga helay kooxo la karantiilay bilawgii cudurka safmareenka ah ee bina'adamka ku dhaca.
translated: Tirtirka 29-nucleotide ee sifada SARS-CoVs ayaa laga helay noocyo go'doonsan bilowga cudurka faafa ee aadanaha.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: Waayitaanka unugyada ORF8 ee ORF8a iyo ORF8b waxaana loo malaynayaa in ay tahay la qabsashada isbadallada koriin kaas oo hormarinaysa badalidda xanuun-sidayaasha.
translated: Tirtiriddan waxay u qaybsantaa ORF8 oo u kala baxda ORF8a iyo ORF8b waxaana loo malaynayaa inay tahay beddelaad la-qabsi ah oo kor u qaada beddelka martigeliyayaasha.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Kasokow, SARS-CoV wuxuu leeyehay suurtagalnimada tariikh iskudhafka hida side ahaaneed ee alpha iyo beta-CoV, halka tira badan oo aagag yaryar ee isku dhafka hida sidaha lagu arkay RNA ga ku tiirsan RNA polymerase.
translated: Ka sokow, SARS-CoV waxay leedahay taariikhda dib-u-habaynta suurtagalka ah ee leh abtirsiinyada alfa- iyo gamma-CoVs, halkaas oo tiro badan oo gobollada dib-u-habaynta yar yar lagu aqoonsaday RNA polymerase-ku-tiirsan.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: Goobaha dib-isugu dhafka hida sidaha ayaa sidoo kale lagu sheegay nsp9, inta badan nsp10, iyo qaybo nsp14 ah.
translated: Goobaha dib u habeynta ayaa sidoo kale lagu aqoonsaday nsp9, inta badan nsp10, iyo qaybo ka mid ah nsp14.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Sidoo kale, waxaa la arkay in cudurka safmareenka ee MERS-CoV lagu arkay dhacdooyinka dib u habaynta hida sidaha ee  faracyo kala duwan, kuwaas oo ku dhacay geela halka kurus leh ee gudaha Sacuudi Carabiya.
translated: Sidoo kale, waxaa la muujiyay in cudurka MERS-CoV uu la kulmay dhacdooyin dib-u-habayn oo u dhexeeyay abtirsiinyo kala duwan, kuwaas oo ka dhacay geel-jiif ah ee Sacuudi Carabiya.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: Kasokow SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, dib isku dhafka dhacdooyinka ayaa sido kale lagu arkay HCoV yada kale, halkaas oo HCoVs isku dhafaan hida sidayaasha aan qaab-dhismeed lahayn ee CoVs xayawaanada kale.
translated: Marka laga reebo SARS-CoV iyo MERS-CoV, dhacdooyinka dib-u-dajinta ayaa sidoo kale lagu arkay HCoV-yada kale, kuwaas oo HCoVs ay dib ula midoobaan CoV-yada kale ee xayawaanka ee hiddo-wadaha aan dhisnayn.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: Waa in sidoo kale laga taxadaraa in xulashada aadanuhu ay ka qayb qaadan karto isbadallo aan loo qasdin oo ku dhaca hida-sidaha fayraska, inta badan kuwa sababaya ka bogsashada fayrasyada ee cadaadiska xulasho la saaray, sida habka difaaca jirka ee xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Waa in sidoo kale laga digtoonaado in xulashada macmalka ah ay gacan ka geysan karto isbeddellada aan loo baahnayn ee genomes-ka fayraska, oo ay u badan tahay inay ka dhashaan fayrasyada cadaadiska xulashada ee la sameeyay, sida habka difaaca ee martida loo yahay.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: Tusaalaha saamaynta waa waayida dheerarka caadiga ah ee noocyada isku midka ah ee ORF4 ee HCoV-229E, kuwaas oo leh waayida laba-nucleotude.
translated: Tusaalaha saameyntan ayaa ah luminta ORF4-dherer buuxa oo ku jira nooca HCoV-229E, taasoo ay ugu wacan tahay tirtirka laba-nucleotide.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: Halka dhaawac la'aanta ORF4 lagu arki karo fiidmeerta iyo fayrasyada geela la xariira HCoV-229E, alpaca alpha-CoV uu muujinayo halka galitaan oo nucleotide ah, kaaso ka dhalanaya isbaladda koriinaadka ee hida-sidaha.
translated: Iyadoo ORF4 aan waxba ka jirin lagu arki karo fayraska fiidmeerta iyo geela ee la xiriira HCoV-229E, alpaca alpha-CoV waxay soo bandhigaysaa gelinta hal nucleotide ah, taasoo keentay qaab-dhismeedka.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: Ugu dambeyntiina ugu yar, qiimaynta HCoVs cusub ayaa sidoo kale laga keenay shay'yaasha badala hida-sidaha kaydiyaasha xanuunka ee xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Ugu dambayn, laakiin ugu yaraan, horumarka cusub ee HCoVs waxa kale oo horseeda cadaadiska xulashada ee martigaliyayaasha kaydka kaydka.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: Muujin la'aanta calaamado ama kaliya calaamado fudud ayaa lagu arkay  marka fiidmeeraha qaadeen caabuqa CoV yada, taas oo tusinaysa isla qabsashada labada dhinac ee u dhexeeya CoV yada iyo fiid-meeraha.
translated: Asymptomatic ama calaamado fudud oo kaliya ayaa la ogaadey markii fiidmeerta laga qaaday CoVs, taasoo muujineysa is qabsiga ka dhexeeya CoVs iyo fiidmeerta.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: Waxay u muuqatay in fiidmeerta ay si wanaagsan ula qabsadeen CoV yada qaab jir ahaaneed iyo qaabka shaqayn ahaaneed ba.
translated: Waxay u muuqatay in fiidmeerta ay si fiican ula qabsadeen CoVs anatomically iyo physiologically.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, ciladaha keenaya jawaab celinta waxyaalaha bararka keena ee fiidmeerta ayaa si waxtar leh hoos ugu dhigta jeermisyada ay kiciyaan CoV yada.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, cilladaha firfircoonida ka jawaab celinta bararka ee fiidmeerta waxay si wax ku ool ah u yaraynaysaa cudurada ay kiciyaan CoVs.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: Waxaa dheer, dilaaga dabiiciga ah ee hawlaha unugyada fiidmeerta ayaa lacadaadiyay sababtoo ah kordhinta kicinta xanibidda dilayaasha dabiiciga ah ee dareemaha unuga NKG2/CD94 iyo heerka qeexitaan ee hooseeya ee wada jirka molecule ka Fasalka I.
translated: Ka sokow, dhaqdhaqaaqa unugyada dilaaga ah ee dabiiciga ah ee fiidmeerta waa la xakameeyey sababtoo ah kor u kaca soo-dhoweynta unugga dilaaga dabiiciga ah ee NKG2/CD94 iyo heerka muujinta hoose ee heerka weyn ee iswaafajinta histocompatibility fasalka I molecules.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: Kasokow, heerka sare ee kicinta oksijiinka noolaha (ROS) kaas oo ka dhashay hawlaha dheef-shiidka kiimikada ee fiidmeeraha ayaa labaduba cadaadiya taranka CoV iyo saamaynta dib u akhrinta exoribonuclease, taas oo siinaysa xulashada cadaadiska ee soo sarista noocyada fayraska jeermiska badan leh marka la galiyo xanuun-qaade cusub.
translated: Waxaa intaa dheer, heerka sare ee noocyada oksijiinta falcelinta (ROS) ee ka soo jeeda dhaqdhaqaaqa dheef-shiid kiimikaadka sare ee fiidmeerta waxay labaduba xakameyn karaan dib-u-celinta CoV waxayna saameyneysaa dib u akhrinta exoribonuclease, taas oo bixisa cadaadiska xulashada jiilka fayrasyada si aad ah u faafa marka lagu soo daro martigeliyaha cusub.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: Noocyo badan oo ah jeermisyada sababa CoV ayaa laga yaabaa in ay si tartiib ah u koraan ayagoo dib isugu dhafmaya, taas oo keenaysa helitaanka borotiinada cusub ama borotiino leh astaamaha la qabsashada xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Noocyo badan oo caabuqa CoV ayaa sidoo kale laga yaabaa inay ku abuurmaan dib-u-habayn, taasoo horseedaysa helitaanka borotiinno cusub ama astaamaha borotiinka ee la qabsiga martida loo yahay.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: Sidaas awgeed, si bakhtiyaa nasiib ah ma aha in saddexda HCovs ee cusub ee hada soo shaac-bexeen inta lagu jiray labaatankii sanno ee lasoo dhaafay.
translated: Sidaa darteed, maahan wax nasiib ah in saddex sheeko oo HCoVs ah ay soo baxeen labaatankii sano ee la soo dhaafay.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoV yada waa kuwa aan jeermis lahayn ama aan u sababin calaamado fudud kaydiyayaashoda xanuun-side sida fiid-meeraha iyo geela.
translated: CoV-yadu waa kuwa aan cudur-sidaha lahayn ama waxay ku keenaan calaamado khafiif ah meelaha kaydka ah sida fiidmeerta iyo geela.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: Waxay u tarmaan si xoog ah iyaga oo aan mancinayn jawaab celinta adag ee difaaca jirka xanuun-sidaha.
translated: Waxay si adag u soo celiyaan iyaga oo aan soo saarin jawaab celin difaac adag oo martida loo yahay.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: Halkan waxaa ka jira sirta sababta loo arko dadka xanuun-sidayaasha ee aan wax calaamad ah muujinin iyo waxa sababa kiisaska ba'an ee caabuqa bina aadamka.
translated: Halkan waxaa ku yaal sirta ah sababta loo arko sidayaal asymptomatic ah iyo waxa sababa kiisaska daran ee caabuqa aadanaha.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: Calaamadaha ba'an ayaa ah kuwa badanaa sabab u ah hawl-galinta aadka ee ka jawaab celinta difaaca iyo dhibaatada cytokine halka jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ee adag,  ay u badantahay dhaawac ba'an oo wadna la dhaawaco.
translated: Calaamadaha aadka u daran waxaa ugu wacan firfircoonida ka jawaab celinta difaaca jirka iyo duufaanka cytokine halkaas oo ay ka xoog badan tahay jawaab celinta difaaca, ayaa ah mid aad u daran dhaawaca sambabada.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: Taa badalkeed, xanuun-sidayaaha aan calaamadaha muujinin, jawaab celinta difaaca jirka waxaa kala gooyay taranka CoV.
translated: Taas bedelkeeda, sidayaal asymptomatic ah, jawaab celinta difaaca ayaa laga saaray isku-duubnida CoV.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: Istaraajiyada lamidka ah ee xiriirka loogu jarayo jawaab celinta difaaca jirka ayaa laga yaaba in ay u leedehey saamayn faaiido leh daaweynta la dagaalanka SARS-CoV-2
translated: Istaraatiijiyad la mid ah ee hoos u dhigista jawaabta difaaca ayaa laga yaabaa inay saameyn faa'iido leh ku yeelato daaweynta ka hortagga SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: Jawaab celinta interferon ayaa si gaar ah ugu xoogan fiidmeeraha.
