sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: Kooxda kiisaska ugu horeysay ee lasoo sheegay Diseembar 2019, saddex meelood laba meel ayaa la ogaaday in xiriir la lahaayeen suuqa.
translated: Fayraska sababay dillaaca waxaa loo yaqaan SARS-CoV-2, fayras dhowaan la helay oo si dhow ula xiriira coronaviruses fiidmeerta, pangolin coronaviruses, iyo SARS-CoV. Qofkii ugu horreeyay ee la yaqaan ee astaamaha ayaa markii dambe la ogaaday inuu bukooday 1dii Disembar 2019 , qofkaasina xiriir muuqda lama lahayn kooxda suuqa qoyan ee dambe.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: 13kii Maarso 2020, war aan la xaqiijinin oo ay qorta South China Morning Post ayaa soo jeedisay in kiiska la daba galay 17 kii Noofembar 2019, in qof 55 -sano jir ah oo ka yimid gobolka Hubei, uu  ahaa qofkii ugu horeeyay. 26 dii Febraayo 2020, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa ku warantay, in kiisaska cusub ee laga soo sheegayo Shiinaha ay hoos u dhacday balse ay kor o kacday mida Talyaaniga, Iran, Kuuriya Koonfureed, tirada kiisaska cusub ee dibaba Shiinaha ayaa ka batay tirada kiisaska cusub gudaha Shiinaha markii ugu horeysay.
translated: Kooxdii hore ee kiisaska la soo sheegay Diseembar 2019, saddex-meelood labo ayaa la ogaaday inay xiriir la leeyihiin suuqa.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: Waxaa jiri kara in aan lasoo sheegin kiisas muhii, gaar  ahaan kuwa leh calaamadaha fudud.
translated: 13-kii Maarso 2020, warbixin aan la xaqiijin oo ka soo baxday South China Morning Post ayaa soo jeedisay in kiis la helay ilaa 17 Noofambar 2019, oo ah 55 jir ka soo jeeda gobolka Hubei, laga yaabo inuu ahaa kii ugu horreeyay. 26 Febraayo 2020, WHO ayaa werisay. in, iyadoo kiisas cusub oo la sheegay inay hoos u dhaceen Shiinaha laakiin si lama filaan ah ay ugu kordheen Italy, Iran, iyo South Korea, tirada kiisaska cusub ee ka baxsan Shiinaha ayaa markii ugu horeysay kor u dhaaftay tirada kiisaska cusub ee Shiinaha.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: Ugu dambeyn 26 Febraayo, saami ahaan kiisas yar ayaa laga soo sheegay dhalinyarta, kuwa 19 sano jira iyo wixii ka hooseeya ayaa noqday 2.4% kiisaaska aduunka oo dhan. Gudoomiyaha  la talinta saynis ahaaneed ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, Patrick Vallance, ayaa qiyaasay in 60% bulshada Ingiriis ka in ay qaadi doonaan caabuqa ka hor inta aan difaac jireed oo adkaysi iyo waxtar  leh la gaarayo.
translated: Waxaa laga yaabaa inay jirto warbixin hoose oo la taaban karo oo kiisas ah, gaar ahaan kuwa leh calaamadaha fudud.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: Kiisaska waxaa loo la jeeda tirada dadka laga baadhay COVID-19, kuwaas oo baadhitaankooda laga he;lay cudurka sida laga soo xigtay borotokoolo rasmi ah.
translated: Ilaa 26kii Febraayo, kiisas aad u yar ayaa laga soo sheegay dhalinyarada, kuwaas oo 19 jir ah iyo in ka yar yihiin 2.4% kiisaska adduunka oo dhan. Madaxa lataliyaha sayniska ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, Patrick Vallance, ayaa ku qiyaasay in 60% dadka Ingiriiska ay u baahnaan doonaan inay qaadaan cudurka ka hor. Xasaanadda xoolaha ayaa la gaari karaa.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: Ilaa 23 Maarso, dal baadhay in ka badan 3% tirada guud ee dadkiisa wadama badan waxay lahaayeen xeerar rasmi ah oo ah in la baadhin dadka qaba calaamadaha fudfud, sida Talyaaniga, Netherlands, Spain, iyo Switzerland,
translated: Kiisaska waxaa loola jeedaa tirada dadka laga baaray COVID-19, oo baaristooda la xaqiijiyay inay togan tahay sida ku cad borotokoolka rasmiga ah.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: Daraasad la daabacay 16 kii Maarso ayaa la helay in Shiinaha, ilaa 23 dii Janaayo, qiyaas dhan 86% ee caabuqayda COVID-19 in aan la ogaan, caabuqan aan la diwaan galini uu ahaa isha caabuqa 76% kiis oo la diwaan galiyay.
translated: Laga bilaabo 23-kii Maarso, ma jiro waddan tijaabiyay in ka badan 3% dadkiisa, dalal badanna waxay lahaayeen siyaasado rasmi ah oo aan lagu tijaabin kuwa leh astaamo fudud, sida Talyaaniga, Nederland, Isbaanishka, iyo Switzerland.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: Taxliilin istaatisk ahaaneed oo la daabacday 30 kii Maarso in tirada qiyaas ahaaneed ee caabuqa ee gudaha Talyaaniga ay si weyn uga badnaan karto kiisaska lagu soo waramay.
translated: Daraasad la daabacay 16-kii Maarso ayaa lagu ogaaday in Shiinaha, ilaa 23-kii Janaayo, lagu qiyaasay 86% infekshannada COVID-19 aan la ogaanin, iyo in caabuqyadan aan sharciyeysneyn ay yihiin isha caabuqa 79% kiisaska la diiwaangeliyay.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: Qiyaastii hore ee tirada taranka (R0) ee aasaasiga ah ee COVID-19 in ay ay ahayd 1.4 ila 2.4.
translated: Falanqaynta tirakoobka ee la daabacay 30-kii Maarso ayaa lagu qiyaasey in tirada cudurrada ku dhaca Talyaaniga ay aad uga badan yihiin kiisaska la soo sheegay.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: Daraasad ay daabacday Xarunta Xakamayta iyo Ka hortaga Cudurka ee Maraykanka in ay kusoo gabagabaysay in ay noqon karto 5.7.
translated: Qiyaasaha bilowga ah ee lambarka taranka aasaasiga ah (R0) ee COVID-19 waxay ahaayeen 1.4 ilaa 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: Badanaa dadka qabaa COVID-19 way bogsadaan.
translated: Daraasad ay daabacday Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ee Mareykanka ayaa lagu soo gabagabeeyay in laga yaabo inay noqoto 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: Kuwa aan qabin, xilliga soo bixitaanka calaamadaha ilaa dhimasha waxay u dhaxaysaa 6 iyo 41 maalmood, kuwa ugu badana ay yihiin 14 maalmood.
translated: Inta badan dadka qaba COVID-19 way bogsadaan.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: Ilaa 10 Abriil 2020, qiyaas ahaan 97,000 dhimasho ayaa loo sababeeyay COVID-19.
translated: Kuwa aan samayn, wakhtiga laga soo bilaabo horumarinta calaamadaha ilaa dhimashada waxay ahayd inta u dhaxaysa 6 iyo 41 maalmood, oo ay ugu badan yihiin 14 maalmood.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: Shiinaha, ilaa 5 feebraayo ku dhawaad 80% dhimashada waxay ahayd kuwa ka weyn 60, 75% ka mid ahna waxay qabeen xaalada caafimaad oo horey usii jiray oo ay ku jiraan xanuunada wadnaha iyo sokorowga, Tirada guud ee dhimasho ee rasmiga ah ee cudurka caalamiga ah ee COVID-19  ayaa guud ahaan loogu yeeraa dadka cudurka COVID laga helay una dhinta sida laga soo xiganayo borotokoolo rasmi ah.
translated: Laga bilaabo 10kii Abriil 2020, ku dhawaad 97,000 oo dhimasho ah ayaa loo aaneeyay COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: Tirada dhimashada runta ah ee COVID-19 ayaa laga yaaba in ay aad u sarayso, iyada oo aan lagu daraynin dadka u dhinta iyaga oo aan la baadhin- tusaale kuwa guryaha ku dhinta, kuwa daryeelka guriga ku jira, iwm.
translated: Shiinaha, laga soo bilaabo 5tii Febraayo qiyaastii 80% dhimashada ayaa ku dhacday kuwa ka weyn 60, 75% waxay lahaayeen xaalado caafimaad oo hore u jiray oo ay ku jiraan cudurrada wadnaha iyo xididdada sokorowga. u fiican COVID sida ku cad borotokoolka rasmiga ah.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: Qayb ahaanta xogta laga helay Talyaaniga ayaa ah tirada dhimashada ee siyaadada ah inta lagu jiray cudurka caalamiga ah ay dhaaftay tirada guud ee rasmiga ah ee COVID-19 lambar ahaan 4-5x.
translated: Tirada dhimashada dhabta ah ee ka timid COVID-19 ayaa laga yaabaa inay aad uga badan tahay, maadaama aysan ku jirin dadka ku dhinta baaritaan la'aan - tusaale guriga, guryaha dadka lagu xanaaneeyo, iwm.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: Gabarta afhayeenka u ah Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Ka hortaga Cudurka ee Maraykanka (CDC) ayaa qirtay "Waxaan ognahay in [tirada dhimasho ee la sheegay] ay tahay mid qiyaas ahaan hooseysa",  oraah ay xaqiijiyeen warar aan rasmi ahayn oo ah tirada hoos loo dhigay ee Maraykanka. Hoos u dhigida qiyaasta tira ahaaneed oo kale badana waxay dhacdaa inta lagu jiro cudurada caalmaiga ah, sida 2009 N1N1 hargabka doofaarka ee saf-mareenka ah. Dhimashadii ugu horeysay ee la xaqiijiyay waxay ka dhacday gudaha Wuhan  9 kii Janaayo 2o20.
translated: Xog qayb ka mid ah oo laga helay Talyaaniga ayaa ogaatay in tirada dhimashada xad dhaafka ah ee inta lagu guda jiro cudurka faafa ay dhaaftay tirada rasmiga ah ee dhimashada COVID 4-5x.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: Dhimashadii koobaad ee ka baxsan mainland Shiinaha waxay ka dhacday 1dii Febraayo Philippines,  dhimashadii koobaad ee ka baxsan Asia waxay ka dhacday Faransiiska 1 kii Febraayo.
translated: Afhayeen u hadashay Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ee Maraykanka (CDC) ayaa qiratay "Waan ognahay in [tirada dhimashada la sheegay] ay tahay wax la dhayalsan karo", bayaan lagu caddeeyay warbixinnada laxiriira ee ku saabsan hoos u dhaca Mareykanka. Cudurka hargabka doofaarka ee H1N1 ee 2009. Kii ugu horreeyay ee la xaqiijiyay wuxuu ku dhintay Wuhan 9-kii Janaayo 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: Dhamaadki 28 dii Febraayo, dibada mainland Shiinaha, in ka badan darsano dhimasho ah ayaa laga diwaan galinayay mid kasta Iran, Kuuriyada Koonfureed, iyo Talyaaniga.
translated: Dhimashadii ugu horreysay ee ka baxsan dhul weynaha Shiinaha waxay dhacday 1-dii Febraayo dalka Filibiin, dhimashadii ugu horreysayna meel ka baxsan Aasiya waxay ku dhimatay Faransiiska 14-kii Febraayo.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 13 Maarso, in kabadan afar dal iyo dhulal aayaa laga soo sheegay dhimasho, qaarad kasta marka laga reebo Antarctica. talaabooyin dhowr ahaa ayaa caadi ahaan loo isticmlaay si loo yareeyo dhimashada.
translated: 28kii Febraayo, meel ka baxsan dhul weynaha Shiinaha, in ka badan toban dhimasho ayaa mid walba laga diiwaan geliyay Iran, South Korea, iyo Italy.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Tiradan way isbadalaysaa marka loo eego gobol gobol muda kadib, waxaana fudaydinaya baadhitaanka badan, tayada nimaadka daryeelka caafimaadka, ikhtiyaarka daaweyneed,waqtiga ilaa markii u bilawday dilaacitaanka iyo sifooyinka bulshada sida da'da, jinsiyada iyo caafimaadka guud. Saamiga dhimasha marka loo eego saamiga kiiska ayaa wuxuu muujinaya tirada dhimashada oo loo qaybiyay tirada kiisaska laga baadhay ee muda goan.
translated: Ilaa 13-kii Maarso, in ka badan afartan waddan iyo dhulal ayaa soo sheegay dhimasho, qaarad kasta marka laga reebo Antarctica. Dhowr tallaabo ayaa caadi ahaan loo isticmaalaa in lagu qiyaaso dhimashada.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Iyadoo lagu salaynayo istaastikada Jaamacada Johns Hopkins, dhimashada caalmaka ee saamiga kiis ahaaneed waa 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) ilaa iyo 1o Abriil 2020.
translated: Tirooyinkani way kala duwan yihiin gobol ahaan iyo wakhti ka dib, waxaana saameeya mugga baadhista, tayada nidaamka daryeelka caafimaadka, fursadaha daawaynta, wakhtiga tan iyo markii uu dillaacay bilawgii, iyo sifooyinka dadka sida da'da, jinsiga, iyo guud ahaan caafimaadka. waxay ka tarjumaysaa tirada dhimashada oo loo qaybiyay tirada kiisaska la ogaaday muddo go'an gudahooda.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: Tirada way isbadashaa marka loo fiiriyogobol.
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan tirakoobka jaamacadda Johns Hopkins, saamiga dhimashada-kiis-kii adduunka waa 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) marka la gaaro 10ka Abriil 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: Shiinaha, waxay ku qiyaastay saamiga dhimasha marka loo eego saamiga kiiska in uu yaraaday laga bilaabo 17.3% (kuwa calaamaha u bilawdeen 1-10 Janaayo 2020) ilaa 0.7% (kuwa aan calaamadaha aan u bilaabanin kadib 1 Febraayo 2020). Talaabooyinka kale waxaa ka midka ah heerkakiisaska dhimashada (CFR), taas oo ka turjumaysa boqolkiiba dadka la baaray ee u dhintay cudurka, iyo heerka u dhimashada caabuqa (IFR), taas oo ka turmujaysa boqolkiiba dadka qaaday caabuqa (kuwa la baaray iyo kwa aan la baarinba) kuwaas oo u dhinta cudurka.
translated: Tirada way kala duwan tahay gobol ahaan.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Istaatiskadan waqti kuma xirna waxayna raacdaa bulsho gaar ah laga bilaabo qaadista caabuqa iyado loo marayo qaraarada kiiska.
translated: Dalka Shiinaha, qiyaasaha saamiga dhimashada iyo kiis ayaa hoos uga dhacay 17.3% (kuwa leh astaamaha bilawga 1-10 Janaayo 2020) ilaa 0.7% (kuwa leh astaamaha bilawga ka dib 1 Febraayo 2020) Tallaabooyin kale waxaa ka mid ah heerka dhimashada kiisaska (CFR), taas oo ka tarjumaysa boqolkiiba dadka la baaro ee u dhinta cudur, iyo heerka dhimashada caabuqa (IFR), taas oo ka tarjumaysa boqolkiiba dadka cudurka qaba (la ogaaday iyo kuwa aan la aqoonsan) ee u dhinta cudur.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: Tiro akadamiyo ah ayaa isku dayay in ay xisaabiyaan  tiradan ee tiro dad ah oo gaar ah.
translated: Tirakoobyadani maaha kuwo wakhti go'an oo waxay la socdaan dad gaar ah oo ka yimaada caabuqa iyada oo loo marayo xallinta kiiska.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: Xarunta Culuumta Caafimaadka ee ku Dhisan -Cadaynta ee Jaamacada Exford ayaa ku qiyaastayheerka dhimasha caabuqa caalamiga ah ee aduun ka oo dhan inta u dhaxaysa 0.1% iyo 0.39%.
translated: Tiro aqoonyahanno ah ayaa isku dayay inay lambaradan u xisaabiyaan dad gaar ah.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: Qiyaaska kore ee tiradan waa mid joogta ah oo leh natiijada baadhitaanki ugu horeeyay ee aan kala sooca la hayn ee COVID-19 ee jarmalka, iyo taxliinlinta daraasada istaatiska ahaan saamaynta baadhitaaneed ee qiyaaska CFR.
translated: Jaamacadda Oxford ee Xarunta Caddaynta Ku Salaysan Daawada ayaa ku qiyaastay in heerka dhimashada caabuqa ee guud ahaan masiibada uu u dhexeeyo 0.1% iyo 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa sheegtay in cudurka caalamiga ah la xakamayn karo.
translated: Qiyaasta sare ee kala duwanaantan waxay la socotaa natiijooyinka ka soo baxay imtixaankii random ee ugu horreeyay ee COVID-19 ee Jarmalka, iyo daraasad tirakoob oo lagu falanqeynayo saameynta baaritaanka qiyaasaha CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: Mudada ugu saraysa ee dilaacitaanka ayaa ah mid aan la hubin wayna ku kala goob ahaan.
translated: WHO waxay cadaysay in masiibada la xakameyn karo.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: Macieji Boni ee Jaamacada Penn State ayaa sheegay, waxaa laga tagay iyada oo aan ka hubin, ka dilaacintaanada cudurada faafa inta badan dhulalka sare
translated: Waqtiga ugu sarreeya iyo muddada ugu dambeysa ee cudurka dillaacay lama hubo waxaana laga yaabaa inay ku kala duwanaato goobta.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: Balse suurtagal ma aha in la sameeyo saadaalin kasta oo macquul ah haddaoo ku saabsan marka ay noqon doonto".
translated: Maciej Boni oo ka tirsan Jaamacadda Penn State University ayaa yidhi, "Haddii aan la xakamayn, faafitaannada faafa sida caadiga ah ee plateau ka dibna waxay bilaabaan inay hoos u dhacaan marka cudurku ka dhammaado martida la heli karo.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: La taliye caafimaad oo sarre ee dawlada Shiinaha Zhong Nanshan ayaa ku dooday in "ay dhamaan doonto dhamaadka Juun" hadii dawladaha dhan loo abaabuli lahaa raacitaanka talaabooyinka Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka si loo joojiyo faafitaanka fayraska.
translated: Laakiin waa wax aan macquul aheyn in hadda la sameeyo saadaal macquul ah oo ku saabsan goorta ay taasi noqon doonto."

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: 17kii Maarso, Adam Kucharski ee Dugsiga Nadaafada & Culuumta Caafimaadka ee Dhulka kulu ee London ayaa sheegay in SARSCoV-2 "waxay noqon doonta mid wareegta, suutgal ahaan hal sanno ama laba sanno".
translated: Lataliyaha sare ee caafimaadka ee dawladda Shiinaha Zhong Nanshan ayaa ku dooday in "ay dhamaan karto bisha Juun" haddii dhammaan waddamada la abaabulo si ay u raacaan talada WHO ee tillaabooyinka lagu joojinayo fiditaanka fayraska.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay daraasdda Kulliyada Imperial  ee uu hogaaminayo Neil Fergusin, kala fogaanshaha jir ahaaned iyo talaabooyin kale ayaa loo baahanyahay "ilaa talaal laga helay (oo ay suurtagal tahay 18 billood iyo ka badan)".
translated: 17-kii Maarso, Adam Kucharski oo ka tirsan Iskuulka Nadaafadda iyo Daawada Kulaalaha ee London wuxuu sheegay in SARS-CoV-2 "ay noqon doonto mid wareegaysa, suurtagalna ah sanad ama laba".

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: William Schaffner ee Jaamacada Vanderbilt ayaa sheegay, "Waxaan u malaynayaa in aysan u badnayn in ay tahay coronavirus-sabbato ah si xawli ayaa la siugu gudbin karaa-gabi ahaanba way baaba'aan" oo waxaa "macquul ah in ay isu badasho cudur xilliyeed, kaas oo soo noqon kara sanad kasta".
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay daraasadda Imperial College ee uu hoggaamiyo Neil Ferguson, fogeynta jirka iyo tillaabooyinka kale ayaa loo baahan doonaa "ilaa laga helayo tallaalka (oo ay suurtagal tahay 18 bilood ama ka badan)".

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: Halista kusoo laabashada waxay ku xirnaani awooda difaaca jirka oo adag iyo xadka isbadalka koriin.
translated: William Schaffner oo ka tirsan jaamacadda Vanderbilt ayaa yidhi, "Waxay ila tahay in aanay suurtogal ahayn in coronavirus-kan-maxaa yeelay aad ugu diyaarsan in la kala qaado - uu si buuxda u baaba'ayo" waxaana laga yaabaa in "ay isu beddesho cudur xilliyeed, oo soo noqnoqda sannad kasta".

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: Calaamadaha COVID-19 ayaa qiyaan ahaan ah kuwa aan cayiminayn dadka qaadana laga yaaba in aysan calaamadaha muujinin.
translated: Fayraska soo noqoshada waxay ku xirnaan doontaa xasaanadda lo'da iyo inta uu le'eg yahay isbeddellada.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: Labada  calamaadood ee badanaa u badan waa qandho (88%) iyo qufac qalan (68%).
translated: Calaamadaha COVID-19 waxay noqon karaan kuwo aan gaar ahayn oo dadka cudurka qaba waxay noqon karaan asymptomatic.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: Calaamadaha aan aadka u badanayn waxaa ka mid ah daal, soo saarista neef-mareen ee xaako (xaako), waayitaanka dareenka urinta, neefsasho yaraan, murqo iyo xubno xanuun, dhuun xanuun, madax xanuun, qabaw, mataqis, quficida dhiig, shuban ama midabka oo buluug noqda. Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa sheegta in qiyaas ahaan hal qof oo leh lix calaamood uu noqon karo mid aad u xanuunsan neefsigana dhibo.
translated: Labada calaamad ee ugu caansan waa qandho (88%) iyo qufac qalalan (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: Xarumaha Xakmaynta iyo ka Hortagida Xanuun ee Maraykanka (CDC) ayaa taxday calaamadaha dagdaga ah sida dhibaato neefsiga, feedha xanuun joogta aha ma cadaadis, warer kadis ah, dhibaato soo kicitaan,iyo wajiga ama faruuryaha oo buluug noqda; daryeel caafimaad oo dagdag ah  ayaa lagula taliyay qofkii calaamdaha isku arko. Sii  hormar kale oo dheeri ah ee cudurka wuxuu keeni karaa burukiito ba'an, calaamadaha dhibaata neef-mareenka ee ba'an, xaalad halis ah, dhiig karka oo hoos dhaca iyo dhimasho.
translated: Calaamadaha aan caanka ahayn waxaa ka mid ah daal, soo saarista xaakada neefsashada (xaakada), luminta dareenka urta, neefta oo ku dhacda, murqo xanuun iyo kalagoysyo xanuun, cune xanuun, madax-xanuun, qarqaryo, matag, dhiigbax, shuban, ama cyanosis. WHO waxay sheegtay in qiyaastii Lixdii qofba hal qof ayaa si xun u bukoodaa oo waxaa ku adkaata neefsashada.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: Kuwa qaaday caabuqa ayaa noqon kara kuwa aan calaamadaha muujinin, kuwaas oo aan lahayn calaamado caafimaad ahaaned balse natiijooyinka baadhitaanadu xaqiijiyeen qaaditaanka caabuqa, sidaas awgeed cilmi baadhayaasha ayaa soo saaray la talin ah in qofkii macaamilitaan dhaw la lahaa qof la xaqiijiyay qaadista caabuqa in si dhaw loo joogteeyo loona baaro si meesha looga saaro caabuqa.
translated: Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ee Maraykanka (CDC) waxay liis garaysaa calaamadaha degdega ah sida neefsashada oo adkaata, laabta xanuun ama cadaadis joogto ah, jahawareer degdeg ah, dhibaato soo jeed, iyo waji ama faruuryo guduudan; Si degdeg ah ayaa lagula talinayaa haddii calaamadahan ay muuqdaan. Horumarka dheeraadka ah ee cudurku wuxuu keeni karaa oof-wareen daran, cillad neef-mareenka oo degdeg ah, sepsis, septic shock iyo dhimasho.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: Shiinaha ayaa ku qiyaasay heerka saamiga dadka aan calaamadaha muujinin waxyar ilaa 44%.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah dadka uu ku dhacay cudurkan ayaa laga yaabaa inay yihiin kuwo asymptomatic ah, oo aan lahayn astaamo caafimaad, laakiin natiijooyin baaris ah oo xaqiijinaya caabuqa, sidaa darteed cilmi-baarayaashu waxay soo saareen talo ah in dadka xiriirka dhow la leh dadka la xaqiijiyey in cudurkan ay tahay in si dhow loola socdo lana baaro si meesha looga saaro caabuqa.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: Mudada cudurka uusan kasoo ismuujinin (waqtiga u dhexeeya qaadista caabuqa iyo bilawga calaamadaha) ayaa u dhaxaysa  hal iyo 14 maalin; badanaa waxay u badantahay shan maalmood, Tusaaleha hubinti la'aan, jajabka qiyaaska dadka qaba COVID-19 kuwaas oo waayay dareenka urka ayaa horaantii ahayd 30% kadibna waxay usoo dhacday 15%.
translated: Qiyaasta Shiinaha ee saamiga asymptomatic waxay u dhaxaysaa dhowr ilaa 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: Macluumadka qaar ee ku saabsan sida uu cudurku ku faafo ayaa wali la ogaan.
translated: Muddada caabuqa ee caadiga ah (waqtiga u dhexeeya caabuqa iyo calaamaduhu) waxay u dhaxaysaa hal ilaa 14 maalmood; Inta badan waa shan maalmood. Tusaale ahaan hubanti la'aan, qiyaasta jajabka dadka qaba COVID-19 ee lumiyay dareenka urta waxay markii hore ahayd 30% ka dibna hoos ugu dhacday 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: Cudurka ayaa la aaminsanyahay in uu si aad ah ugu faafo la macaamilitaanka dhaw iyo dhibcaha qufaca  ee soo baxa marka qof qufacayo, hindhisaya, or talking; kuwaas oo qof ku dhaw ilaa 1 ilaa 2 mitir (3 ilaa 6 fiit)
translated: Faahfaahinta qaar ee ku saabsan sida cudurku u faafo ayaa weli la go'aaminayaa.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: Daraasaddo ayaa ogaaday in qufaca aan  la daboolin  u keeni karo dhibcaha qufaca oo duula ilaa 4.5 mitir (15 fiit) ilaa 8.2 mitir (27 fiit)
translated: Cudurku waxa la rumaysan yahay in uu ugu horrayn ku fido marka la isku soo dhawaado iyo dhibco yaryar oo soo baxa xilliga qufaca, hindhisada, ama hadalka; oo leh xiriir dhow oo u dhexeeya 1 ilaa 2 mitir (3 ilaa 6 cagood).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: Qaar ayaa soo jeediyay in fayraska sidoo kale lagu gudbin karo dhibcaha yaryar ee ku nagaada hawada mudo dheer, ee soo bixi kara marka la hadlayo. dhibcaha Neefmareenka ayaa sidoo kale soo bxi kara amrka la neefsanayo, oo ay ku jirto marka la hadlayo, inkastoo fayruusku uusan gud ahaan hawda ku gudbin.
translated: Daraasado la sameeyay ayaa lagu ogaaday in qufaca aan la daboolin uu u horseedi karo dhibco socda ilaa 4.5 mitir (15 cagood) ilaa 8.2 mitir (27 cagood).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: Dhibcaha ayaa ku dhici kara afafka iyo sanka dadka meesha ka dhaw ama waxaa suurtagal ah in lagu neefsado sanababada.
translated: Qaar ayaa soo jeediyay in fayrasku sidoo kale lagu kala qaado dhibco yaryar oo hawada ku jira muddo dheer, kuwaas oo laga yaabo inay abuurmaan xilliga hadalka. hawada laga qaado.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: Qaabab caafimaad sida tuunba galinta iyo dib usoo kicinta wadnaha (CPR) ayaa sababi kara bixitaanka neefmareenka si loogu buufiyo taas oo keeni karta inuu hawada ku faafo.
translated: Dhibcaha ayaa ku dhici kara afka ama sanka dadka u dhow ama laga yaabo in lagu neefsado sambabada.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale ku faafi kartaa markuu qof taabto meel fadaraysan, oo ay kamid tahay maqaarka, kadibna uu taabto indhahiisa, sankiisa, mise afkiisa.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah hababka caafimaadka sida intubation iyo dib u soo kicinta wadnaha sambabada (CPR) ayaa laga yaabaa inay sababaan dheecaanka neefsashada oo la sii daayo oo ay keento faafitaanka hawada.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Iyadoo ay jiraan walaacyo ah inuu ku faafi karo saxarada, khatarta waxaa la aaminsanyahay inay hoosayso.
translated: Waxa kale oo laga yaabaa inay fido marka mid taabto meel wasakhaysan, oo ay ku jirto maqaarka, ka dibna taabto indhahooda, sankooda, ama afka.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: Dawlada Shiinaha waxay diiday suurtagalnimada saxaro ilaa af u gudbinta SARS-CoV-2. fayruusku wuxuu saaid u faafaa inta lagu jiro saddexda maalin ee u horaysa ee bilaabashada calaamadaha, inkastoo faafitaanku uu suurtagal noqon karo ka hor intaysan muuqan calaamaduhu iyo heerarka danbe ee cudurka.
translated: Inkastoo ay jiraan walaac laga yaabo inay ku faafto saxarada, khatartan ayaa la rumeysan yahay inay yar tahay.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: Dadka ayaa laga helay xanuunka ka hor saddex maalin intaan lagu arkin calaamado taas oo soo jeedinaysa in isu gudbintu ay suurtagal ah ka hor intaysan imaanin calaamado badan.
translated: Dowladda Shiinaha ayaa beenisay suurtagalnimada gudbinta saxarada-afka ee SARS-CoV-2. Fayrasku wuxuu aad u faafaa inta lagu jiro saddexda maalmood ee ugu horreeya ka dib bilawga calaamadaha, in kasta oo faafitaanku suurtagal yahay ka hor intaysan astaamuhu soo bixin iyo marxaladaha dambe ee cudurka.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: Kaliya warbixino yar oo kiisaska calaamadaha leh ee shaybaarka lagu xaqiijiyay ayaa jira, laakiin isu gudbinta calaamadaha leh ayaa lagu ogaaday dalalka qaar inta la gu jiray baarista dadka istaabtay.
translated: Dadku waxay tijaabiyeen cudurka ilaa saddex maalmood ka hor inta aanay bilaabmin calaamadaha soo jeedinaya in la kala qaado ay suurtogal tahay ka hor intaysan yeelan calaamado muuqda.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: Xarunta Yurub ee Xakamaynta iyo ka Hortaga Xanuunka (ECDC) ayaa sheegaysa maadaama aysan si guud  u cadayn sida fudud ee xanuunku ku faafo, hal qof ayaa guud ahaan qaadsiiya labo ilaa saddex kale, fayruusku wuxuu ku noolaadaa saacado ilaa maalmo dusha shay'yada.
translated: Kaliya warbixino yar oo shaybaadhka-xaqiijiyay kiisas asymptomatic ah ayaa jira, laakiin gudbinta asymptomatic-ka waxaa aqoonsaday wadamada qaar intii lagu jiray baadhitaanada raadinta xidhiidhka.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Gaar ahaan, fayruuska ayaa la ogaaday in laga aqoonsan karo bacaha (polypropylene) ilaa saddex maalin iyo 304 birta aan daxalaysan, ee hal maalin ee alwaaxa, iyo ilaa afar maalin copper dushiisa.
translated: Xarunta Yurub ee Kahortagga iyo Xakamaynta Cudurrada (ECDC) waxay leedahay in kasta oo aan si buuxda loo caddayn sida fudud ee cudurku u faafo, hal qof ayaa guud ahaan ku dhaca laba ilaa saddex qof oo kale.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: Tan, si kasta ha ahaatee, way kala duwantahay marka lagu saleeyo huurka iyo heer kululka. bisadaha iyo xoolaha kale yaa laga helay COVID-19.
translated: Gaar ahaan, fayrasku waxa la ogaaday in lagu ogaan karo ilaa saddex maalmood balaastiig (polypropylene) iyo 304 bir ah, hal maalin oo kartoon ah, iyo ilaa afar saacadood oo naxaas ah.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: Ma jirto cadayn in xooluhu ay u gudbin karaan fayruuska bini'aadanka, inkastoo masuuliyiinta Britain ay ku waaninayaan in qofku gacmaha dhaqdo markuu taabto xoolaha, sida markuu taabto meelaha kale ee dadka uu ku dhacay laga yaabo inay taabteen.
translated: Tani, si kastaba ha ahaatee, way kala duwan tahay iyadoo ku saleysan qoyaanka iyo heerkulka. Xayawaanka iyo xayawaanka kale waxay tijaabiyeen cudurka COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: Astaanta neefmareenka ba'an ee coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) waa fayruus aan caadi ahayn, oo markii ugu horaysay laga helay saddex qof oo leh burukiito la xiriirta kiisas kooxo xanuuno neefmareen ba'an ee laga helay Wuhan.
translated: Ma jiro wax caddaynaya in xayawaanku u gudbin karaan fayraska bini'aadamka, in kasta oo mas'uuliyiinta Ingiriiska ay ku talinayaan in qofku gacmaha la dhaqo ka dib marka la taabto xayawaanka, sida ka dib marka la taabto meelaha kale ee dadka cudurka qaba ay taabteen.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Dhamaan astaamaha fayruuska cusub ee SARS-CoV-2 waxay ku dhacaan coronavirus yo isla xiriira dabiici ahaan. banaanka jirka bini'aadanka, fayruuska waxaa dila saabuunta guriga, taas oo ku qasmata xayndaabkeeda adag. SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu si dhaw ula xiriiraa SARS-CoV ee asalka ahaa.
translated: Cudurka halista ah ee neef-mareenka coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) waa fayras cusub, oo markii ugu horreysay ka soocay saddex qof oo qaba oof-wareen ku xiran kooxda kiisaska cudurrada neef-mareenka ee degdegga ah ee Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Waxaa loo maleeyay inay leedahay asal xanuun xoolo oo dadka u gudba.
translated: Dhammaan sifooyinka fayraska cusub ee SARS-CoV-2 wuxuu ku dhacaa coronaviruses-ka la xiriira dabeecadda. Jirka ka baxsan, fayrasku waxaa dila saabuunta guriga, taas oo milmaan baqshadeeda ilaalinta.SARS-CoV-2 waxay si dhow ula xiriirtaa SARS-kii asalka ahaa- CoV.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Falanqaynta hiddaha wuxuu soo saaray in coronavirus hidde ahaan uu koox la yahay qaybta Betacoronavirus, ee subgenus Sarbecovirus (Qaraamiga B) iyadoo uu la socdo laba nooc oo fiidmaarta ka yimid.
translated: Waxaa loo maleynayaa inay leedahay asal zoonotic.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: 96% ayay lamid tahay heerka guud ee genome ee sambalada kale ee fiidmaarta coronavirus (BatCov RaTG13).
translated: Falanqaynta hidde-sidaha ayaa daaha ka qaaday in coronavirus-ka hiddesi ahaan uu ku urursan yahay genus Betacoronavirus, oo ku jira subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) oo ay weheliyaan laba nooc oo fiidmeerta ka soo jeeda.

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: Febraayo 2020, cilmi baarayaasha Shiinaha ayaa ogaaday inay jirto kaliya hal kala duwanaansho oo amino acid ah qaybaha gaar taxanaha genome ee u dhaxeeya fayruusyada qarandida iyo kuwa bini'aadanka.
translated: Waxay 96% la mid tahay guud ahaan heerka genome-ga iyo muunadaha kale ee coronavirus ee fiidmeerta (BatCov RaTG13).

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: Isbarbardhig genome dhan ilaa hadaa ayaa ogaaday ugu badnaan 92% shay'yada hiddaha ay wadaageen coronavirus qarandida iyo SARS-CoV-2, kaas oon kufilnayn inuu cadeeyo inay qarandiyaashu yihiin xanuun sdaha dhexdhexaadka ah.
translated: Bishii Febraayo 2020, cilmi-baarayaal Shiinees ah ayaa ogaaday in ay jiraan farqi u dhexeeya amino acid qaybo gaar ah oo ka mid ah taxanaha hiddo-wadaha u dhexeeya fayrasyada pangolins iyo kuwa bini'aadamka.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: Qaaditaanka fayruuska waxaa si xirfadaysan lagu baari karaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo calaamadaha, inkastoo xaqiijintu ugu dambayn tahay dib u nuqulin taxanaha falcelinta polymerase (rRT-PCR) ee soo bixitaanada uu ku dhacay mise sawirista CT.
translated: Isbarbardhigga genome-ga dhan ilaa taariikhda ayaa helay ugu badnaan 92% walxaha hidde-sidaha la wadaago ee u dhexeeya pangolin coronavirus iyo SARS-CoV-2, taas oo aan ku filnayn in la caddeeyo pangolins inay yihiin martigeliyaha dhexe.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: Daraasad isbarbardhigaysa PCR iyo Ct ee Wuhan ayaa soo jeedisay in CT ay si wayn oo badan xasaasi u tahay marka loo fiiriyo PCR, inkastoo uu gaar ahaan yarayahay, iyadoo in badan oo astaamaha sawirkeeda ay qarinayaan burukiitooyinka kale iyo hababka xanuunada.
translated: Caabuqa fayrasku si ku meel gaar ah ayaa loo baari karaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo calaamadaha, in kastoo xaqiijinta ugu danbeyn lagu sameeyo falcelinta silsiladda polymerase (rRT-PCR) ee dheecaannada cudurka qaba ama sawirka CT.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Maarso 2020, Kulliyada Maraykanka ee Radiology ayaa ku talinaysa in "CT aan loo isticmaalin si loo baaro baaritaanka koobaad ee lagu baarayo COVID-19".
translated: Daraasad la barbar dhigay PCR iyo CT ee Wuhan ayaa soo jeedisay in CT aad uga xasaasisan yahay PCR, in kasta oo aan gaar ahayn, iyada oo qaar badan oo ka mid ah astaamaha sawirradu ay la socdaan oof wareenka kale iyo hababka cudurrada.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: WHO ayaa daabacday habab baaris RNA oo dhawr ah ee SARS-CoV-2 oo ta u horaysay la shaaciyay 17 Janaayo.
translated: Laga bilaabo Maarso 2020, Kulliyada Radiology ee Mareykanka waxay ku talineysaa "CT waa inaan loo isticmaalin baaritaanka ama sidii safka koowaad ee baaritaanka COVID-19".

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: Baaritaanku wuxuu isticmaalayaa waqtiga dhabta ah dib u nuqulaynta taxanaha ka falcelinta polymerase (rRT-PCR).
translated: WHO ayaa daabacday dhowr borotokool baarista RNA ee SARS-CoV-2, iyadoo markii ugu horreysay la soo saaray 17-kii Janaayo.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Baaritaanka waxaa lagu samayn karaa neefmareenka mise sambalada dhiiga.
translated: Tijaabadu waxay isticmaashaa falcelinta silsiladda polymerase-ka-beddelka-waqtiga-dhabta ah (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: Natiijooyinka ayaa si guud loo helayaa saacado yar gudahood ilaa maalmo.
translated: Baaritaanka waxaa lagu sameyn karaa shaybaarka neefsashada ama dhiigga.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: Guud ahaan baaristan ayaa lagu sameeyaa dheecanka sanka inkastoo dheecaanka cunaha la isticmaali karo. Tiro shaybaaro iyo shirkado ayaa samaynaya baaritaano dheecaanada dhiiga, kaas oo ogaanaya antibody yada.
translated: Natiijooyinka waxaa guud ahaan la heli karaa dhowr saacadood ilaa maalmo gudahood.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: 6 Abriil 2020, ma jiro mid la xaqiijiyay inuu saxsanyahay si loogu ansixiyo isticmaal balaaran.
translated: Guud ahaan baaritaankan waxaa lagu sameeyaa suufka sanka ee sanka, inkastoo laga yaabo in suufka cunaha sidoo kale la isticmaalo. Tiro shaybaaro iyo shirkado ah ayaa sameynaya baaritaanno selojiig ah, kuwaas oo lagu ogaanayo unugyada difaaca jirka.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: Maraykanka baaritaanka dheecaanka dhiiga oo ay samaysay Cellex ayaa la ansixiyay u isticmaalka xaaladaha degdegga ee shaybaarada sharciyaysan kaliya.
translated: Laga bilaabo 6 Abriil 2020, midkoodna lama xaqiijin si ku filan oo sax ah si loogu oggolaado isticmaalka baahsan.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: Dabeecadaha astaamaha sawir qaadista ee raajooyinka iyo raajada koombuyuutarka (CT) ee dadka calaamadaha leh waxaa ku jira dhalooyinka dhulka yaal oon waxba laga dhex arkin iyo maqnaashaha dheecaanka u dhexeeya sanbabka iyo xabadka.
translated: Dalka Maraykanka shaybaadh serological ah oo uu sameeyay Cellex ayaa loo ogolaaday isticmaalka degdega ah ee ay isticmaalaan shaybaaro shahaado haysta oo kaliya.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: Ururka Raajada Talyaaniga ayaa uruurinaya xog online oo caalami ah oo natiijooyin sawir qaadis ah ee kiisaska la xaqiijiyay.
translated: Astaamaha sawirka sifada ee shucaaca iyo sawir-gacmeedka la xisaabiyay (CT) ee dadka calaamaduhu leeyihiin waxaa ka mid ah muraayadaha dhulka ku wareegsan ee aan asymmetrical lahayn iyo dheecaanno malab ah oo maqan.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: Sababtoo ah isdulfuulka caabuqyada kale sida adenovirus, sawir qaadista aan lahayn xaqiijinta PCR oo leh jaangoyn xadidan ee aqoonsiga COVID-19.
translated: Ururka Shucaaca talyaaniga ayaa ururinaya xog ururin caalami ah oo online ah oo ku saabsan natiijooyinka sawirada ee kiisaska la xaqiijiyay.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: Daraasad balaaran oo Shiinaha lagu sameeyay ayaa isbarbar dhigtay natiijooyinka CT da xabadka iyo PCR waxayna muujisay inkastoo sawir qaadistu aysan gaar ku ahayn caabuqa, way dhaqsa badan tahay wayna xasaasi badan tahay, iyadoo soo jeedinaysa tixgalinteeda inay tahay qalab lagu baaro goobaha safmareenka.
translated: Sababo la xiriira isku dhafka cudurrada kale sida adenovirus, sawirka iyada oo aan la xaqiijin PCR waa mid xaddidan oo lagu aqoonsanayo COVID-19.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: Garaadka gacan ku samayska ah- ee ku salaysan gadiska shabakada neerfaha ayaa la sameeyay si loo ogaado astaamaha sawirista ee fayruuska ee labada raajada iyo CT.
translated: Daraasad ballaaran oo Shiinaha laga sameeyay ayaa la barbardhigay natiijooyinka CT-ga laabta iyo PCR waxayna muujisay in inkasta oo sawir-qaadashadu ay ku yar tahay infekshanka, ay dhakhso badan tahay oo aad xasaasi u tahay, oo soo jeedinaysa tixgelinteeda sidii qalab baadhis ah oo ku saabsan meelaha faafa.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: Istaraatiijiyadaha ka hortaga gudbinta cudurka waxaa kamid ah joogtaynta nadaafad shaqsi ahaaneed fiican oo guud, gacma dhaqis, ka fogaanshaha ku taabashada indhaha, ama afka gacma aan la dhaqin, iyo ku qufucista ama ku hindhisoonta istaraasho iyo gaynta istaraashada qashin qubka.
translated: Shabakado maskaxeed oo ku salaysan sirdoon ayaa la sameeyay si loo ogaado muuqaalada sawirka fayraska oo leh radiographs iyo CT labadaba.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: Kuwa ee horaan qabay caabuqa ayaa lagu waaniyay inay xirtaan maaskarada qaliinka bulshada dhexdheeda.
translated: Xeeladaha looga hortagayo gudbinta cudurka waxaa ka mid ah ilaalinta guud ahaan nadaafadda shakhsi ahaaneed, dhaqidda gacmaha, iska ilaalinta taabashada indhaha, sanka, ama afka gacmaha aan la dhaqin, qufaca ama hindhisada unug iyo in nudaha si toos ah loo geliyo weel qashinka ah.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: Talaabooyinka kala fogaanshaha muuqda  ayaa sidoo kale lagu talinayaa si looga hortago gudbinta. Dawlado badan ayaa xadiday ama ka digay dhamaan socdaalka aan muhiimka ahayn ee lagu aadayo ama lagaga imaanayo dalalka iyo goobaha uu saameeyay dilaacu.
translated: Kuwa laga yaabo inay horeba u qabeen infekshanka ayaa lagula taliyay inay xidhaan maaskaro qalliin meel fagaare ah.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, fayruusku wuxuu gaaray heerka ku faafitaanka bulshada ee qaybo badan oo caalamka ah.
translated: Tallaabooyin kala fogaansho jireed ayaa sidoo kale lagula talinayaa si looga hortago faafitaanka. Dowlado badan ayaa xaddiday ama ku taliyay dhammaan safarrada aan muhiimka ahayn ee lagu tagayo lagana imanayo waddamada iyo meelaha uu cudurku ka dillaacay.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: Tani waxay ka dhigantahay in fayruusku uu ku faafayo bulshooyinka dhexdooda, qayba kamid ah bulshaduna ma oga meesha ama sida uu ugu dhacay. Daryeel caafimaad bixiyaasha ee daryeelaya qof laga yaabo inuu ku dhacay ayuu lagula talinayaa inay isticmaalaan taxaddaro casriyaysan, taxaddaro taabasho, iyo ilaalin il. Dabagalka xiriirka waa hab muhiim ah oo masuuliyiinta caafimaadku ay ku ogaan karaan meeshuu ka bilawday caabuqu iyo si ay uga hortagaan sii gudbin dheeri ah.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, fayrasku wuxuu gaadhay heerkii bulshada ee ku fiday meelo badan oo adduunka ah.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: Isticmaalka xogta goobta aad joogto ee Taeefoonada gacanta ee dawladu ay u isticmaalayso ujeedadan ayaa kiciyay walaac asturnaan, iyadoo Amnesty Internation iyo in ka badan 100 hay'ada kale ay soo saareen maqaalo ay ku baaqayaan xadidista noocan ilaalinta ah.
translated: Tani waxay ka dhigan tahay in fayrasku uu ku faafo bulshada dhexdeeda, xubnaha bulshada qaarkoodna ma garanayaan meesha ama sida laga helay. Bixiyeyaasha daryeelka caafimaadka ee daryeelaya qof laga yaabo inuu qabo cudurka waxaa lagula talinayaa inay isticmaalaan taxaddarrada caadiga ah, taxaddarrada xiriirka, iyo ilaalinta indhaha. Baafinta xiriirku waa hab muhiim u ah mas'uuliyiinta caafimaadka si ay u go'aamiyaan isha caabuqa iyo si looga hortago faafin kale.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: App yaal dhawr ah oo moobeelada gacanta ayaa la hawlgaliyay ama lasoo jeediyay isticmaal ikhtiyaar ah, ilaa Abriil 7, 2020, in ka badan darsin kooxo khabiiro ah ayaa ka shaqaynayay xalalka sir ilaalinta, sida isticmaalka Bluetooth si loo arko u dhawaanshaha isticmaalaha taleefanada kale ee gacanta .
translated: Isticmaalka xogta goobta ee talefannada gacanta ee dawladuhu ujeedadan ayaa keentay walaacyo gaar ah, iyadoo Amnesty International iyo in ka badan 100 urur oo kale ay soo saareen bayaan ay ku dalbanayaan in la xaddido ilaalinta noocan ah.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Isticmaalayaasha  ayaa kadib helaya fariin hadii ay u dhawaadeen qof laga helay COVID-19. Khuraafaad ayaa wareegaya ku saabsan sidii looga hortagi lahaa caabuqa; tusaale ahaan, dhaqista sanka iyo ku luqluqashada af dhaqaha ma aha kuwa shaqaynaya.
translated: Barnaamijyo kala duwan oo mobilada ah ayaa la hirgeliyay ama la soo jeediyay isticmaalka ikhtiyaarka ah, iyo laga bilaabo Abriil 7, 2020, in ka badan dersin kooxood oo khabiiro ah ayaa ka shaqeynayay xalalka saaxiibtinimada gaarka ah, sida adeegsiga Bluetooth si ay u galaan u dhowaanshaha isticmaaleha taleefannada kale ee gacanta.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: Ma jiro talaal COVID-19, inkastoo hay'ado badan ay ka shaqaynayaan inay mid keenaan.
translated: Isticmaalayaasha ayaa markaa helaya fariin haddii ay si dhow ula xiriireen qof laga helay COVID-19. Fikradaha khaldan ayaa wareegaya sida looga hortago caabuqa; tusaale ahaan, ku luqluqashada sanka iyo ku luqluqashada af-dhaqidda waxtar ma leh.

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: Gacma dhaqista ayaa lagu taliyay si looga hortago faafitaanka cudurka.
translated: Ma jiro tallaal COVID-19, in kasta oo ururo badan ay ka shaqaynayaan sidii ay mid u soo saari lahaayeen.

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: CDC ayaa kula talinaysa dadku inay ku dhaqdaan gacmaha inta badan saabuun iyo biyo ugu yaraan labaatan ilbiriqsi, gaar ahaan musqusha markay aadaan kadib mise markay gacmuhu wasakhaysanyihiin, cuntada ka hor; iyo kadib afuufista qof sankiis, quficista, ama hindhisada.
translated: Gacmo-dhaqashada ayaa lagula talinayaa si looga hortago faafitaanka cudurka.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: Tan waxaa keenay sababtoo ah banaanka jirka bini'aadanka, fayruuska waxaa dila saabuunta guriga, taas oo dilaacisa xunbadeeda ilaalinaysa.
translated: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in dadku ku dhaqmaan gacmaha saabuun iyo biyo marar badan ugu yaraan labaatan ilbiriqsi, gaar ahaan ka dib marka ay musqusha galaan ama marka ay gacmuhu si muuqata u wasakhoobaan; cuntada ka hor; iyo ka dib markaad sanka ka dhawaajiso, qufacdo, ama hindhiso.

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: CDC waxay si dheeri ah ku talisay isticmaalka jeermis dilaha gacmaha ee khamrida ka samaysan oo ugu yaraan leh 60% mug khamri ah marka aan saabuun iyo biyo si fudud loo heli karin.
translated: Sababtoo ah meel ka baxsan jidhka bini'aadamka, fayrasku waxaa dila saabuunta guriga, taas oo dillaacsa xumbo difaaceed.

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: WHO waxay ku waaninaysaa dadka inay ka fogaadaan ku taabashada indhaha, sanka, mise afka gacmo aan la dhaqin.
translated: CDC waxay kaloo ku talisay in la isticmaalo gacmo nadiifiye alkohol ku salaysan oo leh ugu yaraan 60% aalkolo marka loo eego saabuun iyo biyo aan diyaar ahayn.

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Dusha sare waxaa lagu jeermis dili karaa tirooyin xal (hal daqiiqo oo loo dhigayo jeermis dilaha ee dusha bir aan daxalaysan), oo ay ku jirto 62-71% ethanol, 50-100% isoproponal, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, iyo 0.2-7.5% povidone-iodine.
translated: WHO waxay kula talisay dadka inay iska ilaaliyaan inay ku taabtaan indhaha, sanka, ama afka gacmo aan la dhaqin.

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: Xalalka kale, sida benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, waa kuwa waxyar shaqaynaya.
translated: Dusha sare waxa laga yaabaa in lagu sumeeyo tiro xalal ah (hal daqiiqo gudaheed marka la soo gaadho jeermiska ee dusha birta aan lahayn), oo ay ku jiraan 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, iyo 0.2 -7.5% povidone-iodine.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa hadii kiis COVID-19 ah laga shakiyo ama la xaqiijiyo mee daryeel sida xafiis mise meesha daryeelka maalinta, goobaha dhamaan sida xafiisyada, musqulaha qubayska, goobaha guud, qalabka elektarooniga ee la wadaago sida tablets, shaashadaha la taabto, kiiboodhyada, xakameeyaasha ramuudka, iyo mashiinada ATM ee ay isticmaaleen dadka xanuunsan, waa in la jeermis dilaa.
translated: Xalalka kale, sida chloride benzalkonium iyo chrohexidine gluconate, ayaa waxtar yar leh.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
targetString: Hay'adaha caafimaadka ayaa ku taliyay in dadka ay dabooshaan afkooda iyo sankooda iyadoo ku qufacaya ama hindhisoonaya xagasha jiqilkooda ama istaraasho, iyo inay qashinka ku daraan istaraasha kasta si dhakhsa ah.
translated: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in haddii kiis COVID laga shakiyo ama lagu xaqiijiyo xarun sida xafiis ama xannaano, dhammaan aagagga sida xafiisyada, musqulaha, meelaha la wadaago, qalabka elektiroonigga ah ee la wadaago sida tablets, screens touch, kiiboodhka, kontaroolada fog, iyo ATM Mashiinnada ay isticmaalaan dadka jirran, waa in la jeermi-tiray.

sourceString: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
targetString: Maaskarooyinka qaliinka ayaa lagula talinayaa kuwa uu ku dhaco, maadaama xirashada maaskaruhu uu xadidi karo muga iyo masaafada ay soconayso dhibcaha dhacaya ee baahan markuu hadlayo, hindhisoonayo, ama qufacayo.
translated: Ururada caafimaadku waxay ku taliyeen in dadku ku daboolaan afkooda iyo sankooda suxulka foorarsan ama unug marka ay qufacayaan ama hindhisayaan, oo ay iska tuuraan wixii unug ah isla markaaba.

sourceString: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
targetString: WHO ayaa soo saartay talooyin ku saabsan goorta iyo sida loo isticmaalayo maaskarooyinka.
translated: Maaskarada qalliinka ayaa lagula talinayaa kuwa laga yaabo inay qaadaan cudurka, maadaama xirashada maaskaro ay xaddidi karto mugga iyo masaafada safarka ee dhibco dhicis ah oo kala firirsan marka la hadlayo, hindhisada, iyo qufaca.

sourceString: The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
targetString: Iyadoo laga soo xiganayo Stephen Griffin, fayruus yaqaan jooga Jaamacada Leeds, "xirashada maaskaruhu wuxuu yarayn karaa kor u kaca [ee] dadka inay taabtaan wajigooda, kaas oo ah isha u wayn ee laga qaado hadaysan jirin nadaafad gacan oo ku haboon". Maaskarooyinka ayaa sidoo kale lagu taliyay inay isticmaalaan dadka daryeelaya qof uu hayo cudurku.
translated: WHO ayaa soo saartay tilmaamo ku saabsan goorta iyo sida loo isticmaalo waji-xidhka.

sourceString: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
targetString: WHO ayaa kula talisay xirashada maaskarooyinka dadka caafimaadka qaba haday khatar sare ku jiraan, sida kuwa daryeelaya qof qaba COVID-19, inkastoo sidoo kale ay qirayaan in xirashada maaskaradu ay ka caawin karto dadka inay ka fogaadaan taabashada wajigooda.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay Stephen Griffin, oo ku takhasusay cilmiga virologist kana tirsan jaamacadda Leeds, "Xidashada maaskaro waxay yarayn kartaa u janjeerta [dadka] inay taabtaan wejigooda, taas oo ah isha ugu weyn ee caabuqa iyada oo aan la helin nadaafadda gacanta saxda ah." Maaskarada ayaa sidoo kale lagula taliyay in la isticmaalo by kuwa daryeelaya qof laga yaabo inuu qabo cudurka.

sourceString: The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
targetString: Dalal dhawr ah ayaa bilabay inay ku dhiirigaliyaan isticmaalka maaskarada wajiga xubnaha bulshada.
translated: WHO ayaa ku talisay xirashada maaskaro ee dadka caafimaadka qaba kaliya haddii ay halis sare ugu jiraan, sida kuwa daryeelaya qof qaba COVID-19, in kasta oo ay sidoo kale qireen in xirashada maaskaro ay ka caawin karto dadka inay iska ilaaliyaan inay taabtaan wajigooda.

sourceString: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
targetString: Maraykanka, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa xirashada maaskarada wajiga aan tan caafimaadka ahayn ee dharka laga sameeyay. Shiinaha ayaa gaar ahaan kula taliyay isticmaalka maarkarada caafimaad ee la tuuri karo xubnaha caafimaadka bulshada, gaar ahaan mark ay usoo dhawaanayaan (1 mitir (3 dhudhun) mise ka yar) dadka kale.
translated: Dhowr waddan ayaa bilaabay inay dhiirigeliyaan isticmaalka waji-xidhka ee xubnaha dadweynaha.

sourceString: In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
targetString: Hong Kong ayaa ku talinaysa xirashada maaskarada qaliinka marka la raacayo gaadiidka dadwaynaha ama la joogo meelaha dadka badan.
translated: Dalka Maraykanka, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa xidhashada maaskaro weji aan dawo ahayn oo laga sameeyay maro.Shiinuhu waxay si gaar ah ugu talisay isticmaalka maaskaro la tuuri karo oo ay adeegsadaan xubnaha caafimaadka qaba ee dadweynaha, gaar ahaan marka ay isu soo dhawaadaan (1 mitir (3 ft) ama ka yar ) dadka kale.

sourceString: Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
targetString: Masuuliyiinta caafimaadka ee Thailand ayaa ku dhiirigalinya dadka inay   ku samaystaan maaskarada wajiga oo dhar ah guriga ayna maalin kasta dhaqaan.
translated: Hong Kong waxay ku talinaysaa xidhashada maaskaro qalliin marka aad raacayso gaadiidka dadweynaha ama aad joogtid meelaha dadku ku badan yahay.

sourceString: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
targetString: Jamhuuriyada Czech iyo Slovakia ayaa joojiyay in banaanka bulshada loo soo baxo iyadoon la xirnayn maaskarada mise daboolista sanka iyo afka qofka.
translated: Saraakiisha caafimaadka ee Thailand ayaa dadka ku dhiiri galinaya in ay guriga ku sameeyaan maro waji oo ay maydhaan maalin kasta.

sourceString: The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
targetString: 16 Maarso, Vietnam waxay ka codsatay qofkasta inuu xirto maaskarada wajiga markuu aadayo goobaha bulshada si ay u ilaaliyaan naftooda iyo tan dadka kale.
translated: Czech Republic iyo Slovakia waxay mamnuuceen in bannaanka loo baxo iyada oo aan la xidhin maaskaro ama aan la daboolin sanka iyo afka.

sourceString: On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
targetString: Dawlada Austria ayaa sharciyaysay in qof kasta oo galaya bakhaar alaab uu xirto maaskarada wajiga.
translated: 16-kii Maarso, Vietnam waxay ka codsatay qof walba inuu xidho maaskaro wajiga marka uu aadayo meelaha caamka ah si loo ilaaliyo naftooda iyo kuwa kale.

sourceString: The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
targetString: Israel ayaa waydiisatay dhamaan deegaanka inay xirtaan maaskarada waiga markay bulshada ku dhex jiraan.
translated: Dowladda Austria ayaa amar ku bixisay in qof kasta oo galaya dukaan raashinka ah uu xirto maaskaro wajiga ah.

sourceString: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
targetString: Taiwan, oo soo saaraysay toban milyan oo maaskarooyin maalintii ilaa iyo Maarso dhexdeeda, ayaaa uga baahnayd rakaabka tareenada iyo basaska magaalooyinka isaga goosha inay xirtaan maaskarada wajiga wixii ka billawda 1 Abriil.
translated: Israa'iil waxay ka codsatay dhammaan dadka deggan inay xirtaan waji-xidhka marka ay meel fagaare ah joogaan.

sourceString: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April.
targetString: Panama ayaa waajib ka dhigtay xirashada maaskarada wajiga marka banaanka loo baxayo, halka ay sidoo kale ku talisay soo saarista maaskarada wajiga guriga lagu hagaajiyay si ay u isticmaalaan dadka aan iibsan karin maaskarada wajiga.
translated: Taiwan, oo soo saaraysay toban milyan oo maaskaro ah maalintii ilaa badhtamihii Maarso, waxay u baahday rakaabka saaran tareenada iyo basaska magaalada inay xidhaan waji-xidho 1da Abriil.

sourceString: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
targetString: Maaskarooyinka wajiga ayaa sidoo kale si balaaran looga isticmaalay Japan, Kuuriyada Koonfureed, Malaysia, iyo Singapore.
translated: Panama waxa ay waajib ka dhigtay in la xidho maaskaro mar kasta oo aad dibadda u baxayso, iyada oo sidoo kale ku talinaysa in loo sameeyo maaskaro wejiga lagu sameeyo oo kuwa aan iibsan karin waji-xidhka.

sourceString: Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore.
targetString: Kala fogaanshaha bulshada ( sidoo kale loo yaqaano kala fogaanshaha muuqata) waxaa kamid ah ficilalada xakamaynta caabuqa ee loola jeedo in hoos loogu dhigo faafitaanka cudurka iyadoo la yaraynayo istaabashada dhaw ee u dhaxaysa dadka.
translated: Maaskarada wejiga ayaa sidoo kale si weyn looga isticmaalay Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, iyo Singapore.

sourceString: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
targetString: Hababka waxaa kamid ah kariintiill, xannibaada socdaalka, iyo xirista dugsiyada, goobaha shaqada, garoonada ciyaarta, masraxyada, mise xarumaha dukaamaysiga.
translated: Fogaanta bulshada (sidoo kale loo yaqaano fogeynta jirka) waxaa ka mid ah ficilada xakameynta caabuqa ee loogu talagalay in lagu yareeyo faafitaanka cudurka iyadoo la yareynayo xiriirka dhow ee ka dhexeeya shakhsiyaadka.

sourceString: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
targetString: Dadka ayaa ku dhaqan gelin kara habka kala fogaanshaha bulshada inay guriga joogaan, xadidista socdaalka, ka fogaanshaha goobaha dadka badan, isticmaalka salaanta aan lays taabanayn, iyo inay muuqaal ahayn ka fogaadaan dadka kale.
translated: Hababka waxaa ka mid ah karantiilka; xayiraadaha safareed; iyo xidhitaanka dugsiyada, goobaha shaqada, garoommada, tiyaatarada, ama xarumaha wax iibsiga.

sourceString: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
targetString: Dawlado badan ayaa hada sharciyaynaya ama ku talinaya kala fogaanshaha bulshada ee gobolada uu saameeyay dilaacistu.
translated: Shakhsiyaadka waxaa laga yaabaa inay adeegsadaan hababka kala fogeynta bulshada iyagoo guriga jooga, xaddidaya safarka, ka fogaanshaha meelaha dadku ku badan yahay, iyagoo isticmaalaya salaanta aan la xidhiidhin, iyo inay jidh ahaan iska fogeeyaan kuwa kale.

sourceString: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Qiyaasta isu imaatinka ugu badan ee ay ku talisay masuuliyiinta dawlada Maraykanku iyo hay'adaha caafimaadka si fudud hoos loogu dhigay laga bilaabo 2500 qof (hadaysan jirin faafitaan COVID-19 oo lagu ogaa gobolka) ilaa 50 qof, iyo ugu dambayn 10 qof.
translated: Dawlado badan ayaa hadda amar ku bixinaya ama ku talinaya fogeynta bulshada ee gobollada uu saameeyay cudurka dillaacay.

sourceString: The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
targetString: 22 Maarso 2020, Jarmalku wuxuu joojiyay isu imaatinka bulshada ee wax ka badan laba qof. Dadka waawayn iyo kuwa qaba xaalada caafimaad oo hooseeya sida sonkorawga, wadna xanuun, xanuunka neefmareenka, dhiig kar iyo nidaamka difaaca jirka oo hooseeya ayaa wajahaya khatar sare oo xanuuno ba'an ah iyo cillado waxayn CDC ku waanisay inay guriga joogaan intii suurtagal ah meelaha bulshada ee uu ka dilaacay. Dhamaadkii Maarso 2020, WHO iyo hay'adaha kale ee caafimaad waxay bilaabeen inay ku badelaan isticmaalka erayga "kala fogaanshaha bulshada" "kala fogaanshaha muuqda", si loo cadeeyo inay ujeedadu tahay in hoos loo dhigo istaabashada muuqata iyadoo la joogtaynayo xiriirada bulshada, ha noqoto mid aan toos ahayn mise mid meel fog.
translated: Cabbirka ugu badan ee isu imaatinka ee ay ku taliyeen hay'adaha dowladda Mareykanka iyo ururada caafimaadka ayaa si degdeg ah looga dhimay 250 qof (haddii aan la ogeyn COVID-19 ku faafay gobol) oo laga dhigay 50 qof, markii dambena laga dhigay 10 qof.

sourceString: On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
targetString: Isticmaalka erayga "kala fogaanshaha bulshada" ayaa keenay natiijooyin in dadku ay kala soocid bulsho oo dhamaystiran galaan, halkii lagu waanin lahaa inay dadka kale kula xiriiraan habab lamid ah oo kale. Masuuliyiinta qaar ayaa bixiyay talooyin caafimaad oo galmo si loo isticmaalo inta lagu jiro cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: 22-kii Maarso 2020, Jarmalku wuxuu mamnuucay isu imaatinka dad ka badan laba qof. Dadka waaweyn iyo kuwa leh xaalado caafimaad oo hoose sida sonkorowga, cudurada wadnaha, cudurada neef-mareenka, hypertension, iyo nidaamka difaaca jirka oo daciifa ayaa wajahaya khatarta sii kordheysa ee jirro halis ah iyo dhibaatooyin Waxay kula talisay CDC inay guriga joogaan intii suurtagal ah meelaha ay bulshadu ka dillaacday. Dabayaaqadii bishii Maarso 2020, WHO iyo hay'adaha kale ee caafimaadka waxay bilaabeen inay ku beddelaan adeegsiga ereyga "fogeynta bulshada" "fogeynta jireed", si loo caddeeyo in ujeedadu waa in la dhimo xidhiidhka jidhka iyadoo la ilaalinayo xidhiidhka bulsho, mid ahaan ama meel fog.

sourceString: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
targetString: Kuwan waxaa kamid ah talooyinka inaad galmo la samayso kaliya qofka aad la nooshahay, kaas oo aan qabin fayruuska ama calaamadaha fayruuska.
translated: Isticmaalka ereyga "fogeynta bulshada" ayaa horseeday saameyn ah in dadku ay galaan go'doon bulsho oo dhammaystiran, halkii lagu dhiirigelin lahaa inay la xiriiraan kuwa kale siyaabo kale. Maamulka qaar ayaa soo saaray tilmaamaha caafimaadka galmada ee isticmaalka inta lagu jiro aafada.

sourceString: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
targetString: Iskarantiilka guriga ayaa lagula taliyay dadka laga helay COVID-19 iyo kuwa ka shakisan inuu ku dhacay.
translated: Kuwaas waxaa ka mid ah talooyinka in kaliya lala galmoodo qof aad la nooshahay, oo aan lahayn fayraska ama calaamadaha fayraska.

sourceString: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
targetString: Hay'adaha caafimaadka ayaa soo saaray tilmaamo cad ee iskarantiilka haboon. Dawlada badan ayaa sharciyeeyay ama ku taliyay iskarantiilka dhamaan bulshada ku nool goobaha uu saameeyay.
translated: Go'doominta guriga ayaa lagula taliyay kuwa laga helay COVID-19 iyo kuwa ka shakisan inay qaadeen.

sourceString: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
targetString: Talooyinka iskarantiilka ugu xoogan ayaa la siiyay kooxaha ku sugan khatarta sare.
translated: Hay'adaha caafimaadku waxay soo saareen tilmaamo faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan gooni-u-goynta habboon. Dawlado badan ayaa amar ku bixiyay ama ku taliyay is-karantiil dhammaan dadka ku nool meelaha ay dhibaatadu saameysey.

sourceString: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
targetString: Kuwa laga yaabo inay la kulmeen qof qaba COVID-19 iyo kuwa dhawaan u socdaalay dal ama gobol leh gudbitaan baahsan ayaa lagu waaniyay inay is karantiilaan 14 maalin laga bilaabo waqti ugu dambeeyay ee suurtagalka inuu la kulmay.
translated: Tilmaamaha is-karantiil ee ugu xooggan ayaa la siiyay kuwa ku jira kooxaha khatarta sare leh.

sourceString: Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
targetString: Istaraatiijiyadaha lagu xakameeyo dilaacista ayaa ah joojin mise hoos u dhigid, iyo yarayn.
translated: Kuwa laga yaabo inuu la kulmo qof qaba COVID-19 iyo kuwa dhowaan u safray waddan ama gobol uu ku faafay faafitaanka baahsan ayaa lagula taliyay inay is-karantiiliyaan 14 maalmood laga bilaabo markii ugu dambaysay ee ay suurtagal tahay.

sourceString: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
targetString: Joojinta ayaa la qaadaa marxaladaha ugu horeeya ee dilaacista waxayna rabaan inay raadiyaan oyna karantiilaan kuwa uu ku dhacay iyo si lamid ah inay keenaan talaabooyin kale ee xakamaynta caabuqa iyo talaalista si looga joojiyo cudurka inuu ku faafo bulsha inta kale.
translated: Xeeladaha lagu xakameynayo dillaaca waa xakamaynta ama xakamaynta, iyo yaraynta.

sourceString: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
targetString: Marka aysan suuragal ahayn in la joojiyo faafista cudurka, dadaalada ayaa markaas aadaya marxalada yaraynta, talaabooyin ayaa la qaadaa si hoos loogu dhigo  faafitaanka loona yareeyo saamaynta uu ku leeyahay nidaamka caafimaadka iyo bulshada.
translated: Ka-hortagga cudurka ayaa la qabtaa marxaladaha hore ee dillaaca waxaana ujeeddadeedu tahay in la raadiyo lagana saaro kuwa cudurka qaba iyo sidoo kale in la sameeyo tillaabooyin kale oo xakameynta caabuqa iyo tallaallo si looga hortago in cudurka uu ku faafo dadka intiisa kale.

sourceString: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
targetString: Iskudarka labada talaabooyin ee joojinta iyo yaraynta ayaa la qaadi karaa isku waqti.
translated: Marka ay suurtagal noqon weydo in la xakameeyo faafitaanka cudurka, dadaallada ayaa markaa u gudba heerka dhimista: tillaabooyin ayaa la qaadayaa si loo yareeyo fiditaanka oo loo yareeyo saameynta ay ku leedahay nidaamka daryeelka caafimaadka iyo bulshada.

sourceString: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
