targetString: Hoos u dhigidu waxay u baahantahay talaabooyin badan oo adag si loogu celiyo cudurka caalamiga ah iyadoo la yareynayo tira taran ee aasaasiga ah ilaa wax ka yar 1. qaybta maaraynta dilaaca xanuunada caabuqa waxay isku dayaysaa inay yarayso kor u kaca safmareenka, ee lagu yaqaan balaarinta soo qaloocaha safamreenka.
translated: Tallaabooyin xakameyn iyo yareyn isugu jira ayaa la qaadi karaa isku mar.

sourceString: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
targetString: Tani waxay hoos u dhigaysaa khatarta adeegyada caafimaadka ay ku baaba'ayaan waxayna siinaysaa waqti badan in la sameeyo talaalada iyo dawooyinka.
translated: Xakamaynta waxay u baahan tahay tillaabooyin aad u daran si dib loogu celiyo masiibada iyadoo la dhimayo tirada aasaasiga ah ee taranka oo laga dhigay in ka yar 1. Qayb ka mid ah maaraynta cudurrada faafa waxay isku dayaysaa inay hoos u dhigto heerka ugu sarreeya ee cudurka, oo loo yaqaan 'flattening the epidemic curve'.

sourceString: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
targetString: Faragelinta aad daawa samaynta ah ee maareeya dilaaca waxaa kamid ah talaabooyinka is ilaalinta shaqsi ahaaneed, sida nadaafada, xirashada maaskarada wajiga, iyo iskarantiilka; talaabooyinka nulshada ee laga maaganyahay kala fogaanshaha muuqda sida xirista dugsiyada iyo joojinta madalaha isu imaatinka wayn; ku lug lahaanshaha bulshada ee lagu waaninayo aqbalista iyo ka qay qaadashada faragelinta noocaas ah; iyo si lamid ah talaabooyinka deegaanka sida nadiifinta dusha. Ficilo adag oo badan oo laga maaganyahay joojinta dilaaca ayaa laga qaaday Shiinaha markay ba'naanta dilaacu soo muuqatay, sida karantiilka magaalooyin dhan iyo soo rogida joojin socdaal oo adag.
translated: Tani waxay yaraynaysaa khatarta ah in adeegyada caafimaadka la buuxdhaafiyo waxayna siisaa wakhti badan oo tallaalada iyo daawaynta lagu soo saaro.

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: Dalalka kale ayaa sidoo kale dhaqan geliyay talaabooyin dhawr ah oo looga gol leeyahay xadidista faafitaanka fayruuska.
translated: Waxqabadyada aan dawooyinka ahayn ee maareyn kara faafitaanka waxaa ka mid ah tallaabooyinka ka hortagga shakhsi ahaaneed, sida nadaafadda gacmaha, xirashada waji-xidhka, iyo is-karantiil; tillaabooyinka beesha ee looga dan leeyahay kala fogaanshiyaha jireed sida xiritaanka dugsiyada iyo joojinta dhacdooyinka isu imaatinka tirada badan; ka-qaybgalka bulshada si loo dhiirrigeliyo aqbalaadda iyo ka-qaybgalka waxqabadyadaas; iyo sidoo kale tillaabooyinka deegaanka sida nadiifinta dusha sare.Tallaabooyin aad u adag oo loogu talagalay in lagu xakameeyo cudurka dillaacay ayaa laga qaaday Shiinaha markii ay soo shaac baxday darnaanta cudurka dillaacay, sida karantiilidda dhammaan magaalooyinka iyo soo rogidda xayiraadaha safarka.

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa soo rogtay baaritaan baahsan iyo karantiilo maxalli ah, waxayna soo saartay digniino ku saabsan dhaqdhaqaaqa dadka uu ku dhacay.
translated: Wadamada kale ayaa sidoo kale qaatay tillaabooyin kala duwan oo looga dan leeyahay in lagu xaddido fiditaanka fayraska.

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: Singapore ayaa siisay taageero maaliyadeed dadka uu ku dhacay ee is karantiilay waxay dul dhigtay ganaaxyo balaaran dadka taas samayn waayay.
translated: Kuuriyada Koonfureed waxay soo bandhigtay baaris ballaaran iyo karantiil gudaha ah, waxayna soo saartay digniino ku saabsan dhaqdhaqaaqa shakhsiyaadka cudurka qaba.

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: Taiwan waxay kor u qaaday soo saarista maaskarada wajiga waxayna ganaaxday kor u qaadista qiimaha agabka caafimaad. Naqshadaha Ingiriiska iyo Maraykanka ayaa muujinaya in yaraynta (hoos u dhigida laakiin aan ahayn joojinta faafitaanka safmareenka) iyo cadaadinta(dib u celista koritaanka safmareenka) inay leeyihiin caqabado badan.
translated: Singapore waxay taageero dhaqaale u fidisay kuwa cudurka qaba ee is karantiilay waxayna ku soo rogtay ganaaxyo waaweyn kuwa sidaas yeeli waayay.

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: Farsamooyinka yaraynta ee ugu fiican ayaa yarayn kara baahida daryeelka caafimaadka ugu sareeya 2/3 dhimashadan kala bar, laakiin wali natiijooyinka ee boqolaal kun oo dhimasho ah iyo in nidaamyada caafimaadka la baabi'yay.
translated: Taiwan waxay kordhisay wax soo saarka waji-xidhka iyo kaydinta sahayda caafimaadka oo la ganaaxay. Sawirada Great Britain iyo Maraykanka waxay muujinayaan in yaraynta (yaraynta laakiin aan la joojin faafitaanka faafitaanka) iyo xakamaynta (dib u celinta kobaca faafa) waxay leeyihiin caqabado waaweyn.

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: Cadaadiska ayaa la door bidi karaa laakiin wuxuu u baahanyahay in la joogteeyo inta uu fayruusku ku wareegayo bulshada bini'aadanka (mise ilaa talaal laga helayo, haday taasi hor timaado), hadii kale gudbinta ayaa si dhakhsa leh usoo laba kaclaynaysa marka talaabooyinka la khafiifiyo.
translated: Siyaasadaha yaraynta ugu wanaagsan ayaa laga yaabaa inay yareeyaan baahida daryeelka caafimaad ee ugu sareysa 2/3 iyo dhimashada kala bar, laakiin wali waxay keenaysaa boqolaal kun oo dhimasho ah iyo nidaamyada caafimaadka oo buux dhaafiyay.

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: Faragelinta mudada dheer ee cadaadinta cudurka caalamiga ah ayaa sababaya kharashka bulsho iyo mid dhaqaale.
translated: Cabudhinta waa la doorbidi karaa laakiin waxay u baahan tahay in la sii wado ilaa iyo inta uu fayrasku ku dhex wareegayo dadka bini'aadamka (ama ilaa tallaal la helayo, haddii ay taasi u horreyso), sida gudbinta haddii kale si dhakhso ah ayey u soo noqotaa marka tallaabooyinka la dejiyo.

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: Ma jiraan daawayn fayruus ka hortag oo gaar ah oo loo ansixiyay COVID-19, laakiin dadaalada samaynta ayaa socda, iyadoo ay kamid tahay tijaabinta daawooyinka sii jiray.
translated: Faragelinta muddada-dheer ee lagu xakameynayo masiibada waxay sababtaa kharashyo bulsho iyo dhaqaale.

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: Qaadashada daawooyinka qabawga ee la heli karo, cabista juuska, iyo nasashada ayaa caawin kara baabi'inta calaamadaha.
translated: Ma jiraan dawooyin gaar ah oo ka hortag ah oo loo oggolaaday COVID-19, laakiin dadaallada horumarineed ayaa socda, oo ay ku jiraan tijaabinta dawooyinka jira.

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: Iyadoo ku xiran ba'naanta, ku daaweynta oxygen ka, dareeraha xidika laga qaato, iyo taageerista neefsashada ayaa loo baahan karaa.
translated: Qaadashada dawooyinka qabowga ee aan la qorin, cabitaanka cabitaanka, iyo nasashada waxay kaa caawin kartaa yaraynta calaamadaha.

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: Isticmaalka steroid ayaa xumayn kara natiijada.
translated: Iyadoo ku xiran darnaanta, daaweynta ogsajiinta, dareeraha xididada, iyo taageerada neefsashada ayaa loo baahan karaa.

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: Isku jiro badan oo horay loo ansixiyay in lagu daaweeyo cudurada kale ee fayruusyada ayaa la baarayaa in loo isticmaalo karo daaweynta COVID-19.
translated: Isticmaalka steroids waxay ka sii dari kartaa natiijooyinka.

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: WHO ayaa sidoo kale sheegta in qaar "daawooyin dhaqameedka iyo kuwa guriga" ay yara dejin karaan calaamadaha uu sababay SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Dhowr ka kooban oo hore loogu oggolaaday daaweynta cudurrada kale ee fayraska ayaa la baarayaa si loogu isticmaalo daawaynta COVID-19.

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: Kor u qaadista baaxada iyo la qabsiga daryeelka caafimaad ee baahiyaha bukaanada COVID-19 ayay WHO ku sheegtay talaabo falcelin oo aasaasi ah ee dilaaca.
translated: WHO waxa kale oo ay sheegtay in qaar ka mid ah "daawoyinka dhaqameed iyo kuwa guriga" ay ku siin karaan nasinta calaamadaha uu keeno SARS-CoV-19.

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: ECDC iyo xafiis goboleedka Yurub ee WHO ayaa soo saaray tilmaamo ku aadan isbitaalada iyo adeegyada daryeelka caafimaad ee aasaasiga ah ee wareejinta ilaha heerar dhawr ah, oo ay ku jirto diirad saarista adeegyada shaybaarka ee ku aadan baarista COVID-19, joojinta hababka xulashada markasta oo suuragal ah, kala saarista iyo karantiilka bukaanda COVID-19, iyo awoodaha daryeelka degdegga iyadoo la tababarayo shaqaalaha iyo kordhinta tirada neef siiyaasha iyo sariiraha la heli karo.
translated: Kordhinta awoodda iyo la-qabsiga daryeelka caafimaadka baahiyaha bukaannada COVID-19 waxa ay WHO ku tilmaantay cabbirka jawaabta aasaasiga ah ee dillaaca.

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: Waxaa jira sheegashooyin dhawr ah oo ku saabsan halka kiiska ugu horeeyay (ee loogu yeero bukaanka eberaad) uu kasoo farcamay.
translated: ECDC iyo xafiiska gobolka Yurub ee WHO waxay soo saareen tilmaamo isbitaallada iyo adeegyada daryeelka caafimaadka aasaasiga ah ee wareejinta kheyraadka heerar kala duwan, oo ay ku jiraan diiradda saaraya adeegyada shaybaarka dhanka baaritaanka COVID-19, baabi'inta nidaamyada doorashada mar kasta oo ay suurtagal tahay, kala soocida iyo go'doominta COVID-19 togan. bukaanada, iyo kordhinta awoodaha daryeelka degdega ah iyadoo la tababarayo shaqaalaha lana kordhinayo tirada hawo-mareenada iyo sariiraha la heli karo.

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: Kiiska ugu horeeyay ee la ogyahay ee coronavirus ka cusub ayaa noqon kara Diseembar 2019 Wuhan, Hubei, Shiinaha.
translated: Waxaa jira aragtiyo kala duwan oo ku saabsan halka kiiskii ugu horreeyay (waxa loogu yeero eber bukaan) laga yaabo inuu ka yimid.

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Bil gudaheed, tirada kiisaska coronavirus ee Hubai ayaa si tartiib ah u kordhay.
translated: Kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee la yaqaan ee coronavirus-ka cusub ayaa laga yaabaa inuu dib ugu laabto 1 Disembar 2019 Wuhan, Hubei, Shiinaha.

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: Kuwan waxaa inta abdan lala xiriiriyay Suuqa Huanan Seafood Wholesale, kaas oo sidoo kale iibiyay xoolaha nool, hal fikrad ayaan ah in fayruusku uu ka yimid mid kamid ah noocyadan xoolaha; mise, si kale hadii loo dhigo, wuxuu leeyahay asal xanuun xoolo oo u gudba aadanaha. Kooxda burukiitada ee waxa keena la yaqaano ayaa lagu arkay 26 Diseembar waxaana daweeyay dhakhtar Zhang Jixian gudaha isbitaalka Hubei Provincial, kaas oo ogaysiiyay Wuhan Jianghan CDC 27dii Diseembar.
translated: Bil gudaheed, tirada kiisaska coronavirus-ka ee Hubei ayaa si tartiib tartiib ah u kordhay.

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: 30kii Diseembar, koox dhaqaatiir ka ah Isbitaalka Dhexe ee Wuhan ayaa asxaabtooda uga digay "coronavirus ka shabaha SARS".
translated: Kuwani waxay inta badan ku xirnaayeen Suuqa Jumlada ee Huanan Seafood Seafood, oo sidoo kale iibin jiray xoolaha nool, hal aragti ayaa ah in fayrasku ka yimid mid ka mid ah noocyadan xoolaha; ama, si kale loo dhigo, waxa uu leeyahay asal zoonotic ah

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: Sideed ka mid ah daqaatiirtan, uu ka mid yahay Li Wenliang, ayay booliska ka waaniyeen faafitaanka warar been abuur ah, iyo waxyaalo kale, Ai Fen,  ayaa waxaa canaantay maamulayaasheed sababta ah kor uqaadida cabsida.
translated: 30kii Diseembar, koox dhakhaatiir ah oo jooga cisbitaalka dhexe ee Wuhan ayaa uga digay asxaabtooda "coronavirus-u eg SARS".

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: Gudiga Caafimaad ee Dawlada Hoose ee Wuhan ayaa mar danbe sii daysay ogaysiis dadweyne 31 Maarso wargalisayna Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka.
translated: Siddeed ka mid ah dhakhaatiirtan, oo uu ku jiro Li Wenliang, ayay booliisku ku waaniyeen inay faafiyeen warar been abuur ah, mid kalena, Ai Fen, ayaa waxaa canaantay madaxdeeda sare u qaadista digniinta.

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: Kiiasa ku filan oo ah burukiito aan la aqoon  ayaa lagu soo wargaliyay madaxda caafimaad ee Wuhan kaas oo kiciyay baadhitaan bilawgii Janaayo.Inta lagu guda jiray marxaladihii hore ee dilaacitaanka, tirada kiisaska ayaa islabalaabay qiyaas ahaan toddobo maalin bar kasta.
translated: Guddiga caafimaadka degmada Wuhan ayaa markii dambe soo saaray ogeysiis dadweyne 31-kii Diseembar waxayna ku wargeliyeen WHO.

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: Horaantii iyo bartamihii Janaayo 2020 fayraska ayaa ku faafay gobolada kale ee Shiinaha, kaas uu saaciday isu socodka Sanadka Cusub ee Shiinaha iyadoo Wuhan tahay xarunta gaadiidka iyo goobta ugu wayn ee tareenada isku badalaan.
translated: Kiis ku filan oo ah oof-wareen aan la garanayn ayaa loo sheegay mas'uuliyiinta caafimaadka ee Wuhan si ay u bilaabaan baaritaan horraantii Janaayo. Intii lagu jiray marxaladaha hore ee cudurka dillaacay, tirada kiisasku waxay labanlaabmeen ku dhawaad 7 maalmood iyo badhkiiba.

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: 20kii Janaayo, Shiinaha ayaa ku warantay ku dhawaad 140 kiisas cusub ah hal maalin,  oo ay ka mid yihiinlabo qof oo gudaha Beijing ah iyo hal qof oo laga helay Shenzhen.
translated: Horraantii iyo badhtamihii Janaayo 2020, fayrasku wuxuu ku fiday gobollada kale ee Shiinaha, oo ay ka caawisay socdaalka sanadka cusub ee Shiinaha iyo Wuhan oo ah xarun gaadiid iyo isweydaarsiga tareenka weyn.

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: Xog rasmi ahaa gadaal ka mmuujisay in 6,174 qof ay horaan calaamadaha u muujiyeen dhamaadkii 20 Janaayo 2020, 26 Maarso, Maraykanka ayaa ka hormaray Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga isagoo leh tirada ugu badan ee la xaqiijiyay aduunka oo dhan.Ilaa 9 Abrill 202o, kiisas ka badan 1.61 milyan ayaa laga soo sheegay aduunka oo dhan; in ka badan 97,000 oo qof ayaa dhintay in kaadan 364 na way bogsadeen.
translated: 20kii Janaayo, Shiinaha ayaa soo sheegay ku dhawaad 140 xaaladood oo cusub hal maalin, oo ay ku jiraan laba qof oo ku sugan Beijing iyo mid Shenzhen ah.

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: Ku dhawaad 200 oo dal iyo dhulal ayaa laga helay ugu yaraan hal kiis.
translated: Xogta rasmiga ah ee dambe waxay muujineysaa in 6,174 qof ay horey u yeesheen astaamo marka la gaaro 20-ka Janaayo 2020. Ilaa 26-kii Maarso, Mareykanka wuxuu dhaafey Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga tirada ugu badan ee kiisaska la xaqiijiyey ee adduunka. kiisaska ayaa laga soo sheegay adduunka oo dhan; in ka badan 97,000 oo qof ayaa dhintay in ka badan 364,000 ayaa ka soo kabsaday.

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: Sababtoo cudurka caalamiga ee gudaha Yurub, wadamo badan oo ah Aaga Schengen ayaa xayiray dhaqdhaqaaqa xorta ah dajiyayna kontooralada xuduuda.
translated: Ku dhawaad 200 oo waddan iyo dhulal ayaa ugu yaraan hal kiis ku dhacay.

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: Falcelinta qaranta ayaa waxaa ka mid ah talaabooyin xakamayn sida karantiilo (oo loo yaqaan amarada guriga joog ah, amarada hoygiina kujira, ama xiritaanada guud) iyo bandawyo,Ka bilaabata 2 Abriil, ku dhawaad 300 milyan oo qof, ama ku dhawaad 90% dadweynaha ayaa ku jira nooc  xayiraad ah gudaha Maraykanka,In kabadan 50 milyan oo qof ayaa ku jira xayiraad gudaha Philippines, ku dhawaad 59 milyan oo qof ayaa ku jira xayiraad gudaha Koonfur Afrika, iyo 130 bilyan qof oo ku jira xayiraado gudaha Hindiya.
translated: Faafida Yurub awgeed, waddamo badan oo ku yaal Aagga Schengen ayaa xaddiday dhaqdhaqaaqa xorta ah waxayna dejiyeen kontaroolada xuduudaha.

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: 26dii maarso, 1.7 bilyan oo dad aduunka oo dhan ayaa ku jiray  noocyo ka mid ah xayiraad, kaaso oo u kordhay 2.6 bilyan oo dad laba maalin kadib-kudhawaad saddex meelood hal meel shacabka aduunka oo dhan.
translated: Dareen-celinta qaranka waxaa ka mid ahaa tillaabooyin xakameyn ah sida karantiil (oo loo yaqaan amar-ku-joogista guriga, amarada-guriga-guriga, ama xannibaadda) iyo bandowyada. Waxay ku hoos jiraan nooc ka mid ah xiritaannada Mareykanka, in ka badan 50 milyan oo qof ayaa ku jira xannibaadda Filibiin, ku dhawaad 59 milyan oo qof ayaa ku jira xannibaadda Koonfur Afrika, iyo 1.3 bilyan oo qof ayaa ku xiran Hindiya.

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: Kiiskii ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ee COVID-19 ayaadib loo daba galay ilaa 1 Diseembar 2019 gudaha Wuhan; halwarbixin oo aan la xaqiijinin ayaa soo jeedisay kiiskii ugu horeeyay in uu ahaa 17kii Noofembar.
translated: 26-kii Maarso, 1.7 bilyan oo qof oo adduunka oo dhan ah ayaa ku hoos jiray nooc ka mid ah xannibaadda, taasoo kor u kacday 2.6 bilyan oo qof laba maalmood ka dib - qiyaastii saddex meelood meel dadka adduunka.

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: Dhaktarad Zhang Jixian ayaa arkay koox kiisas burukiito ah oo aan  la ogayn waxa sababay 26 dii Diseembar, halkaas oo isbitaalkeeda ogaysiiyay Wuhan Jianghan CDC 27dii Diseembar.
translated: Kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee la xaqiijiyey ee COVID-19 ayaa laga soo bilaabay Wuhan 1dii Disembar 2019; Warbixin aan la xaqiijin ayaa sheegaysa in kiiskii ugu horreeyay uu dhacay 17kii Noofambar.

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Baadhitaanka hida sidaha sambalada bukaanada ee hore ee 27 Diseembar 2019 ayaa muujisay ka helitaanka SARS ka shabaha coronavirus.
translated: Dhakhtarka Zhang Jixian wuxuu arkay koox kiisas ah oof-wareen ah oo aan la garanayn sababta 26-kii Diseembar, kaas oo isbitaalkeedu uu ku wargaliyay Wuhan Jianghan CDC 27kii Diseembar.

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: Ogaysiis daweyneed ayaa waxaa sii daayayGuddiga Caafimaad ee Dawladda Hoose ee Wuhan 31 kii Diseembar.
translated: Tijaabadii hore ee hidde-sidaha ee muunadaha bukaanka 27kii Diseembar 2019 waxay muujisay joogitaanka coronavirus-ka SARS-u eg.

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ayaa loo sheegay isla maalintaas.
translated: Ogeysiis dadweyne waxaa sii daayay Guddiga Caafimaadka Degmada Wuhan 31-kii Diseembar.

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: Fariimahan marka ay dheceen, dhaqaatiirta Wuhan ayaa wuxuu boolisku uga digay in "faafiyaan warar been ah" oo ku saabsan dilaacitaanka.
translated: WHO ayaa isla maalintaas lagu wargeliyay.

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: Guddiga Qaran ee Caafimaadkaee Shiinaha ayaa sheegay horaatii in aysan wax "cadayn cad" oo ah in bina aadamka dheexdiisa isu gudbiyo.
translated: Sida ogeysiisyadan ay dhaceen, dhakhaatiirta Wuhan waxaa uga digay booliisku "faafinta wararka xanta ah" ee ku saabsan cudurka dillaacay.

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Dhamaadkii Janaayo,  dawlada shiinaha ayaa daahfurtay olole isbadal ahaaneed oo markii danbe  ku qeexay xoghayaha guud ee Xisbiga Shuuciyada ee Shiinaha Xi Jinping "la dagaalanka dadka" si loo joojiyo faafitaanka fayraska.
translated: Komishanka Caafimaadka Qaranka Shiinaha ayaa markii hore sheegtay inaysan jirin "caddeyn cad" oo ku saabsan gudbinta bini'aadamka iyo bini'aadamka.

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Wax lagu qeexay in uu yahay "karantiilkii ugu waynaa ee taariikhda bina aadamka", xanibaad lagu dhawaaqay 23 dii Janaayo taas oo joojinaysa socotadda soo galaysa iyo kuwa ka baxaya Wuhan, taas oo lagu balaadhiyay wadarta 15 caasimadood ee Hubei, taas oo saamaysay wadarta dad ku dhaw 57 milyan
translated: Dabayaaqadii bishii Janaayo, dowladda Shiinaha ayaa billowday olole xagjir ah oo uu markii dambe ku tilmaamay xoghayaha guud ee xisbiga Shuuciga Shiinaha Xi Jinping "dagaal dad" si loo xakameeyo fiditaanka fayraska.

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: Isticmaalka gaariyada gaarka loo leeyahay ayaa laga mamnuucay caasimada.
translated: Waxa lagu tilmaamay "karantiilkii ugu weynaa ee taariikhda bini'aadamka", waxaa lagu dhawaaqay 23-kii Janaayo joojinta safarka iyo ka bixista Wuhan, kaas oo lagu kordhiyay 15 magaalo oo Hubei ah, taasoo saameysay wadar dhan 57 milyan. dadka.

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: Dabaal daga Sanadka Cusub ee Shiinaha (25 Janaayo) ayaa goobo badan la baajiyay.
translated: Gaadiidka gaarka loo leeyahay ayaa laga mamnuucay magaalada.

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: Madaxda ayaa sidoo kale ku dhawaaqay dhisitaanka isbitaal ku meel-gaar ah, Houshenshan Hospital, kaas oo lagu dhamaystiray 10 maalmood.
translated: Sannadka cusub ee Shiinaha (25 Janaayo) ayaa meelo badan la joojiyay.

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Isbitaal kale ayaa la dhisay markaa kadib, Leishenshan Hospital, si uu u qabto bukaano cusub.
translated: Maamulka ayaa sidoo kale ku dhawaaqay dhismaha isbitaal ku meel gaar ah, Huoshenshan Hospital, kaas oo lagu soo gabagabeeyay 10 maalmood gudahood.

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: Waxaa dheer isbitaalka cusub ee la dhisay, Shiinuhu 14 goob oo kale oo gudaha Wuhan ah ayuu u badalay isbitaalo ku meel-gaar ah, sida xarumaha shirarka iyo garoono. 26 Janaayo dawladu waxay soo saartay talaabooyin dheeraad ah si loo joojiyo dilaacista COVID-19, oo ay ka mid yihiin bixinta cadaymo caafimaad ee socotada iyo muddo u kordhinta fasaxa Xaflada Guga.
translated: Isbitaal kale ayaa la dhisay ka dib, Isbitaalka Leishenshan, si loogu daweeyo bukaanno dheeraad ah.

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Jamaacadaha iyo dugsiyada ayaa la xiray dhamaan wadanka.
translated: Marka laga soo tago isbitaallada dhowaan la dhisay, Shiinuhu wuxuu sidoo kale u beddelay 14 xarumood oo kale oo ku yaalla Wuhan, sida xarumaha shirarka iyo garoomada, isbitaallo ku meel gaar ah. iyo kordhinta fasaxa Festival Gu'ga.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Goboladda Hong Kong iyo Macau ayaa soo saaray talaabooyin dhawr ah, gaar ahaan quseeya dugsiyada iyo jaamacadaha.
translated: Jaamacadaha iyo iskuulada dalka ayaa sidoo kale la xiray.

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: Talaabooyinka ka shaqaynta meelo ka baxsan goobaha shaqada ayaa lasoo saaray gobolo dhaw ah Shiinaha.
translated: Gobollada Hong Kong iyo Macau waxay dejiyeen tallaabooyin dhowr ah, gaar ahaan xagga dugsiyada iyo jaamacadaha.

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: Xayiraadaha safarka ayaa laga dhaqan galiyay gudaha iyo dibada Hubei.
translated: Tallaabooyin shaqo fog ayaa laga sameeyay dhowr gobol oo Shiinaha ah.

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: Gaadiidka dadweynaha ayaa wax laga badalay, tiyaatarada dhamaan Shiinaha aya si ku meel-gaar ah loo xiray.
translated: Xayiraadaha safarka ayaa lagu sameeyay gudaha iyo dibadda Hubei.

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: Xakamaynta dhaqdaqaaqa bulshada ayaa lagu dabaqay caasimado badan, waxaana lagu qiyaasay ku dhuwaad 760 milyan oo qof (in ka badan nus dadweynaha) in ay soo wajeheen noocyo xayiraad didabada ah.Kadib marka u dilaacitaanka galay marxaladeeda caalamiga ah bartamihii Maarso, madaxda Shiinaha ayaa qaaday talaabooyin adag si looga hortago in laga soo "dhoofiyo" wadamada kale.
translated: Gaadiidka dadweynaha ayaa wax laga beddelay, waxaana si ku meel gaar ah loo xiray madxafyada Shiinaha oo dhan.

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, Beijing ayaa kusoo rogtay 14-maalin  karantiil waajib ah dhamaan musaafiriinta caalamiga ah ee soo galaya caasimada.23dii Maarso,  mainland Shiinaha oo kaliya ayaa hal kiis gudaha ah gudbisay shan maalin ka hor, xaaladaas oo kale ayadoo loo marayo musaafir kusoo laabanayay Guanzzhou kana imaanayay Istanbul.
translated: Xakamaynta dhaqdhaqaaqa dadweynaha ayaa lagu dabaqay magaalooyin badan, waxaana lagu qiyaasay in ilaa 760 milyan oo qof (in ka badan kala badh dadweynaha) ay la kulmeen nooc ka mid ah xannibaadda dibadda. ka ilaali fayraska inuu "ka soo dejiyo" wadamada kale.

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: 24kii Maarso 2020, Raisul wasaaraha Shiinaha  Li Keqiang ayaa sheegay in faafitaanka guda ahaaneed ee kisaska la isugu gudbiyay in la xakameeyay iyo in dilaacitaanka in lagy xakameeya gudaha Shiinaha.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, Beijing waxay ku soo rogtay karantiil qasab ah 14-maalmood dhammaan dadka safarka ah ee caalamiga ah ee soo galaya magaalada. 23-kii Maarso, dhul weynaha Shiinaha hal kiis oo keliya ayaa gudaha lagu soo gudbiyay shantii maalmood ee ka hor, tusaale ahaan safarka ku soo laabanaya Guangzhou ee Istanbul.

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: Isla maalintii la khafiifiyay xayiraadaha safar ee Hubei, marka laga reebo Wuhan, laba bil kadib markii lasoo rogay xiritaanka guud. Wasaarada Arimaha Dibadda ee Shiinaha ayaa ku dhawaaqdey 26 Maarso 2020 in dadka fiisaha kusoo galaya iyo dadka haysta warqadaha daganaanshaha la hakin doono ka bilaabato 28 Maarso iyo wixii ka danbeeya, iyada oo aan jirin macluumaad gaar oo cayimaya goorta xeerku dhamaan doono.
translated: 24-kii Maarso 2020, Ra'iisul Wasaaraha Shiinaha Li Keqiang ayaa sheegay in faafitaanka kiisaska gudaha lagu kala qaado asal ahaan la xannibay oo cudurka dillaacay lagu xakameeyay Shiinaha.

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: Kuwa raba in ay galaan shiinaha waa in ay ka codsadaan fiisooyinka  safaaradaha ama qunsuladaha Shiinaha.
translated: Isla maalintaas xayiraadaha safarka ayaa laga fududeeyay Hubei, marka laga reebo Wuhan, laba bilood ka dib xannibaadda ayaa lagu soo rogay. ma jiro tafaasiil gaar ah oo ku saabsan goorta ay siyaasaddani dhammaan doonto.

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Dawlada Shiinaha ayaa ku dhiiri galisa ganacsatadda iyo warshadaha in dib loo furo 30 ka Maarso, waxayna siisay lacag dhiiri galin ah shirkadaha.Golaha gobolka ayaa ki dhawaaqay maalin baroor-diiq ah midaas oo ku bilaabanaysa saddex daqiiqo oo amusnaan qaran abaarihii 10:00 4 ta Abriil, midaas oo isku soo hagaageen Xaflada Qinming, inkastoo dawlada dhexe ay ka codsatay qoysaska in ay xushmadooda ku muujiyaan si online ah ayagoo dhawraya kal fogaanshaha jir ahaaneed si looga fogaado dilaacistaanka COVID-19 oo dib loo cusboonaysiiyo.
translated: Kuwa doonaya inay galaan Shiinaha waa inay fiisaha ka dalbadaan safaaradaha ama qunsuliyadaha Shiinaha.

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: COVID-19 ayaa la xaqiijiyay in uu ku faafay Kuuriyada Koonfureed asagoo ka imaanayay Shiinaha.
translated: Dowladda Shiinaha ayaa ku dhiirigelisay ganacsiyada iyo warshadaha inay dib u furaan 30-ka Maarso, waxayna siisay xirmo dhaqaale oo loogu talagalay shirkadaha. Bandhiga Qingming, in kasta oo dawladda dhexe ay ka codsatay qoysaska inay ixtiraamkooda ku bixiyaan khadka tooska ah iyadoo la ilaalinayo fogeynta jireed si looga fogaado inuu dib u dillaaco COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: Hay'ada caafimaadka ee qaran ayaa ku warantay kordhitaan weyn ee kiisaska la xaqiijiyay 20 kii Febraayo, taas oo si weyn loogu sababeeyay isu imaatanka Daegu ee dhaqdaqaaqa diimaha cusub ee loo yaqaan Shincheonji Church ee Jesus.
translated: COVID-19 ayaa la xaqiijiyay inuu ku faafay South Korea 20kii Janaayo 2020 isagoo ka yimid Shiinaha.

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Kuwa caabuda Shincheonji ee booqanaya Daegu ee ka yimid Wuhan ayaa looga shakiyay in ay yihiin asalka dilaacista.
translated: Hay'adda caafimaadka ee qaranka ayaa soo warisay koror aad u weyn kiisaska la xaqiijiyay 20-kii Febraayo, oo inta badan loo aaneynayo isu imaatinka Daegu ee dhaqdhaqaaq diimeed cusub oo loo yaqaan Kaniisadda Shincheonji ee Ciise.

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Ilaa 22 Febraayo, 9,336 oo taabacsan kaniisada, 1,261 ama ku dhhawaad 13% ayaa soo sheegay calaamadaha.Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaad ku dhawaaqday feejignaantii ugu saraysay 23dii Febraayo 2020.
translated: Daacad Shincheonji oo booqday Daegu oo ka yimid Wuhan ayaa looga shakiyay inay yihiin asalka cudurka dillaacay.

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: 28dii Febraayo, in ka badan 2,000 oo kiis oo la xaqiijiyay ayaa laga soo sheegay Kuuriya, kaas oo 29 kii Febraayo kor ugu kacday ilaa 3,150.
translated: Laga bilaabo 22 Febraayo, oo ka mid ah 9,336 taageerayaasha kaniisadda, 1,261 ama qiyaastii 13% ayaa la soo sheegay calaamadaha. Kuuriyada Koonfureed waxay ku dhawaaqday heerka ugu sarreeya ee feejignaanta 23 Febraayo 2020.

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: Dhamaan xarumaha milatariga Kuriyada Koonfureed ayaa la karantiilay kadib markii saddex ka mid ah askarta la xaqiijiyay in fayraska laga helay.
translated: 28kii Febraayo, in ka badan 2,000 oo kiis oo la xaqiijiyay ayaa laga soo sheegay Kuuriya, taasoo gaartay 3,150 29kii Febraayo.

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: Jadwalka diyaaradaha ayaa sidoo kale la saameeyay sidaas awgeed waa la badalay.Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa soo saartaywax loo arkaayay barnaamijka ugu weyn uguna  abaabulitaan fiican aduunka oo dhan kaas oo looga baadhayo shacabka fayraska, laguna karantiilayo qof kasta oo qaaday caabuqa sidoo lagu dabagalayo laguna karantiilayo kuwa la macaamilay ayaga.
translated: Dhammaan saldhigyada ciidamada Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa la karantiilay kadib markii baaritaanno la sameeyay lagu xaqiijiyay in saddex askari laga helay cudurka.

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: Hababka baadhitaanka waxaa ka mid ah soo sheegitaanka shaksi ahaaneed ee waajibka ah ee calaamdaha ee dadka ka imaanaya caalamka ayaagoo isticmaalaya barnaamij telefoon,  aaditaanka baadhitaanka fayraska ayadoo natiijadana la helayo maalinta xigta, iyo kordhinta awooda baadhitaan si loo awoodo in20,000 oo qof maalintii la baadho.
translated: Waxa kale oo saamayn ku yeeshay jadwalkii diyaaradeed sidaa darteedna waa la bedelay.Koonfurta Kuuriya waxa ay soo bandhigtay barnaamij loo arko in uu yahay kan ugu weyn uguna habaynta wanaagsan caalamka si dadka looga baadho fayraska, lagana saaro cid kasta oo cudurka qaba iyo sidoo kale in la raadiyo lana karantiiliyo dadkii la soo xidhiidhay. .

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Barnaamijka Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa loo arkay in uu ku gulaystay xakamaynta dilaacista inkastoo karantiilitaan aysan ka jirin caasimadaha oo dhan. Bulshada Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa horaan u xayiray ka jawaab celinta dhibaatada ee Madexweyne Moon Jae.
translated: Hababka baadhista waxa ka mid ahaa is-ka warbixinta khasabka ah ee calamadaha soogalootiga cusub ee caalamiga ah iyada oo loo marayo codsiga moobilka, baaritaanka fayraska ee natiijada la heli karo maalinta xigta, iyo kordhinta awooda baadhista si loo ogolaado ilaa 20,000 oo qof in la tijaabiyo maalin kasta.

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Dad badan oo kuuriyaan ah ayaa saxiixay dacwad ah in xil ka qaadista Moon wax lagu sheegay marin habaabinta dawlada ee dilaacitaanka, ama ku amaanida jawaab celintiisa.
translated: Barnaamijka Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa loo arkaa inuu yahay mid lagu guuleystay xakameynta cudurka dillaacay inkasta oo aan la karantiilin dhammaan magaalooyinka.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: 23dii Maarso, waxaa lasoo sheegay in Kuuriyada Koonfureed ay leedahay kiiska maalinlaha ah ee ugu yaraa wadarta afar isbuuc.
translated: Dad badan oo Kuuriyaan ah ayaa saxeexay codsiyo midkoodna ku baaqaya in xilka laga xayuubiyo Moon sababo la xidhiidha waxa ay ku andacoonayaan in ay dawladu si xun u maaraysay cudurka dillaacay, ama ay ammaanayaan jawaabtiisa.

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: 29kii Maarso waxaa lasoo sheegay in bilawga1 Abriil dhamaan socotada ka yimid dibada la karantiili doono laba isbuuc.
translated: 23-kii Maarso, waxaa la soo wariyay in Kuuriyada Koonfureed ay haysato kiis hal maalin ah ugu hooseeya afar toddobaad gudahood.

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Sida ay warbaahinta ku warantay 1dii Abriil, Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa heshay codsiyada ka saacidaynta baadhitaanada fayraska ee 121 dal oo kala duwan.
translated: 29-kii Maarso ayaa la sheegay in laga bilaabo 1-da Abriil dhammaan dadka cusub ee dibadda yimid la karantiilay muddo laba toddobaad ah.

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: Iran ayaa sheegtay in kiiskeeda ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ee caabuqa SARS-CoV-2 uu ahaa 19kii Febraayo lagana Qom, halka,  sida laga soo xigtay Wasaarada Caafimaadka iyo Waxbarashada Culumta Caafimaadka, in laba qof ay u dhintay goor danbe oo maalintaas ah.
translated: Sida warbaahintu sheegtay 1-dii Abriil, Kuuriyada Koonfureed waxay heshay codsiyo gargaar baadhista fayraska 121 waddan oo kala duwan.

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Talaabooyin dagdag ah ayay dawladu ku dhawaaqday oo ay ku jiraan baajinta riwaayadaha iyo dhacdooyinka dhaqan ahaaneed ee kale, dhacdooyinka isboortiga, iyo salaada jimcaha, iyo xiritaanada jaamacadaha, dugsiyada waxbarashade sare, iyo dugsiyada.
translated: Iran ayaa soo warisay kiisaskeedii ugu horreeyay ee la xaqiijiyey ee ah infekshannada SARS-CoV-2 19-kii Febraayo gudaha Qom, halkaas oo, sida ay sheegtay Wasaaradda Caafimaadka iyo Waxbarashada Caafimaadka, laba qof ayaa ku dhintay maalintaas dambe.

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Iran ayaa u qoondaysay shan tirilyan oo riyaal si loo lala dagaalamo fayraska.
translated: Tallaabooyinka hore ee ay dawladdu ku dhawaaqday waxaa ka mid ahaa joojinta riwaayadaha iyo dhacdooyinka kale ee dhaqameed, munaasabadaha isboortiga, iyo salaadda Jimcaha, iyo xidhitaanka jaamacadaha, machadyada tacliinta sare, iyo dugsiyada.

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: Madaxweyne Hassan Rouhani ayaa yidhi 26 Febraayo 2020 in aysan jirin waxa qorsha ah oo ku saabsan goobaha karantiilka ee dilaacistu saamaysay, kaliya dad uun baa la karantiili doonaa.
translated: Iran waxay u qoondaysay shan tirilyan riyaal si loola dagaallamo fayraska.

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Qorshayaasha lagu xakamaynayo safaradda caasimadaha ayaa lagu dhawaaqay Maarso, inkastoo  saxmada gawaarida oo weyn ayaa kasii socotay inta u dhaxaysa caasimadaha ka hor Sanadka Cusub ee Persian Nowrus.
translated: Madaxweyne Hassan Rouhani ayaa sheegay 26-kii Febraayo 2020 in aysan jirin qorshe lagu karantiilo meelaha uu cudurku ka dillaacay, oo kaliya shaqsiyaadka la karantiilay.

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: Goobaha barakaysan ee Shiicada ayaa wali u furan xujeyda ilaa 16ka Maarso 2020, Iran ayaa noqotay xarunta faafitaanka fayraska ka dib Shiinaha inta lagu jiray Febraayo.
translated: Qorshayaasha lagu xaddidayo safarka magaalooyinka ayaa lagu dhawaaqay bishii Maarso, in kasta oo isu socodkii badnaa ee u dhexeeyay magaalooyinka ka hor sanadka cusub ee Faaris Nowruz uu sii socday.

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Sheegista dhexdhexaadka ah ee qarinta xadka dilaaca ee gudaha  Iran,  in ka badan toban dal ayaa daba galay  ilaa Iran dhamaadkii 28 Febraayo, taas oo tusinaysa in xadka dilaacitaanka uu ka ba'an yahan marka loo eego 388 kiis ee ay soo sheegtay dawlada Iran maalintaas.
translated: Macbadyada Shiicada ee Qom waxay u furnaayeen xujeyda ilaa 16-ka Maarso 2020. Iran waxay noqotay xarun faafitaanka fayraska kadib Shiinaha bishii Febraayo.

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: Barlamaanka Iran ayaa la xiray, iyadoo 23 kamid ah 290 ka xubin baarlamaaneed la sheegay in laga helayfayraska 3dii Maarso.
translated: Iyada oo lagu jiro sheegashada qarinta heerka uu gaarsiisan yahay cudurka ka dillaacay Iran, in ka badan toban waddan ayaa kiisaskooda dib ugu celiyay Iran 28-kii Febraayo, taasoo muujineysa in heerka cudurka dillaacay uu ka sii darnaan karo 388 kiis ee uu soo sheegay Iiraan dawladda taariikhdaas.

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: 12kii Maarso, Hay'ada Xuquuqda Aadanaha ayaa ku dhiiri galisay madaxda xabsiyada Iran in si shuruud la'aan ah u sii daayaan difaacayaasha xuquuqda aadanaha ee loo xiray kala duwanaanshaha fikradeed, iyo sidoo kale dhamaan in si ku meel-gaar ah loo sii daayo maxaabista u qalma.
translated: Baarlamaanka Iiraan waa la xiray, iyadoo 23 ka mid ah 290-kiisa xubnood la sheegay in laga helay fayraska 3-dii Maarso.

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: Waxay sheegtay in ay jirto khatar weyn oo ah ku faafitaanka fayraska ee xarumaha xiran sida xabsiyada, kuwaas oo aan lahayn daryeel caafimaad oo ku filan.
translated: 12kii Maarso, Human Rights Watch waxay ku boorisay maamulka xabsiga Iran inay si shuruud la'aan ah u sii daayaan difaacayaasha xuquuqul insaanka ee u xiran mucaaradnimada nabadeed, iyo inay sidoo kale si ku meel gaar ah u sii daayaan dhammaan maxaabiista xaqa u leh.

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: 5kii Maarso, dawlada Iran ayaa ku warantay 100 dhimasho hal maalin ah,taas oo ah mida ugu badan ee wadanka laga diwaan galiyay ilaa bilaabintaanka dilaaca.
translated: Waxa ay sheegtay in ay jirto khatar weyn oo uu fayrasku ugu faafo xarumaha xidhan sida xarumaha dadka lagu hayo, kuwaas oo aan haysan daryeel caafimaad oo ku filan.

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: Ugu yaraan 12 madaxda talada haya ama siyaasiyiintii hore ee reer Iran iyo madaxda dawlada ayaa u dhintay cudurka dhamaadkii 17kii Maarso.
translated: 15-kii Maarso, dowladda Iran ayaa soo sheegtay 100 dhimasho ah maalin gudaheed, waana tiradii ugu badneyd ee laga diiwaan geliyo dalka tan iyo markii uu cudurka dillaacay.

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 23dii Maarso, Iran ayaa la kulmaysay 50 kiis halkii saacba iyo hal dhimasho tobonkii daqiiqaba sababto ah fayraska corona.
translated: Ugu yaraan 12 fadhi ama siyaasiyiin hore oo Iiraaniyiin ah iyo saraakiil dawladeed ayaa u dhintey cudurka 17-kii Maarso.

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay madaxda Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka, in ay jirin karaan kiisas shanjeer ka badan gudaha Iran marka loo eego waxaa lasoo sheegay.
translated: Markay ahayd 23-kii Maarso, Iran waxay la kulmeysay 50 kiis oo cusub saacad kasta iyo hal dhimasho oo cusub tobankii daqiiqaba sababtoo ah coronavirus.

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxaa lasoo jeediyay in xayiraadaha Maraykan saaray Iraan ay saamayn karto awooda dhaqaalaha wadanka ee ka jawaab celinta dilaacista fayraska.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay sarkaal ka tirsan WHO, waxaa laga yaabaa inay shan jeer ka badan yihiin kiisaska Iran laga soo sheegay.

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Ergayga Sare ee Xuquuqda Aadanaha ee Qaramada Midoodaw ayaa dalbaday khafiifinta xayiraadaha dhaqaale ee dalalka si aadka ah u saameeyay cudurka caalamiga ah, oo uu ka mid yahay Iran.
translated: Waxaa sidoo kale la soo jeediyay in cunaqabateynta Mareykanka ee Iran ay saameyn ku yeelan karto awoodda dhaqaale ee dalka si uu uga jawaabo faafitaanka viruska.

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: Dilaacitaanka ayaa la xaqiijiyay in uu ku faafay Talyaaniga 31 Janaayo,  markii laba dalxiise ee Shiinayska ah laga helay SARS-CoV-2 gudaha Rome.
translated: Wakiilka Sare ee Qaramada Midoobay ee Xuquuqda Aadanaha ayaa dalbaday cunaqabatayn dhaqaale in loo fududeeyo waddammada uu sida aadka ah u saameeyay masiibada, oo ay ku jirto Iran.

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: Kiisaska ayaa bilawday in ay si xawli ah kor ugu kacaan,  kaas oo ku sababay dawlada Iran in ay joojiso  dhamaan duulimaadyada diyaaradaha ee aadaya kana imaanaya Shiinaha waxayna ku dhawaaqday xaalad dagdag ah.
translated: Faafitaanka ayaa la xaqiijiyay inuu ku faafay Talyaaniga 31-kii Janaayo, markii laba dalxiisayaal Shiineys ah laga helay cudurka SARS-CoV-2 ee Rome.

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Koox kiisas ah oo la xiriirin COVID-19 ayaa mar danbe la ogaaday, ayadoo ku bilaabatay 16 kiis oo la xaqiijiyay gudaha Lombardy 21dii Febraayo. 22dii Febraayo, Goloha Wasiirada ayaa ku dhawaaqay wareegto-sharci ah oo cusub si loo jooji dilaaca, oo ka mid yihiin karantiilida in ka badan 50,000 oo qof oo kasoo jeeda 11 dagmooyin oo kala oo ah waqooyiga Talyaaniga.
translated: Kiisaska ayaa billaabay inay aad sare ugu kacaan, taasoo keentay in dowladda Talyaaniga ay joojiso dhammaan duullimaadyadii aadi jiray iyo kuwii ka imaan jiray Shiinaha, waxayna ku dhawaaqday xaalad degdeg ah.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Raisul Wasaare Giuseppe Conte ayaa yiri, "Goobaha cudurka ka dilaacay, galitaanka iyo ka bixitaankaba lama heli doono.
translated: Koox aan lala xiriirin oo ah kiisaska COVID-19 ayaa markii dambe la ogaaday, laga bilaabo 16 kiis oo la xaqiijiyey Lombardy 21kii Febraayo. 22kii Febraayo, Golaha Wasiirradu waxay ku dhawaaqeen xeer cusub oo lagu xakameynayo cudurka dillaacay, oo ay ku jiraan karantiil in ka badan 50,000 oo qof oo ka socda 11 degmooyinka kala duwan ee waqooyiga Talyaaniga.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Joojinta hawlaha shaqo iyo madasha isboortiga  ayaa lagu amray goobahaas."4 Maarso, dawlada Talyaaniga ayaa amartay in si buuxda loo xiro dhamaan dugsiyada iyo jamaacadaha dhamaan wadanka markaas oo Talyaaniga gaaray 100.
translated: Raiisel wasaare Giuseppe Conte ayaa yiri, "Meelaha uu cudurku ka dillaacay, gelitaanka iyo ka bixista lama bixin doono.

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Dhamaan madasha dhacdooyinka isboortiga, ooka mid yihiin kulanada kubada cagta ee Serie A, waa in lagu qabtaa gooba xiran, balse 9 Maarso, dhamaan isboortiga ayaa la joojiyay si buuxda ugu yaraan hal bil.
translated: Joojinta hawlaha shaqada iyo dhacdooyinka ciyaaraha ayaa horeba loo amray meelahaas.” 4-tii Maarso, dawladda Talyaanigu waxay amartay in gebi ahaanba la xidho dhammaan dugsiyada iyo jaamacadaha waddanka oo dhan iyadoo Talyaanigu gaadhay 100 dhimasho ah.

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: 11kii Maarso, Raisul Wasaare Conte ayaa amray joojitaanka  ku dhawaad dhamaan hawlaha ganacsi marka laga reebo dukaamada waaweyn iyo farmashiyayaasha.6dii Maarso Kuliyada Suuxdinta, Qandha Jabinta, Dib usoo kicinta  qofka Suuxay iyo Daryeelka Dagdaga ah (SIAARTI) ayaa daabacay soo jeedino caafimaad ahaaneed iyadoo la tixraacayo borotokoolo kala soocin ahaaneed kuwaas oo laga yaabo in la dhaqan galiyo.
translated: Dhammaan dhacdooyinka isboorti ee waaweyn, oo ay ku jiraan ciyaaraha kubbadda cagta Seri A, waxay ahayd in lagu qabto albaabbada xiran illaa Abriil, laakiin 9-kii Maarso, dhammaan ciyaaraha ayaa gebi ahaanba la hakiyay ugu yaraan hal bil.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: 19kii Maarso, Talyaaniga ayaa dhaafay Shiinaha asago noqday wadanka ugu badan ee dhimashada la xiriirta fayraska corona aduunka oo dhan marka ay soo wargaliyeen 3,405 dhimasho oo uu sababay cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: 11-kii Maarso, Raiisel wasaare Conte wuxuu amar ku bixiyay in la joojiyo ku dhawaad dhammaan dhaqdhaqaaqa ganacsiga marka laga reebo dukaamada waaweyn iyo farmashiyeyaasha. 6dii Maarso, Kulliyada Talyaaniga ee Suuxinta, Xanuunka Xanuunka, Dib-u-nooleynta iyo Daryeelka Degdegga ah (SIAARTI) waxay daabacday talooyinka anshaxa caafimaadka ee ku saabsan borotokoollada kala soocida ee laga yaabo in la shaqaaleysiiyo.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: 22kii Maarso, waxaa lasoo  sheegay in Ruushka uu diray Talyaaniga sagaal diyaarad milatari ah oo sida agab caafimaad.
translated: 19-kii Maarso, Talyaanigu wuxuu la wareegay Shiinaha oo ah waddankii ugu dhimashada badnaa ee la xiriira coronavirus-ka adduunka ka dib markii uu soo sheegay 3,405 dhimasho ah.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Ilaa 5ta Abriil, waxaa jiray 128,98 kiis oo la xaqiijiyay, 15,887 dhimasho, iyo 21,815 bogsasho gudaha Talyaaniga,  inta badan kiisaskan waxay ka dhaceen gobolka Lombardy.
translated: 22-kii Maarso, waxaa la sheegay in Ruushka uu u diray Talyaaniga sagaal diyaaradood oo militari ah oo wata qalab caafimaad.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Warbixin ay sii daysay CNN ayaa tusinaya isku dhafka tirada dadka da'da ah ee badan ee shacabka  Talyaaniga iyo awoodid la'aanta baadhida dadka qaba fayraska ay ka qayb qaadan karto heer dhimasho ee sareeya.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo 5-tii Abriil, waxaa jiray 128,948 xaaladood oo la xaqiijiyey, 15,887 dhimasho ah, iyo 21,815 ka soo kabsashada gudaha Talyaaniga, iyadoo inta badan kiisaskaas ay ka dhaceen gobolka Lombardy.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Jawaab celinta fayraska ee Boqorooyada Ingiriiska ayaa markii hore u muuqday midka ugu dabacsanaanta badana wadamada uu saameeyay, ilaa 18 kii Maarso 2020, dawlada Ingiriiska maysan soo rogin shacbkeed wax kala fogaansho bulshadeed ah ama nooc talaabooyin karantiilad ee dad badan.
translated: Warbixin CNN ayaa muujisay in isku darka dadka waayeelka ah ee Talyaaniga iyo awood la'aanta in la baaro dhammaan kuwa qaba fayraska ilaa maanta ay gacan ka geysaneyso heerka dhimashada sare.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Natiijo ahaan, dawlada ayaa la cambaareeyay sababto ah talaabo qaadasha la'aanta iyo xajmiga ka jawaab celinta walaacyada soo wajahay dadweynaha.16kii Maarso, Raisul Wasaare Boris Johnson ayaa sameeyay shaacis asago dadka ka waaniya socodaalada aan muhiimka ahayn iyo isla macaamilitaanka bulshadeed, asagoo soo jeediyay in dadka shaqeeyaan iyagoo guryahooda jooga marka ay macquul tahay oo ayna ka fogaadaan goobaha sida baararka, hudheelada, iyo tiyaatarada.
translated: Jawaabta Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ee fayraska ayaa markii ugu horreysay u soo baxday inay tahay mid ka mid ah kuwa ugu dabacsan waddamada ay dhibaatadu saameysey, iyo illaa 18-kii Maarso 2020, dowladda Ingiriiska ma aysan soo rogin nooc kasta oo jahawareerka bulshada ah ama tillaabooyin karantiil ballaaran muwaadiniinteeda.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: 20kii Maarso, dawlada ayaa ku dhawaaqday in dhamaan goobaha waqtiga firaaqada la isugu yimaado sida baararka iyo goobaha jimicsiga in sida ugu dhaqsa badan uguna macquulsan loo xiro, waxayna balanqaaday  in bixiso ilaa 80% oo ah mushaharka shaqaalaha ila xad £2,500 bil kasta si looga hortago shaqaalaysiin la'aanta inta lagu jiro dhibaatada.23dii Maarso, Raisul Wasaraha ayaa ku dhawaaqay talaabooyin adag oo ah kala fogaanshaha bulshada, mamnuucida isu imaanada in ka badan laba qof iyo xayirado socodaaleed iyo  guryo joogista taas oo loo arkay in ay tahay muhiim.
translated: Natiijo ahaan, dawladdu waxay heshay dhaleecayn loo arkay xawaare la'aanta iyo xoojinta jawaabta ay ka bixinayso walaacyada ay soo wajahday dadweynaha. 16-kii Maarso, Ra'iisul Wasaare Boris Johnson wuxuu ku dhawaaqay talo ka dhan ah dhammaan safarka aan muhiimka ahayn iyo xiriirka bulshada, isagoo dadka soo jeedinaya. ka shaqee guriga halka ay suurtagal tahay kana fogow meelaha sida baararka, makhaayadaha, iyo tiyaatarada.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: Si ka duwan talaabooyinkii hore, xayiraadahan ayaa waxaa dhaqan galinayay booliska iyagoo u maraya ganaaxid iyo kala diritaanka kulamada.
translated: 20-kii Maarso, dawladdu waxay ku dhawaaqday in dhammaan xarumaha firaaqada sida baararka iyo goobaha jimicsiga ay tahay in la xidho sida ugu dhakhsaha badan, waxayna ballan qaaday inay bixinayso ilaa 80% mushaharka shaqaalaha illaa £2,500 bishii si looga hortago shaqo la'aanta xiisadda. 23-kii Maarso, Ra'iisul Wasaaruhu wuxuu ku dhawaaqay tallaabooyin adag oo fogeynta bulshada, isagoo mamnuucay isu imaatinka in ka badan laba qof wuxuuna xaddiday safarka iyo dhaqdhaqaaqa bannaanka tan loo arko inay lagama maarmaan tahay.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Inta badan ganacsiyada ayaa la amray in la xiro, marka laga soo reebo ganacsiyada loo arkay in ay yihiin "aasaasiga" , oo ay ka mid yihiin dukaanada waaweyn, farmashiyada, bankiyada, dukaanada qalabka dhismaha, xarumaha batraaokla, iyo geerajyada.
translated: Si ka duwan tillaabooyinka hore, xannibaadahan waxaa fulinayey booliisku iyagoo soo saaraya ganaaxyo iyo kala firdhinta isu imaatinka.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: 20kii Janaayo,  kiiskii ugu horeyay ee la ogyahay ee COVID-19 ayaa laga xaqiijiyay waqooyi-galbeed Pacific ee gobolka Washington nin kasoo laabtay Wuhan 15kii Janaayo.
translated: Inta badan meheradaha ayaa lagu amray inay xidhaan, marka laga reebo ganacsiyada loo arkay inay "muhiim" yihiin, oo ay ku jiraan dukaamada waaweyn, farmashiyeyaasha, bangiyada, dukaamada qalabka, kaalimaha shidaalka, iyo garaashyada.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: Kooxda ku Hawlan fayraska Corona ee Aqalka Cad ayaa waxaa la aasaasay 29kii Janaayo.
translated: 20kii Janaayo, kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee loo yaqaan COVID-19 ayaa laga xaqiijiyay gobolka Pacific Waqooyi-galbeed ee Washington nin ka soo laabtay Wuhan 15kii Janaayo.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: 31dii Janaayo, maamulka Trump ayaa ku dhawaaqay xaalad caafimaad dadweyne oo dagdag ah, wuxuuna dul dhigay xayiraado soo galitaanka socotada ka imaanaysa Shiinaha.
translated: Kooxda Aqalka Cad ee Coronavirus waxa la aasaasay 29-kii Janaayo.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: 28dii Janaayo 2020, Xarunka Xakamaynta Cudurka-machadka ugu horeeyacaafimaadka dadweynaha ee dawlada Maraykanka-ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay sameeyeen agab baadhitaan oo iyaga u gaar ah.
translated: 31-kii Janaayo, maamulka Trump wuxuu ku dhawaaqay xaalad degdeg ah oo caafimaadka dadweynaha ah, wuxuuna xannibay soo gelitaanka dadka safarka ah ee ka imanaya Shiinaha.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: Kaskow samaynta midaas, baadhitaanka dawlada Maraykanka ayaa ah bilawga mid hooseysa, taas oo qarinaysa xajmiga runta ah ee dilaacitanka waqtign.
translated: 28-kii Janaayo 2020, Xarunta Xakamaynta Cudurrada—machadka ugu horreeya caafimaadka dadweynaha ee dawladda Mareykanka—ayaa ku dhawaaqay inay sameeyeen qalab baaris oo iyaga u gaar ah.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Baadhitaanka waxaa haleey agab baadhitaan oo cilad qaba oo ay soo saartay dawlada fedaraalka dhexdii Febraayo, la'aantaansixinta dawlada fedaraalka ee agabyada baadhitaan ee kuwa aan dawliga ahayn( ee akadamiyadaha, shirkadaha iyo isbitaalada) ilaa dhamaadka Febraayo, iyo qaab xadidan ee dadku ugu qalmaan baadhitaan ilaa  bilawga Maarso. (inta kadib talooyinka dhaqtareed ayaa loo baahnaa).
translated: In kasta oo uu sidaas sameeyay, Mareykanka ayaa si tartiib tartiib ah u bilaabay tijaabada, taas oo mugdi gelisay heerka dhabta ah ee cudurka dillaacay waqtigaas.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: 27dii Febraayo, The Washington Post ayaa ku warantay in kar yar 4,000 baadhitaano laga sameeyay gudaha Maraykanka.
translated: Imtixaanka waxaa hareeyay xirmooyinka imtixaanada cilladaysan oo ay soo saartay dowladda federaalka bishii Febraayo, ogolaansho la'aanta dowladda federaalka ah ee xirmooyinka tijaabada ah ee aan dawliga ahayn (machadyada, shirkadaha iyo isbitaallada) ilaa dhammaadka Febraayo, iyo shuruudaha xaddidan ee dadka si ay ugu qalmaan tijaabi ilaa horraantii Maarso (amarka dhakhtarka ayaa loo baahday intaa ka dib).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: Dhamaadka 13 ka Maarso, Atlantic ayaa ku warantay in ka yar 14,00 baadhitaano la sameeyay.
translated: Ilaa 27kii Febraayo, Washington Post ayaa sheegtay in ka yar 4,000 oo baaritaan lagu sameeyay Mareykanka.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: 22kii Maarso, Associated Press ayaa ku warantay: "Dad badan oo qabay calaamadaha iyo amaraka dhaqtar ayaa sugay  saacado iyo maalmo in la baadho."Kadib dhimashadii koobaad ee Maraykanka laga soo sheegay gudaha gobolka Washington  29kii Febraayo, Gubanatoore Jay Inslee ayaa ku dhawaaqay xaalad dagdag ah, ficil ay markii danbe raacen gobollo kale.
translated: Ilaa 13-kii Maarso, The Atlantic ayaa soo warisay in wax ka yar 14,000 oo tijaabo ah la sameeyay.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Dugsiyada aaga Seattle ayaa baajiyay fasaladda 3dii Maarso,, bartamihii Maarsa na dugsiyada wadanka oo dhan ayaa la xiray. 6dii Maarso 2020, Maraykanka ayaa koox ku takhasustay cudurada saf-mareen oo ka tirsan kulliyada Imperial College London kula taliyeen saadaalinta saamaynta fayraska cusub ee corona ee uu  wadanka.
translated: 22-kii Maarso, Associated Press ayaa soo warisay: "Dad badan oo leh astaamo iyo amar dhakhtar ayaa sugay saacado ama maalmo baaritaan." Ka dib dhimashadii ugu horreysay ee Mareykanka ayaa laga soo sheegay gobolka Washington 29-kii Febraayo, Guddoomiyaha Jay Inslee wuxuu ku dhawaaqay xaalad degdeg ah, oo ah tallaabo ay dhawaan raaceen dowlado kale.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Isla maalinta uu Madaxweyne Trump uu saxiixay Xeerka u diyaargarawnaanta iyo ka Jawaab Celinta Dheeriga ee Ku haboon, kaas oo bixiyay $8.3 bilyan oo dagdag ah kaas oo lagu maal galinayo hay'adaha fedaraalka si ay uga jawaab celiyaan dilaaca.
translated: Dugsiyada agagaarka Seattle waxay baajiyeen fasallada 3-dii Maarso, iyo bartamihii Maarso, iskuullada dalka oo dhan waa la xiray. 6-dii Maarso 2020, Mareykanka ayaa lagula taliyay saadaasha saameynta coronavirus-ka cusub uu dalka ku yeelanayo koox oo ka tirsan dhakhaatiirta cudurrada faafa ee Imperial College London.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Shirkadaha ayaa kusoo rogay shaqaalohooda xayiraado socodaaleed, baajitaanada shirarka, iyo ku dhiirigalinta shaqaalaha in ay ka shaqeeyaan guryaha.
translated: Isla maalintaas Madaxweyne Trump waxa uu saxeexay Xeerka u diyaargarowga Coronavirus iyo Ka-jawaabista Kaabista Miisaaniyadda, kaas oo bixiyay $8.3 bilyan oo maalgelin degdeg ah hay'adaha federaalka si ay uga jawaabaan dillaaca.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Madalaha  iyo xilliyada isboortiyada ayaa la baajiyay. 11kii Maarso, Trump ayaa ku dhawaaqay xayiraado socodaaleed inta badan Yurub, marka laga reebo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, oo loogu talagalay 30 maalmood, oo dhaqan galaysa 13 ka Maarso.3
translated: Shirkadaha waxay soo rogeen xayiraadaha safarka shaqaalaha, baajiyeen shirarkii, waxayna ku dhiirigaliyeen shaqaalaha inay ka shaqeeyaan guriga.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Maalinta xigtay, wuxuu balaariyay xayiraadaha  asago ku daray Boqortooyada Ingiriiska iyo Ireland.
translated: Dhacdooyinka ciyaaraha iyo xilliyada waa la joojiyay. 11-kii Maarso, Trump wuxuu ku dhawaaqay xayiraadaha safarka inta badan Yurub, marka laga reebo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, muddo 30 maalmood ah, dhaqangal ah 13-ka Maarso.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: 3 Maarso, wuxuu ku dhawaaqay xaalad degdegga oo qaran, taas oo ka dhigtay maalgalinta fedaraalka mid loo heli karo ka falcelinta musiibada.
translated: Maalintii xigtay, wuxuu ballaariyay xannibaadaha oo uu ku daray Boqortooyada Ingiriiska iyo Ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Laga bilaabo 15 Maarso, beecsharooyin badan ayaa xirmay ama la yareeyaay saacadaha shaqada ee daafaha Maraykanka si laysugu dayo in la yareeyo faafitaanka fayruuska.
translated: 13-kii Maarso, wuxuu ku dhawaaqay xaalad degdeg ah oo heer qaran ah, taasoo ka dhigtay lacag federaal ah in wax looga qabto dhibaatada.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: 17 Maarso, safmareenka waxaa laga xaqiijiyay dhamaan 50ka gobol iyo degmada Columbia. 23 Maarso, waxaa lasooo sheegay in magaalada New York laga helay 10,700 kiisas oo coronavirus ah, in ka badan tirada guud ee kiisas Kuuriyada Koonfureed.
translated: Laga bilaabo 15-kii Maarso, ganacsiyo badan ayaa xiray ama la dhimay saacado gudaha Mareykanka si ay isugu dayaan in ay yareeyaan faafitaanka fayraska.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: 25 Maarso, gofanatooraha wuxuu sheegay in kala fogaanshaha bulshada ay u eegtahay inay shaqaynayso, maadaama oo qiyaasaha laba jibaarka kiisaska uu hoos uga soo dhacay 2.0 maalmood ilaa 4.7 maalmood.
translated: Markay ahayd 17-kii Maarso, faafitaanka cudurka waxaa laga xaqiijiyay dhammaan 50-ka gobol iyo degmada Columbia.23-kii Maarso, waxaa la sheegay in magaalada New York laga helay 10,700 xaaladood oo ah coronavirus, in ka badan tirada guud ee kiisaska Koonfurta Kuuriya.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: Ilaa iyo 28 Maarso, waxaa jiray 32,308 kiisas la xaqiijiyay magaalada New York, iyo 672 qof oo u dhintay fayruuska. 26 Maarso, Maraykanka waxaa laga soo sheegay in laga helay kiisaska caabuqa coronavirus oo la xaqiijiyay oo ka badan dal kasta oo caalamka ah, oo ay ku jiraan Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga. 8 Abriil, 400,335 kiisas ayaa laga xaqiijiyay Maraykanka,  iyo 12,841 qof ayaa dhintay.
translated: 25-kii Maarso, guddoomiyuhu wuxuu sheegay in fogeynta bulshada ay u muuqatay inay shaqeyneyso, maadaama qiyaasaha kiisaska labanlaabmay ay ka gaabiyeen 2.0 maalmood ilaa 4.7 maalmood.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Sida warbaahintu soo tabinayso 30ka Maarso, Madexwaynaha Maraykanka Trump ayaa go'aansaday inuu sii dheereeyo talooyinka kala fogaanshaha bulshada ilaa iyo 30ka Abriil.
translated: Ilaa 28-kii Maarso, waxaa magaalada New York ka jiray 32,308 xaaladood oo la xaqiijiyey, 672 qofna waxay u dhinteen fayraska. Ilaa 8-dii Abriil, 400,335 xaaladood ayaa laga xaqiijiyay Mareykanka, iyo 12,841 qof ayaa dhintay.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Isla maalintaas, USNS Comfort, markab isbitaal ah oo leh ku dhawaad 1000 sariirood, ayaa kusoo xirtay New York.
translated: Sida warbaahintu sheegtay 30-kii Maarso, madaxweynaha Mareykanka Trump wuxuu go'aansaday inuu kordhiyo tilmaamaha fogeynta bulshada illaa 30ka Abriil.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: 3dii Abriil, Maraykanku wuxuu diiwaan geliyay 884 dhimasho oo uu sababay coronavirus mudo 24 saacadood ah.
translated: Isla maalintaas, USNS Comfort, oo ah markab cisbitaal leh oo leh ilaa 1000 sariirood, ayaa ku xidhay New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Gobolka New York kiisaska ayaa ka batay 100,000 oo qof 3dii Abriil. Aqalka Cad ayaa lagu dhaleeceeyay inay yaraysanayaan khatarta iyo xakamaynta fariimaha iyagoo ku amaraya masuuliyiinta caafimaadka iyo saynisyahanada inay isku duwaan maqaalada iyo daabacaadaha la xiriira fayruuska xafiiska Madaxweyne ku xigeenka Mike Pence.
translated: 3-dii Abriil, Mareykanka wuxuu lahaa rikoor 884 dhimasho ah oo uu sababay coronavirus muddo 24-saac gudahood ah.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: Ansixinta guud ee maaraynta Trump ee musiibada ayaa lagaga horyimid safafka partisan-ka.
translated: Gobolka New York kiisasku waxay dhaafeen 100,000 oo qof 3-dii Abriil. Aqalka Cad ayaa lagu dhaleeceeyay inuu hoos u dhigay khatarta iyo xakameynta fariimaha isagoo faray saraakiisha caafimaadka iyo saynisyahannada inay isku dubbaridaan bayaannada dadweynaha iyo daabacadaha la xiriira fayraska xafiiska Madaxweyne ku xigeenka Mike Pence.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Qaar ka mid ah madaxda Maraykan iyo ka faaloodayaal ayaa cambaareeyay isku halaynta Maraykanka ee muhiimad siinta waxyaabaha cakiran, oo ay ka mid yihiin saadka caafimaad ee aasaaska ah, ee laga keenay Shiinaha.
translated: Ansixinta guud ee maamulka Trump ee xiisadda ayaa lagu saleeyay dhinac dhinac.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Taxliilin shaxda safar ee hawada ayaa loo isticmaalay si loo sawiro loona saadaaliyo qaabka faafitaan waxaana lagu daabacay The Journal of Travel Medicine bartamihii Janaayo 202o.
translated: Qaar ka mid ah saraakiisha Mareykanka iyo faallooyinka ayaa dhaleeceeyay ku tiirsanaanta Mareykanka ee soo dejinta agabyada muhiimka ah, oo ay ku jiraan sahayda caafimaad ee muhiimka ah, ee laga keenay Shiinaha.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay macluumaadka 2018 ee Ururka Duulista Hawada ee caalamiga ah, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, iyo Taipei ayaa lahaa tirada ugu badnayd ee socoto ka yimaada Wuhan.
translated: Falanqaynta qaababka safarka hawada ayaa loo adeegsaday khariidad iyo saadaalinta qaababka faafitaanka waxaana lagu daabacay Joornaalka Caafimaadka Safarka badhtamihii Janaayo 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubai, Sydney, iyo Melbourne ayaa sidoo kale lagu soo waramay in ay yihiin goobaha aadka socoto ka imaanaysa Wuhan ugu safrayso.
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan macluumaadka 2018 ee Ururka Caalamiga ah ee Gaadiidka Cirka, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, iyo Taipei ayaa lahaa mugga ugu badan ee socdaalayaasha Wuhan.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
