targetString: Bali ayaa lagu soo waramay in ay tahay mida ugu diyaar garaw yar ee 20 ka caasimadood ee caanka ee socotodu u safrayso, halka caasimadah  Australia loo aqoonsaday in ay yihiin kuwa ugu diyaar garaw weyn. Australia ayaa sii daysay Qorshe ka Jawaab celin Dagdag ah ee fayraska Cusub ee Corona (COVID-19) 7dii Febraayo.
translated: Dubai, Sydney, iyo Melbourne ayaa sidoo kale lagu soo warramey inay yihiin meelaha caanka ah ee loo aado dadka ka safraya Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Waxaa la sheegay in wax badan laga ogayn weli COVID-19, in Australia ay  xooga saari doonto kontoroolada xuduuda iyo isgaadhsiinta  ee ka jawaab celinta cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: Bali waxaa lagu soo waramayaa inay ka mid tahay 20-ka magaalo ee ugu caansan dhanka diyaargarowga, halka magaalooyinka Australia loo tixgeliyey inay ugu awood badan yihiin.Australia waxay sii deysay Qorsheheeda Waxqabadka Degdegga ah ee Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) 7dii Febraayo.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: 21kii Maarso, talaabooyin lagaga ilaalinayo bin aadamka waxyaalaha halista ah oo dag ah ayaa lagaga dhawaaqay Australia.
translated: Waxay sheegtay in wax badan aan wali laga helin COVID-19, iyo in Australia ay xoogga saari doonto xakameynta xuduudaha iyo isgaarsiinta si ay uga jawaabto masiibada.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: Iyadoo leh karantiil waxtar leh ee gaadiidka dad weynaha gudaha Wuhan iyo Hubei, wadamo dhawr ah ayaa qorsheeyay kasoo daad gureynta  shacabkooda iyo shaqalohooda dublaamaasiyadeed goobta, ugu horeyn iyadoo loo isticmaalayo duulimaadyo la kiraystay oo wadanka laga leeyahay, iyagoo madaxda shiinaha na bixinaysoogolaanshaha rasmiga ah.
translated: 21kii Maarj, xaalad degdeg ah oo badbaado noole ayaa lagaga dhawaaqay Australia.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Kanada, Maraykanka, Japan, Hindiya, Sri Lanka, Australia, Faransiiska, Argentina, Jatmalka, iyo Thailand ayaa ka mid ahkuwa ugu horeeyay ee qosheeyay soo daad guraynta shacabkooda.
translated: Iyada oo ay ugu wacan tahay karantiilnimada wax ku oolka ah ee gaadiidka dadweynaha ee Wuhan iyo Hubei, dalal dhowr ah ayaa qorsheeyay in ay ka daadgureeyaan muwaadiniintooda iyo shaqaalahooda diblomaasiyadeed ee aagga, ugu horrayn iyaga oo u sii maraya duullimaadyo kireysan oo waddankooda ah, iyada oo mas'uuliyiinta Shiinaha ay bixinayaan fasax.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Pakistan ayaa dhahday in aysan wax shacabkeda ah kasoo daad gureynayn Shiinaha.
translated: Kanada, Maraykanka, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, iyo Thailand ayaa ka mid ahaa kuwii ugu horeeyay ee qorsheeyey daadgureynta muwaadiniintooda.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: 7dii Febraayo, Brazil ayaa soo daad guraysa 34 qof oo Brazil u dhashay ama xubno qoys inta waxaa dheer  afar qof oo Poland u dhashay, qof Shiinays ah, iyo qof Hindiya U dhashay.
translated: Pakistan ayaa sheegtay in aysan wax muwaadiniin ah ka soo daad gurayn doonin Shiinaha.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: Shacab u dhashay Poland, Shiinaha, iyo Hindiya ayaa dib loogu soo duuliyay Poland, marka diyaarad Brazil laga leeyahay ay dhexda ku istaagtay inta aysan horay ugu sii socon Brazil.
translated: 7dii Febraayo, Brazil waxay daad guraysay 34 Brazilian ah ama xubnaha qoyska marka lagu daro afar Pole, qof Shiineys ah, iyo muwaadin Hindi ah.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Shacab u dhasay Brazil oo aaday Wuhan ayaa lagu karantiilay xarun militari oo u dhaw Brasília.
translated: Muwaadiniinta Poland, China, iyo India ayaa ku duulay Poland, halkaas oo diyaarada Brazil ay ku istaagtay ka hor inta aysan raacin wadada Brazil.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Isla maalintaas, 215 qod oo udhashay Kanada (176 la socday diyaaradii koobaad, iyo 39 qof oo la socday diyaaradi labaad ee ay kiraysatay dawlada Maraykan) ayaa laga soo daad gureeyay Wuhan lana geeyay CFB Trenton si loogu karantiilo laba isbuuc.
translated: Muwaadiniinta reer Brazil ee aaday Wuhan ayaa lagu karantiilay saldhig milatari oo u dhow Brasília.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: 11ki Febraayo, diyaarad kale oo sida 185 ree Kanada ah oo ka yimid Wuhan ayaa caga dhigatay CFB Trenton.
translated: Isla maalintaas, 215 Canadian ah (176 ka mid ah diyaaradii ugu horreysay, iyo 39 laga keenay diyaarad labaad oo ay u kiraysan tahay dowladda Mareykanka) ayaa laga daadgureeyay Wuhan oo la geeyay CFB Trenton si loo karantiilo laba toddobaad.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Masuuliyiinta Australia ayaa u barakiciyay 277 muwaadin 3dii iyo 4tii Febraayo Xarunta Xabsiga Jasiirada Kirismaaska, taas oo loo qaabeeyay goob karantiil, halkaas oo ay joogeen 14 maalmod.
translated: 11kii Febraayo, diyaarad kale oo 185 Canadian ah oo ka timid Wuhan ayaa ku degtay CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Duulimaad soo raris ee New Zealand ayaa yimid Auckland 5tii Febraayo, rakaabkeedii (oo ay ku jiraan kuwa ka yimid Australia iyo Pacific) ayaa lagu karantiilay goob ciidanka badda oo ku taal Whanaparoa, waqooyiga Auckland.
translated: Maamulka Australiya ayaa 277 muwaadiniin ah u daadgureeyay 3 iyo 4tii Febraayo Xarunta Dadka lagu hayo ee Christmas Island, oo dib loogu soo celiyay xarun karantiil, halkaas oo ay ku sugnaayeen 14 maalmood.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: 15kii Febraayo, Maraykanku wuxuu shaaciyay inay soo rarayso dadka Maraykanka ee saraan markabka dalxiiska ee Diamond Princess.
translated: Duulimaadka daadguraynta New Zealand ayaa timid Auckland 5tii Febraayo; Rakaabkeeda (oo ay ku jiraan qaar ka yimid Australia iyo Pacific) ayaa lagu karantiilay saldhigga ciidamada badda ee Whangaparoa, waqooyiga Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: 21dii Febraayo, diyaarad sidda 129 rakaab ree Kanada ah oo laga keenay Diamond Princess ayaa soo caga dhigtay Trenton, Ontario.
translated: 15-kii Febraayo, Mareykanka wuxuu ku dhawaaqay inuu daadgureyn doono dadka Mareykanka ah ee saaran markabka dalxiiska ee Princess Diamond.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: Horaantii Maarso, dawlada Hindya ayaa billawday kasoo rarista shacabkeeda Iran. 14kii Maarso diyaarada South African Airways ee ay leedahay dawlada South Africa ayaa dib usoo celisay 112 muwaadan oo ree South Africa ah.
translated: 21kii Febraayo, diyaarad sidday 129 rakaab ah oo Canadian ah oo laga soo daadgureeyay Princess Diamond ayaa ku degtay Trenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: Baaritaanka Caafimaad ayaa la sameeyay ka hor tagitaanka, 4 ree South Africa oo ay ka muuqatay calaamadaha coronavirus ayaa laga tagay si khatarta loo yareeyo.
translated: Horraantii bishii Maarso, dowladda Hindiya waxay billowday inay muwaadiniinteeda ka daadgureyso Iran. 14-kii Maarso diyaarad South African Airways ah oo u kiraysan dowladda Koonfur Afrika ayaa dib u celisay 112 muwaadin oo Koonfur Afrikaan ah.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Kaliya dadka South African ee laga waayay ayaa dib dalka loogu soo celiyay.
translated: Baaritaan caafimaad ayaa la sameeyay ka hor inta aan la dhoofin, afar qof oo Koonfur Afrikaan ah oo muujinaya calaamadaha cudurka 'coronavirus' ayaa looga tagay si loo yareeyo khatarta.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Natiijooyinka baarista ayaa cadeeyay dhamaan dadka ree South Africa, oo ay ku jiraan shaqaalihii diyaarada, duuliyaasha, shaqaalaha huteelka, Booliska iyo ciidanka ku lug lahaa hawlgalka bini'aadanimo kuwaas oo, si tallaabo taxadar ah, dhamaantood la ilaalinayay oo ku karantiilnaa muddo 14 maalin ah Ranch Resort.
translated: Kaliya Koonfur Afrikaan ah oo tijaabiyey diidmo ayaa dib loo celiyay.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: 20kii Maarso, Maraykanku wuxuu bilaabay inuu kala soo baxo ciidankiisa Ciraaq sababo la xiriira safmareenka.
translated: Natiijooyinka imtixaanku waxay nadiifiyeen dhammaan dadka Koonfur Afrika, oo ay ku jiraan shaqaalihii duulimaadka, duuliyayaasha, shaqaalaha hoteelka, booliiska iyo askarta ku lugta leh hawsha bini'aadantinimo kuwaas oo, tallaabo taxaddar leh, dhammaan waxay ku jireen indho-indheyn iyo karantiil muddo 14 maalmood ah oo ku taal The Ranch Resort. .

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: 5tii Febraayo, wasaarada arimaha dibedda ee Shiinaha ayaa sheegtay in 21 dalal (oo ay ku jiraan Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad iyo Tobago, Egypt, iyo Iran) ay caawimaad usoo direen Shiinaha.
translated: 20-kii Maarso, Mareykanka wuxuu bilaabay inuu qeyb ahaan ciidamadiisa kala baxo Ciraaq cudurka faafa dartiis.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah ardeyga Shiinaha ee jaamacadaha maraykanka ayaa isu yimid si ay u caawiyaan kaalma dirista qaybaha uu fayruuska ku dhuftay ee Shiinaha, iyadoo koox isku dhaf ah oo ku sugan goobta wayn ee Chicago sida lasoo sheegay ay maareeyeen inay 50,000 oo maaskarooyinka N95 ah u diraan isbitaaladagobolka Hubei 30kii Janaayo. Kaalmada Tooska ah ee Hay'ada Caawinta Bini'aadanimada, oo la shaqaynaysa FEDEX, ayaa dirtay 200,000 maaskarooyinka wajiga ah iyadoo ay la socdaan qalabka kale oo ilaalin shaqsi ahaaneed ah, oo ay ku jiraan gacma gashin iyo guntis, iyadoo si degdegga diyaarad loogu qaaday ilaa isbitaalka Wuhan Union 30kii Janaayo.
translated: 5tii Febraayo, wasaaradda arrimaha dibadda Shiinaha ayaa sheegtay in 21 waddan (oo ay ku jiraan Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad iyo Tobago, Masar, iyo Iran) ay u soo direen gargaar Shiinaha.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: 5tii Febraayo, Bill iyo Melinda Gates ayaa shaaciyay sadaqo dhan $100 milyan oo ay siinayaan WHO si ay ugu maalgaliyaan baarista talaalka iyo dadaalada daawaynta iyadoo la ilaalinayo "dadka khatarta ugu jira Afrika iyo Asia".
translated: Qaar ka mid ah ardayda Shiinaha ee wax ka barata jaamacadaha Mareykanka ayaa ku biiray si ay gacan uga geystaan sidii ay gargaar ugu diri lahaayeen qeybaha uu fayrasku ku dhuftay ee Shiinaha, iyadoo koox wadajir ah oo ku nool aagga weyn ee Chicago lagu soo warramey inay 50,000 N95 waji-xidho ah u direen isbitaallada ku yaal gobolka Hubei 30kii Janaayo. Gargaarka tooska ah, iyada oo la kaashanaysa FedEx, waxay u dirtay 200,000 waji-xidhka wejiga ah oo ay weheliyaan qalab kale oo ilaalin shakhsi ah, oo ay ku jiraan galoofyada iyo gogosha, diyaarad degdeg ah oo loo qaaday Cusbitaalka Wuhan Union 30-kii Janaayo.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Interaksyon ayaa soo sheegtay in dawlada Shiinaha ayaa ku sadaqaysatay 200,000 maaskaro Filibiiin 6dii Febraayo, kadib markuu sanatar Richard Gordon uu u daabulay 3.16 milyan oo maaski Wuhan.
translated: 5tii Febraayo, Bill iyo Melinda Gates waxay ku dhawaaqeen $100 milyan oo deeq ah WHO si loogu maalgeliyo cilmi baarista iyo dadaallada daawaynta tallaalka oo ay weheliso ilaalinta "dad halista ku jirta ee Afrika iyo Koonfurta Aasiya".

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: 9kii Febraayo, Laaqayrta Cas ee Singapore ayaa shaacisay inay u diri doonto kaalmo dhan $2.26 milyan Shiinaha.
translated: Interaksyon ayaa soo warisay in dowladda Shiinaha ay ugu deeqday 200,000 oo maaskaro ah Filibiin 6-dii Febraayo, ka dib markii Senator Richard Gordon uu 3.16 milyan oo maaskaro ah u soo diray Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Japan ayaa ku sadaqaysatay hal milyan oo maaskarada wajiga Wuhan, Turkey ayaa u qaaday qalab caafimaad, Ruushka ayaa u diray Wuhan in ka badan 13 tan oo agabka caafimaadka ah, Malaysia ayaa shaacisay sadaqo dhan 18 milyan gacmo gashiga caafimaadka Shiinaha, Jarmalka ayaa gaysay agabyo caafimaad oo kala duwan oo ay ku jiran 10,000 suudhadhka Hazmat, iyo Maraykanka oo ku tabarucaaday 17.8 tan oo agabyo caafimaad ah Shiinaha wuxuuna ballan qaaday $100 milyan oo dheeraad ah oo lagu taageerayo dhaqaale ahaan dalalka uu saameeyay. Kadib markii kiisaska Shiinaha ay u muuqdeen inay degayaan, dalku wuxuu u dirayay kaalmo dalal kala duwan oo uu ku dhuftay cudurka caalamiga ah.
translated: 19kii Febraayo, Laanqeyrta Cas ee Singapore waxay ku dhawaaqday inay u dirayso Shiinaha $2.26 milyan oo gargaar ah.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Maarsob dhexdeedii, Shiinaha, Kuuba iyo Ruushka ayaa u diray agab caafimaad iyo khubaro si ay u caawiyaan Talyaaniga inay la tacaalaan dilaaca coronavirus.
translated: Japan ayaa hal milyan oo waji waji ah ugu deeqday Wuhan, Turkigu waxa uu u diray qalab caafimaad, Russia waxa ay u dirtay Wuhan in ka badan 13 tan oo sahay caafimaad ah, Malaysia waxa ay ku dhawaaqday in ay ugu deeqday 18 milyan oo galoofyada caafimaadka ee Shiinaha, Jarmalku waxa uu gaadhsiiyay sahay caafimaad oo kala duwan oo ay ka mid yihiin 10,000 oo Hazmat suits ah, iyo Mareykanka ayaa 17.8 tan oo sahay caafimaad ah ugu deeqay Shiinaha wuxuuna ballan qaaday $100 milyan oo dheeri ah oo taageero maaliyadeed ah oo la siinayo waddamada ay dhibaatadu saameysey.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Beecsharoolaha Jack Ma ayaa u diray 1.1 milyan oo agabka baarista, 6 milyan oo maaskarooyinka wajiga ah, iyo 60,000 oo suudhadhka iska ilaalinta Addis Ababa, Ethiopia si ay u qaybiso Midawga Afrika.
translated: Bishii Maarso, Shiinaha, Cuba iyo Ruushka waxay u direen sahay caafimaad iyo khubaro si ay uga caawiyaan Talyaaniga wax ka qabashada cudurka dillaaca coronavirus.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Kadib wuxuu u diray 5,000 agabka baarista, 100,000 maaskarooyinka wajiga iyo 5 neef siiye Panama.
translated: Ganacsade Jack Ma ayaa 1.1 milyan oo xirmooyinka baaritaanka, 6 milyan oo waji-xidhka, iyo 60,000 oo suudadka ilaalinta ah u diray magaalada Addis Ababa ee dalka Itoobiya si uu Midowga Afrika u qaybiyo.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Ma wuxuu sidoo kale ugu tabarucay agab caafimaad kanada. Netherland, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, iyo Jamhuuriyada Czech ayaa sheegay walaaca ay ka qabaan maaskarooyinka iyo agabka baarista ee ay sameeyeen Shiinuhu.
translated: Kadib wuxuu u diray Panama 5,000 oo xirmooyinka tijaabada ah, 100,000 waji-xidhka iyo 5 hawo-mareeno.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, Spain ayaa saartay 58,000 agabka coronavirus lagu baaro oo Shiinuhu sameeyay oo laha qiyaas sax ahaaneed oo dhan 30%, isla markaas, Netherland ayaa dib usoo celisay 600,000 oo maaskarooyinka wajiga Shiinaha kuwaas oo xumaa.
translated: Ma ayaa sidoo kale sahay caafimaad ugu deeqday Canada. Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, iyo Czech Republic ayaa muujiyay walaaca ay ka qabaan maaskaro iyo xirmooyinka tijaabada ah ee Shiinaha lagu sameeyay.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Belgium ayaa soo celisay 100,000 maaskarooyin aan la isticmaali karin, oo loo malaynayo inay ka yimaadeen Shiinaha, laakiin dhab ahaan ka yimid Kolombiya.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, Spain waxay la baxday 58,000 oo ah xirmooyinka baaritaanka coronavirus-ka ee Shiinaha lagu sameeyay oo leh qiime sax ah 30%, dhanka kale, Nederland waxay soo celisay 600,000 waji-xidhka Shiinaha oo cilladaysan.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Dhinaca kale, kaalmada Shiinaha ayaa si fiican looga soo dhaweeyay qaybo kamid ah Latin America iyo Africa. 2dii Abriil, Bankiga Aduunka ayaa bilaabay taageero hawlgal oo degdegga dalalka soo koroya.
translated: Belgium waxay dib u soo celisay 100,000 waji-xidho aan la isticmaali karin, oo loo malaynayo inay ka yimaadeen Shiinaha, laakiin dhab ahaantii waxay ka yimaadeen Kolombiya.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: WHO ayaa bogaadisay dadaalada masuuliyiinta Shiinaha ee maaraynta iyo xakamaynta safmareenka.
translated: Dhinaca kale, gargaarka Shiinaha ayaa si wanaagsan looga helay qaybo ka mid ah Latin America iyo Afrika. 2-dii Abriil, Bangiga Adduunka wuxuu bilaabay hawlgallo taageero degdeg ah oo loogu talagalay waddamada soo koraya.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO ayaa sheegtay mid kasoo horjeeda intii u dhaxaysay 2002-2004 dilaacitaankii SARS, halkaas oo masuuliyiinta Shiinaha lagu eedeeyay qarinta dib u dhigista dadaalada ka hortaga iyo xakamaynta, iyo musiibada hadda halka dawlada dhexe "ay bixinayso la socodsiin cusub si looga hortago walwal ku yimaada fasaxyada Sanadka Cusub ee Lunar".
translated: WHO ayaa bogaadisay dadaalka mas'uuliyiinta Shiinaha ee maareynta iyo xakameynta cudurka.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: 23dii Janaayo, iyagoo ka falcelinaya go'aankii masuuliyiinta dhexe ee ay ku dhaqangelinayeen xayiraada gaadiidka Wuhan, wakiilka WHO Gauden Galea ayaa xusay inaysan ahayn "talo ay bixiyeen WHO", waxay ahayd sidoo kale "astaan aad u muhiim ah ee ka go'naanta inay ku xakameeyaan safmareenka meesha uu aad ugu badanyahay" waxaana ugu magac dareen "filasho la'aanta taariikhda caafimaadka bulshada". 30kii Janaayo, iyadoo dabasocota xaqiijin inuu ukala gudbayo bini'aadanka banaanka Shiinaha iyo koroorka tirada kiisaska dalalka kale, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday in dilaacitaanku yahay Walaac Caalami ah oo Soo ifbax degdegga ee Caafimaadka Bulshada (PHEIC), PHEIC lixaad ilaa iyo inta talaabada la qaaday intii lagu gudajiray safmareenka 2009 ee hargab doofaarka.
translated: WHO waxay xustay farqiga u dhexeeya dillaaca SARS 2002-2004, halkaas oo mas'uuliyiinta Shiinaha lagu eedeeyay sirta caqabad ku ah dadaallada ka hortagga iyo xakameynta, iyo xiisadda hadda jirta halkaas oo dowladda dhexe ay "siisay cusbooneysiin joogto ah si looga fogaado argagaxa ka hor fasaxyada sanadka cusub" .

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Agaasimaha Guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom ayaa sheegay in PHEIC ay u dhaw dahay "khatar ah ku faafitaanka caalamka, gaar ahaan dalalka dakhliga hoose iyo kuwa dhexe ee aan lahayn nidaam caafimaad oo xoogan.
translated: 23kii Janaayo, iyada oo laga falcelinayo go'aanka maamulka dhexe ee ah in laga dhaqan geliyo xayiraadda gaadiidka ee Wuhan, wakiilka WHO Gauden Galea wuxuu yiri "runtii ma ahan talo ay WHO soo jeedisay", waxay sidoo kale ahayd "mid aad muhiim u ah." Ballanqaadka ah in lagu xakameeyo faafitaanka cudurka meesha uu ugu badan yahay" wuxuuna ugu yeeray "wax aan horay loo arag taariikhda caafimaadka dadweynaha" 30-kii Janaayo, ka dib markii la xaqiijiyay isu gudbinta bini'aadamka ee ka baxsan Shiinaha iyo kororka tirada kiisaska kale ee kale. Wadamada, WHO waxa ay ku dhawaaqday in uu dillaacay Xaalad Degdegga Caafimaadka Dadweynaha ee Walaaca Caalamiga ah (PHEIC), oo ah kii lixaad ee PHEIC tan iyo markii qiyaasta markii ugu horreysay la codsaday intii lagu jiray 2009 masiibada ifilada doofaarka.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Iyadoo laga falcelinayo dhaqangelinada xayiraada socdaalka, Tedros ayaa sheegay " inaysan jirin sabab loo qaato talaabooyinka aan si ku haboon ula falgalayn isu socodka iyo ganacsiga caalamiga ah" iyo in "WHO aysan ku talinayn xadidista isu socodka iyo ganacsiga".
translated: Agaasimaha guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom ayaa sheegay in PHEIC ay sabab u tahay "khatarta faafitaanka caalamiga ah, gaar ahaan wadamada dakhligoodu hooseeyo iyo kuwa dhexdhexaadka ah ee aan lahayn nidaamyo caafimaad oo adag.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: 5tii Febraayo, WHO waxay ka codsatay bulshada caalamka tabarucaad dhan $675 milyan oo lagu maalgeliyo diyaargarawga istaraatiijiyad ahaaneed ee dalalka dakhliga yar,  iyadoo muujinaysa degdegnimada in la taageero dalalkaas "oon aan lahayn nidaamyo meel u yaala oo lagu ogaanayo dadka uu ku dhacay fayruusku, xitaa hadii ay soo bixi lahayd".
translated: Isagoo ka jawaabaya fulinta xayiraadaha safarka, Tedros wuxuu sheegay "ma jirto sabab loo qaado tallaabooyin aan loo baahnayn oo farageliya safarka caalamiga ah iyo ganacsiga" iyo in "WHO aysan ku talineynin in la xaddido ganacsiga iyo dhaqdhaqaaqa."

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Tedros ayaa si dheeri ah u sheegay maqaal ah "waxaan u xooganahay kaliya sida xiriirkeena ugu daciifsan" wuxuuna ugu baaqay bulshada caalamka inay "maanta maalgashadaan ama ay  berri mid ka badan bixiyaan". 11ka Febraayo, WHO oo shir jaraaid qabatay ayaa magaca xanuunka ku sheegtay COVID-1.
translated: 5tii Febraayo, WHO waxay ka codsatay bulshada adduunka $ 675 milyan oo tabaruc ah oo lagu maalgalinayo u diyaargarowga istaraatiijiga ah ee waddamada dakhligoodu hooseeyo, iyadoo tixraacaysa degdegga ah in la taageero waddamadaas "aan lahayn nidaamyo lagu ogaanayo dadka uu ku dhacay fayraska. , xataa haddii ay soo bixi lahayd".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Isla maalintaas, Tedros ayaa sheegay in Xoghayaha Guud ee Qaramada Midoobay Antonio Guterres uu ogolaaday inuu siiyo "awooda nidaamka guud ee Qaramada Midoobay ka falcelinta".
translated: Tedros wuxuu sii raaciyay hadallo uu ku caddeeyay "waxaan nahay kaliya sida xooggan isku xirkayaga ugu daciifsan" wuxuuna ku booriyay beesha caalamka inay "maalgashadaan maanta ama ay bixiyaan wax badan ka dib". cudurka.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Kooxda Maareynta Musiibada ee Qaramada Midoobay ayaa la hawlgaliyay natiijada awgeed, iyadoo u ogolaanaysa wadashaqaynta guud ahaan ka falcelinta Qaramada Midoobay, kaas oo WHO ay shegayso inay u ogolaanayso "inay diirada saaraan ka falcelinta caafimaad halka hay'adaha kaleay keeni karaan khibrada si loola qabsado natiijooyinka balaaran ee bulshada, dhaqaalaha iyo hormarka ee dilaacitaanka".
translated: Isla maalintaas, Tedros wuxuu sheegay in Xoghayaha Guud ee Qaramada Midoobay António Guterres uu ogolaaday inuu bixiyo "awoodda dhammaan nidaamka Qaramada Midoobay ee jawaabta".

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: 14kii Febraayo, Koox Hawgal oo Iskudhaf ah oo ay hogaaminayso WHO oo la socota Shiinaha ayaa la hawlgaliyay si loo sameeyo inay khubarada caalamiga ah iyo kuwa WHO ee Shiinaha jooga ay u caawiyaan maaraynta maxalli iyo qiimaynta "ba'naanta iyo isu gudbinta cudurka" iyagoo qabanaya siminaaro iyo kulamo ay la yeeshaan macaahida ugu muhiimsan ee heer qaran iyo si ay u sameeyaan booqashooyinka goobta si ay u qiimeeyaan "saamaynta hawlaha ka falcelinta ee heer gobol iyo heer ismaamul, oo ay ku jiraan meelaha magaalada iyo baadiyaha". 25tii Febraayo, WHO ayaa ku dhawaaqday in "caalamku sameeyo wax badan si uu isugu diyaaro cudur caalami oo suurtagal ah ee coronavirus," iyagoo sheegaya inkastoo ay xilli hore tahay in lagu magacaabo cudur caalami ah, dalalku waa inay marwalba ay ahaadaan "waji diyaarsanaan".
translated: Kooxda Maareynta Qalalaasaha ee Qaramada Midoobay ayaa la hawlgeliyay natiijadaas, taasoo u oggolaanaysa iskudubarid dhammaan jawaabta Qaramada Midoobay, taas oo ay gobollada WHO u oggolaan doonto inay " diiradda saaraan jawaabta caafimaadka halka hay'adaha kale ay keeni karaan khibradooda si ay ula qabsadaan bulsho-weynta, dhaqaalaha. iyo saamaynta korriinka ee dillaaca".

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Iyadoo laga falcelinayo dilaaitaan sii socda ee Iran, WHO waxay dirtay Koox Hawlgal oo Iskudhaf ah si ay u qiimeeyaan xaalada. 28dii Febraayo, masuuliyiinta WHO waxay sheegeen in qiimaynta halista coronavirus ee heer caalami kor looga qaadayo "sareeya" ilaa "saaid u sareeya", digniinta heerka ugu saraysa iyo qiimaynta khatarta.
translated: 14kii Febraayo, Kooxda Wadajirka ah ee Wadajirka ah ee ay hogaamineyso WHO iyo Shiinaha ayaa la hawlgeliyay si ay u bixiyaan khubaro caalami ah iyo WHO gudaha Shiinaha si ay uga caawiyaan maamulka gudaha oo ay qiimeeyaan "darnaanta iyo gudbinta cudurka" iyada oo martigelinaysa aqoon-is-weydaarsiyo iyo kulamo xarumaha muhiimka ah ee heer qaran iyo in la sameeyo booqashooyin gudaha ah si loo qiimeeyo "saameynta waxqabadyada waxqabadka ee heer gobol iyo degmo, oo ay ku jiraan goobaha magaalooyinka iyo miyiga" 25kii Febraayo, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday "in dunidu ay sameyso wax badan si ay ugu diyaargarowdo suurtogalnimada suurtagalka ah" Faafida coronavirus," isagoo sheegay in iyadoo ay aad u horeeyso in loogu yeero masiibo, si kastaba ha ahaatee dalalku waa inay ku jiraan " weji diyaargarow ah".

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Mike Ryan, agaasimaha fulinta barnaamijka caafimaadka degdegga ee WHO, ayaa ku digay maqaal uu ku sheegay "Tani waa hubin xaqiiqo ah ee dawlad kasta oo dhulka saaran: Toosa,
translated: Iyada oo laga jawaabayo cudurka ka dillaacay Iran, WHO waxay halkaas u dirtay Koox Hawl-wadaag ah si ay u qiimeeyaan xaaladda. 28kii Febraayo, saraakiisha WHO waxay sheegeen in qiimeynta halista coronavirus ee heerka caalamiga ah laga soo qaadi doono "sare" lana gaarsiin doono "mid aad u sarreeya" , heerka ugu sarreeya ee feejignaanta iyo qiimeynta khatarta.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Fayruuskan ayaa jidka kusoo jiri kara waxaadna u baahantahay inaad diyaar ahaato," isagoo sheegay in talaabooyinka falcelinta saxda ah ay ka caawin karaan caalamka inuu ka fogaado "waxa ugu xun".
translated: Mike Ryan, oo ah agaasimaha fulinta ee barnaamijka xaaladaha degdegga ah ee caafimaadka ee WHO, ayaa bayaan uu soo saaray ku yiri “Tani waa hubin dhab ah oo dowlad kasta oo meeraha ka jirta: Kac.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Ryan ayaa sii sheegay in xogta hada uusan damaanad qaadin in masuuliyiinta caafimaadka bulshadu ay ku dhawaaqaan cudur caalami, isagoo sheegay ku dhawaaqis noocaas ah inay ka dhigantahay "inaan aasaasi ahaan aqbalayno in bini'aadan kasta oo dhulka saaran uu ku dhacayo fayruuska.
translated: Fayraskani waxa laga yaabaa inuu jidka ku soo jiro oo aad u baahan tahay inaad diyaar ahaato,” isagoo ku boorinaya in tillaabooyinka jawaabta saxda ah ay ka caawin karaan adduunka inuu ka fogaado "waxa ugu xun".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: 11kii Maarso, WHO ayaa ku dhawaaqday coronavirus inuu yahay cudur caalami ah.
translated: Ryan wuxuu sii raaciyay in xogta hadda jirta aysan dammaanad qaadin mas'uuliyiinta caafimaadka dadweynaha inay ku dhawaaqaan masiibo caalami ah, isagoo sheegay in ku dhawaaqida noocan oo kale ah ay la macno tahay "waxaan dhab ahaan aqbalnay in qof kasta oo adduunka ku nool uu la kulmi doono fayraskaas."

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Agaasimaha Guud ayaa sheegay in WHO ay "si qoto dheer uga walaacsanayd labadaba heerarka naxdinta leh ee faafitaanka iyo ba'naanta, iyo heerarka naxdinta leh ee hawlgal la'aanta". WHO waxay wajahday dhaleecayn wayn oo ku aadan wax u muuqda inuu yahay la tacaalis aan ku filnayn ee cudurka caalamiga ah, oo ay kamid tahay ku dhawaaqista daahday ee xaalada degdegga caafimaadka bulshada iyo u aqoonsiga fayruuska inuu yahay cudur caalami.
translated: 11kii Maarso, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday faafitaanka coronavirus inuu yahay masiibo.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Dhaleecaynta waxaa kamid ahaa codsi loo gudbiyay Agaasimaha Guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom si uu u gudbiyo iscasilaadiisa, oo ay saxiixeen 733,000 qof 6dii Abriil.
translated: Agaasimaha Guud ayaa sheegay in WHO ay aad uga walaacsan tahay heerka fiditaanka iyo darnaanta, iyo heerarka naxdinta leh ee waxqabad la'aanta. ku dhawaaqida soo daahday ee xaalad degdeg ah oo caafimaadka dadweynaha ah iyo u kala saarista fayraska sida masiibo.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: 26dii Maarso 2020, darsino khubaro ee xuquuqul insaanka Qaramada Midoobay ayaa ku celceliyay in la xushmeeyo xuquuqda qof kasta inta lagu jiro cudurka caalamiga ah ee COVID-19.
translated: Cabashada ka dhalatay waxaa ka mid ahaa codsi uu u gudbiyay Agaasimaha Guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom inuu u gudbiyo istiqaaladiisa, oo ay saxiixeen 733,000 oo qof laga soo bilaabo 6dii Abriil.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Kooxda khubarada waxay sheegeen in qofkasta uu xaq u leeyahay hawlaha naf badbaadinta dawlada ayaana masuul ka ah.
translated: 26-kii Maarso 2020, daraasiin khubarada xuquuqul insaanka Qaramada Midoobay ah ayaa ku nuuxnuuxsaday ixtiraamka xuquuqda qof kasta inta lagu jiro masiibada COVID-19.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Kooxdo waxay xooga saareen in la'aanta dakhliga ama caymiska caafimaad uusan waligiis noqonin cadayn lagu takooro koox gaar ah.
translated: Kooxda khubarada ah ayaa sheegtay in qof kastaa uu xaq u leeyahay faragelin nafta lagu badbaadinayo, dowladduna ay mas’uuliyaddaas hayso.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Khubaradu waxay hoosta ka xariiqeen in qof kasta uu xaq u leeyahay caafimaad, oo ay ku jiraan dadka naafada ah, ee kasoo jeeda kooxaha tirada yar, dadka waawayn, dadka gudaha ku barakacay, kuwa gurya la'aanta, kuwa ku nool xaaladaha saaid u liita, dadka xabsiyada ku jira, iyo sidoo kale qaxootiga iyo kooxaha kale een la sheegin ee u baahan taageero dawlo.
translated: Kooxdu waxay ku nuuxnuuxsatay in la'aanta kheyraad ama caymis caafimaad aysan waligood u adeegin sidii cudurdaar lagu takoorayo koox gaar ah.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Hay'adaha caalamiga ah ee dawlada ayaa sheegaya saameynta dhaqaale iyo tan bulsho ee musiibada COVID-19.
translated: Khubaradu waxay hoosta ka xariiqeen in qof kastaa uu xaq u leeyahay inuu helo caafimaad, sida dadka naafada ah, ka tirsan kooxaha laga tirada badan yahay, dadka da'da ah, kuwa gudaha ku barakacay, kuwa hoy la'aanta ah, kuwa ku nool xaalad aad u liidata, dadka xabsiyada ku jira, iyo sidoo kale qaxooti iyo qaar kale oo aan la cayimin. kooxaha u baahan taageerada dawladda.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Ururka Iskaashiga Dhaqaalaha iyo Horumarka ayaa bilaabay goob lagu bixinayo macluumaad dhamaystiran oo waqti  leh oo ku saabsan hab falcelin ee dalalka daafaha caalamka, iyo sidoo kale aragtiyo iyo waano.
translated: Ururada dawliga ah ee caalamiga ah ayaa wax ka qabanaya saamaynta dhaqaale iyo bulsho ee dhibaatada COVID-19.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Laga soo bilaabo habab lagu xoojinayo nidaamyada caafimaad iyo dhaqaalaha aduunka ilaa ka hadlitaanka saamaynta bandawga iyo xayiraadaha socdaalka, xarunta casriga ah oo ay kamid tahay Dabagalaha Xeerka Dalka, wuxuuna ku tala jiraa inuu caawiyo dalalku wax iska bartaan iyo inay fududeeyaan falcelin caalami oo wada shaqayn leh oo ku aadan caqabada coronavirus.
translated: Ururka iskaashiga dhaqaalaha iyo horumarinta ayaa bilaabay madal lagu bixiyo waqtiga iyo macluumaadka dhamaystiran ee jawaabaha siyaasadda ee dalalka adduunka oo dhan, iyo sidoo kale fikradaha iyo talada.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Dawlada Shiinaha waxaa cambaareeyay Maraykanka, Wasiirka Ingiriiska ee xafiiska wasiirada Michael Gove, iyo wiilka Madaxweynaha Baraasiil Jair Bolsonaro, sida ay ula tacaaleen cudurka caalamiga ah kaas oo ka billawday gobolka Shiinaha ee Hubei.
translated: Laga soo bilaabo siyaasadaha lagu xoojinayo nidaamyada caafimaadka iyo dhaqaalaha adduunka si wax looga qabto saameynta xannibaadda iyo xaddidaadaha safarka, xudunta dhijitaalka ah waxaa ka mid ah Tracker Siyaasadda Dalka, waxayna ujeeddadeedu tahay inay ka caawiso waddammada inay wax ka bartaan midba midka kale iyo in la fududeeyo jawaab-celin caalami ah oo la isku dubariday caqabada coronavirus.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Tiro maamulada heer gobol ee xisbiga Shuuciga ah ee Shiinaha (CPC) ayaa loo cayriyay sida ay ula tacaaleen dadaalada karantiilka ee Bartamaha Shiinaha, calaamad qanaacad la'aan ee falcelinada ay abuureen siyaasaduhu ee ku aadan ka dilaacitaanka goboladaas.
translated: Dowladda Shiinaha waxaa dhaleeceeyay Mareykanka, Wasiirka Wasaaradda UK ee Xafiiska Golaha Michael Gove, iyo wiilka Madaxweynaha Brazil Jair Bolsonaro Eduardo Bolsonaro sida ay wax uga qabteen cudurka faafa, oo ka billowday gobolka Hubei ee Shiinaha.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Dadka wax falanqeeya ayaa aaminsan in talaabadan looga gol lahaa in lagaga ilaaliyo xoghayaha guud ee xisbiga Shuuciga Shiinaha Xi Jinping carada bulashada ee ka dhalatay dilaacitaanka coronavirus.
translated: Tiro ka mid ah maamulayaasha heer gobol ee Xisbiga Shuuciga ee Shiinaha (CPC) ayaa shaqada looga eryay sida ay u maareeyeen dadaallada karantiil ee Bartamaha Shiinaha, taasoo calaamad u ah sida ay uga xun yihiin jawaabta hay'adda siyaasadeed ee ka dillaacay gobolladaas.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah msuuliyiinta Shiinaha, tusaale Zhao Lijian ayaa diiday qirasho hore oo ahayd inuu dilaacitaanka coronavirus ka billawday Wuhan, isagoo u eexanaya aragtiyaha shirqoolka ku saabsan COVID-19 inuu kasoo farcamay Maraykanka mise Talyaaniga.
translated: Falanqeeyayaasha qaarkood ayaa rumeysan in tallaabadan looga dan lahaa in laga ilaaliyo xoghayaha guud ee xisbiga Shuuciga Shiinaha Xi Jinping xanaaqa dadweynaha ee ku aaddan dillaaca coronavirus.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Maamulka Maraykanka Donald Trump ayaa ku qeexay coronavirus "fayruuska Shiinaha" mise "fayruuska Wuhan" isagoo sheegay in baaritaanada shiinaha inay keeneen fayruus kaas oo hada isu badelay cudur caalami ah", kaas oo ay dadka wax cambaareeya ay ku cambaareeyeen inuu yahay midab nacayb iyo inuu dadka ka jeediyo sida maamulkiisu ugu fashilmay xakamaynta cudurka".
translated: Qaar ka mid ah saraakiisha Shiinaha, tusaale ahaan Zhao Lijian ayaa diiday qirasho hore oo ah in cudurka coronavirus uu ka dillaacay Wuhan, iyaga oo door biday fikradaha shirqoolka ah ee ku saabsan COVID-19 ee ka soo jeeda Mareykanka ama Talyaaniga.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Daily Beast ayaa helay xarig dawlada Maraykanka oo muujinaya khiyaano isgaarsiin oo leh asal cad oo ka yimid Golaha Amaanka Qaran, oo leh istaraatiijiyad lagu sheegay "Wax walba Shiinaha ayuu ku saabsanyahay.
translated: Maamulka Mareykanka ee Donald Trump ayaa ku tilmaamay cudurka 'coronavirus' inuu yahay "Fayraska Shiinaha" ama "virus Wuhan" isagoo sheegay in faafreebka Shiinaha uu kor u qaaday fayras hadda isu beddelay masiibo caalami ah, taas oo dhaleeceynta qaar ay ku dhaleeceeyeen cunsurinimo. iyo "in ay ka jeediyaan [wax ka qabad] maamulkiisa oo ku guul daraystay xakamaynta cudurka".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Waxaa naloo sheegay inaan isku dayno oo aan fariimahan helno si kasta oo suuragal ah, oo ay ku jiraan shirar jaraaid iyo muuqaalo talefiishan. "Baahiyaasha sida Politico, Siyaasada Dibedda, iyo Bloomberg ayaa sheegay in dadaalada Shiinaha ee ah inay kaalmo u diraan dalalka uu fayruusku ku dhuftay ay qayb ka tahay riixitaan borobagaandho oo lagu saamaynayo caalamka.
translated: Daily Beast ayaa heshay fiilada dowladda Mareykanka oo qeexaysa xeelad isgaarsiineed oo asal ahaan ka soo jeeda Golaha Amniga Qaranka, iyadoo istaraatiijiyaddan lagu soo xigtay "Wax walba waxay ku saabsan yihiin Shiinaha.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Gudoomiyaha siyaasada dibedda EU Josep Borrell ayaa ka digay in ay jirto "shay siyaasad juquraafiyeed oo ay kamid tahay loolanka lagu saamaynayo iyadoo loo marayo daandaansi iyo 'deeqsinimada siyaasada'.
translated: Waxaa naloo sheegay inaan isku dayno oo aan u helno fariintan si kasta oo suurtagal ah, oo ay ku jiraan shirarka jaraa'id iyo muuqaalada telefishinada. oo ah dacaayad dacaayad ah oo lagu riixayo saamaynta caalamiga ah.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Borrell wuxuu sidoo kale dhahay " Shiinaha wuxuu si wuxuushnima ah u riixayaa fariinta ah, marka laga soo tago Maraykanka, inay tahay saaxiib masuul oo laysku halayn karo."
translated: Madaxa siyaasadda arrimaha dibadda ee Midowga Yurub Josep Borrell ayaa ka digay in ay jirto "qayb juquraafi-siyaasadeed oo ay ku jiraan halganka loogu jiro saamaynta iyada oo loo marayo wareegtada iyo 'siyaasadda deeqsinimada'".

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Shiinuhu wuxuu sidoo kale ugu baaqay Maraykanka uu ka qaado cunuqabataynta Syria, Venezuela iyo Iran, isagoo uu kaalmo u diraya labada dal ee danbe.
translated: Borrell ayaa sidoo kale sheegay in "Shiinuhu uu si gardarro ah u riixayo farriinta, si ka duwan Maraykanka, waa lammaane mas'uul ah oo la isku halleyn karo."

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Tabarucadka Jack Ma ee 100,000 maaskarooyin lagu siiyo Kuuba waxaa hor istaagay cunaqataynada Maraykanka 3dii Abriil.
translated: Shiinaha ayaa sidoo kale ku baaqay in Mareykanka uu ka qaado cunaqabateynta saaran Suuriya, Venezuela iyo Iran, halka la sheegay in uu gargaar u dirayo labada dal ee dambe.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Masuuliyiinta Maraykanka ayaa sidoo kale lagu eedeeyay inay u leexinayaan kaalmadii loogu talagalay dalalka kale dalkooda.
translated: Deeqdii Jack Ma ee 100,000 oo waji-xidho ah oo uu ugu deeqay Cuba waxaa xannibay cunaqabataynta Maraykanku 3-dii Abriil.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Waxaa jiray dhibaato lasoo sheegay oo la xiriira maaskaro oo u dhaxeeya dalal kale, sida jarmalka, Austria, iyo Switzerland; iyo Jamhuuriyada Czech iyo Talyaaniga.
translated: Maamulka Mareykanka ayaa sidoo kale lagu eedeeyay in ay u weeciyeen gargaarkii loogu talagalay wadamada kale ee dalkooda.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Intaaas waxaa dheer, Turkiga wuxuu qabtay boqolaal mashiinada neef-siinta oo loo waday Spain.
translated: Waxaana jiray khilaafyo la xidhiidha waji-xidhka oo laga soo sheegay dalal kale, sida Jarmalka, Austria iyo Switzerland; iyo Czech Republic iyo Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Horaaantii Maarso, dawlada Talyaaniga ayaa ku cambaaraysay Midawga Yurub diir nixitaan la'aan ku aadan Talyaaniga uu coronavirus saameeyay.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, Turkigu wuxuu qabtay boqolaal hawo-mareeno ah oo u socday Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, safiirka Talyaaniga ee EU, ayaa sheegay "kaliya Shiinaha ayaa ka jawaabtay si laba geesood.
translated: Horraantii bishii Maarso, dowladda Talyaanigu waxay dhalleeceysay midnimo la'aanta Midowga Yurub ee uu saameeyay coronavirus-ka Talyaaniga.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Hubaal, tani maaha astaan fiican ee iskuudnaanta reer Yurub ah."
translated: Maurizio Massari, oo ah safiirka Talyaaniga ee Midowga Yurub, ayaa yiri "Shiinaha oo kaliya ayaa si laba geesood ah uga jawaabay.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: 22dii Maarso, kadib wicitaan taleefan uu la yeeshay Raysal wasaaraha Talyaaniga Giuseppe Conte, Madaxwaynaha Ruushka Vladimir Putin ayaa qabanqaabiyay in ciidanka Ruushku u diro Talyaaniga dhakhaatiir milatari, baabuurta gaarka ah ee caabuq dilaha, iyo qalab kale oo caafimaad.
translated: Hubaal, tani maaha calaamad wanaagsan oo muujinaysa midnimada Yurub."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Wargeeska Talyaaniga ee Stampa ayaa kasoo xigtay "ilo siyaasad heer sare" oon la aqoon in boqolkiiba 80 kaalmada Ruushku ay ahayd "mid waxtar la'aan ah ama waxtar yar u leh Talyaaniga".
translated: 22-kii Maarso, ka dib markii uu taleefoon kula xiriiray Raiisel Wasaaraha Talyaaniga Giuseppe Conte, madaxweynaha Ruushka Vladimir Putin wuxuu abaabulay ciidamada Ruushka inay u diraan dhakhaatiir militari, gawaarida jeermiska gaarka ah, iyo qalab kale oo caafimaad oo Talyaani ah.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Ilaha ayaa ku eedeeyay Ruushka inuu soo daabulayo "siyaasad juquraafiga iyo diblomaasiyad" olole taageero raadis.
translated: Wargeyska La Stampa ee Talyaaniga ayaa soo xigtay "il siyaasadeed oo heer sare ah" oo qarsoodi ah in 80 boqolkiiba gargaarka Ruushka uu ahaa "mid aan faa'iido lahayn ama aan faa'iido u lahayn Talyaaniga".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Madaxweynaha Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, iyo Wasiirka arimaha dibedda Talyaaniga Luigi Di Maio ayaa ka baaqday warbixinnada warbaahinta waxayna muujiyeen mahdnaqooda.
translated: Isha ayaa ku eedaysay Ruushka in uu bilaabay weerar soo jiidasho leh oo "geopolitical and diplomatic" ah.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Ruushka ayaa sidoo kale diray diyaarad xamuul ah oo u sidda kaalmo caafimaad Maraykanka.
translated: Madaxweynaha Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, iyo Wasiirka Arrimaha Dibadda ee Talyaaniga Luigi Di Maio, ayaa meesha ka saaray wararka ay baahiyeen warbaahinta, waxayna muujiyeen sida ay ugu faraxsan yihiin.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Afhayeenka Kremlin Dmitry Peskov ayaa yir "marka la siinayo kaalmo saaxiba Maraykanka, [Putin] wuxuu u qaataa in marka soo saarayaasha qalabka caafimaadka iyo agabyada kale ee Maraykanka ay helayaan awood, waxay sidoo kale awoodi donaan inay abaal gudaan haday haboon tahay".
translated: Ruushka ayaa sidoo kale diyaarad xamuul ah oo gargaar dawo ah u diray Mareykanka.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Dhoolatuska milatari ee NATO "Difaaca 2020" ee la qorshaynay ee ka dhici lahaa Jarmalka, Poland, iyo dawladaha Baltic, dhoolatuskii dagaal ee NATO ee ugu waynaa tan iyo dhamaadkii Dagaalkii Qaboobaa, ayaa la qaban doonaa isagoo baaxad yar.
translated: Afhayeenka Kremlin-ka Dmitry Peskov ayaa yiri "marka la siinayo caawinta asxaabta Mareykanka, [Putin] wuxuu u maleynayaa in marka soo-saareyaasha Mareykanka ee qalabka iyo agabka ay kor u qaadaan, ay sidoo kale awoodi doonaan inay ka jawaabaan haddii loo baahdo."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Xoghaya guud ee Olalaha Hub ka dhigista Nukleerka Kate Hudsan ayaa dhaleeceeyay dhoolatuska Difaaca 2020: "musiibada caafimaadka bulshada ee hadda jirta, waxay khatar galinaysaa nolosha kaliya maaha ciidamada Maraykanka iyo dalal badan oo Yurub oo ka qay qaadanaya balse sidoo kale dadka degan dalalka ay ka hawl galayaan. "Dawlada Iran waxaa si wayn u saameeyay fayruuska, isagoo ku dhawaad laba darsin oo xubnaha baarlamaanka ku dhacay iyo sidoo kale shan iyo toban kale oo ah masuuliyiin siyaasadeed oo hadda mise kuwa hore.
translated: Dhoolatuska millatari ee NATO ee loo qorsheeyay “Difender 2020” ee Jarmalka, Poland, iyo wadamada Baltic, oo ah dhoolatuskii ugu weynaa ee NATO tan iyo dhamaadkii dagaalkii qaboobaa, ayaa lagu qaban doonaa heer la dhimay.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Madaxweynaha Iran Hassan Rouhani ayaa warqad guud u qoray hogaamiyaasha caalamka isagoo waydiisanaya kaalmo 14kii Maarso 2020, isagoo sheegaya in dalkiisu uu la daalaa dhacayo inuu la dagaalamo dilaaca sababto ah ogolaansho la'aanta suuqyada caalamiga ah natiijo ka dhalatay cunuqabatayntii uu Maraykanku saaray Iran. Dilaaca cudurka ayaa keenay baaqyo loo dirayo Maraykanka inay dhaqan geliso habab bulsho oo ay ka simanyihiin dalalka kale ee hodanka ah, oo ay ku jiraan daryeelka caafimaad ee caalami, daryeelka ilmaha oo caalami, fasax qoys oo mushahar leh, iyo heerar sare ee maalgalinta caafimaadka bulshada.
translated: Xoghayaha guud ee Ololaha Hub ka dhigista Nukliyeerka Kate Hudson ayaa dhaleeceysay Layliga Difaaca 2020: "Dhibaatada caafimaadka dadweynaha ee hadda jirta, waxay halis gelineysaa nolosha kaliya maahan ciidamada Mareykanka iyo dalal badan oo Yurub ah oo ka qayb qaadanaya laakiin dadka deggan waddamada ay ku sugan yihiin Dowladda Iran waxaa si aad ah u saameeyay fayrasku, iyadoo ku dhawaad labaatan xubnood oo baarlamaanka ah uu cudurka ku dhacay iyo sidoo kale shan iyo toban qof oo kale oo hadda ama hore u ahaa siyaasiyiin.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Falanqeeyaasha siyaasada ayaa saadaaliyay inay si xun u saamayn doonto fursada dib u doorashada Donald Trump 2020 ee doorashada madaxtinimada. Xiriirada diblomaasiyadeed ee ka dhaxeeya Japan iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa sii xumaaday cudurka caalamiga awgiis.
translated: Madaxweynaha Iran Hassan Rouhani ayaa warqad fagaare ah u qoray hogaamiyayaasha adduunka isagoo ka codsanaya caawimaad 14-kii Maarso 2020, isagoo sheegay in dalkiisa uu la halgamayo la dagaallanka cudurka dillaacay sababtuna tahay marin-u-helidda suuqyada caalamiga ah taasoo ka dhalatay cunaqabateynta Mareykanka ee ka dhanka ah Iran. ayaa soo dedejisay baaqyada loogu baaqayo Maraykanka in uu qaato siyaasadaha bulsheed ee ka dhexeeya wadamada kale ee hodanka ah, oo ay ku jiraan daryeelka caafimaadka caalamiga ah, daryeelka carruurta caalamiga ah, fasaxa qoyska ee mushaharka leh, iyo heerarka sare ee maalgelinta caafimaadka dadweynaha.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Kuuriyada Konfureed ayaa dhaleecaysay "dadaalada karantiilka een cadayn ee socda" kadib markay Japan shaacisay in qof kasta oo ka imaanaya Kuuriyada Koonfureed la gelin doono labo todobaad oo karantiil ah goobo dawladu ay u qorshaysay.
translated: Falanqeeyayaasha siyaasadeed ayaa saadaaliyay inay si xun u saameyn karto fursadaha Donald Trump ee dib-u-doorashada doorashada madaxtinimada ee 2020. Xidhiidhka diblomaasiyadeed ee u dhexeeya Japan iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa ka sii daray cudurka faafa.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Bulshada Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa horaan kukala qaybsanaa falcelinta uu madaxweyne Moon Jae-in uu ka sameeyay musiibada.
translated: Kuuriyada Woqooyi waxay dhalleecaysay "dadaallada karantiil ee mugdiga leh ee aan qarsoonayn" ka dib markii Japan ay ku dhawaaqday in qof kasta oo ka imanaya Kuuriyada Koonfureed la dhigi doono laba toddobaad karantiil goobaha ay dawladdu u qoondaysay.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Ree Kuuriya badan ayaa saxiixay codsi ay ku dhawaaqayaan in xilka laga qaado Moon sababo la xiriira wax ay ku sheegeen la tacaal xumada dawlada dilaacitaanka, mise in la amaano falcelintiisa. Cudurka caalamiga ah ayaa u ogolaaday dalalka inay mariyaan shuruuc degdegga oo looga jawaabayo.
translated: Bulshada Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa markii hore ku milmay jawaabta madaxweyne Moon Jae-in ee xiisadda.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Falanqeeyaasha qaar ayaa muujiyay walaac ah inay u ogolaan doonto dawladaha inay xoojiyaan haysashadooda awooda.
translated: Kuuriyo badan ayaa saxeexay codsiyo midkoodna ku baaqaya in xilka laga qaado Moon sababo la xidhiidha waxa ay ku andacoonayaan inay dawladdu si xun u maaraysay cudurka dillaacay, ama ay ammaanayaan jawaabtiisa.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Hungary, baarlamaankeeda ayaa codeeyay si ay ugu ogolaadaan raysal wasaraha, Viktor Orban, inuu shuruuc soo rogo kala sooc la'aan, uu joojiyo baarlamaanka iyo sidoo kale dooroshooyinka uuna ciqaabo kuwa loo arko inay faafinayeen macluumaad been abuur ah oo ku saabsan fayruuska iyo sida dawladu ula tacaalayso musiibada.
translated: Falanqeeyayaasha qaar ayaa walaac ka muujiyay in ay u ogolaan karto dowladaha inay xoojiyaan awoodooda.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Dilaacista fayraska corona ayaa waxaa lagu eedeeyay xaalado dhawr ah gabaab sahayda, taas oo ay sababtay kororka isticmaalka agabka si loola dagaalamo dilaaca, iibsashada cabsida daraadeed, iyo dhibaatada warshada iyo hawlaha sahay gaynta.
translated: Hungary, baarlamaankeedu wuxuu u codeeyay inuu u oggolaado ra'iisul wasaaraha, Viktor Orbán, inuu ku xukumo amar aan xad lahayn, laalo baarlamaanka iyo sidoo kale doorashooyinka lana ciqaabo kuwa loo arko inay faafiyeen macluumaad been ah oo ku saabsan fayraska iyo sida ay dowladdu wax uga qabato dhibaatada.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Maamulka Cuntada iyo Daawada ee Maraykanka ayaa soo saartay digniin ku saabsan gababaasiga daawooyinka iyo agabka caafimaadka sababtoo kororka baahida isticmaalaha iyo dibaatada kuwa sahayda bixiya.
translated: Faafitaanka coronavirus waxaa lagu eedeeyay dhowr xaaladood oo sahayda gabaabsi ah, taasoo ka dhalatay isticmaalka qalabka adduunka oo kordhay si loola dagaallamo cudurrada dillaacay, gadashada argagaxa, iyo carqaladeynta warshadaha iyo saadka.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Gooba dhawr ayaa sidoo kale marqaati kacay iibsashada cabsi dareed taas oo sababtay dhamaynta dukaamada tafaariiqda sida cuntada, waraaqaha musqusha, iyo biyaha caagadaha kujira, taas oo keentay gabaabiska sahayda.
translated: Maamulka Cunnada iyo Dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ayaa soo saaray digniino ku saabsan yaraanta dawooyinka iyo qalabka caafimaadka taas oo ay sabab u tahay korodhka baahida macaamiisha iyo carqaladaynta alaab-qeybiyaha.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Warshadaha tiknoolajiyada ayaa si gaar ah looga digayay daahinta soo safrinta badeecada elektoroniga ah.
translated: Dhawr degaan ayaa sidoo kale goob joog ka ahaa iibsashada argagaxa taasoo keentay in khaanadaha laga nadiifiyo waxyaabaha lagama maarmaanka u ah cuntada sida cuntada, warqadaha musqusha, iyo biyaha caagadaha ah, taasoo keentay saadka gabaabsi.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Sida laga soo xigtay agaasimaha-guud ee Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka Tedros Adhanom, baahida loo qabo agabka is ilaalinta shaqsi ahaaneed ayaa kor ugu kacay 100-oo laba jibaar ah.
translated: Warshadaha tignoolajiyada gaar ahaan waxay ka digayeen dib u dhigista shixnadaha elektiroonigga ah.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Baahidan waxay sababtay ko u kaca qiimaaha ee labaatan jibaar marka loo eego qiimaha caadiga ah taas oo sidoo kale sababtay daahinta sahayda caafimaad afar ilaa lix isbuuc.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay agaasimaha guud ee WHO Tedros Adhanom, baahida qalabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa kor u kacday 100 laab.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Waxay sababtay sidoo kale sababtay gabaabsiga agabka isku ilaalinta shaksi ahaaneed aduunka oo dhan, iyadoo Hay'ada Caafimaadka Aduunka ay soo saartay digniin ah in midan ay khatar galin doonto shaqaalaha caafimaadka.
translated: Dalabkan ayaa keenay in qiimaha caadiga ah uu kordho ilaa labaatan jeer, waxa kale oo ay keentay dib u dhac ku yimi agabka caafimaadka muddo afar ilaa lix bilood ah.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Gudaha  Australia, cudurka caalimaga wuxuu siiyay fursad cusub halka dukaanada iibinta wakiileed ay ka iibiyaan Shiinaha alaabta Australia.
translated: Waxay sidoo kale sababtay yaraanta qalabka ilaalinta shaqsiyeed ee adduunka oo dhan, iyadoo WHO ay ka digayso in tani ay khatar gelin doonto shaqaalaha caafimaadka.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Hawsha sababtay gabaabsiga caanaha caruurta ee dukaamada waaweyn qaarkood taas oo mar danbe dawlada Australia mamnuucday. Kasokow ku baahsanaanta kiiska COVID-19 Waqooyiga Talyaaniga iyo gobolka Wuhan, iyo baahida sare ee wax agabka cuntada, labadaba goobaha ka badbaadaday gabaabsiga cunte ee ba'an.
translated: Australia gudaheeda, masiibadani waxay fursad cusub siisay dukaamada daigou si ay ugu iibiyaan alaabada Australia Shiinaha.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Talaabooyinka ay Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga qaadeen ee la dagaalanka xayaysiinta iyo ganacsiga sharci darada ah ee alaabada halista aha ayaa ah mid guulaysatay, ayagoo ka fogaanaya gabaabsiga cuntada ee ba'an taas oo laga filay Yurub iyo sidoo kale Maraykanka Waqooyi.
translated: Hawsha ayaa ka abuurtay gabaabsi caanaha caanaha carruurta ee dukaamada waaweyn ka dibna waxaa mamnuucday dowladda Australia.In kasta oo kiisaska COVID-19 ay aad ugu bateen Waqooyiga Talyaaniga iyo gobolka Wuhan, iyo baahida sare ee cuntada, labada aagba waxay leeyihiin. laga badbaadiyay cunto yari aad u daran.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Waqooyiga Talyaaniga oo leh wax soo saarka beeraha oo weyn ayaan lagu arkin wax isdhimitaan ah oo weyn, balse qiimaha ayaa kordhi kara marka loo eego wakiilada warshadaha.
translated: Tallaabooyinka Shiinaha iyo Talyaanigu ee ka dhanka ah kaydinta iyo ganacsiga sharci darrada ah ee badeecadaha muhiimka ah ayaa lagu guuleystay, iyaga oo ka fogaanaya cunto yari ba'an oo laga filayey Yurub iyo sidoo kale Waqooyiga Ameerika.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Khaanadaha cuntada oo madhan ayaa lala kulmay si ku meelgaar ah, xataa gudaha magaalada Wuhan, halka dawlada Shiinaha ay si rasmi ah u siidaysay kaydadka doofaarka si loo hubiyo nafaqa siinta bulshada.
translated: Waqooyiga Talyaaniga oo leh wax soo saarkeeda beeraha ee muhiimka ah ma arag hoos u dhac weyn, laakiin qiimaha ayaa laga yaabaa inuu kordho marka loo eego wakiilada warshadaha.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Shuruuc la mid ayaa ka jira Talyaaniga oo ah u baahnaansha wax soo saar cunto ah si loo kaydiyo  oo loogu dabaro xaaladah dagdaga ah oo kale.
translated: Shelefyada cuntada ee faaruqa ah ayaa kaliya si ku meel gaar ah loola kulmay, xitaa magaalada Wuhan, halka saraakiisha dowladda Shiinaha ay sii daayeen kaydka hilibka doofaarka si loo xaqiijiyo nafaqo ku filan oo dadka ah.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Dhaawaca dhaqaale ee aduun weynaha ayaa laga dareemay Shiinaha: sida laga soo xigtay warbixinta warbaahinta16 Maarso, dhaqaalaha Shiinaha ayaa ah mid si weyn loo saameeyay labadii bilood ee ugu horeysay 2020 sababtoo ah talaabooyinka ay qaaday dawladu si ay u joojiso faafitaanka fayraska, wax iibsiga tafaariiqeed ayaa hoos u dhacay 20.5%.
translated: Sharciyo la mid ah ayaa ka jira Talyaaniga oo u baahan in soo saarayaasha cuntada ay kaydiyaan xaaladaha degdegga ah.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Maadaama mainland Shiinaha ay tahay xariun weyn oo dhaqaale iyo wax soo saar, dilaacida fayraska ayaa la arkay in uu keenay cabsi weyn oo khalkhal galinaysa dhaqaalaha aduunka.
translated: Burbur ku yimid dhaqaalaha adduunka ayaa laga dareemay Shiinaha: sida lagu sheegay warbixin warbaahintu soo saartay 16-kii Maarso, dhaqaalaha Shiinaha aad ayuu u saameeyay labadii bilood ee ugu horreeyay 2020 sababtoo ah tillaabooyinka ay dowladdu qaaday si loo xakameeyo faafitaanka viruska, iyo tafaariiqda. Iibka ayaa hoos u dhacay 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Agathe Demaris oo ka tirsan Taxliiliyayaasha Dhaqaale ayaa saadaaliyay in ay suuqyada kacsanaan doonaan ilaa muuqaal cad uu soo baxo ee natiijoyin waxtar ah.
translated: Maaddaama dhul weynaha Shiinaha uu yahay xudunta dhaqaalaha iyo wax soo saarka, faafitaanka fayraska ayaa la arkay inuu khatar weyn u keenayo dhaqaalaha adduunka.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Bartamihii Janaayo 2020, taxliiliyayaasha qaar ayaa ku qiyaasay dib usoo kabsashada dhaqaale ee cudurka saf-mareenka ah in koriinta aduunka oo dhan uu dhaafi dooni midii 2002-2004 ee dilaacii SARS.
translated: Agathe Demarais oo ka tirsan waaxda sirdoonka dhaqaalaha ayaa saadaaliyay in suuqyadu ay ahaan doonaan kuwo aan deganayn ilaa sawir cad uu ka soo baxo natiijooyinka suurtagalka ah.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Hal qiyaas oo u bixiyay khabiir ka tirsan Jaamacada Washingto ee St. Louis ayaa  bixiyay $300+ bilyan oo saamayn ah silsilada sahayda ee addunka oo dhan taas oo ssi socon karta ilaa labo sano.
translated: Bishii Janaayo 2020, falanqeeyayaasha qaar ayaa qiyaasay in hoos u dhaca dhaqaalaha ee faafitaanka cudurka ee kobaca caalamiga ah uu dhaafi karo kii dillaacay SARS 2002-2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Ururka Wadamada Dhoofiya Batroolka(OPEC) ayaa sida lasoo sheegayo "wareeray" kadib hoos u dhac wayn oo ku yimid qiimayaasha saliida oo ay sababtay baahi yari ka timid Shiinaha.
translated: Hal qiyaas oo ka soo baxay khabiir ka tirsan jaamacadda Washington ee St. Louis waxay siisay $300+ bilyan oo saamayn ah silsiladda sahayda adduunka oo socon karta ilaa laba sano.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Suuqayada badeecada ee calaamka ayaa hoos u dhacay 24 Febraayo sababtoo ah kor u kaca sare ee tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee dibada mainland Shiinaha.
translated: Ururka wadamada Dhoofinta Shidaalka (OPEC) ayaa lagu soo waramayaa in ay "la carareen" ka dib markii uu hoos u dhac weyn ku yimid qiimaha saliida sababo la xiriira dalabaadka Shiinaha oo hooseeya.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: 27dii Febraayo, walaaca soo kordhayaa ee laga qabo dilaacitaanka fayraska  corona, tusmooyinka saamiyada badeecada oo ay ka mid yihiin NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 index, iyo the Dow Jones Industrial Average ayaa qoraal ay qoreen ku sheegay hoos u dhacoodi ugu hooseeyay ilaa 2008, halka the Dow ay hoos ugu dhacday 1,191 dhibcood, kaas oo ah hoos u dhacii ugu weyn ee hal maalin ah ilaa qalalaasihii dhaqaale ee 2007-08.
translated: Suuqyada saamiyada adduunka ayaa hoos u dhacay 24-kii Febraayo sababtuna tahay koror weyn oo ku yimid tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee ka baxsan dhul weynaha Shiinaha.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Dhamaan saddexda tusmooyin saamiyaga badeecada ayaa isbuucan ku dhamaaday hoos u dhac ka weyn 10%.
translated: 27kii Febraayo, welwelka sii kordhaya ee ku saabsan dillaaca coronavirus dartiis, tusmooyinka saamiyada kala duwan ee Mareykanka oo ay ku jiraan NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, iyo celceliska warshadaha Dow Jones ayaa dhajiyay hoos u dhacooda ugu sarreeya tan iyo 2008, iyadoo Dow uu hoos u dhacay 1,191 dhibcood, kan ugu weyn. hoos u dhac hal maalin ah tan iyo xiisaddii dhaqaale ee 2007-08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Ilaa 28 Febraayo, shirkada qiimaynta ee SCope Ratings GmbH ayaa xaqiijisay in qiimaynta madaxa banaan ee khatarta maalgashiga Shiinaha, balse waxay joogtay aragti aan fiicnayn.
translated: Dhammaan saddexda tilmaamood waxay ku dhammaatay toddobaadka hoos u dhac ka badan 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Dhicitaanka badeecooyinka ee markale ee ku salaysan cabsida fayraska corona, hoos u dhaca ugu weyn wuxuu ahaa 16kii Maarso.
translated: 28kii Febraayo, Baaxadda Qiimaynta GmbH waxay xaqiijisay qiimeynta deynta madax-bannaanida ee Shiinaha, laakiin waxay sii waday Aragti xun.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u arka suurta galnimada hoos u dhac dhaqaale.
translated: Kaydka ayaa mar kale hoos u dhacay iyadoo lagu saleynayo cabsida coronavirus, dhicitaankii ugu weynaa wuxuu ahaa 16-kii Maarso.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Daqaalyahan Mohamed El-Erian ayaa mahadiyay talaabooyinka dagdag ah ee bankiga dhexe iyo kan gobolka.
translated: Qaar badan ayaa u arka hoos u dhac dhaqaale in ay suurtagal tahay.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Bankiyada dhexe ayaa si dhaqsa ah uga falcelinaya marka loo eego dhibaatada dhaqaale ee dhacday 2008.
translated: Dhaqaaleyahan Mohamed El-Erian ayaa amaanay bangiyada dhexe iyo dawlad goboleedyada talaabooyinka degdega ah ee wakhtiga ku haboon.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Dalxiiska ayaa ah midka sida ugu xun loo saameeyay sababtoo ah xayiraadaha socodaaleed, xiritaanada goobaha dad weynaha oo ay kamid tahay soo jiidashooyinka socotada, iyo digniinta dawlada ee ka dhanka u safrida meel kasta oo aduunka ah.
translated: Bangiyada dhexe ayaa si ka dhaqso badan uga falcelinaya shilkii dhaqaale ee 2008.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Natiijo ahaan, tiro badan oo ah shirkada diyaaradaha ayaa baajiyay duulimaadyadoodi sababtoo ah hoos u dhaca dalabka oo kamid yihiin shirkada duulimaadka ee British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, iyo Qantas, halka shirkada diyaarada goboleed ee Ingirisska ee Flybe ay buburtay.
translated: Dalxiiska waa mid ka mid ah waaxyaha ugu daran ee ay dhibaatadu saameysey sababtoo ah mamnuucista safarka, xiritaanka goobaha dadweynaha oo ay ku jiraan meelaha safarka, iyo talada dawladaha ee ka dhanka ah safar kasta oo adduunka ah.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Saamaynta ay ku leedahay shirkada safareed ee doonta ayaa ah heer aan horey waligeed loo arag.
translated: Natiijo ahaan, shirkado badan oo diyaaradeed ayaa baajiyay duullimaadyadii sababo la xiriira baahida hoose, oo ay ku jiraan British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, iyo Qantas, halka diyaarada gobolka ee Ingiriiska ee Flybe ay burburtay.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Boostaajooyinka tareeno dhawr ah iyo doomaha  dakadda ayaa sidoo kale la xiray.
translated: Saamaynta ay ku leedahay warshadaha khadadka dalxiiska waxay ahayd heer aan horay loo arag.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
