translated: Ku-dhaqidda saabuunta cad waxay keentaa in ka badan saddex laab heerka cudurka caabuqa bakteeriyada ee loo gudbiyo cuntada marka la barbar dhigo ku dhaqidda saabuunta bakteeriyada in khamriga gacan-ku- xoqista ay hoos u dhigtay wasakhowga bakteeriyada 26% in ka badan saabuunta bakteeriyada.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: Laakiin saabuunta iyo biyaha ayaa ka waxtar badan alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo yaraynta H1N1 hargabka A fayruska ah iyo Clostridium hoos u dhiciisa gacmaha. Wax ka qabadka nadaafada gacmaha ee bahdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaad waxa ku jiri kara barista shaqaalaha gacmo maydhiga, kordhinta helitaanka alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo, iyo qoraalka iyo hadalka xasuusinta shaqaalaha.
translated: Laakiin saabuunta iyo biyaha ayaa ka waxtar badan kuwa gacmaha lagu dhaqo khamriga si loo yareeyo fayraska H1N1 hargabka A iyo Clostridium difficile kudka gacmaha gacan ku xoqid, iyo xusuusin qoraal iyo hadal ah oo shaqaalaha ah.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: Waxaa loo baahan yahay daraasad dheeraad ah oo lagu sameeyo kuwan ka ugu haboon habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka ee kala duwan.
translated: Waxaa jirta baahi loo qabo cilmi-baaris dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan waxqabadyadan kuwa ugu waxtarka badan goobaha daryeelka caafimaadka ee kala duwan.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: Dalalka soo koraya, gacmo ku maydhashada saabuunta ayaa loo yaqaan inay tahay ka ugu jaban, oo ah shay daruuri ah oo lagu gaadho caafimaad wanaagsan, iyo xataa nafaqada wanaagsan.
translated: Waddamada soo koraya, gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunta waxaa loo aqoonsan yahay inay tahay wax-ku-ool ah, qalab lagama maarmaan u ah helitaanka caafimaad wanaagsan, iyo xitaa nafaqo wanaagsan.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: Laakiin, maadaama oo ay ku yar yihiin biyuhu, saabuun iyo ama xarumaha farxalku ee guryaha dadka, dugsiyada iyo goobaha shaqada waxaa ku adag in laga dhabeeyo habdhaqanka farxalka ee caalamiga ah.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, la'aanta biyo la isku halayn karo, saabuun ama tas-hiilaad gacmaha lagu dhaqo ee guryaha dadka, dugsiyada iyo goobta shaqada ayaa ka dhigaysa caqabad si loo gaaro habdhaqanka gacmo-dhaqashada caalamiga ah.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, badanaa miyiga Afrika waxaa ku yar tuubooyinka lagu farxalanayo ee gaar loo leeyahay ama suuliyaasha shacabka ku garab yaala way yar yihiin, in kasta oo ay tahay ikhtiyaarka ugu jaban ee jira in la dhiso meelo lagu farxasho.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, badi miyiga Afrika qasabadaha gacmaha lagu dhaqo ee u dhow musqul kasta oo gaar ah ama mid guud ayaa ku yar, in kasta oo ay jiraan fursado jaban oo lagu dhisayo saldhigyada gacmaha lagu dhaqo.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: Laakiin, farxal yaraantu waa habdhaqan laga dhaxlay saabuun iyo biyo la'aanta ka jirta.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, heerka dhaqidda gacmaha oo hooseeya waxay sidoo kale noqon kartaa natiijada caadooyinka la kobciyay halkii ay sabab u tahay saabuun ama biyo la'aan.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: Wacyi gelinta iyo u ololeynta farxadka iyada oo saabuun la isticmaalayo waxa ay saamayn kartaa go'aamada xeerka, waxa ay abuuri kartaa wacyi gelin ku saabsan faa'dada farxalka oo waxa ay keeni kartaa is badal habdhaqanka ah oo mudada dheer ah oo shacabka ah.
translated: Horumarinta iyo u doodista gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunta waxay saameyn ku yeelan kartaa go'aamada siyaasadda, kor u qaadida wacyiga ku saabsan faa'iidooyinka gacmo-dhaqashada waxayna horseedi kartaa isbeddel dabeecadeed oo mustaqbalka fog ah ee dadweynaha.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: Si tan si wax ku ool ah loo gaadho, waxaa loo baahan yahay kormeer iyo qiimayn.
translated: Si ay tani si hufan ugu shaqeyso, la socodka iyo qiimayntu waa lagama maarmaan.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: Qiimayn lagu sameeyay 70 daraasadood ayaa lagu ogaaday in qaababka bulshada ku salaysan uu wax ku ool yahay kordhinta farxalka ee LMICs, halka ololaha ka dhaadhicinta bulshadu aanu waxtar badan lahayn. Hal tusaale oo wacyi gelinta farxalka ah ee dugsiyadu waa "Qaabka Sadexda Xidigood" ee UNICEF kaas oo ay ku dhiiri gelinayso dugsiyada inay qaadaan talaabooyin fudud, talaabooyin aan qaali ahayn si loo xaqiijiyo in ardaydu ay ku farxashaan saabuun, iyo sidoo kale shuruudo kale oo nadaafada ah.
translated: Dib-u-eegis nidaamsan oo lagu sameeyay 70 daraasadood ayaa lagu ogaaday in hababka bulshada ku salaysan ay waxtar u leeyihiin kordhinta gacma-dhaqista ee LMICs, halka ololayaasha suuq-geynta bulshada ay yihiin kuwo aan waxtar lahayn.Hal tusaale u ah horumarinta gacmo-dhaqidda dugsiyada waa "Saddexda Xiddig ee Hababka" ee UNICEF oo ku dhiirigelisa dugsiyada qaado talaabooyin fudud oo jaban si aad u hubiso in ardaydu gacmahooda ku dhaqaan saabuun, iyo shuruudaha kale ee nadaafadda.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: Marka heerka ugu yar la gaadho, dugsidu waxa ay meesha ka saarayaa sadexda xidigood ee ugu sareeya.
translated: Marka heerarka ugu hooseeya la gaaro, dugsiyadu waxay ka gudbi karaan hal ilaa ugu dambeyntii seddex xiddigood.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: Samaynta meelo lagu farxasho waxa ay qayb ka noqon karaan ololaha wacyi gelinta farxalka ee la qaadayo si loo yareeyo xanuunada iyo dhimashada ilmaha.
translated: Dhisidda xarumaha gacma-dhaqidda waxay qayb ka noqon kartaa ololeyaasha dhiirrigelinta gacmo-dhaqashada ee la sameeyo si loo yareeyo cudurrada iyo dhimashada carruurta.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Farxalka waxaa weeye tusaale kale oo lagu samaynayo wacyi gelin taas oo lagu doonayo in lagu badalo habdhaqanka. Safmarka coronavirus 2019-20 dartiis, UNICEF waxa ay wadaa olole lagula qabsanayo farxalka.
translated: Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Gacmo-dhaqidda waa tusaale kale oo olole wacyigelin ah oo isku dayaya in lagu gaaro isbeddelka dabeecadda. Natiijada cudurka faafa ee coronavirus 2019-20, UNICEF waxa ay dhiirrigelisay qaadashada emoji-gacmo-dhaqidda.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa lagu eegey qaab jaban oo farxalka dalalka soo koraya  looga sameeyo oo la xidhiidha DALYs dabelkeeda.
translated: Daraasado yar ayaa tixgeliyey waxtarka guud ee qiimaha gacmo-dhaqashada ee dalalka soo koraya ee xiriirka la leh DALY-yada.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: Si kastaba ha noqotee, hal mid oo kamid ah kuwa lagu taliyay ee dhiirrigelinta gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunku ay aad uga qiimo badan tahay waxtarka ka badan waxqabadyada kale ee biyaha iyo fayadhowrka.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, hal dib u eegis ayaa soo jeedinaysa in kor u qaadida gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunta ay aad uga kharash badan tahay waxqabadyada kale ee biyaha iyo fayadhowrka.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: Muhiimiyada uu farxalku u leeyahay caafimaadka bila aadamka – gaar ahaan dadka ku jira xaalada nugul sida hooyada iminka dhashay ama askarta dhaawactay ee ku jira isbitaalada – ayaa markii ugu horeesay la aqoonsaday bartamihii qarnigii 19-aad oo waxaa aqoonsaday laba hogaamiye oo nadaafada gacmaha ah: Dhakhtarka Hangari u dhashay ee Ignaz Semmelweis oo ka shaqayn jiray Vienna, Awstariya iyo Florence Nightingale, oo Ingiriis ahaan "aas aasihii kaaliyaha caafimaadka casriga ah".
translated: Muhiimadda ay gacan-dhaqashada u leedahay caafimaadka bini'aadamka - gaar ahaan dadka ku jira duruufaha nugul sida hooyooyinka hadda ku dhashay ama ku dhaawacmay askarta isbitaallada - ayaa markii ugu horreysay la aqoonsaday bartamihii qarnigii 19-aad laba hormood oo nadaafadda gacmaha ah: dhakhtarka Hungarian Ignaz Semmelweis oo shaqeeyay. Vienna, Austria iyo Florence Nightingale, Ingiriisi "aasaasaha kalkaalinta casriga ah".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: Waqtigaas badanaa dadku waxa ay aaminsanayaayeen in caabuqa uu keeno urta loo yaqaan miasmas.
translated: Wakhtigaas dadka intiisa badani waxay weli rumaysnaayeen in caabuqa uu keeno ur xun oo loo yaqaan miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: 1980yaadkii, caabuq ka dhashay cuntada iyo daryeelka caafimaadka caabuq la xidhiidha ayaa keeney in Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka inay si firfircoon u bilawdo wacyi gelinta nadaafada gacmaha taas oo markaa ah qaab muhiim ah oo lagaga hortago faafitaanka caabuqa.
translated: Sannadihii 1980-aadkii, cudurrada dillaaca cuntada iyo cudurrada la xidhiidha daryeelka caafimaadku waxay u horseedeen Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ee Maraykanka inay si firfircoon u dhiirrigeliyaan nadaafadda gacmaha oo ah hab muhiim ah oo looga hortago faafitaanka caabuqa.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: Safmarkii hargabkii swine ee 2009-kii iyo safmarka COVID-19 ee 2020-ga ayaa kordhiyay wacyi gelinta dalal badan oo ah muhiimiyada ku faraxalashada sabuunta si markaa la iskaga ilaaliyo xanuunada.
translated: Faafitaanka ifilada doofaarka ee 2009 iyo faafitaanka COVID-19 ee 2020 ayaa horseeday wacyiga kordhay ee waddamo badan muhiimadda ay leedahay in gacmaha lagu dhaqo saabuun si qofku isaga ilaaliyo cudurrada faafa.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, waraaqo ku saabsan "farsamada saxda ah ee farxalka" ayaa lagu soo dhajiyay farxalka agtiisa meelaha suuliyada dadka ka dhaxeeya iyo suuliyada dhismayaasha xafiisyada iyo madaarada Jermalka.
translated: Tusaale ahaan, boodhadh ay ku qoran yihiin "farsamo gacmo-dhaqid oo sax ah" ayaa lagu soo dhejiyay meel u dhow saxanka gacmaha lagu dhaqo ee musqulaha dadweynaha iyo musqulaha dhismayaasha xafiisyada iyo garoomada diyaaradaha ee Jarmalka.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: Kalmada "dhaq mid gacamihiis" ee wax, waxay ka timid in uu qof diido masuuliyad kor u ridashada wax ama wadaagista kaas.
translated: Weedha “gacmaha oo la dhaqo” shay, macneheedu waxa weeye in qofku sheego rabitaan la’aantiisa in uu qaado masuuliyadda shay ama la wadaago dhibka ku jira.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: Waxa ay ka timid baybalka weedha ku taal ee Matthew taas oo Pontius Pilate uu iska maydhay gacmahiisa wixii go'aan ah ee lagu dilayay Ciise Misiixi, laakiin waxa uu noqday kalmad balaadhan oo si wayn loo isticmaalo bulshooyinka qaar Ingiriiska.
translated: Waxay ka timid tuducda Baybalka ee Matayos halkaas oo Bontiyos Bilaatos uu gacmihiisa ku maydhay go'aankii Ciise Masiix iskutallaabta lagu qodbay, laakiin wuxuu noqday weedh si weyn looga isticmaalo bulshooyinka Ingiriisiga qaarkood.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: Shakespeare Macbeth, Lady Macbeth waxa ay bilawday inay si qasab ah gacmaheeda u dhaqdo si iskuday ah si ay u nadiifiso wasakhda mala awaalka ah,iyada oo matalaysa damiirkeedii dambiga ahaa ee ku saabsan dambiyada ay gashay isla markaana ay ninkeeda u horseeday inuu sameeyo.
translated: Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth waxay bilawday inay si qasab ah u dhaqdo gacmaheeda iyada oo isku dayaysa in ay nadiifiso wasakhda la malaynayo, iyada oo u taagan damiirkeeda dambiga ah ee ku saabsan dembiyada ay samaysay oo ninkeeda ku kalliftay inuu sameeyo.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: Waxaa sidoo kale la ogaaday in dadka, kadib marka ay xasuustaan ama ay sameeyaan ficil damiirka u daran, inay badanaa maydhaan gacmaha si kasii badan intii hore, oo waxa ay isku dayaan inay qiimeeyaan agabka lagu farxasho intii hore wax ka badan.
translated: Waxa kale oo la ogaaday in dadku, ka dib marka ay dib u soo celiyaan ama ay ka fekeraan falalka anshax-darrada ah, waxay u badan yihiin inay dhaqdaan gacmaha si ka badan kuwa kale, oo ay aad u qiimeeyaan qalabka gacmaha lagu dhaqo.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: Intaa waxaa sii dheer, kuwa loo oggol yahay inay gacmahooda dhaqaan ka dib markii laga fiirsado sidaas oo kale uma badna inay ku lug yeeshaan falal kale oo "nadiifin" ah, ficilkaasi, sida ikhtiyaarka.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, kuwa loo oggol yahay inay gacmahooda dhaqdaan ka dib fekerka noocaas ah waxay u badan tahay inay ku lug yeeshaan ficillada magdhowga "nadiifinta" kale, sida tabarucnimada.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: Diimaha ayaa qeexa falxalka iyo nadaafada hab ku dayasho leh. Calaamada farxalka, iyada oo la isticmaalayao biyo aan saabuun lahayn si loogu farxalo waxaa kamid ah farxalka ku jira diimo badan, oo ay kamid yihiin Baha'i Diinta ah, Hinduusimka, tevilah iyo netilah yadayim ee Judaidm-ka, Lavabo ee Kiristanka iyo Wudhu ee Islaamka. Diimaha ayaa sidoo kale u qora farxalka, gaar ahaan ficilada qaar la sameeyo.
translated: Diintu waxay faraysaa gacmo-dhaqidda labada ujeeddooyin nadaafadeed iyo mid calaamad ah labadaba. Gacmo-dhaqashada calaamadda ah, isticmaalka biyaha, isticmaalka saabuun aan lahayn gacmaha lagu dhaqo, waa qayb ka mid ah gacmo-dhaqidda caadada ah ee ka muuqda diimaha badan, oo ay ku jiraan Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah iyo netilat yadayim ee diinta Yuhuudda. , Lavabo in Christianity, iyo Wudhu in Islam. Diimaha ayaa sidoo kale amraya in gacmaha la nadiifiyo, gaar ahaan ka dib falalka qaarkood.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Hinduism, Judaism, iyo Islaamka ayaa waajibiya in la faraxasho marka suuliga laga soo baxo.
translated: Hinduism-ka, Yuhuuda iyo Islaamku waxay farayaan in gacmaha la dhaqo ka dib marka la isticmaalo musqusha.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Iyo, Hinduuga, Buddhsm, Sikhim, Yahuudda iyo Islaamka ayaa waajibiya faraxalka kahor iyo cuntada.
translated: Iyo, Hinduism-ka, Buddhism-ka, Sikhism-ka, Yuhuuda iyo Islaamku waxa ay amrayaan in gacmaha la dhaqo ka hor iyo ka dib cunto kasta.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Xakmaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19 waxaa weeye barnaamijyo lagu dabaqayo amaanka shaqada iyo qaabka caafimaadka ee loo xakamaynayo waxyeelo si looga hortago xanuunka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Qaabka saxda ah ee xakamaynta khatarta goobta shaqadu waxay ku xidhan tahay goobta shaqada iyo shaqooyinka, waxay ku xidhan tahay qiimaynta khatarta ee isha meesha uu qofka kasoo gaadhi karo, inta uu le'eg yahay xanuunku bulshada dhaxdeeda, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqaalaha shakhsiyaadka ah kuwaas oo u nugul inay qaadaan COVID-19.
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19 waa adeegsiga badbaadada shaqada iyo hababka caafimaadka ee xakamaynta khatarta si looga hortago cudurka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Amaanka Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), marka uu yaraado khatarta inuu dadka soo gadho isaga oo shaqada ku jira waxay yaraynaysaa in shaqada lagu kala qaado shacabka iyo daka wada shaqaynayaayi, taas oo loo baahan yahay talaabooyin aas aasiga ah oo lagaga hortagayo faafitaanka caabuqa, oo ay ku jiraan gacmo maydhis, ku dhiiri gelin shaqaalaha inay gurigooda joogaan hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah, oo ay si joogto ah nadaafada ugu dadaalaan oo ay jeermiska ka dilaan goobta shaqada.
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta saxda ah ee goobta shaqadu waxay ku xidhan tahay goobta shaqada iyo hawsha shaqada, iyadoo lagu salaynayo qiimaynta halista ilaha soo-gaadhista, darnaanta cudurka ee bulshada, iyo arrimaha halista ah ee shaqaalaha gaarka ah ee u nugul qandaraaska COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Khatarta waxoogaaga ah ee shaqada waxaa kamid ah dadka looga baahan yahay inay dadka aan la garaynin ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 inay macaamilaan ama u dhawaada, laakiin ay dhici karta inuu ka qaaday caabuqa bulshaamada inta uu u socdaalay dibada.
translated: Marka loo eego Maamulka Badbaadada Shaqada iyo Caafimaadka ee Mareykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta ah ee soo-gaadhista hoose waxay leeyihiin xiriir shaqo oo yar oo ay la yeeshaan dadweynaha iyo dadka kale ee la shaqeeya, kuwaas oo lagu taliyey tillaabooyinka aasaasiga ah ee ka hortagga caabuqa, oo ay ku jiraan gacmo-dhaqashada, dhiirigelinta shaqaalaha inay guriga joogaan haddii ay jiran yihiin. , anshaxa neefsashada, iyo ilaalinta nadiifinta joogtada ah iyo jeermiska deegaanka shaqada.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Kuwaas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha ay isasoo gaadheen shacabka guud sida dugsiyada, deegaanada shaqo ee dadku ku badan yihiin, iyo tukaamada dadka badan.
translated: Shaqooyinka khatarta ah ee soo-gaadhista dhexdhexaadka ah waxaa ka mid ah kuwa u baahan xiriir joogto ah ama xiriir dhow oo lala yeesho dadka aan la garanayn ama looga shakisan yahay inay qabaan COVID-19, laakiin laga yaabo inay qaadaan cudurka faafinta bulshada ee socda ama socdaalka caalamiga ah.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Iska ilaalinta khatarta ee kooxdan, sidoo kale talaabooyinka kahortaga caabuqa ee aas aasiga ah, oo ay ku jiraan mishiinada neefsiga ee isticmaala hawo nadiifiyaha aadka u tayo sareeya, wax ka ilaaliya hindhisada dadka kale, iyo in la helo agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ee la heli karo hadii qofka ay isasoo gaadhaan cid qabta COVID-19.
translated: Tan waxaa ka mid ah shaqaalaha xiriirka la leh dadweynaha guud sida dugsiyada, goobaha shaqada ee dadku ku badan yahay, iyo goobo tafaariiqeed oo sarreeya.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: OSHA waxay eegeysaa daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha waayeelka ah ee ay isasoo gaadheen cid aan la garanaynin ama dadka looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 waxaa loo arkaa inay tahay khatar sare, taas oo kordhinaysa khatarta hadii shaqaalaha uu qabto nidaam guud, ama uruurin ama ka shaqayn muunada ah, oo loo yaqaan ama looga shakiyo qofka inuu qabo COVID-19.
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta ah ee kooxdan, marka lagu daro tallaabooyinka aasaasiga ah ee ka hortagga caabuqa, waxaa ka mid ah hawo la isticmaalayo shaandhooyin hawo oo tayo sare leh, ilaaliyayaasha hindhisada, iyo in la helo qalab ilaalin shakhsi ah haddii qof COVID-19 qabo la kulmo.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: Xakamaynta waxyeelada ee shaqaalahaas oo ay ku jiraan xakamaynta farsao ee qolka hawo nadiifiya ee cadaadiska negetifka, iyo agabka ilaalida shakhsi ahaaneed ee munaasabka ah ee shaqada.
translated: OSHA waxay u tixgelisaa daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha maydka ee la soo bandhigay qofka la yaqaan ama looga shakisan yahay inuu qabo COVID-19 inay halis sare ugu jiraan soo-gaadhista, taas oo kordhisa khatarta soo-gaadhista aadka u sarreysa haddii shaqaaluhu ay ku sameeyaan hababka hawada-soo-saarka, ama ay ka soo ururiyaan ama qabtaan muunadaha, qof la yaqaan ama la tuhunsan yahay. oo leh COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Faafitaanka COVID-19 waxa uu ku yeelan karaa saamayn xun goobta shaqada.
translated: Xakamaynta khatarta ah ee ku haboon shaqaalahan waxaa ka mid ah kontaroolada injineernimada sida qolalka hawo-mareenka cadaadiska xun, iyo qalabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ee ku haboon shaqada shaqada.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Shaqaalaha waxaa dhici karta inayna ka maqnaanin goobta shaqada xanuun darteed, ay macquul tahay in loo baahdo inay daryeelaan mid kale, ama baqi inuu asiibi karo ah.
translated: Faafida COVID-19 waxay ku yeelan kartaa dhowr saameyn gudaha goobta shaqada.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Qaababka ganacsiga ayaa is badali kara, taas oo ah alaabta loo baahan yahay, iyo qaabka loo heleyo alaabaadkan (sida in la iibsado saacada aan saxmada ahayn ama in guriga la iskugu keeno ama iyada oo gaadhiga lagu jiro in la iibsado).
translated: Shaqaaluhu waxaa laga yaabaa inay shaqada uga maqnaadaan jirro darteed, u baahan daryeel dadka kale, ama cabsi ay ka qabaan soo-gaadhista.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Ugu danbayntii, alaabaadka ka yimaada meelaha uu aadka ugu habsaday COVID-19 waxaa dhici kara in khalkhal uu soo galo. Qorshaha u diyaar garawga iyo ka jawaabida xanuunka caabuqa ah ayaa loo adeegsan karaa si uu kuugu hago talaabooyinka is ilaalinta inuu ina hago..
translated: Qaababka ganacsigu wuu is beddeli karaa, marka loo eego badeecadaha la rabo, iyo siyaabaha lagu heli karo alaabtan (sida wax iibsiga saacadaha ugu sarreeya ama adeegga la keeno ama la sii wado).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: Qorshayaasha lagaag jawaabayo khatarta la xidhiidha goobaha shaqada ee kala duwan iyo shaqooyinka, oo ay ku jiraan meelaha laga qaadayo, xaalada khatarta ee ka imanaysa guriga iyo bulshada, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqada shakhsi ahaaneed sida da'da wayn ama mushkilada caafimaadka mudada dheer.
translated: Ugu dambayntii, shixnadaha alaabta ka imanaya meelaha juqraafiyeed ee uu sida ba'an u saameeyay COVID-19 waa la joojin karaa. Diyaarinta cudurrada faafa iyo qorshaha jawaabta ayaa loo isticmaali karaa in lagu hago tallaabooyinka ilaalinta.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Waxa ay sidoo kale sheegaan daruuriyaadka lagaga jawaabayo khatarahaas, iyo qorshaha lagu baxsanayo hadii xaalad ka timaado safmarkan.
translated: Qorshayaashu waxay wax ka qabtaan heerarka khatarta ah ee la xidhiidha goobaha shaqo ee kala duwan iyo hawlaha shaqada, oo ay ku jiraan ilaha soo-gaadhista, arrimaha khatarta ah ee ka yimaada guriga iyo goobaha bulshada, iyo arrimaha khatarta ah ee shaqaalaha gaarka ah sida da'da ama xaaladaha caafimaad ee daba-dheeraada.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Qorshayaasha u diyaar garawga iyo jawaabta xanuunada caabuqa waxa dhici karta inay ka waajibaan ama ay badalaan talooyinka.
translated: Waxay sidoo kale qeexaan kontaroolada lagama maarmaanka ah si wax looga qabto khatarahaas, iyo qorshayaasha kadiska ah ee xaaladaha ka dhalan kara dillaaca.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Jawaabta wax ku oolka ah ee faafitaanka xanuunka waxaa kamid ah yaraynta isku gudbitna ee shaqaalaha, ilaalinta dadka ku jira khatarta ugu badan ee inuu saamayn caafimaad daro xun ku yeesho, in la wado shaqada ganacsi, iyo in la yareeyo saaayta xun ee shirkada kale ee wax laga iibsado.
translated: U diyaargarowga cudurada faafa iyo qorshooyinka wax ka qabashada waxa laga yaabaa inay hoos yimaadaan talooyinka heer qaran ama heer qaran.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Adkaanshaha xanuunka ee bulshada uu ganacsigu uu ku yaalo waxa uu saamaynayaa jawaabta la qaadayo.
translated: Ujeedooyinka looga jawaabayo faafitaanka waxaa ka mid ah dhimista gudbinta shaqaalaha, ilaalinta dadka khatarta sare ugu jira dhibaatooyinka caafimaad darro, ilaalinta hawlaha ganacsiga, iyo yaraynta saamaynta xun ee qaybaha kale ee silsiladahooda sahayda.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: Sida ay u kala sareeyaan xakamaynta waxyeelada waxa nidaam shaqo u tahay isticmaalka balaadhan ee amaanka iyo caafimaadka shaqada ee xakamaynta khatarta kooxeed si wax ku ool ah.
translated: Xanuunka darran ee bulshada uu meheradku ku yaalo wuxuu saameeyaa jawaabaha la qaatay.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Halka aan la xadidi karin waxyeelada COVID-19, qaabka ugu wax oolsan ee loo xakamayn karaa waa in la sameeyo xakamayn, uu daba socdo xakamaynta maamulka, iyo ugu danbayntii agabka ilaalada shakhsi ahaaneed.
translated: Kala sareynta xakamaynta khatarta waa qaab si weyn loogu isticmaalo badqabka shaqada iyo caafimaadka si loo xakameeyo khatarta kooxeed ee waxtarka leh.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Samaynta xakamaynta waxaa kamid ah in shaqaalaha laga xidho khatarta waxyeelo ee shaqada iyada oo aan la isku halaynaynin habdhaqanka shaqaalaha, waxaana uu noqon karaa qaabka ugu kharashka yar ee xal ah ee la dhaqan gelin karo.
translated: Halka khatarta COVID-19 aan la baabi'in karin, kontaroolada ugu waxtarka badan waa kontaroolada injineernimada, oo ay ku xigto kontaroolada maamulka, iyo ugu dambeyntii qalabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Xakamaynta maamulku waxaa weeye is badal nidaamka ama xeerka ah kaas oo uga baahan shaqalaaha ama cida loo shaqeeyo inay talaabo qaado.
translated: Kantaroolka injineernimada waxa ku lug leh ka soocida shaqaalaha khataraha shaqada la xidhiidha iyada oo aan lagu tiirsanayn hab-dhaqanka shaqaalaha, oo waxa ay noqon kartaa xalka ugu qaalisan ee la hirgeliyo.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) waxaa loo arkaa inay ka waxtar yar yihiin samaynta iyo dhaqan gelinta xakamaynta, laakiin waxay kahortagi karaan caabuqyada qaar.
translated: Koontaroolada maamulku waa isbedelada siyaasada shaqada ama habraacyada u baahan ficilka shaqaalaha ama loo shaqeeyaha.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Nooc kasta oo PPE ah waa in lagu doortaa khatarta shaqaalaha, inay si wanaagsan ugu galaan oo ay munaasab yihiin (sida, neefsiga), in si joogto ah oo munaasab ah loo xidho, si joogto ah loo baadho, hagaajiyo, oo loo badalo, oo si haboon la iskaga saaro, nadiifiyo, oo loo kaydiyo ama tuuro si markaa looga hortago in caabuq ay keenaan.
translated: Qalabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) waxaa loo arkaa inuu ka waxtar yar yahay injineerinka iyo kontaroolada maamulka, laakiin wuxuu kaa caawin karaa kahortagga soo-gaadhista qaar.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayaan Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Badbaadada Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta yar waxay ay yihiin isasoo gaadh dadka oo yar iyo dadka wada shaqaynayaayi.
translated: Dhammaan noocyada PPE waa in lagu doortaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo khatarta shaqaalaha, si habboon loogu rakibay sida lagu dabaqi karo (tusaale, qalabka neefsashada), si joogto ah oo habboon loo xidho, si joogto ah loo baadho, loo dayactiro, loona beddelo, haddii loo baahdo, oo si habboon loo saaro, loo nadiifiyo, loona kaydiyo ama la tuuro si looga fogaado wasakheynta.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Talaabooyinka kahortaga xanuunka ee aas aasiga ah ee lagula taliyo dhamaan goobaha shaqada waxaa kamid ah in si joogto ah oo wanaagsan  loo maydho gacmaha, in shaqaalaha lagu dhiiri geliyo inay joogaan guriga hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah oo ay ku jirto inay afka iyo sanka qabsadaan hadii ay qufacaan oo ay hindhisaan, in la siiyo kilinigis iyo salada qashinka, loo diyaariyo inay meel kale kasoo shaqayn karaan ama in shaqada la isku habeeyo wakhtiyada lasoo galayo hadii loo baahdo, in laga wacyi shaqaalaha inay wada isticmaalaan agab iyo qalab, iyoinay si joogto ah u nadiifiyaan iyo jeermiska uga dilaan goobta shaqada.
translated: Marka loo eego Maamulka Badbaadada iyo Caafimaadka Shaqada ee Mareykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta ah ee soo-gaadhista hoose waxay leeyihiin xiriir shaqo oo yar oo ay la yeeshaan dadweynaha iyo kuwa kale ee la shaqeeya.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: In markaba la soo saaro oo meel lay aysoleet gareeyo shakhsiga laga yaabo inuu keeno caabuq taas oo ah talaabo muhiim ah oo markaa lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha, macaamiisha, booqdayaasha, iyo dadka kale ee goobta shaqada jooga.
translated: Tallaabooyinka aasaasiga ah ee ka-hortagga caabuqa ee lagu taliyay dhammaan goobaha shaqada waxaa ka mid ah gacmo-dhaqid joogto ah oo dhammaystiran, ku dhiirri-gelinta shaqaalaha inay guriga joogaan haddii ay jiran yihiin, hab-dhaqanka neefsashada oo ay ku jiraan daboolidda qufaca iyo hindhisada, bixinta unugyo iyo weelasha qashinka, u diyaargarowga isgaadhsiinta ama isbeddelada isbeddelka ah haddii loo baahdo, dhiirigelinta shaqaalaha Isticmaalka qalabka iyo qalabka kuwa kale, iyo ilaalinta nadiifinta joogtada ah iyo jeermi-dilista deegaanka shaqada.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Maraykanka (CDC) waxay ku talinaysaa in shaqaalaha qaba calaamada xanuunka daran ee neefsiga inay joogaan gurigooda ilaa inta ay ka baaba'ayso xumadu, raadka xumadu, iyo calaamado kale ugu yaraan 24 saacadood iyaga oo aan isticmaalin dawooyinka yareeya ama wax ka badala xumaha, iyo inay leeyihiin xeer fasaxa xanuunka oo dabacsan, kaas oo u ogolaanaya shaqaalaha inay joogaan gurigooda oo ay daryeelaan cidii xubinta qoyska ah ee xanuunsanaysa, iyo in shaqaalaha ay ka warqabaan xeerarkan.
translated: Aqoonsiga degdega ah iyo go'doominta shakhsiyaadka suurtagalka ah ee faafin kara waa tallaabo muhiim ah oo lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha, macaamiisha, booqdayaasha, iyo kuwa kale ee goobta shaqada.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayso OSHA, shaqooyinka leh khatarta yar waxaa kamid ah kuwa dadku si joogto ah isasu gaadhaan ama macaamilka la isku jirsanayo wax ka yar lix fuudh (1.8 m) dadka aan la garanaynin ama looga shakiyo inay yihiin bukaan COVID-19, laakiin ay dhici karto inay qabaan SARS-CoV-2 maadaama oo uu yahay xanuun ku faafa oo ka jira aaga ganacsigu ku yaalo, maadaama oo shakhsi u socdaalay meel kale oo kamid ah meelaha looga shakiyay COVID-19 baahintiisa.
translated: Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ee Maraykanka (CDC) waxay ku talinaysaa in shaqaalaha leh calaamadaha xanuunka neef-mareenka ee degdega ah ay guriga joogaan ilaa ay ka xoroobaan qandho, calaamadaha qandho, iyo calaamad kasta oo kale ugu yaraan 24 saacadood iyada oo aan la isticmaalin. xummadda-yaraysa ama daawooyinka kale ee calaamadaha wax ka beddela, iyo siyaasadaha fasaxa jirku waa dabacsanaan, u oggolow shaqaalaha inay guriga joogaan si ay u daryeelaan xubin qoyska ka mid ah, iyo in shaqaaluhu ay ka warqabaan xeerarkan.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Kuwas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha tagay meelaha shacabka sida dugsiyada, meelaha shaqada ee aadka u saxmada badan, iyo meelaha ay dadku ku badan yihiin ee tukaamada. Samaynta xakamayntu tan iyo kooxaha khatarta badan ku jira waxaa kamid ah in la sameeyo hawo nadiifiye tayo sareeya, la kordhiyo xadiga hawo nadiifinta, samayn wax u dhaxeeya sida caag la iska dhax arkayo oo qabta hindhisada, iyo lala sameeyo daaqad qofka gaadhigiisa isaga oo ku jira loogu adeego. Kamaynta maamulka ee tan iyo kooxda khatarta badan ku jirta waxaa kamid ah in lagu dhiiri geliyo shaqaalaha xanuunsanaya inay gurigooda joogaan, ay ku badalaan kulanka foolk-foolka ah maqal iyo muuqaal, in la habeeyo wakhtigan shaqada, in la joojiyo wixii socdaal ah ee aan daruuriga ah ee meelaha uu ka jiro COVID-19, in la sameeyo qorshe xidhiidh xaalada degdeg ah oo ay ku jirto in laga wada hadlo shaqaalaha walaacaalooda, in la siiyo shaqaalaha macluumaadkii ugu danbeeyay iyo in lagu tabo baro xaaladaha khatarta COVID-19 iyo habdhaqanka ilaalinta, lagu tobobaro shaqaalaha cida ay tahay inay isticmaasho dharka ilaalada iyo qalabka sida loo isticmaalo, in la siiyo khayraad iyo deegaan shqo oo markaa horseedaysa nadaafada shakhsi ahaaneed, in lagu khasbo gacmo maydhiga joogtada ah, xadidaada macaamiisha iyo dadka soo gali kara goobta shaqada, iyo in lasoo dhigo calaamado gacmo nadiifin ah iyo talaabooyinka lagaga hortago COVID-19. Taas oo ku xidhan shaqada, shaqaalaha ay yartahay inuu soo gaadho waxaa dhigi kara inay u baahan karaan inay xidhaan agabka ilaalinsha shakhsi ahaaneed oo ay ku jiraan isku darta golofis, dirayska, waji gashad, ama wajiga inay xidhaan, ama muraadayo.
translated: Marka loo eego OSHA, shaqooyinka khatarta ah ee soo-gaadhista dhexdhexaadka ah waxaa ka mid ah kuwa u baahan xiriir joogto ah ama xiriir dhow oo lix fiit (1.8m) u jira dadka aan la garanayn ama looga shakisan yahay bukaannada COVID-19, laakiin laga yaabo inay qaadaan SARS-CoV-2 bulshada socota awgeed. gudbinta agagaarka goobta ganacsiga, ama sababtoo ah shakhsigu wuxuu dhawaan safar caalami ah ku tagay goob faafitaanka baahsan ee COVID-19.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Shaqaalaha ku jira kooxdan khatarta kujirta badanaa ma isticmaalaan neefsiga.
translated: Kuwaas waxaa ka mid ah shaqaale xiriir la leh dadweynaha guud sida dugsiyada, goobaha shaqada ee dadku-cufnaanta, iyo qaar ka mid ah goobaha tafaariiqda sare. Kontoroolka injineernimada ee tan iyo kooxaha khatarta sare leh waxaa ka mid ah rakibidda filtarrada hawada sare ee waxtarka leh, kordhinta heerarka hawo-mareenka. , Ku rakibidda caqabadaha jireed sida ilaalinta hindhisada caaga ah ee cad, iyo rakibidda daaqada wadista ee adeegga macaamiisha. Koontaroolada maamulka ee tan iyo kooxaha khatarta sare leh waxaa ka mid ah dhiirigelinta shaqaalaha jirran inay joogaan guriga, beddelka shirarka fool ka foolka ah ee isgaarsiinta casriga ah, samaynta isbedelada isdaba jooga ah, joojinta safarka aan muhiimka ahayn ee lagu aado meelaha ay ka jiraan faafitaanka COVID-19, samaynta qorshayaasha isgaadhsiinta degdega ah oo ay ku jiraan gole lagaga jawaabayo welwelka shaqaalaha, siinta shaqaalaha waxbarasho iyo tababar casri ah oo ku saabsan khatarta COVID-19 iyo dabeecadaha ilaalinta, in la tababaro shaqaalaha u baahan ilaalinta dharka iyo qalabka sida loo isticmaalo, bixinta agab iyo jawi shaqo oo kor u qaada nadaafadda shakhsi ahaaneed, u baahan gacmo-dhaqid joogto ah, xaddidida macaamiisha iyo dadweynaha ee goobta shaqada, iyo dhajinta calaamadaha ku saabsan gacmo-dhaqashada iyo kuwa kale. Tallaabooyinka ilaalinta COVID-19. Iyada oo ku xidhan hawsha shaqada, shaqaalaha leh ugu yaraan khatarta soo-gaadhista dhexdhexaadka ah waxay u baahan karaan inay xidhaan qalab ilaalin shakhsi ah oo ay ku jiraan qaar isku-dar ah galoofyada, goonnada, gaashaanka wejiga ama waji-xidhka, ama muraayadaha.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Hadii uu qofku xanuunsado isaga oo diyaarad saaran, qaabka saxda ah ee xakamaynta ee shaqaalaha iyo dadka kale ee rakaabka ah loo ilalain karo waxaa kamid ah in qofka dadka kale laga dhax saaro oo markaa loo jirsiiso 6 fuudh, in hal qof lagu qoro qofka aadka u xanuunsaday, iyo in lasiiyo waji gashad qofka xanuunsanaya ama laga dalbado qofka xanuunsayaa inuu afka iyo sanka xidho oo uu saarto kilinikis marka uu qufacayo ama hindhisayo.
translated: Shaqaalaha ku jira kooxdan khatarta ah marar dhif ah ayay u baahan yihiin isticmaalka qalabka neefsashada.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Shaqaalaha diyaaradu waxa ay xidhanayaan golofiska caafimaadka ee marka kaliya la isticmaalo marka ay u adeegayaan qof xanuunsanaya oo rakaab ah ama ay dheecaadn taabanayaan ama meelo ay dhici karto inuu jeermisku ku fadhiyo,  iyo agab ilaalo shakhsi ahaaneed oo dheeraad ah hadii qofka xanuunsaya ee rakaabka ahi uu qabo xumad, si joogto ah u qudacayo, ama uu neefsigu ku adkaado.
translated: Haddii qofku uu ku buko diyaaradda, kontaroolada saxda ah ee lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha iyo rakaabka kale waxaa ka mid ah in qofka buka laga sooco dadka kale masaafo dhan 6 cagood, in loo qoondeeyo hal xubin oo ka mid ah shaqaalaha diyaaradda si uu ugu adeego qofka jirran, iyo in qofka buka la siiyo maaskaro weji ah. ama weydiiso qofka buka in uu afkiisa iyo sankiisa ku daboolo unugyo marka uu qufacayo ama hindhisayo.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Golofiska iyo shayada kale ee marka kaliya la isticmaal waa in lagu ridaa bacda qashinka kiimikada, oo meelaha la taataabtay ee wasakhda ahna waa in la nadiifiyaa oo jeermiska laga dilaa. Wixii maraakiibka ganacsi ah, oo ay ku jiraan maraakiibta dalxiiska iyo maraakiibta kale ee rakaanka, waxyaabaha lagaga hortagi karo khatarta waxaa kamid ah in dib loo dhigo socdaalka qofka xanuunsayo, in qofku uu meel isku xidho, iyo in loo fidiyo qofka daryeel caafimaad markaba hadii uu qofku leeyahay xumad ama xanuuno kale inta uu saaran yahay.
translated: Shaqaalaha qolka waa in ay xidhaan galoofyada caafimaadka ee la tuuri karo marka ay u damqanayaan socotada buka ama taabanayaan dareeraha jidhka ama sagxadaha suurtagalka ah ee wasakhaysan, iyo suurtogalnimada qalab dheeraad ah oo ilaalin shakhsi ah haddii socotada buka uu leeyahay qandho, qufac joogto ah, ama neefsashada oo ku adag.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Caadiyan, waa in caafimaad ahaan lala socdaa qofka qolkiisa ku shax xidhan. Dugsiyada iyo xarumaha daryeelka caruurta, CDC waxay ku talinaynaa in mudo yar la xidho si loo nadiifiyo ama jeermiska looga dilo hadii qof qaba caabuqu uu yimid dugsiga iyada oo aan la eegeynin inuu gaadhsiiyay bulshada iyo in kale.
translated: Gacan-gashiyada iyo alaabta kale ee la tuuri karo waa in lagu dhex tuuraa bac biohazard ah, oo meelaha wasakhaysan waa in la nadiifiyaa oo la jeermi ka dib markab ganacsi. rugta caafimaadka ee dusha sare isla markaaba haddii mid ay qandho ama calaamado kale ka soo baxdo marka uu diyaaradda saaran yahay.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Marka uu jiro caabuq dhexe ama daran oo bulshada ah, khidada kala fogaanshaha dadka ayaa la dhaqan gelinayaa sida in la joojiyo safarada waxbarasho, isku imaatinada, iyo inay si kale dad badan iskugu yimaadaan sida waxbarashada la wada joogo ama fasalada farshaxanka ama cuntooyinka maqaaxida, in la kordhiyo masaafada u dhaxaysa miisaska, in la isku habeeyo wakhtiga imaatinka iyo wakhtiga la baxayo, xadidaada booqashooyinka aan loo baahnayn, iyo isticmaalka xafiis gaar ah oo caafimaad oo meel kale ku yaal wixii caruur ah ee lah calaamado sida hargabka oo kale ah.
translated: Sida habboon, dabagalka caafimaadku waa inuu ka dhacaa qolka qofka go'doonsan. Dugsiyada iyo xarumaha daryeelka carruurta, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in muddo gaaban la xidho si loo nadiifiyo ama loo jeermiyo haddii qof cudurka qaba uu ku jiro dhismaha dugsiga iyada oo aan loo eegin faafitaanka bulshada.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Marka uu jiro caabuq aad u baahdan oo bulshada deegaanka ah, marka laga tago khidada kala fogaanshaha dadka, inla balaadhiyo xidhitaanka dugsiga ayaa la isla eegayaa. Ciidamada bilayska ee qabanada shaqada maalintii, waxa ay CDC u aragtaa in khatartooda caafimaadku uu yar yahay.
translated: Marka ay jirto isu gudbinta bulshada ee ugu yar ama dhexdhexaadka ah, xeeladaha fogeynta bulshada waa la hirgelin karaa sida joojinta safarada dibadda, shirarka, iyo shirarka kale ee waaweyn sida jimicsiga jimicsiga ama fasalada heesaha ama cuntada makhaayadaha, kordhinta booska u dhexeeya miisaska, imaatinka naxdinta leh iyo cayrinta. waqtiyo, xaddidaya booqdayaasha aan muhiimka ahayn, iyo isticmaalka meel xafiis caafimaad oo gaar ah carruurta leh calaamadaha hargabka.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Saraakiisha bilayska ee ay isasoo gaadhaan dadka lagu xaqiijiyay ama looga shakiyay inay qabaan COVID-19 waxaa lagula talinayaa inay raacaan isla tilmaamahaas ay raacayaan farsamo yaqaanada caafimaadka degdega ah, oo ay ku jiraan agabka ilaalinta shakhsi aahaneed.
translated: Marka ay jirto faafin la taaban karo oo ka dhex jirta bulshada deegaanka, marka lagu daro xeeladaha jahawareerka bulshada, cayrinta dugsiga ee la dheereeyay ayaa la tixgalin karaa

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Hadii ay isasoo gaadhaan marka uu qabanayo qofka, shaqaaluhu waa inuu nadiifiyaa oo uu jeermiska ka dilaa suunkooda shaqada iyo agabka kahor inta aanu dib ugu isticmaalay iyada oo adeegsanaya buufinta nadiifinta qoyska ama masaxaad, oo uu raaco nidaamka heerka shaqada ee caadiga ah ee wasakhda iyo tuurista PPE-ga la isticmaalay ee ay ku jiraan dharka wasakhda ah maydhistooda.
translated: Saraakiisha fulinta sharciga ee ay tahay inay la xiriiraan shaqsiyaadka la xaqiijiyay ama looga shakisan yahay inay qabaan COVID-19 waxaa lagula talinayaa inay raacaan tilmaamaha la mid ah sida farsamoyaqaannada caafimaadka degdegga ah, oo ay ku jiraan qalabka ilaalinta shaqsiyeed ee saxda ah.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: OSHA waxa ay u aragtaa in daryeelka caafimaadka qaar iyo dhimashada shaqalaaha inay aad u badan tahay ama ay tahay heerka khatarta sare ee qaadida.
translated: Haddii xiriir dhowi dhaco inta lagu jiro cabsida, shaqaaluhu waa inay nadiifiyaan oo ay jeermiska ka saaraan suunka iyo qalabka shaqada ka hor intaanay dib u isticmaalin buufinta nadiifinta guriga ama tirtirka, oo ay raacaan nidaamka hawlgalka caadiga ah ee xakamaynta iyo tuurista PPE ee la isticmaalay iyo ka koobnaanta iyo dhaqidda dharka.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: Shaqooyinka khatartooda in laga qaado ay sareyso waxaa kamid ah bixinta daryeelka caafimaadka, taageerada, shaybaadhka, iyo shaqaalaha gaadiidka caafimaadka kuwaas oo uu asiibay ama looga shakiyay inay qabaan COVID-19.
translated: OSHA waxay u tixgelisaa qaar ka mid ah daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha qolka meydka inay ku jiraan heerar sare ama mid aad u sarreeya ee khatarta soo-gaadhista.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Tani waxa ay noqotaa khatar badan hadii shaqaalaha qabana shaqada, ama ka shaqaynaya qaadida ama baadhita muunada, wixii looga shakiyo ama lagu og yahay ee ah bukaanka COVID-19.
translated: Shaqooyinka khatarta sare leh waxaa ka mid ah bixinta daryeelka caafimaadka, taageerada, shaybaadhka, iyo shaqaalaha gaadiidka caafimaadka ee la kulmay bukaannada COVID-19 ee la yaqaan ama la tuhunsan yahay.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Nidaamka shaqada ee guud waxaa kamid ah, sifada, qaabak uu u qufacayo, bronchoscopies, daawaynta daryeelka ilkaha qaar iyo shaybaadhka, ama muunada adag qaadideeda.
translated: Kuwani waxay noqonayaan khatar aad u sareysa oo soo-gaadhis ah haddii shaqaaluhu ay ku sameeyaan habab soo saara hawada hawada, ama ay ka soo ururiyaan ama ka qabtaan muunada bukaannada COVID-19 ee la yaqaan ama la tuhunsan yahay.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Shaqooyinka khatarta badan ee dhimashada ah waxa kamid ah shaqaalaha ka shaqeeya diyaarinta maydhka dadka la og yahay ama looga shakiyo COVID-19 wakhtigan ay dhimanayaan; kuwan ayaa leh khatar aad u badan hadii ay qaliin ku samaynayaan maydka. Xakamaynta farsamo ee dheeraadka ah ee kooxda khatarta ku jirta waxaa kamid ah qolka lagu soo xidho bukaanka la og yahay inuu qabo ama looga shakiyo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan shaqada guud ee markaa loo qabtay.
translated: Nidaamyada soo saarista hawada waxaa ka mid ah dhuujinta, hababka soo-gelinta qufaca, bronchoscopies, hababka ilkaha qaarkood iyo baaritaannada, ama ururinta muunad soo jiidasho leh.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Cadaadiska gaarka ah ee negetifka ah ee gaarka ah waxaa loo samayn karaa habdhismeedyada daryeelka caafimaadka iyo meelaha lagu aaso dadka.
translated: Shaqooyinka maydka ee khatarta sare leh waxaa ka mid ah shaqaalaha ku hawlan diyaarinta maydadka dadka la yiqiin ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 markii ay dhinteen; Kuwaani waxay noqonayaan khatar aad u sareysa oo ay la kulmaan haddii ay sameeyaan baaritaanka meydka. Kontoroolka injineernimada dheeriga ah ee kooxahan halista ah waxaa ka mid ah qolalka go'doominta ee bukaannada la yaqaan ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan marka hababka hawada-soo-saarka la sameeyo.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Muunada waa in lagaga sheeqeeyaa tacadirka Biosafety Heerka 3 aad ah.
translated: Hawo cadaadis xun oo gaar ah ayaa laga yaabaa inay ku habboon tahay daryeelka caafimaadka iyo goobaha meydka qaarkood.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) waxay ku talinaysaa i bukaanka lasoo dhigayo in loo saaro meel gaar ah oo lagu sugo taas oo ku xidhan hadii looga shakisan yahay COVID-19. Sidoo kale PPE-ga kale, OSHA waxay ku talinaysaa in neefsiga dadka ka shaqaynaya meel u jirta 6 fuush bukaanka la og yahay, ama looga shakiyo inuu qabo, ama qaaday SARS-CoV-2, iyo dadka u samaynaya daawaynta guud.
translated: Tijaabooyinka waa in lagu xalliyaa taxadarka Heerka Biosafety 3.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Maraykanka, NIOSH N95-ka ay ansixisay ee waji gashadka filterka leh ee neefsiga ah ama waa n loo isticmaalaa si wanaagsan, neefsiga qoraalka ah ee barnaamijka ilaalada oo ay ku jiraan tijaabinta inuu ku xidhmay, tobobar, iyo shaybaadhka caafimaad.
translated: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) wuxuu ku talinayaa in bukaannada imaanaya loo kala saaro meelo kala duwan oo sugitaanno ah iyadoo ku xiran haddii looga shakisan yahay kiis COVID-19. Marka lagu daro PPE kale, OSHA waxay ku talisaa qalabka neefsashada ee kuwa ka shaqeeya 6 cagood bukaannada loo yaqaan inay yihiin , ama looga shakisan yahay in uu qabo, uu qabo SARS-CoV-2, iyo kuwa fulinaya hababka hawada-soosaarka.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Noocyada kale ee neefsiga waxa ay bixin karaan ilaalo wayn iyo hormar raaxada shaqaalaha ah. WHO kuma taliso in wajiga oo dhan la duubo, maadaama oo COVID-19 uu yahay xanuun neefsi oo aanu ku gudbin dheecaanka jidhka.
translated: Dalka Maraykanka, NIOSH-ay ansixisay N95 shaandhaynta qalabka neefsiga ama ka sii wanaagsan waa in loo adeegsadaa macnaha guud, barnaamijka ilaalinta neefsashada oo qoran oo ay ku jiraan tijaabin taam ah, tababar, iyo baaritaanno caafimaad.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: WHO waxay kaliya ku talisaa in la xidho waji gashadka qaliinka shaqaalaha jooga meesha laga galayo shaybaadhka.
translated: Noocyada kale ee neef-qaadayaasha ayaa bixin kara ilaalin weyn waxayna wanaajin karaan raaxada shaqaalaha. WHO kuma talinayso daboolka daboolka, maadaama COVID-19 uu yahay cudur neef-mareenka ah halkii lagu kala qaadi lahaa dheecaannada jirka.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: Dadka qaadaya muunada neefsiga, daryeelaya, ama qaadaya bukaanka COVID-19 iyad aoo aanay jirin daawayn guud, WHO waxay ku talisaa in xidhaan waji gashadka qaliinka, golofis, ama wajiga duubtaan, dirays iyo golifis xidhaan.
translated: WHO waxay ku talisaa kaliya maaskaro qalliin oo loogu talagalay shaqaalaha baadhista barta-galka.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Hadii la samaynayo daawayn keeni karta caabuq, waji gashadka qaliinka ayaa lagu badlaayaa N95 ama FFP2 waji gashadka ah.
translated: Kuwa ka ururinaya muunada neefsashada, daryeelaya, ama ka qaadaya bukaannada COVID-19 iyaga oo aan lahayn habraac hawo-soo-saar ah, WHO waxay ku talisaa maaskaro qalliin, muraayado, ama gaashaan wejiga, goonnada, iyo galoofyada.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Maadaama oo helitaanka PPE uu yar yahay calaamka, WHO waxay ku talinaysaa in la yareeyo baahida loo qabo PPE taas oo ah in maqal iyo muuqaal dadka lagu daweeyo, wax loo dhaxaysiiyo sida daaqad nadiif ah, taas oo u sahlaysa dhamaan dadka ku lug leh daryeelka tooska ah ee gelitaanka qolka uu ku jiro bukaanka COVID-19, in la isticmaali kaliya PPE daruuriga ah shaqooyinka gaar, in lasii wado isticmaalka isla waji gashadkaas iyada oo aan la iska saarin inta dhawrka bukaan loo adeegayo oo isku xanuun qaba, in lala socdo oo la isku duba rido iibka PPE, iyo in dadka laga wacyi geliyo inay isticmaalaan waji gashadka dadka xanuunsanaya.
translated: Haddii habka soo saarista hawada hawada la sameeyo, maaskarada qalliinka waxaa lagu bedelayaa N95 ama FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: HALKA Maarso 4, 2020, waxaan bayaaiyay Xaaada Degdeg ah ee ka jirta California taas oo uu keeney khatarta COVID-19;
translated: Marka la eego in sahayda caalamiga ah ee PPE aysan ku filneyn, WHO waxay ku talineysaa in la yareeyo baahida PPE iyada oo loo marayo telemedicine, caqabadaha jireed sida daaqadaha cad, u oggolaanaya kaliya kuwa ku lug leh daryeelka tooska ah inay galaan qol leh bukaan COVID-19, iyadoo la adeegsanayo kaliya PPE lagama maarmaanka ah Hawsha gaarka ah, sii wadida isticmaalka isla neefsashada iyada oo aan la saarin iyada oo la daryeelayo bukaanno badan oo isku mid ah, la socodka iyo isku dubaridka silsiladda sahayda PPE, iyo dhiirigelinta isticmaalka maaskaro ee shakhsiyaadka asymptomatic.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: KU SOCOTA: Dhamaan shaqaalaha Hay'ada Wikimedia
translated: KA: Katherine Maher, Madaxa Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: KHADKA MAWDUUCA: [Covid-19] Bayaaminta culayska iyo u diyaar garawga mustaqbalka
translated: TO: Dhammaan shaqaalaha Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: TAARIIKHDA/SAACADA LA DIRAY: 14 Maarso, 2020, 00:24 UTC
translated: Xariiqda Mawduuca: [Covid-19] Fududeynta culeyska iyo u diyaarinta mustaqbalka

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: LIISANKA: CC0: Wax lambar ah lama sheegin
translated: SOO DIR TAARIIKHDA/WAKHTIGA: 14 Maarj, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: Waxa aanu isku aragnay xaalad adag bishan.
translated: SHAQADA: CC0: Wax xuquuq ah lama hayo

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Safmarka COVID-19 waxaa weeye shay cadeeyay isdhax galka bilaa aadanka caalamka iyo masuuliyada midba midka kale ka saaran.
translated: Bishan waxaan ku jirnaa duruufo cajiib ah.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Awood uma lihin joojinta faafitaanka xanuunkan, laakiin waanu garanaynaa qaabka la isku halayn karo ee lagaga jawaabayo garawsha , qada shaqaynta iyo bulshada caalamka dhisideeda taas oo markaa hawlbawle u ah hay'adan.
translated: Faafida COVID-19 waa wax caddaynaya isku xirnaanta aadanaha ee caalamiga ah iyo mas'uuliyadaha aan iska leenahay.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Tani waxay muujinaysaa dadaalka iyo danaynta aanu ku aragnay dhamaan shaqaalaheena ee iimeelka, wada hadalka iyo wada sheekeysiga taas oo si wayn u xaqiijinaysa cajiibnimada bilaa aadanka aanu nasiibka u helnay in aanu la shaqayno.
translated: Ma hayno wax horudhac u ah caqabadaha jira, laakiin waxaan ognahay in jawaabtayada ugu fiican ay ku tiirsan tahay nooca dareenka caalamiga ah, iskaashiga, iyo dhismaha bulshada ee ku fadhiya xudunta ururkan.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Waxa aan kaga faanayo ma jiro dhamaan inaan wada shaqayno.
translated: Saaxiibtinimada iyo daryeelka aan ku dhex aragnay dhammaan asxaabtayada xagga iimaylka, wicitaannada, iyo sheekeysiga waa ansixinta cajiibka ah ee bini'aadamka cajiibka ah ee aan nasiibka u yeelanno inaan la shaqeyno.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, qof ayaa soo dhigay mahadnaq shaqadeena ah.
translated: Maan aad ugu mahadcelin karin oo aan ku faano inaan dhammaantiin idinku tiriyo inaad tihiin saaxiibo.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Waxa ay i xasuusiyeen sida ay caalamka wax ku ool ugu tahay in wakhti xaadirkan ay galaan Wikipedia, iyo calaamada awooda badan ee ay u tahay isha macluumaadka muhiimka ah inay online ku jirto oo markaa ay heli karaan dhamaan.
translated: Toddobaadkii hore, qof ayaa ila wadaagay mahadnaq ay u hayaan shaqadayada.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Shaqadaada ayaa macquul ka dhigaysa, hadii websaytku uu sii jiro ama hadii shaqaalaheena lasiiyo mushahar ama amaanka bulshooyinka.
translated: Waxay i xasuusiyeen sida ay macne u tahay in dunidu ay awood u leedahay inay u rogto Wikipedia hadda, iyo waxa calaamad xoog leh ay u tahay agabkan muhiimka ah inuu ku sii jiro khadka oo la heli karo dhammaan.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Caalamku waxa uu u baahan yahay macluumaadka Wikipedia uu bixiyo, iminka wakhti kasta si kasii badan.
translated: Shaqadaadu waxay suurtogal ka dhigaysaa tan, haddii aad ilaaliso boggaga ama saaxiibadayada oo lacag ah ama bulshooyinkayada mid ammaan ah.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan oo kaliya aan ahayn waxa aanu qabanayno, laakiin sida aanu u qabanayno, ayaa saamayn wayn ku leh caalamka.
translated: Dunidu waxay u baahan tahay macluumaadka uu Wikipedia bixiyo, hadda in ka badan sidii hore.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Maadaama oo uu muhiim tahay shaqadani iyo kaalintaada, waxa aanu samayn doonaa hagaajin muhiim ah oo sida aanu u wada shaqayno ah, laga bilaabo todobaadkan.
translated: Tani waa daqiiqad aan kaliya ahayn waxa aan samayno, laakiin sida aan u samayno, waxay sameyn doontaa saameyn macno leh adduunka.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: In aanu habayno shaqooyinkeena iyo jadwalkeena.
translated: Muhiimadda ay leedahay howlgalkan iyo doorka aad ku leedahay awgeed, waxaan wax ka bedel weyn ku sameyn doonnaa sida aan u wada shaqeyno, laga bilaabo usbuucan soo socda.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Sida uu hore u sheegey Robyn, kooxda-c ayaa kulmay habeen hore si ay uga wada hadlaan qaabka iyo jadwalka maalmaha iyo bilaha soo socda.
translated: Waxka bedelka shaqadeena iyo jadwalkeena

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Wada sheekeysigaa, waxa aanu ku eegnay wixii aanu u aragno inay tahay jawaabta munaasabka ah ee waxa aanu wajahayno iyo qaabka ugu wanaagsan ee hay'ada loo sii wadi karo wakhtigan.
translated: Sida Robyn hore u sheegay, c-kooxdu waxay kulmeen xalay si ay uga wada hadlaan habkayaga iyo jadwalka maalmaha iyo bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Waxa aanu si balaadhan doonaynaa in meesha aanu uga saarno warwarka oo aanu taageerno shaqadeena mudada dheer.
translated: Wadahadalkaas, waxa aanu ku tixgalinay waxa aanu u malaynay in ay noqon doonaan jawaab ku haboon waxa ina soo food saara iyo habka ugu wanagsan ee lagu ilaalin karo ururka mid waara inta lagu jiro wakhtigan.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Hadii aad u baahato isku soo celin, waa caadi.
translated: Si xad dhaaf ah waxaan rabnay inaan ka saarno walbahaarka oo aan taageerno hadafkeena mustaqbalka fog.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Dhamaan shaqaalaheena, qansaraaslayaasheena, iyo shaqaalaha heshiiska lagula jiro:
translated: Haddii aad u baahan tahay inaad dib u wacdo, taasi waa caadi.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: waxa aanu maalintii shaqayn doonaa 4 saacadood, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa inta wargelin kale ay soo baxayso.
translated: Dhammaan shaqaalaha, qandaraaslayaasha, iyo shaqaalaha qandaraaska:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: Ma bayaaminayno fasax - hadii aad shaqayn karto saacadaha caadiga ah, oo shaqada laguu adeegsan karo.
translated: Rajadayada shaqo ee maalinlaha ah waxay ahaan doontaa qiyaastii 4 saacadood maalintii, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa ogeysiis kale.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Laakiin, caalamka lama saadaalin karo wakhti xaadirkan, oo hadii aad u baahan tahay inaad daryeesho qof qoyska ah, inaad soo iibsato cunto, ama aad qabato dhakhtarka, badqabkaaga ayaa mudnaantaada ah.
translated: Kuma dhawaaqayno fasax - haddii aad awoodid inaad shaqeyso saacado badan oo caadi ah, howlgalka ayaa ku isticmaali kara.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Lama soconayno wakhtigaaga.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, dunidu hadda lama saadaalin karo, iyo haddii aad u baahan tahay inaad daryeesho dadka aad jeceshahay, aad cunto ka hesho, ama aad dhakhtarka u tagto, wanaaggaagu waa mudnaantayada.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Hadii aad xanuunsanayso, ha shaqaynin.
translated: Ma raadineyno waqtigaaga.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Anaka oo carabaabayna, laakiin odhanayna.
translated: Haddii aad jiran tahay, ha shaqayn.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Looma baahna maalmod fasax xanuun ama PTO in la dalbado - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo kooxdaada ka caawi inay jadwalkooda habaystaan oo ay markaa u sameeyaan wakhti ay shaqooyinka muhiimka ah loo qabto.
translated: Tani waa inay noqotaa iyada oo aan la sheegin, laakiin waxaan leenahay.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: (Hadii lagaa talo COVID-19, fadlan u sheeg Bryan ee T&C Ops loo yaqaan T&C ayaa kaa caawin kara taageerada oo markaa xaqiijinaya in xaaladaada sida haboon laguu fiirsado si loo maamulo).
translated: Ma jiro maalmo jirro ama PTO loo baahan yahay - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo ka caawi kooxdaada inay dib u eegaan jadwalka iyo jadwalka si loo hubiyo in meelaha muhiimka ah ee shaqada la daboolay.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: Mushaharka saacadaha si buuxda ayaa loo bixin doonaa.
translated: (Haddii lagaa helo COVID-19, fadlan u sheeg Bryan gudaha T&C Ops si ay T&C uga caawiso taageerada oo ay hubiso in xaaladaadu ay ka hesho dareenka ku habboon maamulka).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Waxa aanu hore u nidhi, oo nagala go'an in aanu u hogaansano cida aan heshiiska kula jirto iyo saacadaha shaqaalaheena.
translated: Dadka saacadiiba si buuxda ayaa loo bixin doonaa.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Qof kasta waxa lagu siin doonaa mushaharka saacadiihii caadiga ahaa ee uu shaqayn jiray ee xaaladaha caadiga ah.
translated: Horay ayaanu u nidhi, waxaanan mar kale ballan qaadaynaa in aan ixtiraamno ballanqaadyadayada qandaraaslayaasha iyo shaqaalaha saacadaha shaqada.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Taas waxa kamid ah hadii aad xanuunsato oo aanad shaqayn karin.
translated: Qof kasta waxa lagu siin doonaa mushahar ku salaysan saacadaha shaqada ee uu shaqeeyay inta lagu jiro duruufaha caadiga ah.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Hadii aad doonayso inaad shaqayso, waanu ku caawin doonaa.
translated: Tan waxaa ku jira haddii aad jiran tahay oo aanad awoodin inaad shaqeyso.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u adeegsada shaqada qaab ay isku buuqa iskaga yareeyan ee caalamka ku xeeran.
translated: Haddii aad rabto inaad shaqeyso, waan ku taageersanahay.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Waxa bixinayaa abaal marin cajiib ah, gaar ahaan wakhtiga noocan oo kale ah.
translated: Dad badan ayaa shaqada u isticmaala si ay u gudbiyaan walaaca ay ku qabaan dunida inagu xeeran.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Mar kale ayaan ku celinayaa, tani waa daryeelka naftaada.
translated: Waxa aan samayno waxay noqon karaan kuwo si cajiib ah u faa'iido leh, gaar ahaan waqtiyadan oo kale.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Kaliya waxa aanu dalbaynaa waa inaad la xidhiidho maamulahaaga, si markaa aanu u ogaan kartno waxa aanu filan karno oo markaa u habayn karno shaqada.
translated: Mar labaad, tani waxay ku saabsan tahay is-daryeelkaaga.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Shaqooyinka qaar ayaa loo arkaa inay daruuri yihiin.
translated: Weydiintayadu waa inaad la xidhiidho maamulahaaga, si aanu u ogaano waxa aanu filan karno oo aanu ula qabsan karno si waafaqsan.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaynu sii wado qabashadooda.
translated: Shaqada qaar ayaa loo arkaa inay muhiim tahay.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Kalsoonida & Amaanka, iyo Dhaqaale uruurinta kooxda (iyo waxyeebo kale) ayaa ah shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee markaa u baahan taageerada dheeraadka ah.
translated: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaan sii wadno samaynta.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Waxa aanu bilaabi doonaa nidaamka dhamaan waaxaha si markaa aanu u heli karno ujeedooyinka wakhtigan oo markaa diirada u saari karno taageerada shaqooyinkeena daruuriga ah.
translated: SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Badbaadada, iyo kooxaha lacag ururinta (oo ay ku jiraan) waxay qabtaan shaqo muhiim ah oo u baahan karta taageero dheeraad ah.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Waxaa jira wax badan oo nooloo qaban karo, waxa aanu kaliya diirada saari doonaa mashaariicda daruuriga ah.
translated: Waxaan la bilaabi doonaa nidaam dhammaan waaxyaha si aan u qiimeyno ujeedooyinka hadda oo aan u bedelno diiraddayada si aan u taageerno waxa muhiimka u ah himiladeena.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: In iminka la yareeyaa waxyaalo hadhaw ah keeni mayso.
translated: Waxaa jira wax badan oo aan dhammaanteen u qabanno, dhammaanteen waxaan diiradda saari doonnaa mashaariicda ugu muhiimsan.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Ma qorshaynayno in "laba jeer la galo shaqada" marka uu xanuunka laga gudbo.
translated: Hadda oo gaabis ahi hadhow ma dhibayso.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Lagaagama fadhiyo in aan shaqayso wakhti dheeraad ah si aad wakhtiga shaqada ku eeg tahay aad ugu dhamayn karto taas oo aan wakhtigan macquul ahayn.
translated: Ma qorsheyneyno inaan aadno "laba jeer si aan ula qabsanno" mar alla markii uu cudurku dhaafo.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
