targetString: Waxa aanu aqbalnay in xaaladu ay isbadalshay, oo waxa aanu samayn doonaa bartilmaaeed csuub iyo wakhti munaasab ku ah.
translated: Lagaama filayo inaad shaqeyso saacado dheeraad ah si aad ula kulanto waqtiyada kama dambaysta ah kuwaas oo hadda aan macquul ahayn.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Maxaa ku dhacay APP (Qorshaynta Sanadkii)?
translated: Waxaan aqbalnay in duruufuhu is beddeleen, waxaanan ka shaqayn doonnaa dejinta bartilmaameedyo iyo waqtiyo cusub halka ay ku habboon tahay.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Si loo habeeyo waaqiciga cusub iyo shaqada maalintii ee saacadaha la filanayo, waxa aanu qorshaynaynaa in la habeeyo wakhtiga lagu bixinayo Qorshaha Sanadkii ee 2020-2021.
translated: Maxaa ku dhacaya APP (Qorshaynta Sannadlaha ah)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Waxa aanu doonaynaa in aanu soo jeedino kordhin qorshaha 2019-2020 si markaa wakhti loo siin karo miisaaniyada si shaqaalaha loogu ogolaado inay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqooyinka daruuriga ah, daryeelka nafta, iyo daryeelka qoyska inta lagu jiro qaabilaada dadka u baahan ama doonaya inay shaqeeyaan wakhti kayar intii hore dhawrka todobaad ee soo socda.
translated: Si aan ula qabno xaqiiqadeena cusub iyo rajada saacadaha shaqada ee maalinlaha ah, waxaan dooneynaa inaan hagaajino waqtiga loogu talagalay gaarsiinta Qorshe Sannadeedka 2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Waxa uu kordhinta wakhtigani aad u yaraynayaa culayska shaqada ee qorshaha wakhtigan iyo cadaadiska hay'ada oo dhan.
translated: Ujeedadayadu waa in aan soo jeedino kordhinta qorshaheena 2019-2020 taas oo u ogolaanaysa wakhti dheeraad ah miisaaniyada si loogu ogolaado shaqaalaha in ay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqada muhiimka ah, is-daryeelka, iyo daryeelka kuwa la jecel yahay iyada oo la waafajinayo kuwa u baahan ama raba inay ka shaqeeyaan jadwal la dhimay toddobaadyada soo socda.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Waxa aanu bari doonaa qorshaheena Gudida todobaadka soo socda oo waxa aanu cusboonaysiin doonaa wakaalada iyo kooxaha talaabooyinka xiga sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee aannu u xaqiijino.
translated: Kordhinta wakhtigan waxay si weyn u yaraynaysaa culayska shaqada ee qorshaynta hadda iyo cadaadiska ururka oo dhan.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP ee hogaanka arrintan.
translated: Waxaan u soo bandhigi doonaa soo jeedintayada Guddiga toddobaadka soo socda waxaana u cusbooneysiin doonaa wufuudda iyo kooxaha tillaabooyinka xiga isla marka aan helno xaqiijin.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Xaalada xafiiska, soo gaadhida iyo nadiifinta.
translated: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP sida aad hormuudka u tahay tan.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, waxa aanu ogaanay in mid kamid ah shaqaalaha SF ka shaqeeyaa ay dhici karta inuu asiibay fayruska COVID-19.
translated: Xaaladda xafiiska, soo-gaadhista, iyo nadiifinta

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Laakiin, iyada oo laga xatadirayo, waxa aanu shaqaalaysiinay koox jeermiska ka disha xafiiska San Francisco o dhan.
translated: Toddobaadkii hore, waxaan ogaanay in mid ka mid ah asxaabteena fadhigeedu yahay SF laga yaabo inuu la kulmay fayraska COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Ka faa'idaysiga dawada jeermiska disha ee loogu talo geley isbitaalakada si jeermiska looga dilo meelaha la taataabto, iyo sidoo kale qaybta soo dhawaynta iyo wiisha lagu tago dabaqyada.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, taxadar badan awgeed, waxaanu shaqaalaysiinay shaqaalaha nadiifinta fayraska si ay jeermiska uga dilaan dhammaan sagxadaha xafiiska San Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Dhismaha waxa uu leeyahay nidaam daryeelka ah oo markaa looga faa'idaysan karo taageerada amaanka ee dadka kiraystayaasha ah.
translated: Waxay ka faa'iidaysteen xal ka-hortagga fayraska heerka-cisbitaalka ah si ay jeermiska uga dilaan oog kasta, iyo sidoo kale qolalka lobby-ka iyo bangiyada wiishka ee gelaya dabaqayada.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Waxa aanu ku kalsoonahay in xafiisku uu diyaar inoo noqon doono marka aanu doono in aanu kusoo noqono.
translated: Dhismuhu waxa uu isticmaalayaa borotokoolka daryeelka waajibaadkiisa isaga oo isticmaalaya agabka taageera badbaadada kiraystayaasha.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Xafiiskeena DC waxa uu ku yaalaa WeWork, kaas oo nala wadaagay nidaamkiisa COVID-19 naaka iyo dhamaan shaqaalaha DC ka shaqeeya.
translated: Waxaan ku faraxsannahay in xafiisku si wanaagsan ugu diyaar garoobi doono markaan go'aansanno inaan ku laabanno.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, xafiiskeena DC waxaa loo wareejiyay in gebi ahaanba guriga laga soo shaqeeyo taas oo waafaqsan tilmamaamaha ay la wadaageen San Francisco.
translated: Xafiiskayaga DC wuxuu ku yaalaa WeWork, kaas oo nala wadaagay hab-maamuuska COVID-19 annaga iyo dhammaan xubnaha shaqaalaha DC-ku salaysan.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Sida ay yaqaanaan qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena NYC, waxa aanu sidoo kale ka wada hadlanay sidii loo kiraystan lahaa meel Brooklyn ah.
translated: Ilaa usbuucii hore, xafiiskayaga DC wuxuu u dhaqaaqay habayn buuxda oo fog iyadoo la raacayo hagida la wadaagay San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Wada hadalkaasi uu socda laakiin dib ayuu u dhacay.
translated: Sida qaar ka mid ah asxaabteena fadhigoodu yahay NYC ay ogaadaan, waxaan sidoo kale ka wada hadalnay ku saabsan kireysashada meel ku taal Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena ayaa meel kale kasoo shaqaynaya markii ugu horeysay.
translated: Wadahadalladani waa ay socdaan laakiin waxaa laga yaabaa in dib loo dhigo.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Shaqaalaheena mudada dheer guriga ku dhax shaqaynaya ayaa garanaya in aan taas habeyn karno, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa in talin qaar kaa siino:
translated: Qaar ka mid ah asxaabteena ayaa meel fog ka shaqeynaya markii ugu horeysay.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Waxa aad wakhtiga kulanka kusoo koobtaan hal ama ugu badnaan labba saacadood.
translated: Asxaabteena fogfog ee wakhtiga dheer waxay ogyihiin inay noqon karto isbedel, waxayna rabeen inay ku siiyaan talo:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Hadii loo baahan yahay madal ka dheer, waxa aad isla eegtaan inaad u jaajbisaan mudo dhawr ayaamood ah.
translated: Ku xaddid dhererka shirarka ugu badnaan hal ama laba saacadood oo dheeraad ah.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Kulanka sida cad loo cadeeyay, waa inaad yeelataa ajande, oo soo dir warbixin lasii akhriyo arka hore.
translated: Haddii kulamo dheer loo baahan yahay, ka fiirso sida loo kala tagi karo inta ay socdaan dhawr maalmood.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Waxa aad samaysaa fiidyaw toos ah, oo waxa aad isticmaashaa agabka sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si markaa loo fududeeyo oo loo xidhiidhitaa.
translated: Si cad u qeex shirka, yeelo ajande, oo horay u soo dir agabka wax akhriska.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Waxa aad hogaamisaa fududaynta kulan kasta, qof ayaa la soconaya wada sheekeysi wixii su'aalo ah oo markaa la socona liiska dadka hadlaya, oo qof ahaa ka caawin doona qaadida qoraalada (ama inuu isku daro qoraalada la qaaday).
translated: Fiidiyowga ka dhig mid caadi ah, oo wata qalabyada sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si loo fududeeyo wada shaqaynta tooska ah iyo isku xidhka

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Waxa aad soo dirtaa iimeel waaxda taageerada farsamo hadii aad u baahan tahay sameedo haboon.
translated: Hogaamiso si aad u fududayso kulan kasta, qof kala socda wada sheekaysiga su'aalaha oo la socdo liiska afhayeenka, iyo qof kaa caawiya qaadashada qoraallada (ama samaynta qoraal-qaadis iskaashi).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Waxa aad isticamashaa nususaacahaaga wanaagsan.
translated: U dir iimaylka taageerada teknoolojiyadda haddii aad u baahan tahay madax-madaxeed raaxo leh.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Waxa aad ka qayb gashaa #remoties idaacadaha aha ee Slack ee wada hadalka dadka la wada shaqeeyo ee ku saabsan qaybinta shaqada
translated: U isticmaal magdhawga ladnaantaada cunto fudud.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Kooxda Shaqada Waaxda Shaqaalaha ayaa eegaya tilmaamo webinar ah oo markaa lagu kordhinayo taageerada qaybinta shaqada ee Aas Aasiga ah.
translated: Ku biir kanaalka #remoties ee Slack si aad ugala hadasho asxaabtaada shaqada la qaybiyay

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay waxa aanu ka dalbanay bulshada inay helaan joojinta munaasabadaha deeqda lacagta Wikimedia, sida tafatirka, ilaa inta ay WHO ku dhawaaqayso in safmarku uu dhamaaday.
translated: Kooxda Hawlaha HR waxay eegayaan hagida ergonomics-ku-salaysan webinar si ay u taageeraan kororka shaqada loo qaybiyo ee guud ahaan Aasaaska.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Waxa aanu u sheegnay in aanu fahanay in dalabkeenii la joojiyay iyo xadidaadaha kale ee markaa lagu soo rogi karo ei markaa loo buuxiyo deeqa ay ogolaaday hawlaha ah iyo in aan cidna ayna ku mudan ciqaab dib u dhiga ama wax ka badalka yoolashan.
translated: Todobaadki ina dhaafay waxaan waydiisanay dhamaan deeq bixiyayaasha bulshada in ay joojiyaan xafladaha guud ee ay maalgaliso Wikimedia, sida tifaftirka, ilaa ay WHO ku dhawaaqdo in uu dhamaaday masiibada.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Todobaadka soo socda waxa aanu raaci doonaa tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo Wikimenia ah iyo deegaamada kale iyo shirarka bulshada ee heerkulka ah.
translated: Waxaan ogeysiinnay in aan fahamnay in codsigayaga burinta iyo xannibaadaha kale ay ka dhigi karaan wax aan suurtagal ahayn in la dhammaystiro hawlahooda deeqda ee lagu heshiiyey iyo in aan qofna lagu ciqaabi doonin dib u dhigista ama wax ka beddelka yoolalkaas.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Qaabka guud ee bulshooyinka caalamka waxa aad moodaa inay murugo  leedahay khalkhalka laakiin waxa aanu aaminsanahay bayaaminta iyo awooda diirada lagu saarayo bulshadooda, Wikimedia iyo sida kale.
translated: Toddobaadka soo socda waxaan la socon doonaa hagitaan dheeri ah oo ku saabsan Wikimania iyo shirarka kale ee bulshada iyo gobolka.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Marka lagasii socdo, CRT waxay ka shaqaynaysaa inay samayso bog Meta-Wiki ah si loo bixiyo meelo bulshada ah oo lagula soconayo saamaynta iyo la socodka xidhiidhka aanu la leenahay.
translated: Dareenka guud ee ka imanaya bulshada caalamku waxay u muuqataa inay labadaba ka murugoodeen carqaladaynta, laakiin waxay ku nafiseen caddaynta iyo awoodda ay diiradda u saarayaan bulshooyinkooda, Wikimedia iyo haddii kale.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: La socodka wixii arrimo ah ee la xidhiidha COVID-19
translated: Horey u socoshada, CRT waxa ay ka shaqaynaysaa in ay samaysato bog Meta-Wiki si ay u siiso meel ay bulshadu kula socoto saamaynta ayna raacdo wada xidhiidhkayaga.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Waxa aanu soo diri doonaa casuumad Khamiiska soo socota, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kulan shaqaalaha oo gaar ah.
translated: La xiriirida arrimaha la xiriira COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Waxa aanu uga faa'idaysan doonaa wakhtigaas in aanu bixino macluumaadka dheeraadka ah, ka jawaabto su'aalo oo aan wakhti dheeraad ah gelino in dadka kale aanu isku xidhano.
translated: Waxaan kuu soo diri doonaa martiqaad jadwalkaaga Khamiista soo socota, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kulan shaqaale gaar ah.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Waynu ku wada jirnaa oo waxaynu gacan uga gaysan doonaa si kasta.
translated: Waxaan wakhtigan u isticmaali doonaa inaan wadaagno warar dheeraad ah, uga jawaabno su'aalahaaga oo aan wakhti ku qaadano isku xidhka midba midka kale.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa kuusii soconaya in macluumaadku uu kaasoo gaadho iimeelkan, iyo wixii kale ee daruurigaah ee macluumaadka la xidhiidha COVID-19, ee Xafiiska Wiki.
translated: Waxaan u joognaa tan si wadajir ah iyo halkan si aan u caawino si kasta oo aan awoodno.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: CRT ayaa ka shaqayn doona gelinta bogagan iyo dhamaan macluumaadka oo hal meel ah.
translated: Dhanka kale, waxaad sii wadi kartaa inaad ka hesho macluumaadka iimaylkan, iyo dhammaan macluumaadka kale ee muhiimka ah ee COVID-19, ee ku yaal Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: Waxa aanu sidoo kale ka shaqaynaynaa in aanu xidhiidhka joogtayno shaqaalaha degan dalalka wakhti xaadirkan uu saamayn wayn uu ku yeeshay.
translated: CRT waxay ku hayn doontaa boggaga la cusboonaysiiyay iyo dhammaan macluumaadka hal meel.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Hadii aad qabto wax su'aalo ah, oo ku saabsan socdaal, munaasabado, baahinta tooska ah ee shaqada ee waawayn, ama cabaqado internetka ah, ama wax kale oo aad u baahan tahay, fadlan haka gaban inaad wargeliso oo aad la shaqayso CRT.
translated: Waxaan sidoo kale ka shaqeyneynaa inaan joogteyno xiriirka joogtada ah ee shaqaalaha ku nool wadamada hadda ay si weyn u saameeyeen.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Waxa aanu halkan u joognaa in aanu ku caawino oo aan kuula shaqayno sida loogu baahdo.
translated: Haddii aad qabto wax su'aalo ah oo ku saabsan safarka, dhacdooyinka, qulqulka shaqo ee weyn, ama caqabada caymiska, ama wax kasta oo kale oo laga yaabo inaad u baahato caawimo, fadlan haka labalabeyn inaad ogeysiiso oo la shaqeyso CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Hadii aad hayso arrin sir ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan iimeel ugu dir Bryan Judan - Maamulaha Shaqala Caalmaka ee Waaxda Shaqaalaha.
translated: Waxaan halkaan u joognaa inaan gacan ka geysanno bixinta taageerada iyo xiriirka haddii loo baahdo.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Waxba kamid ah isbadalan waa in aan loo arag culays shaqadeena ah iyo waajibaadkeena.
translated: Haddii aad leedahay arrin qarsoodi ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan iimayl u dir Bryan Judan - Agaasimaha Hawlgallada Caalamiga ah ee HR.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Laakiin, waxaa weeye aqoonsiga wakhtigan, oo shaqooyinka iyo waajibaadka waxa ay u badan tahay inay la qabsan doonaan sidii horena ay ula qabsadeen.
translated: Midkoodna isbeddelladan waa inaan loo arkin inay ka tagayaan shaqadeenna iyo waajibaadkeenna.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Waxaa jira talaabooyin aanu u aragno inay daruuri u yihiin taageerada dhaxdeena si markaa aaun usii wadno shaqada, oo uu dhaqaaqeenu u bixiyo taageero ee ay u baahan yhiin, iyo caalamka adeega ay ku tiirsan yihiin.
translated: Hase yeeshe, waxay aqoonsan yihiin in xilligan, shaqadayada iyo waajibaadkayaga ay u badan tahay inay u baahan doonaan inay la qabsadaan si aan hore u haysan.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Shaqadeena qorshaysan waxa ay halkaa ugu sugnaan doontaa marka wakhtigeedu yimaado.
translated: Kuwani waa tillaabooyinka aan aaminsanahay inay lagama maarmaan u yihiin inaan midba midka kale taageerno si aan u sii wadno shaqada, u siino dhaqdhaqaaqayaga taageerada ay u baahan yihiin, iyo adduunka oo dhan adeegga ay ku tiirsan yihiin.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa la gaadhay wakhtigii uu midba midkeena kale taageeri lahaa oo aynu samaynsan lahayn makaanka shaqooyinka muhiimka ah ee todobaadyada iyo bilaha soo socda.
translated: Shaqadayada qorshaysan way ina sugaysaa marka wakhtigu gaadho.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Waxa aanu u baahanahay dhamaantiin inay taasi dhacdo, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa dhamaantiin in aad naftiina daryeeshaan iyo qoysaskiisa si markaa aanu wax kuugu tari karno marka baahidu timaado.
translated: Hadda, waa waqtigii la is taageeri lahaa oo loo abuuri lahaa boos shaqada muhiimka ah ee iman doona toddobaadyada iyo bilaha soo socda.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Iminka, fadlan -- maydh gacmahaaga oo ha taaban wajigaaga!
translated: Waxaan u baahanahay dhammaantiin si ay taasi u dhacdo, sidaas darteed waxaan dhammaantiin idiinka baahanahay inaad daryeeshaan naftaada iyo qoyskaaga si aad ugu fiicnaataan markii baahidu timaado.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, iyo Tony S), iyo inta kale ee Kooxda Hogaanka  (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, iyo Toby N).
translated: Hadda, fadlan -- dhaq gacmahaaga oo ha taaban wejigaaga!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Fayruska SARS-CoV-2 oo uu keeno COVID-19 (xanuunka coronavirus 2019), taas oo ah xanuun faafaa oo neefsiga ah kaas oo markii ugu horeysay lagu ogaaday Diseember 2019, Wigan, Hubei, Jayna.
translated: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, iyo Tony S), iyo kooxda inteeda kale ee Hoggaanka (Grant I, Heather W) , Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, iyo Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu kasoo horjeedaa hawsha la xidhiidhi angiotensim- badala enzyme (ACE) isaga oo yaraynaya xadiga angiotensin-II oo kordhinaya Ang (1-7) kaas oo ka dhigaya dawo wanaagsan oo markaa bartilmaameedsata xanuunka wadnaha. ACE2 waxaa sidoo kale weeye meesha laga soo galo unuyada coronaviruska qaar.
translated: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) waa enzyme ku dheggan dusha sare ee unugyada (xuubka unugyada) ee unugyada sambabada, halbowlayaasha, wadnaha, kelyaha, iyo xiidmaha.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: Nuqulka bilaa aadanka ee enzyme waxaa badanaa loo yaqaan hACE2.
translated: ACE2 waxay ka hortagtaa waxqabadka angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) ee la xidhiidha iyada oo la dhimayo qadarka angiotensin-II iyo kordhinta Ang (1-7) taasoo ka dhigaysa bartilmaameedka dawada ee loogu talagalay daaweynta cudurrada wadnaha iyo xididada. qaar ka mid ah coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Angiostensin-badalka enzyme 2 waxaa weeye sinki uu ku jiro metalloenzyme oo ku yaal dusha endothelial iyo unugyada kale.
translated: Nooca bini'aadamka ee enzymka waxaa badanaa loo yaqaan hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: ACE2 borootiinta ah waxaa ku jira N-terminal ah oo peptidase M2 meelaas ah iyo C-terminal oo aaga qaada aysiidha rental amino ah.
translated: Angiotensin-beddelka enzyme 2 waa zinc ka kooban metalloenzyme oo ku yaal dusha sare ee endothelial iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 waxa weeye nooc kaliya oo I xabka borootiinta ah, kaas oo leh aaga enzymatically firfircoon oo markaa gaadha dusha unuga ee sanbabka iyo unugyada kale.
translated: borotiinka ACE2 wuxuu ka kooban yahay domain N-terminal peptidase M2 iyo qaybta C-terminal collectrin kelyaha amino acid.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: Aagaga unugyada dheeraadka ah ee ACE2 waxa ay ku xardhan yihiin aaga unuga kaas oo qaada enzyme loo yaqaan sheddase, oo keena borootiin milanta oo waxa uu ku baxaa xidida dhiiga oo waxa uu burburiyaan wixii kaadida laga soo saaray.
translated: ACE2 waa borotiinka xuubabka I ee hal-baas ah, oo leh qaybtiisa enzymatically firfircoon ee lagu soo bandhigay dusha unugyada sambabada iyo unugyada kale.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu ku jiraa badanaa unugyada: ACE2 waxa uu weeraraa xabka unuga caadiyan sanbabka nooca II alveolar unugyada ah, enterocytes ee xiidmaha yar, xididka iyo unugyada endothelial kala duwan iyo unugyada murqaha ee badanaa unugyada.
translated: Qaybta unugyada ka baxsan ee ACE2 ayaa laga soocay qaybta transmembrane by enzyme kale oo loo yaqaan shedase, iyo borotiinka milmay ee ka soo baxa ayaa lagu sii daayaa qulqulka dhiigga oo ugu dambeyntii lagu sii daayo kaadida.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2mRNA kalma ah waxaa sidoo kale laga helaa cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, iyo unugyada maskaxda.
translated: ACE2 waxay ku jirtaa xubnaha intooda badan: ACE2 waxay ku dheggan tahay xuubka unugga inta badan sambabada nooca II unugyada alveolar, enterocytes ee mindhicirka yar, unugyada xididada xididada iyo xididdada dhiigga iyo unugyada muruqa siman ee halbowlaha ee xubnaha badankooda.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Shaqada kowaad ee ACE2 waxaa weeye inay noqoto dheelitirka ACE.
translated: ACE2 mRNA muujinta sidoo kale waxaa laga helaa kiliyaha maskaxda, striatum, hypothalamus, iyo maskaxda maskaxda.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Hormoonada ACE cleaves angiotensin I ee duubka murqaha ee angiotensin II.
translated: Shaqada aasaasiga ah ee ACE2 waa inay u dhaqanto sidii dheelitirka counter-ta ee ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE2 waxa kasoo qaadaa carboxyl-terminal amno aysiidh phenylalanine angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-Phe) iyo hydrolyses oo uu geliyaa vasodalitor angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-lle-His-Pro-OH).
translated: ACE waxay u kala jeexdaa hoormoonka angiotensin I ee vasoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sodo kale kasoo qaadaa tiro kale oo peptides ah oo ay ku jiraan [des-arg9] - bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A iyo ghrelin.
translated: ACE2 ayaa iyaduna ka jebisay karboxiyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine oo ka timid angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) oo waxay hydrolys ka saartaa angiotensin vasodilator (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg). -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 waxa uu sidoo kale maamulaa socodka xabka ee neutral amino acid ee laga qaadayo SLC6A19 oo markaa lagu sheegey xanuunka Hartnup.
translated: ACE2 waxay kaloo jebin kartaa tiro peptides kale ah oo ay ku jiraan [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, iyo ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: Borootiinta wadida xabka, ACE2 waxa uu yahay meesha laga galo ee wayn ee unuga ee coronavirus qaar, oo ay ku jiraan HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (fayruska keena SARS); SARS-CoV-2 (fayruska keena COVID-19).
translated: ACE2 sidoo kale waxay xakameysaa ka ganacsiga xuubabka ee gudbiyaha amino acid dhexdhexaadka ah SLC6A19 waxaana lagu lug yeeshay cudurka Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Gaar ahaan, isku darka kor u kaca botooriinta S1 ee SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV2 ee aaga enzymatic ee ACE2 ee dusha unuga ee ka yimid endocytosis iyo gudbinta ee fayriska iyo enzyme yada ee endosomes ee ku yaala unuyada gudahooda.
translated: Sida borotiinka transmembrane, ACE2 waxay u adeegtaa meesha ugu muhiimsan ee laga galo unugyada coronaviruses qaar, oo ay ku jiraan HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (fayras sababa SARS); iyo SARS-CoV-2 (fayraska sababa COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Nidaamkan dhan waxa uu u baahan yahay in la hormariyo botooriinta S ee borootiinta serina sida ee TMPRSS2, ee sanka laga qaado taas oo wakhti xaadirkan la baadhayo inay tahay dabiib borootiin. Taasina waxay horseedi kartaa mala awaalka hoos u dhigaya heerarka ACE2, unuga dhexdiisa, taas oo gacan ka gaysan kara la dagaalanka xanuunka.
translated: Gaar ahaan, ku-xidhka borotiinka S1 ee borotiinka SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV2 ee qaybta enzymatic ee ACE2 ee korka unugyada waxay keenaysaa endocytosis iyo u wareejinta fayraska iyo ensaymka labadaba endosomes ku yaal unugyada.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Laakiin, bulshooyinka xirfadaha badan iyo ururada xeerarka sameeyay waxay ku taliyeen in lasii wado heerka sii socodka qaadashada ACE iyo daawaynta ARB.
translated: Habka gelitaankan waxa kale oo uu u baahan yahay soo saarida borotiinka S ee serine protease TMPRSS2, xannibaadda taas oo ay ku socoto baaritaanka hadda sida daaweynta suurtagalka ah. Tani waxay keentay qaar ka mid ah inay qiyaasaan in hoos u dhigista heerarka ACE2, unugyada, laga yaabo inay gacan ka geystaan dagaalka. caabuqa.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Qiimayn isdaba joog ahayd iyo qiimaynta birta oo la baahiyay Juulay 11, 2012, ayaa lagu ogaaday in "isticamalka neefsiga ACE uu la xidhiidhay hoos u dhig wayn oo 34% ah khatarta xanuunka sanbabka marka loo eego xakamaynta."
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, bulshooyin badan oo xirfadleyaal ah iyo hay'adaha sharciyeynta ayaa ku taliyay in la sii wado ACE inhibitor iyo daawaynta ARB.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Sidoo kale, "khatarta sanbab xanuunka ayaa sidoo kale ku yaraan kara bukaanka lagu daweeyo neefsiga ACE kaas oo markaa khatar sare ugu jira sabab xanuun, gaar ahaan dadka uu faaliga iyo wadne xanuunka qaba.
translated: Dib-u-eegis nidaamsan iyo falanqayn-maro-baadhiseed oo la daabacay July 11, 2012, ayaa lagu ogaaday in "isticmaalka ACE inhibitors ay la xiriirto hoos u dhac weyn oo 34% ah khatarta oof-wareenka marka la barbar dhigo kontaroolada."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Isticmaalka neefsia ACE kaas oo la xidhiidha sanbab xanuunka dhimashada ka timaada ayuu yareeyaa, in kasta oo najiitada ay aad uga waxtar yarayn marka loo eego khatarta guud ee xanuunada sanbabka."
translated: Waxaa intaa dheer, "khatarta sambabada ayaa sidoo kale hoos u dhacday bukaanada lagu daaweeyay ACE inhibitors kuwaas oo halis sare ugu jira oof-wareenka, gaar ahaan kuwa qaba istaroogga iyo wadnaha oo shaqeyn.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Isku darka ilaa aadanka ee ACE2 (rhACE2) taas oo guudmar u ah daawaynta novel ee dhaawaca sanbabka ee daran, iyo in hormar lagu sameeyo hemodynamics-ka baabacada iyo ogsajiinta cufan ee doofaarka oo leh calaamado xanuun daran oo neefsiga ah oo leh lipopolysaccharide.
translated: Isticmaalka ACE inhibitors ayaa sidoo kale lala xiriiriyay hoos u dhaca dhimashada sambabada ee la xiriirta, in kasta oo natiijadu ay ka xoog yaraatay khatarta guud ee oof wareenka."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Kala badh nolosha rhACE2 bilaa aadanka waxaa weeye ilaa 10 saacadood oo waxa uu ku salaysan yhaay ficilka 30 daqiiqo oo dheeraad ah oo mudada wax ku oolka ah (mudada) 24 saacadood.
translated: Dib-u-soo-celinta bini'aadamka ACE2 (rhACE2) ayaa loo maleynayaa inay tahay daaweyn cusub oo loogu talagalay dhaawaca sambabada ba'an, waxayna u muuqatay inay hagaajinayso hemodynamics sambabada iyo qoyaanka oksijiinta ee doofaarka ee leh lipopolysaccharide-ay keentay cillad neef-mareenka daran.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa sheegaya in rhACE2 uu yahay dawo waxtar u leh dadka aad qaadain karin dawada neefsiga ee renin-angiotesin (dawada neefsiga RAS) ama xanuunka wareega angiotensin II uu kordhay. Ku shubida rhACE2 ayaa lagu qiimeeyay tijaabo xarun caafimaad oo daawaynta xanuunada neefsiga ee daran.
translated: Nolosha nuska ah ee rhACE2 ee bini'aadamka waxay ku dhowdahay 10 saacadood, bilawga ficilkuna waa 30 daqiiqo marka lagu daro muddada saamaynta (mudada) ee 24 saacadood.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: b'Bat SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL_CoV-WIV1), sidoo kale waxaa loo yaqaan SARS-sida coronavirus WIV1, waxaa weeye xanuun neefsiga oo daran ee coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) oo markaa laga soo qaaday fiidmeer la dhaqday oo Jayniis ah (Rhinolophus sinicus).
translated: Natiijooyin dhowr ah ayaa soo jeedinaya in rhACE2 laga yaabo inay noqoto daawo rajo leh oo loogu talagalay kuwa aan u dulqaadan karin nidaamka renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ama cudurada meelaha wareegga angiotensin II uu sarreeyo. cillad

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Dawlado kala duwan ayaa soo saaray ama ku taliyay, saraakiisha dawlada ayaa taageerada deegaanmada iyo meelaha qaar.
translated: b'Covid-19 apps waa software-ka mobilada oo loogu talagalay in lagu caawiyo raadinta xiriirka si looga jawaabo cudurka faafa ee coronavirus 2019-20, ie habka lagu aqoonsanayo dadka ("xiriirada") ee laga yaabo inay xiriir la sameeyeen shaqsi cudurka qaba.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Dhawr nidaam ayaa la sameeyay app-ka lagula soconayo.
translated: Codsiyo badan ayaa la sameeyay ama la soo jeediyay, iyada oo taageero rasmi ah oo dawladeed laga helay dhulalka iyo xukunnada qaarkood.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Walaacyada sirta ayaa ka yimid, gaar ahaan nidaamyada ku salaysan la socodka goobta uu ku sugan yahay isticmaalaha app-ku.
translated: Nidaamyo dhowr ah oo lagu dhisayo abka raadinta xiriirka ayaa la sameeyay.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Qaabka ka yar kaas waxaa kamig ah isticmaalka falaadha Buluutuutka ee lagu duwaan gelinayo inta isticmaalka taleefanka kale sita la isku jirsaday.
translated: Walaacyada gaarka ah ayaa la soo qaaday, gaar ahaan nidaamyada ku salaysan la socodka goobta juqraafi ee isticmaalayaasha abka.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple ayaa si wada jir ah ugu dhawaaqay in ay dhax gelin doonaan qaab lagu xoojinayo app-ka Buluutuutka si toos ah Android-kooda iyo iOS obeerin sistemyadooda.
translated: Beddelka faragelinta yar waxaa ka mid ah isticmaalka calaamadaha Bluetooth si loo galo u dhowaanshaha isticmaaleha taleefannada gacanta.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Jayna, dawlada Jayna, oo la socota Alipay, waxa ay sameeyeen app u ogolaanay dadka muwadiniinta inay eegaan hadii uu qofku u dhawaaday cid qabta COVID-19.
translated: 10kii Abriil 2020, Google iyo Apple waxay si wadajir ah u shaaciyeen inay isku dari doonaan shaqeynta si ay u taageeraan barnaamijyada ku saleysan Bluetooth si toos ah nidaamyada hawlgalka Android iyo iOS.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Waxa lagu isticmaalaa wax ka badan 200 oo magaalo Jayna. Singaaboor, app loo uaqaan TraceTogether ayaa la isticmaalaa.
translated: Shiinaha, dawladda Shiinaha, oo kaashanaysa Alipay, ayaa geysay app u oggolaanaya muwaadiniinta inay hubiyaan haddii ay la xiriireen dadka qaba COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: App-ka waxa sameeyay bulshada IT ee deegaanka, waxaa lasoo daayay isaga oo furan oo waxa lagu wareejinayaa dawlada. Waqooyiga Macedonia waxa ay samaysay "StopKorona!", oo ah app Bulutuut ku shaqeeya oo lagula socdo isasoo gaadhka dadka qaba xanuunka oo markaa bixiya jawaab degdeg ah oo maamulka daryeelka caafimaadka ah.
translated: Waxaa laga isticmaalaa in ka badan 200 oo magaalo oo Shiinaha ah. Singapore gudaheeda, app la yiraahdo TraceTogether ayaa la isticmaalayaa.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: App-ka waxaa sameeyay Wasaarada Isgaadhsiinta iyo Teknooloojiyada iyo Wasaarada Caafimaadka.
translated: App-ka waxaa sameeyay bulshada IT-ga maxalliga ah, oo loo sii daayay il furan waxaana lagu wareejin doonaa dowladda. Waqooyiga Macedonia ayaa bilaabay "StopKorona!", App ku saleysan Bluetooth si loo raad raaco la kulanka dadka suurtagalka ah ee cudurka lagana siiyo jawaab degdeg ah maamulka daryeelka caafimaadka .

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Abriil 14 2020, app-ka waxa uu sugayaa ansixinta Google Play Store iyo Apple App Store.
translated: App-kan waxa soo saaray Wasaaradda Isgaadhsiinta iyo Tignoolajiyada iyo Wasaaradda Caafimaadka.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Abriil 12, dawlada waxay sheegtey in meel wanaagsan uu marayo app-ka la socodka u dhawaanshaha dadka qaba, oo markaa uu soo bixi doonto todobaad gudihii. Sidoo kale waxaa la qorshaynayaa in Ayrlaan, iyo Faransiiska app-ba lamid ah ("StopCovid").
translated: Laga bilaabo 14-ka Abriil 2020, abka waxa uu sugayay oggolaanshaha Google Play Store iyo Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Awstaraaliya iyo New Zealand labaduba waxay ka fikirayaan inay dhaqan geliyaan app-babka Singaaboor ee TraceTogether app-ka ah iyo BlueTrace nidaamka ah. Ruushka waxa ay wadaa app-ka deegaanka qofka ku xidhaya laga helo COVID-19 ee degan Moscow, kaas oo loogu talo geley in lagu xaqiijiyo in aan guriga aanu kasoo bixin.
translated: 12-kii Abriil, dawladdu waxay sheegtay in abka raadinta xidhiidhka uu ku jiray marxalad horumarsan oo horumar ah, oo la heli karo in la geeyo toddobaadyo gudahood. App-ka la midka ah ayaa laga qorsheeyay Ireland, iyo Faransiiska ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Ross Anderson, boroofeesar injineerinka ambiga ah oo ka socda Jaamacada Cambridge, ayaa soo saaray liis mushkiladaha ka iman kara nidaamka app-kan ku salaysan, oo ay ku jiraan been ka sheeg cida qabta iyo inay wax tarkoodu ay liitaan hadii isticmaalka app-ku ay ku xadidan yihiin tiro yar oo kaliya oo dad ah.
translated: Labada Australiya iyo New Zealand waxay tixgelinayaan abka ku saleysan Singapore's TraceTogether app iyo borotokoolka BlueTrace.Ruushka waxay rabta inay soo bandhigto app geofencing oo loogu talagalay bukaannada laga helay COVID-19 ee ku nool Moscow, looguna talagalay in lagu hubiyo inaysan guriga ka bixin.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ka jawaabida walaacyada faafitaanka ayaa been abuur noqonaya ama waxyeelada app-ka "coronavirus", Apple waxa ay samaysay xadidaad taas oo hay'ada noocyadeed ay ku dari karaan coronavirus app-la xidhiidha App Store-ka, kaas oo kaliya ku xadidan "saraakiisha" ama hay'ada waawayn.
translated: Ross Anderson, borofisar ku takhasusay injineernimada amniga ee Jaamacadda Cambridge, ayaa taxday tiro dhibaatooyin la taaban karo oo iman kara nidaamyada ku salaysan abka, oo ay ku jiraan wanaagga beenta ah iyo waxtar la'aanta suurtagalka ah haddii qaadashada abka ay ku kooban tahay qayb yar oo ka mid ah dadweynaha.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Google iyo Amazon ayaa sidoo kale xadidaad lamid ah sameeyay.
translated: Isagoo wax ka qabanaya welwelka ku saabsan faafitaanka marin-habaabinta ama waxyeellada leh barnaamijyada "coronavirus", Apple waxay dejisay xaddido noocyada hay'adaha ay ku dari karaan barnaamijyada la xiriira coronavirus-ka App Store, iyaga oo ku xaddidaya kaliya "rasmiga ah" ama hay'adaha kale ee sumcadda leh.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Dadka sirta u ololeeya ayaa muujiyay walaac ku saabsan mushkilad ay keeni karta la socodka dadka badan iyada oo la isticmaalayo app-babka coronavirus, gaar ahaan hadii loo sameeyay la socodka dadka dhismaha ah si loola tacaalo safmarka coronavirus oo la qaybiyo marka khatarta laga gudbo.
translated: Google iyo Amazon waxay hirgeliyeen xannibaadyo la mid ah.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Amnesty International iyo wax ka badan 100 hay'adood oo kale ayaa soo saaray bayaan ay ugu baaqayaan in la xadido kormeerka noocan oo kale ah.
translated: Ololayaasha sirta ah ayaa ka dhawaajiyay walaacooda ku saabsan saameynta ilaalo ballaaran oo la adeegsanayo apps-ka coronavirus, gaar ahaan ku saabsan in kaabayaasha ilaalada ee loo sameeyay in lagula tacaalo cudurka faafa ee coronavirus la baabi'in doono marka hanjabaaddu dhaafto.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Hay'adu waxa ay soo saartay sideed shuruudood oo mashaariicda dawlada ah:
translated: Amnesty International iyo in ka badan 100 urur oo kale ayaa soo saaray bayaan ay ku dalbanayaan in la xaddido ilaalinta noocaan ah.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: kormeerka waxa uu noqonayaa "sharci, daruuri oo munaasabb ah";
translated: Ururadu waxay ku dhawaaqeen sideed shuruudood oo ku saabsan mashaariicda dawlada:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: meesha ka saarida la socodka iyo kormeerka ayaa ahaa weedha iftiimaysa;
translated: Ilaalintu waa inay noqotaa "sharci, lagama maarmaan iyo saami qaybsi";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: isticmaalka macluumaadka waxaa kaliya lagu xadidadayaa wixii ujeedo COVID-19 ah;
translated: Kordhinta la socodka iyo ilaalinta waa inay lahaadaan qodobbada qorrax dhaca;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: amaanka macluumaadka iyo sirta waxaa la ilaalin karayay si loo muujiyo in ilaalintu uu ku salaysan yahay cadaymo;
translated: Isticmaalka xogtu waa inay ku koobnaataa ujeedooyinka COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: kormeerka dhijitaalka ah ayaa lagaga hortagi karaa takoorka iyo muquuninta;
translated: ammaanka xogta iyo qarsoodiga waa in la ilaaliyo oo la tuso in la ilaaliyo iyadoo lagu saleynayo caddaynta;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: wixii macluumaad ah ee lala wadaago cid kale waa inuu sharcigu dhigayaa;
translated: ilaalinta dhijitaalka ah waa inay ka fogaato sii xumeynta takoorka iyo takoorka;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: waxaa ay tahay inuu jiro wax ka ilaalinaya lagu tacadiyo iyo xuquuqda dadka muwaadiniinta ah ee lagaga jawaabayo tacadiga;
translated: xog kasta oo lala wadaago dhinacyada saddexaad waa in lagu qeexaa sharciga;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ka qayb galka wax ku oolka ah ee dhamaan "dadka dantu kaga jirto" waxa ay u baahan doonaan, oo ay jiraan khabiirada caafimaadka shacabka iyo kooxaha la muquuniyay. German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) iyo Wariyayaasha Bilaa Xuduuda ah (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) ayaa soo saaray sidoo kale liis la eegayo.
translated: waa in lahelaa wax-ka-hortagga xadgudubyada iyo xuquuqda muwaadiniinta si ay uga jawaabaan xadgudubyada;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: Qorshaha ay ku taliyeen Google/Apple waxaa loogu talo geley in lagaga jawaabo mushkilada kormeerka joogtada ah iyada oo meesha laga saarayo qaabka lagula soconayo aaladaha obereetin sistemkooda marka aan loo baahnayn.
translated: Ka-qaybgal macno leh oo ay sameeyaan dhammaan "daneeyayaasha ay khusayso" ayaa loo baahan doonaa, oo ay ku jiraan kuwa khubarada caafimaadka dadweynaha iyo kooxaha la takooro. Kooxda Chaos Computer Club (CCC) iyo Wariyeyaasha Aan Xuduudda Lahayn (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) ayaa sidoo kale soo saaray liis hubin.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Dalalka qaar ayaa isticmaala networki deegaanka ah si ay ula socdaan app-babka, kuwaas oo meesha ka saaray baahida loo qabay soo dejisashada app iyo awooda in la socodka.
translated: Qorshaha Google/Apple ee la soo jeediyay waxa uu rajeenayaa in uu wax ka qabto dhibaatada dabagalka joogtada ah iyaga oo ka saaraya habka baafinta nidaamyada qalabkooda marka aan loo baahnayn.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Israaiil, nidaamka la socodka shabakada ayaa la ansixiyay.
translated: Wadamada qaar waxay isticmaaleen raadraaca goobta ku salaysan shabakada halkii ay ka isticmaali lahaayeen apps, taas oo meesha ka saartay baahida loo qabo soo dejinta abka iyo awooda lagaga fogaanayo dabagalka.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Xalalka networkiga ee laga heleyo meelaha isku midka ah ayaa leh mushkilad sirta ah oo mustaqbalka ah.
translated: Israa'iil dhexdeeda, la socodka shabakada ku salaysan ayaa la ansixiyay.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Laakiin, dhamaan nidaamyadu leh serferka dhexe loola baahna in laga helo macluumaadka goobta qofka; nidaamyo la ilaaliyay sirtooda oo badan ayaa la sameeyay oo isticmaala serfer dhexe kalya si ay u xidhiidhaan dhaxdoodu (eeg qaybta hoose).
translated: Xalalka shabakadaha ku salaysan ee hela xogta goobta cayriin waxay leeyihiin dhibaatooyin qarsoodi ah oo muhiim ah.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Koonfurta Kuuriya, nidaam aan app lahayn ayaa lagula socdaa isku dhawaanshaha.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, dhammaan nidaamyada leh server-yada dhexe uma baahna inay helaan xogta goobta shakhsi ahaaneed; waxaa la sameeyay dhowr habab dhowr ah oo u isticmaala server-yada dhexe kaliya wada xiriirka (fiiri qaybta hoose).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Halkii laga isticmaali lahaa app u gaar ah, nidaamku waxa uu soo uruuriyaa macluumaadka la socodka ee meelo kala duwan oo ay ku jiraan macluumaadka la socodka aalada mobile-ka iyo macluumaadka wax ku iibsiga kaadhka, oo waxaana loogu daraa wargelintan la sameeyay oo fariimo qoraal ah dadka ay dhici karto inay qabaan caabuqa.
translated: Koonfurta Kuuriya, nidaam aan ku salaysnayn abka ayaa la isticmaalay si loo sameeyo raadinta xidhiidhka.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Sidoo kale iyada oo la isticmaalayo macluumaadka digniinta isku dhawaanahsha, dawladu waxay sidoo kale macluumaadka goobta ka dhigta mid cid walba heli karto, mararka qaar la ogol yahay maadaama oo ay adag tahay in la badalo sharciga sirta macluumaadka kadib markii uu safmarka MERS uu dalka ku habsaday.
translated: Halkii laga isticmaali lahaa app gaar ah, nidaamku wuxuu soo ururiyay macluumaadka raadraaca ilo kala duwan oo ay ku jiraan xogta raadraaca aaladda moobaylka iyo xogta macaamilka kaadhka, wuxuuna isku daray kuwan si ay u abuuraan ogeysiisyo fariimo qoraal ah oo loogu talagalay shakhsiyaadka suurtagalka ah ee cudurka.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Macluumaadkan waxaa laga heli karaa meel kasta oo tirada app-ka iyo websaytyada. Dalalka ay ku jiraan Jermanu waxay eegeysaa nidaamyada ilalaisa sirta iyo kuwa cid walbaaba geli karaan.
translated: Marka laga soo tago adeegsiga macluumaadkan si loogu digtoonaado dadka lala xiriiri karo, dowladdu waxay sidoo kale ka dhigtay macluumaadka goobta si guud, wax la oggolaaday sababtoo ah isbeddellada fog ee sharciyada sirta ah ee macluumaadka ka dib markii MERS uu ka dillaacay waddankaas.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Abriil 6, 2020, faahfaahinta lama soo saarin.
translated: Macluumaadkan waxa ay heli karaan dadwaynaha iyada oo loo sii marayo barnaamijyo iyo shabakado dhawr ah.Wadamada uu Jarmalku ka mid yahay ayaa loo tixgeliyey isticmaalka xarumaha dhexe iyo ilaalinta sirta labadaba.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: La socodka sirta la ilaaliyay waxaa weeye nuxur balaadhan, taas oo lagu samaeyay daraasan balaadhan oo macluumaadka ah oo socotay ilaa 2013. 7 Abriil 2020, koox khabiiro tobanaan ah ayaa ka shaqaynayay xal sirta ilaalin kara, sida isticmaalka Buluutuutka Tamarta Yar (BLE) si loogu helo aaga dadka kale taleefankoodu ku sugan yahay.
translated: Laga bilaabo 6 Abriil 2020, faahfaahinta weli lama sii dayn.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Laakiin, PEPP-PT waxay isku duba ridaysaa dadaalka uu ku jiro qaab meel kaliya ah iyo mid baahsan, oo mana aha qaab kaliya. Nidaamka meesha kaliya ah waxaa kamid ah La Socodka Aaga Sirta La Ilaaliyay oo La Daadajiyay (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Lambarka Xidhiidhka Kumeel Gaadhka ah (TCN, fka Lambarka Wakhtiga Xidhiidhka, CEN), Nidaamka Sirta Xasaasiga ah iyo Qaab La Socodka Xidhiidhka Mobile-ka (PACT) iyo kuwa kale.
translated: Raadinta xiriirka sirta ah waa fikrad si wanaagsan loo aasaasay, oo leh hay'ad la taaban karo oo suugaan cilmi baaris ah ilaa ugu yaraan 2013. Laga bilaabo 7 Abriil 2020, in ka badan dersin kooxood oo khabiiro ah ayaa ka shaqeynayay xalal saaxiibtinimo oo gaar ah, sida isticmaalka Bluetooth Low Tamarta (BLE) si loo diiwaan geliyo u dhawaanshaha isticmaaleha telefoonnada gacanta.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Nidaamyadan, ogaanshaha macluumaadka shakhsi ahaaneed ma dhaafo aalada, oo dhamaan qaababka waxa ay ka dhacaan aalada.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, PEPP-PT waa dadaal iskudubarid kaas oo ka kooban habab dhexe iyo daadejin labadaba, mana aha hal hab-maamuus. Nidaamyada la daadegay waxaa ka mid ah Baafinta Qarsoonnimada-Ilaalinta Dhawrsanaanta (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Lambarada Xiriirka Ku Meel Gaarka ah (TCN). , Lambarada Dhacdada Xiriirka, CEN), Hab-maamuuska Xasaasiga ah ee Qarsoonnimada iyo Farsamooyinka Baafinta Xiriirka Mobilka (PACT) iyo kuwa kale.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Kooxda Sirta ee MIT Media Lab waxa ay sameeyeen SafePaths, madal loo isticmaalayo farsamooyinka ilaalinta sirta marka la uruurinayo ee la qaadayo goobta ama dhabada macluumaadku iskugu imanayaan si loola socdo faafitaanka COVID-19.
translated: Hab-maamuusyadan, xogta shaqsi ee la aqoonsan karo waligeed kama tagin qalabka, dhammaan isbarbardhiggana waxay ku dhacaan aaladda.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Iyada oo laga duulayo daraasada laga heley waraaqaha cad "Apps Gone Rogue: Ilaalinta Sirta Shakhsi Ahaaneed ee Safmarka" waxa ay soo saartaan Maarso 2020. Dadaal kale oo lamid ah madasha SafeTrace ee uu qoray Enigma MPC, shirkad samaysa teknooloojiyada taas oo markii hore lagu sameeyay MIT Media Lab.
translated: Kooxda Qarsoonnimada ee MIT Media Lab waxay horumarinayeen SafePaths, madal lagu isticmaalo farsamooyinka ilaalinta sirta marka la ururinayo oo la isticmaalayo goobta ama xogta isgoyska wadada si ay ula socdaan fiditaanka COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: SafeTrace waxa uu ka faa'ideeyaa teknooloojiyada haadhweerka taas oo u sahlaysa dadka isticmaalayaasha inay wadaagaan macluumaadka xasaasiga ah ee goobta iyo macluumaadka caafimaadka oo lala wadaago dadka kale ee isticmaalaya iyo saraakiisha, iyada oo aan la dhaawacaynin sirta macluumaadka.
translated: Waxay ku salaysan tahay cilmi-baadhis laga helay warqadda cad "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in Epidemic" oo la sii daayay March 2020. Dadaal kale oo la mid ah ayaa ah SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, oo ah shirkad horumarinaysa tignoolajiyada sirta ah oo sidoo kale asal ahaan laga aasaasay MIT Media Shaybaadhka

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: Abriil 5, 2020, Iskaashiga TCN ee caalamka oo ay aas aaseen kooxaha iska kaashta waxa isku qaabka ah iyo nidaamyada sida wayn isku saarmaya, yoolku waa in la yareeyo qurubyada, oo loo sahlo isku xidhanka caalamka ee la socodka iyo app-ka digniinta, qaab muhiim ah oo lagu gaadhayo in si balaadhan loo dhaqan geliyo.
translated: SafeTrace waxay isticmaashaa tignoolajiyada qalabka adag si ay ugu ogolaato isticmaalayaasha inay la wadaagaan goobta xasaasiga ah iyo xogta caafimaadka isticmaalayaasha kale iyo saraakiisha, iyada oo aan wax u dhimayn xogta gaarka ah ee xogtaas.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Abriil 9, 2020, dawlada Singaaboor ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay furtay nidaamka BlueTrace iyada oo isticmaalaysa app-ka dawlada ee rasmiga ah.
translated: 5tii Abril 2020, Isbahaysiga caalamiga ah ee TCN waxaa aasaasay kooxo ku midoobay waxa asal ahaan isku hab ahaa iyo hab-maamuusyo badan oo is dulsaaran, iyada oo ujeedadu tahay in la yareeyo kala qaybsanaanta, oo loo suurtogeliyo wada shaqaynta caalamiga ah ee raadinta iyo digniinta abka, oo ah arrin muhiim ah oo lagu gaaro korsasho baahsan.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Abriil 10, 2020, Google iyo Apple, shirkadaha maamulka Android iyo iOS madalaha mobile ee ah, waxay ku dhawaaqeen barnaamij lagula soconayo isku dhawaanshaha, taas oo la sheegey inuu ilaalinayo sirta, oo koobsaday isku darta teknooloojiyada Tamarta yar ee Bulutuutka iyo inkiribshinka ilaalinta sirta.
translated: 9-kii Abriil 2020, dawladda Singapore waxay ku dhawaaqday inay fur-furtay borotokoolka BlueTrace ee ay adeegsato abka dawladda ee rasmiga ah.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Waxay sidoo kale baahiyeen waxa ay ka kooban yahay teknooloojiyada asalaka ah ee nidaamku isticmaalayo.
translated: 10kii Abriil 2020, Google iyo Apple, shirkadaha gacanta ku haya aaladaha mobilada ee Android iyo iOS, ayaa ku dhawaaqay hindise lagu raadinayo xiriirka, kaas oo ay ku andacoonayaan inay ilaalinayaan sirta, taas oo ku saleysan isku darka tignoolajiyada Tamarta Yar ee Bluetooth-ka iyo ilaalinta qarsoodiga.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Apple iyo Google, nidaamka waxaa loogu talo geley in uu noqdo sadex waji:
translated: Waxay sidoo kale daabaceen qeexitaannada tignoolajiyada asaasiga ah ee loo isticmaalo nidaamka.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: qaybta agabka oo dawlada u sahlaysa inay abuurto app-bab la socodka coronavirus oo si rasmi ah u ilaalinaya sirta
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay Apple iyo Google, nidaamka waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu soo rogo saddex marxaladood:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: inay dhax geliyaan shaqada iOS iyo Android Google iyo Apple qorshahood ay doonayaan inay kaga jawaabaan qaadista iyo joogteynta mushkilada kormeerka iyad aoo marka kowaad lagu qaybinayo nidaamka oo cusboonaysiinta obeetin sistemka, oo kadibna looga saarayao marka ay khatarta meesha ka baxdo si lamid ah.
translated: soo saarista agabka si ay awood ugu siiso dawladaha inay abuuraan sir rasmi ah oo ilaalinaysa raadinta coronavirus

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: Samaybta dawda b'COVID-19 waxa weli socda daraasadeed lagu samayn lagaa talaal ama dawo lagu daweeyo oo meesha ka saaraysa mushkilada xanuunka 2019-20 coronavirus (COVID-19).
translated: isku dhafka shaqadan si toos ah iOS iyo AndroidGoogle iyo Apple waxay qorsheynayaan inay wax ka qabtaan qaadashada iyo dhibaatooyinka ilaalinta joogtada ah iyadoo marka hore loo qaybiyo nidaamka iyada oo loo marayo casriyeynta nidaamka hawlgalka, ka dibna si la mid ah meesha looga saaro marka khatarta dhaafto.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Tani waa hal khad oo cilmi baadhista sayniska taas oo wakhti xaadirkan la isticmaalay si loogu sameeyo daawayn amaan ah oo wax ku ool ah COVID-19.
translated: B'Drug repositioning (sidoo kale loo yaqaanno dib-u-habaynta daroogada, dib-u-soo-bandhigista, dib-u-shaqaynta ama beddelka daaweynta) waa dib-u-celinta daawada la oggolaaday ee daaweynta cudur ka duwan ama xaalad caafimaad oo ka duwan tii markii hore loo sameeyay.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Daraasado kale ayaa ku saabsan jihaynta oo ay ku jirto samaynta talaal iyo ku dhubin unugyad dhiiga ee COVID-19. SARS-CoV-2 waxa uu leeyahay ilaa 66 dawo oo borootiinta ah, taas oo midkiiba ay leeyahay goobo la isku daray n oo badan oo ligand ah.
translated: Tani waa hal saf oo cilmi baaris cilmiyeed ah kaas oo hadda la raadinayo si loo horumariyo daawaynta COVID-19 badbaado leh oo waxtar leh.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Qiimaynta goobahaas la isku daray waxa ay bixiyaan saadaal macquul ah oo lagu samaynayo borootiin wax ku ool ah oo fayrus disha COVID-19.
translated: Tilmaamaha kale ee cilmi-baarista waxaa ka mid ah horumarinta tallaalka COVID-19 iyo transfusion plasma convalescent.SARS-CoV-2 waxay leedahay ilaa 66 borotiinno daroogo ah, kuwaas oo mid kastaa leeyahay goobo badan oo isku xira ligand.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Waxaa kamid ah botooriinta la bartilmaameedsanayo SARS-CoV-2 ee ugu muhiimsan papain-sida protease, RNA ku tiirsan RNA polymersare, helicase, S borootiin, iyo ADP ribophosphatase.
translated: Falanqaynta goobaha xidhitaanka waxay bixinaysaa mashruuca macquulka ah ee samaynta daawada fayraska ka hortagta ee borotiinnada COVID-19.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Hussein A A, et al waxa uu daraasadeeyay dhawr curiye taas oo kadibna loo isticmaalay oo laguna qiimeeyay waxay ka samaysan yihiiin si lamid ah dawooyinka sare ee la ansixiyay si loo xawaareeyo waxa ay ka kooban tahay dawada lagula dagaalamayo SARS-CoV-2 ee daraasada tijaabada kahor si loogu soo saaro qaabka daraasada tijaabada.
translated: Barootiinnada bartilmaameedka ah ee SARS-CoV-2 ee ugu muhiimsan waa papain-sida protease, RNA polymerase ku tiirsan RNA, helicase, borotiinka S, iyo ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Chloroquine waxaa weeye dawo lagula dagaalamo malariyada taas oo sidoo kale loogu isticmaalay qaar akmid ah xanuunada difaaca si toos ah.
translated: Hussein AA, et al waxay daraasad ku sameeyeen dhowr isku-xidhayaal musharax kuwaas oo la wanaajiyey oo lagu falanqeeyay isku mid ahaanshahooda qalfoofka ee la midka ah daawooyinka la oggol yahay ee ugu sarreeya si loo dardargeliyo horumarinta daroogada ka hortagga SARS-CoV-2 ee xoogga leh ee daraasaddiisa saxda ah si loogu taliyo daraasad caafimaad. naqshadeynta.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Maarso 18, WHO waxay ku dhawaaqday in chloroquine iyo wixii la xidhiidha hydroxychloroquine inay noqon doonaan qaar kamid ah afarta dawo ee qayb ka noqonaya daraasada tijaabada caafimaadka ee Midawga.
translated: Chloroquine waa daawada ka hortagga duumada oo sidoo kale loo isticmaalo ka hortagga cudurrada is-difaaca jirka qaarkood.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Badhasaabka New York Andrew Cuomo waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in tijaabooyinka Gobolka New York ee chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine ay bilaa doonaan 24 Maarso. 28 Maarso, FDA waxay ogolaaday isticmaalka hydroxychloroquie sulfate iyo chloroquine phosphate oo lagu istimcaalka Ogolaanshaha Isticmaalka Xaalada Degdeg ah (EUA).
translated: 18kii Maarso, WHO waxa ay ku dhawaaqday in chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine ee la xidhiidha ay ka mid noqon doonaan afarta dawo ee la darsay iyada oo qayb ka ah tijaabada caafimaad ee Wadajirka.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Daawaynta umay ansixin FDA si loogu sameeyo tijaabo caafimaad waxaana lagu ansixiyay oo ay hoos timaadaa EUA kaliya iyada oo ah daawayn tijaabo ah oo xaalada degdeg ah loogu isticmaalayo bukaanka la dhigay isbitaalka laakiin aan loo haynin daawayn tijaabo caafimaad ku jirta.
translated: Guddoomiyaha New York Andrew Cuomo ayaa ku dhawaaqay in tijaabooyinka chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine ee Gobolka New York ay bilaaban doonaan 24ka Maarso. 28ka Maarso, FDA waxay ogolaatay isticmaalka hydroxychloroquine sulfate iyo chloroquine phosphate iyadoo la raacayo Ogolaanshaha Isticmaalka Degdegga ah (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: CDC waxa ay sheegtey in "isticmaalka, xadiga, ama mudada hydroxychloroquine ee prophylaxis ama daawaynta SARS-CoV-2 caabuqa ah" aan weli la ogaan.
translated: Daawaynta laguma ansixin nidaamka tijaabooyinka caafimaad ee FDA waxaana lagu oggolaaday EUA oo kaliya inay tahay daawaynta tijaabada ah ee isticmaalka degdega ah ee bukaanada jiifa cusbitaalka laakiin aan awoodin inay ku helaan daawaynta tijaabada caafimaad.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirtu waxay sheegeen inay isticmaalaan dawadan mark ay hirin dawo "ikhtiyaar kale oo jiraayi".
translated: CDC waxay sheegtay in "isticmaalka, qaadashada, ama muddada hydroxychloroquine ee ka hortagga ama daaweynta caabuqa SARS-CoV-2" aan weli la dhisin.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Koox daraasadeed oo Turkish ah ayaa Istanbul ku sameeyay daraasad yar iyada oo ay isticmaalayaan chloroquine lagu daray zinc, fiitaamiin A, fiitaamiin C iyo fiitaamiin D.
translated: Dhakhaatiirtu waxay sheegeen in ay isticmaalayaan dawada marka "ay jirto doorasho kale".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Daraasado waawayn ayaa ka socda Jaamacada Duke iyo Jaamacada Oxford.
translated: Koox cilmi baaris ah oo Turki ah oo ku sugan Istanbul ayaa wada daraasad yar oo ku saabsan isticmaalka chloroquine oo ay ku jiraan zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C iyo vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Dugsiga Caafimaadka NYU Langone waxa uu wadaa tijaabada amaanka iyo wax ku oolnimada isticmaalka kahortaga ee hydroxychloroquine.
translated: Daraasado waaweyn ayaa ka socda Jaamacadda Duke iyo Jaamacadda Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: Tijaabooyin caafimaad oo Jayna ku samaysay Wuhan iyo Shenzhen waxaa lagu sheegey in lagu arkay in favipiravir "waxtarkeedu cad yahay"
translated: Dugsiga caafimaadka ee NYU Langone wuxuu sameynayaa tijaabo ku saabsan badbaadada iyo waxtarka isticmaalka ka hortagga ah ee hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Bukaano 35 ah oo ku sugan Shenzhen waxaa laga waayay qaybta 4 maalmood ah, halka mudada xanuunka uu ahaa 11 maalmood 45 bukaan oo aan la siinin dawada.
translated: Tijaabooyinka caafimaad ee Shiinaha ee Wuhan iyo Shenzhen waxay sheegteen in ay muujinayaan favipiravir inay "si cad waxtar u leedahay".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay 240 bukaan oo qaba xanuunada sanbabka, kala badh ayaa lasiiyay favipiravir oo kala badhna waxaa lasiiyay umifenovir.
translated: 35 bukaan oo Shenzhen ah ayaa tijaabiyey diidmo dhexdhexaad ah 4 maalmood, halka dhererka jirku uu ahaa 11 maalmood 45 bukaan oo aan helin.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Hay'ada Dawooyinka Talyaaniga ayaa shacabka u sheegtey inay jiraan cadaymo sheegaya in dawada weli la tijaabinayo oo ay weli hordhac tahay.
translated: Daraasad lagu sameeyay Wuhan 240 bukaan oo qaba oof-wareen, kala badh ayaa la siiyay favipiravir halka kala badhna la siiyay umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Abriil 2, Jermalku waxa uu ku dhawaaqay in uu ka iibsanayo dawo Jabaan kaydkeeda, oo uu u isticmaali doono in ciidanku dawadaas keeno isbitaalada jaamacadaha, halaas oo dawada loo isticmaali doono in lagu daweeyo bukaanada COVID-19.
translated: Wakaaladda dawooyinka ee Talyaanigu waxay xasuusisay dadweynaha in caddaymaha jira ee lagu taageerayo dawada ay yihiin kuwo yar oo hordhac ah.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Si lagu daabacay South Chine Morning Post, Shinzo Abe waxa uu u jawaabay maamulka Trump ee ku saabsan iibsiga dawada. Dawada waxaa dhici karta inayna waxba u tarin xanuunada fayruska uu marka hore tarmay.
translated: 2-dii Abriil, Jarmalku wuxuu ku dhawaaqay inuu ka soo iibsan doono daawada Japan kaydkeeda, oo ay u isticmaali doonto millatariga si ay u gaarsiiso daawada isbitaallada jaamacadda, halkaas oo dawada loo isticmaali doono in lagu daweeyo bukaannada COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Waxaa dhici karta inayna amaan ahayn inay isticmaalaan dumarka uurka leh ama kuwa isku dayaya inay qaadaan.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe waxa uu u gudbiyay maamulka Trump wax ku saabsan iibsashada daawada.Daawadu waxay noqon kartaa mid aan waxtar lahayn xaaladaha daran ee jirrada halkaasoo fayrasku mar hore ku batay.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Hal daraasadeed oo lagu sameeyay lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), isku darta dawada fayruska ee lopinavir iyo ritonavir, "ayaan wax faa'ido ah lagu arag".
translated: Waxa laga yaabaa inaanay ammaan u ahayn isticmaalka haweenka uurka leh ama kuwa isku dayaya inay uuraystaan.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Dawada waxaa loogu talo geley dadka la nool HIV si ayna u badalin isku darka protease.
translated: Mid ka mid ah daraasadda lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), oo ah isku-darka ka-hortagga fayraska lopinavir iyo ritonavir, ayaa lagu soo gabagabeeyay "wax faa'iido ah lama arag".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Koox cilmi baadhayaal ah oo ka socota Jaamacada Colorado ayaa isku dayaya inay wax ka badalaan dawooyinka si ay u helaan curiyayaal isku daraya protease-ka SARS-CoV-2. Waxaa jira dhaleecayn ay bulshada sayniska oo ku saabsan jihaynta khayraadka si dib loogu isticmaalo wixii sida gaarka ah loogu sameeyay HIV/Aydhis.
translated: Daawooyinka waxaa loo qorsheeyay in ay ka hortagaan HIV-ga in uu ku celceliyo iyada oo lagu xirayo borotiinka.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: WHO waxay ku dartay lopinavir/ritonavir tijaabada Midnimada ee caalamiga ah.
translated: Koox cilmi-baarayaal ah oo ka tirsan Jaamacadda Colorado ayaa isku dayaya inay wax ka beddelaan dawooyinka si ay u helaan xarun ku xidhi doonta borotiinka SARS-CoV-2. Waxaa jira dhaleecayn bulshada sayniska dhexdeeda ah oo ku saabsan jihaynta agabka dib-u-soo-celinta dawooyinka si gaar ah loogu sameeyay HIV/ AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: Remdesivir waxa curiyay oo sameeyay Gilead Sciences si loogu daweeyo fayruska Ebola iyo fayruska Marburg. Gilead Sciences waxay markii danbe soo saareen Remdesivir kaas oo lahaa hawlo dawada faryiska ah ee vitro oo dhawr filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo, iyo corona - fayrus ah.
translated: WHO waxa ay ku dartay lopinavir/ritonavir tijaabada midnimada caalamiga ah.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
