targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in la isticmaalo maro nadiif ah oo wajiga lagu xidho meelaha banaanka ah marka loosoo baxo, si loo yareeyo isku gudbinta asxaamaha shakhsi ahaaneed. Kala fogaanshaha waxaa loogu talo geley in lagu yareeyo isku gudbinta dadka iyada oo badan isku yimaada meelaha dugsiyada iyo shaqada, xadidaada socdaalka iyo joojinta isku imaatinka dadka badan.
translated: Nadaafadda gacmaha ee saxda ah kadib qufaca ama hindhisada waa la dhiirigeliyaa.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: Tilmaamaha kala fogaanshaha waxaa kamid ah in dadku ay isku jirsadaan 6 fuudh (1.8 mitir) in ah.
translated: CDC waxay ku talisay in goobaha caamka ah loo isticmaalo maro weji daboolan, qayb ahaan si loo xadido gudbinta dadka asymptomatic-ka ah

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Ma jirto dawo la garnaayo ee lagaga hortago COVID-19. Talaalkana lama filanyo inuu soo baxo ilaa horaanta 2021, qayb muhiim ah oo lagu maamuliya COVID-19 waa in la yareeyo kor u kaca faafista, oo loo yaqaan "yaraynta socodka".
translated: Tilmaamaha fogeynta sidoo kale waxaa ka mid ah in dadku ay kala fogaadaan ugu yaraan 6 fiit (1.8 m).

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in badanaa lagu farxasho sabuun iyo biyo ugu yaraan 20 ilbidhiqsi, gaar ahaan marka suuliga lagasoo baxo ama gacmuhu ay uskag yihiin oo ay muuqdaan, kahor inta aan cunto la cubin iyo kadib marka duufka la iska fi'iyo, qudaco ama hundhiso.
translated: Ma jirto wax daawo ah oo loo yaqaan inay wax ku ool u tahay ka hortagga COVID-19. Maadaama aan tallaalka la fileynin illaa 2021 ugu horreynta, qayb muhiim ah oo ka mid ah maaraynta COVID-19 waxay isku dayeysaa inay yareyso heerka ugu sarreeya ee cudurka, oo loo yaqaan "qalloocinta".

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Sidoo kale waxaa lagu taliyaa in la isticmaalo gacmo nadiifiyaha alkohoosha leh oo ugu yaraan 60% alkohool ah, laakiin kaliya marka aan la heleynin sabuun iyo biyo. Meelaha aan lagu iibin gacmo nadiifiyaha, WHO waxay bixisaa talaabo loogu samaysanayo sidaada.
translated: CDC waxay sidoo kale ku talinaysaa in shakhsiyaadka ay ku dhaqmaan gacmaha saabuun iyo biyo badan ugu yaraan 20 ilbiriqsi, gaar ahaan ka dib marka aad musqusha gasho ama marka ay gacmuhu si muuqata u wasakhaysan yihiin, ka hor inta aan la cunin iyo ka dib marka qofku sanka ka afuufo, qufacayo ama hindhiso.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: Qaacidadan, hawsha antimikrobaatku waxa ka yimaada ethanol ama isopropanol.
translated: Waxa kale oo ay ku talinaysaa in la isticmaalo gacmo nadiifiye alkohol ah oo leh ugu yaraan 60% aalkolo, laakiin kaliya marka aan saabuun iyo biyo diyaar ahayn. Goobaha aan si fudud loo heli karin gacmo nadiifiyaha ganacsiga, WHO waxay bixisaa laba hab oo wax soo saarka gudaha ah.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: Hydrogen peroxide ayaa loo isticaalaa si meesha looga saaro kacsanaanta baakteeriyada ee alkohoosha; "maaha shay firfircoon".
translated: Qaababkaan, waxqabadka antimicrobial wuxuu ka yimaadaa ethanol ama isopropanol.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: Glycerol waxaa lagu daraa humectant.
translated: Hydrogen peroxide waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu caawiyo baabi'inta kudka bakteeriyada ee khamriga; "ma aha walax firfircoon oo loogu talagalay antisepsis-ka gacanta".

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: Dadka waxaa lagu maamulaa daryeel la kormeeray, kaas oo ay ku jiraan daawaynta dheecaanada, taageero ogsajiin, iyo taageerida unugyada kale ee uu fayrusku saameeyay.
translated: Glycerol waxaa lagu daraa huectant ahaan.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in dadka looga shakiyo inay sidaan fayruska ay xidhaan waji gashad.
translated: Dadka waxaa lagu maareeyaa daryeel taageero ah, oo ay ku jiraan daaweynta dareeraha, taageerada oksijiinta, iyo taageeridda xubnaha kale ee muhiimka ah ee ay saameysay.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: Ogsajiinta xabka extracororeal (ECMO) waxa loo isticmaalahaa sidii looga jawaabi lahaa mushkilada neefsiga, laakiin faa'idadeeda wali waa la eegayaa.
translated: CDC waxay ku talinaysaa kuwa ka shakiya inay sido fayraska inay xidhaan maaskaro fudud oo wejiga ah.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Nadaafada shakhsi ahaaneed iyo qaab nololeedka caafimaadka iyo nafaqada ayaa la sheegaa inay kor u qaadaan difaaca.
translated: Ogsajiinta xuubabka ka baxsan xubnaha taranka (ECMO) ayaa loo isticmaalay in wax looga qabto arrinta cilladda neefsashada, laakiin faa'iidooyinkeeda ayaa weli la tixgelinayaa.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: Daawaynta taageerada ah waxay wax u tari kartaa dadka leh calaamadaha yar wakhtiga hroe ee uu xanuunku ku dhaco. WHO iyo Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayniiska waxa ay baahiyeen talooyin lagu. ilaalinayo dadka la dhigay isbitaalka ee qaba COVID-19.
translated: Nadaafadda shakhsi ahaaneed iyo qaab nololeed caafimaad leh iyo cunto ayaa lagula taliyay si loo hagaajiyo difaaca.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirta xiidmaha iyo sanbabka ayaa isku daray daawaynta Marayknaka ee lagu taliyo oo kala heley hay'adp kala duwan oo waxay ka dhigeen khayraad bilaash ah, IBCC.
translated: Daawaynta taageerada ayaa laga yaabaa inay faa'iido u leedahay kuwa leh astaamo fudud marxaladda hore ee caabuqa. WHO iyo Komishanka Caafimaadka Qaranka Shiinaha ayaa daabacay talooyin ku saabsan daryeelka dadka cusbitaalka la dhigay COVID-19.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: Abriil 2020, ma jirto wax daawayn ah oo cayiman oo uu leeyahay COVID-19.
translated: Dhaqaatiirta ku takhasustay sambabada iyo sambabada ee Maraykanka ayaa soo ururiyay talooyinka daawaynta ee hay'ado kala duwan oo ay u soo gudbiyeen kheyraad bilaash ah, IBCC.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Calaamadaha, xirfadlayaal caafimaadka qaar ayaa ku taliya in baraasitimoosha (acetaminophen) laga doorbido ibubarafiinta marka hore.
translated: Laga bilaabo Abriil 2020, ma jirto daaweyn gaar ah oo loogu talagalay COVID-19.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: Waa in laga taxadirtaa sidii loo yarayn lahaa khatarta isku gudbinta fayruska, gaar ahaan habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka marka la samaynayo daawaynta keeni karta hawo la neefsado, sida intubation ama neefsiga gacmaha.
translated: Calaamadaha, qaar ka mid ah xirfadlayaasha caafimaadku waxay kula talinayaan paracetamol (acetaminophen) ibuprofen isticmaalka safka hore.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: Xirfadlayaasha daryeelka caafimaad ee daryeelka dadka qaba COVID-19, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in dadka la geliyo Qolka Aysoleeshinka Caabuqa Wada (AIIR) oo ka dheeraad ah in la sameeyo taxadirka caadiga ah, xidhiidhka dadka iyo taxadirka hawo kagalaya. CDC waxay sheegtey in tilmaamaha loo isticmaalayo agabka ilaalada shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) inta uu jiro safmarku.
translated: Waa in taxaddar la sameeyaa si loo yareeyo khatarta gudbinta fayraska, gaar ahaan goobaha daryeelka caafimaadka marka la samaynayo hababka dhalin kara hawada hawada, sida intubation ama hawo-qaadista gacanta.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: Agabka lagu taliyo waa: PPE-ga dirayska, neefsiga ama waji gashad, indho ilaaliye, iyo golofiska gacmaha. Marka la heli karo, neefsiga (halka waji gashad) uu ka noqon lahaa ayaa la doorbidaa.
translated: Xirfadlayaasha daryeelka caafimaadka ee daryeelaya dadka qaba COVID-19, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in qofka la geliyo Qolka Go'doominta Caabuqa Hawada (AIIR) marka lagu daro isticmaalka taxaddarrada caadiga ah, taxaddarrada xiriirka iyo taxaddarrada hawada laga qaado. qalabka (PPE) inta lagu jiro aafada.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: Waji gashadka N95 ayaa loo ansixiyay shaqadan laakiin FDA waxa ay soo saartay in loo isticmaali waji gashad Ansixinta Isticmaalka Xaalada Degdeg ah (EUA).
translated: Qalabka lagu taliyay waa: Gown PPE, qalabka neefsiga ama waji-xidhka, ilaalinta indhaha, iyo galoofyada caafimaadka. Marka la heli karo, neef-qaadayaasha (halkii waji-xidhashada) ayaa la door bidaa.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: Waxaa loogu talo geley in la iskaga ilaaliyo xanuunada hawada raaca sida dhaska laakiin waxa ay wax ka taraan wixii noole ah laakiin lama damaanad qaadi karo isticmaalka nooc kasta.
translated: N95 neefsashada ayaa loo oggolaaday goobaha warshadaha laakiin FDA waxay u ogolaatay waji-xidhaha in loo isticmaalo Oggolaanshaha Isticmaalka Degdegga ah (EUA).

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: Marka aan la heleynin waji gashadka, CDC waxay ku taliysaa in wajiga la xidho, ama, hadii wax kale la waayo, in wajigashad guriga lagu samaysto.
translated: Waxaa loo qaabeeyey inay ka difaacaan walxaha hawadu qaado sida boodhka laakiin waxtarka ka dhanka ah walax bayooloji gaar ah looma dammaanad qaadayo isticmaalka calaamadda.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: Badanaa COVID-19 aad uma adka ama waxba kama badalo qaabka, laakiin waxoogaa kiisaska ayaa sidaa ah.
translated: Marka waji-xidhka aan la heli karin, CDC waxay ku talinaysaa in la isticmaalo gaashaanka wejiga ama, sida ugu dambeeya, maaskaro guri lagu sameeyo.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: Noocyada taageerada neefsiga ee COVID-19 waxa uu la xidhiidhaa ku guul daraysiga neefsiga kaas oo si wanaagsan loogu daraasadaynayo dadka ku jira isbitaalka, taas oo cadaymo muujinayaan in tuunbo la is geliyo la iska ilaalin karo oo sanka la iskaga dhaadhiciyo ama laba heer oo hawo mareenka ah.
translated: Inta badan kiisaska COVID-19 ma aha kuwo aad u daran oo u baahan hawo farsamo ama beddelaad, laakiin boqolkiiba kiisasku waa.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: Hadii labadani ay isku faa'ido leeyihiin dadka xanuunsanaya iyo in kale lama garanayo.
translated: Nooca taageerada neefsashada ee shakhsiyaadka qaba COVID-19 ee la xidhiidha neefsashada neefsashada ayaa si firfircoon loogu daraaseeyaa dadka isbitaalka ku jira, iyada oo leh xoogaa caddayn ah in tuubbooyinka la iskaga ilaaliyo qulqulka sanka oo qulqulaya oo sarreeya ama cadaadiska marin-haweedka togan ee laba-heer ah.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: Dhakhaatiirta qaar ayaa doorbida joogitaanka guriga qaab neefsi ah marka la heli karo maadaama oo qaabkan uu xadido faafitaanka neefsiga marka la barbardhigo dulka sanka. Mararka ay aad u daran tahay waxaa ku caan ah dadka waawaayn (dadka ka wayn 60 jirka, iyo gaar ahaan kuwa ka wayn 80 jirka).
translated: In labadan midkood uu faa'iido isku mid ah u horseedayo dadka aadka u xanuunsan lama oga.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: Dalal badan oo soo koraya ma laha sariiro isbitaal oo ku filan tirada dadkooda, taas oo xadida awooda nidaamka caafimaadku uu kala tacaalayo hadii uu si lama filaan ah kor ugu kacdo dirada dadka ee qaba COVID-19 aadka u daran ee markaa u baahan isbitaalka.
translated: Dhakhaatiirta qaarkood waxay door bidaan in ay la joogaan hawo-mareeno farsamaysan marka la heli karo sababtoo ah farsamadani waxay xaddidaysaa faafitaanka qaybaha hawada marka la barbar dhigo qulqulka sanka ee qulqulaya ee sanka. .

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: Hal daraasad oo lagu sameeyay Jayna ayaa lagu ogaaday in 5% dadka ka dhigay waaxda daryeelka sare, 2.3% ay u baahdeen mishiinka taageerada neefsiga, oo 1.4% ay u dhinteen.
translated: Wadamo badan oo horumaray ma haystaan sariiro isbitaal oo ku filan qofkiiba, taas oo xaddidaysa awoodda nidaamka caafimaadka si uu wax uga qabto kororka degdega ah ee tirada kiisaska COVID-19 ee daran oo u baahan isbitaal.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: Jayna, celcelis ahaan 30% dadka isbitaalka loo dhigay COVID-19 ayaa markii danbe waaxda ICU loo gudbiyay.
translated: Mid ka mid ah daraasadda Shiinaha ayaa ogaatay in 5% la seexiyay qaybaha daryeelka degdegga ah, 2.3% ay u baahan yihiin taageero farsamo oo hawo ah, iyo 1.4% ayaa dhintay.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: Mishiinka neefsiga ayaa murugsanaaday markii xanuunka neefsigu uu kordhay (ARDS) marka uu kordho COVID-19 oo ogsajiin qaadashada ayaa aad u adkaata.
translated: Shiinaha, ku dhawaad 30% dadka cusbitaalka ku jira ee qaba COVID-19 ayaa aakhirka la dhigaa ICU.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: Mishiino neefsi oo awooda inay qaabka cadaadiska ah inay maamulaa iyo PEEP sare ayaa loogu baahday si heerka ugu sareeya loo gaadhsiiyo gaadhsiinta ogsajiinta si loogu yareeyo khatarta neefsiga ee la xidhiidha dhaawaca sanbabka iyo preumothorax.
translated: Hawo-qaadista makaanikada ayaa noqonaysa mid aad u adag marka ba'an xanuunka neef-mareenka ee xanuunka (ARDS) uu ku soo baxo COVID-19 iyo ogsijiinta ayaa sii adkaanaysa.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: PEEP-ka sare malaha mishiinada neefsiga ah ee hore.
translated: Hawo-mareeno awood u leh hababka xakamaynta cadaadiska iyo PEEP sare ayaa loo baahan yahay si loo kordhiyo bixinta oksijiinta iyadoo la yareynayo khatarta dhaawaca sambabada ee la xidhiidha hawo-mareenka iyo pneumothorax.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: Daraasad ayaa muujinaysa in daawayntu ay ka bilaabmayso Janaayo 2020, oo dawooyinka fayruska caafimaad ahaan la tijaabin doono.
translated: PEEP sare lagama heli karo hawo-mareenada hore.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: Remdesivir ayaad moodaa inay tahay ta ugu faa'idada badan.
translated: Cilmi baaris lagu sameeyay daawaynta suurtagalka ah ayaa bilaabatay Janaayo 2020, iyo dhowr dawooyinka fayruska ka hortaga ayaa ku jira tijaabooyin caafimaad.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: In kasta oo dawooyinka cusub ay qaadan kartaan ilaa 2021 samayntoodu, dhawr kamid ah dawooyinkan ayaa la tijaabiyay oo hore loo ansixiyay si waxyaabo kale loogu isticmaalo ama marka hore heer sare maraya.
translated: Remdesivir wuxuu u muuqdaa inuu yahay midka ugu rajo-gelinta badan.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: Dawooyinka fayruska ayaa lagu tijaabin karaa dadka xanuunada daran qaba.
translated: In kasta oo dawooyin cusub ay qaadan karaan ilaa 2021 si ay u horumariyaan, qaar badan oo ka mid ah dawooyinka la tijaabinayo ayaa horay loogu oggolaaday isticmaallo kale amaba waxay ku jiraan baaritaan horumarsan.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: WHO waxay sheegtay in dadka iskoodh isku xilqaada ay ka qayb qaadanayaan tijaabada wax ku oolnimada iyo amaanka daawaynta mustaqbalka. FDA waxay bixisay ogolaansho kumeel gaadh ah oo convalescent plasma-ha ah kaas oo ah daawayn tijaabo ah oo marka ay xaalada qofku aad u daran tahay ama uu u baahan yahay daawayn dhakhso ah.
translated: Daawooyinka ka hortagga fayraska waxaa laga yaabaa in lagu tijaabiyo dadka cudur daran qaba.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: Weli lama samaynin tijaabo caafimaad oo muujinaysa maanka iyo waxtarka ay u leedahay xanuunka.
translated: WHO waxa ay ku talisay mutadawiciinta inay ka qaybqaataan tijaabooyinka waxtarka iyo badbaadada daawaynta iman karta.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: Febraayo 2020, Jayna waxay samaysay app lagaga shaqaynayo safmarka xanuunka.
translated: Ma aysan marin daraasadaha caafimaad ee loo baahan yahay si loo muujiyo inay badbaado iyo waxtar u leedahay cudurka.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: Dadka isticmaalaya waxaa laga dalbanayaa inay gelitaan magaca iyo lambarka aqoonsiga.
translated: Bishii Febraayo 2020, Shiinuhu wuxuu bilaabay app-ka mobilada si wax looga qabto cudurka dillaacay.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: App-ku waxa uu awoodaa inuu la socdo 'dadka isku dhawaada' isaga oo adeegsanaya macluumaadka kormeerka iyo khatarta isqaadsiinta iman karta.
translated: Isticmaalayaasha waxaa laga codsanayaa inay galaan magacooda iyo lambarka aqoonsiga.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: Isticmaale kastaa waxa uu eegi karaa sidoo kale xaalada sadex isticmaale oo kale.
translated: App-ku waxa uu awoodaa in uu ogaado 'xidhiidh dhow' isaga oo isticmaalaya xogta la socodka oo markaa khatar suurtagal ah oo caabuq ah.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: Hadii la ogaado khatar iman karta, app-ku kaliya kuma talinayo in meel la isku soo xidho, waxa uu sidoo kale wargelinayaa saraakiisha maamulka deegaanka. Macluumaad badan ayuu tafatirayaa oo ku jira taleefanka qacanta, aqoonsiga wajiyada, la socodka mobileka iyo teknooloojiyad ayaa loo isticmaalayaa si iloola socdo dadka qaba caabuqa iyo dadka ay u dhawaadeen Koonfurta Kuuriya, Taywaan iyo Singaaboor.
translated: Isticmaale kasta ayaa sidoo kale hubin kara heerka seddexda isticmaale ee kale.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: Maarso 2020, dawlada Israaiil ayaa u ogolaatay hay'ada maanka inay la socoto mobile-ka dakda looga shakisan yahay inay qabaan coronavirus.
translated: Haddii la ogaado khatarta suurtagalka ah, app-ku kaliya kuma talinayo is-karantiil, sidoo kale wuxuu u digayaa saraakiisha caafimaadka maxalliga ah. Falanqaynta xogta weyn ee xogta taleefanka gacanta, tignoolajiyada aqoonsiga wejiga, raadraaca taleefanka gacanta iyo sirdoonka macmal ah ayaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu raad raaco dadka cudurka qaba iyo dadka ay iyagu u arkaan. lagala soo xiriiray South Korea, Taiwan iyo Singapore.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: Talaabooyin ayaa la qaaday lagu dhaqan gelinayo karantiimada iyo in la ilaaliyo dadka u dhawaaday dadka qaba caabuqa.
translated: Bishii Maarso 2020, dawladda Israa'iil waxay u oggolaatay hay'adaha amniga inay la socdaan xogta taleefanka gacanta ee dadka loo malaynayo inay qabaan cudurka 'coronavirus'.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: Sidoo kale Maarso 2020, Deutsche Telekom ayaa la wadaagtay macluumaad lagu sheegayo meesha taleefanka hay'ada dawlada federalka ee Jarmalka, Robert Koch Institute, si markaa loo baadho oo looga hortago faafitaanka fayruska.
translated: Tallaabadan ayaa loo qaaday si loo dhaqan geliyo karantiil iyo in la ilaaliyo kuwa laga yaabo inay la kulmaan muwaadiniinta cudurka qaba.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ruushku waxa uu sameeyay teknooloojiyada lagu aqoonsanayo wajiga si loola socdo dadka jabiyay amarkoodii karantiimada.
translated: Sidoo kale bishii Maarso 2020, Deutsche Telekom waxay xogta goobta telefoonka la wadaagtay wakaaladda dawladda federaalka ee Jarmalka, Robert Koch Institute, si loo baadho loogana hortago fiditaanka fayraska.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: Gudoomiyaha caafimaadka deegaanka ee Talyaaniga Giulio Gallera waxay u sheegeen shirkada taleefanadu in "40% dadku iskaga socdaan siday doontaan."
translated: Ruushku waxa uu geeyey tignoolajiyada aqoonsiga wajiga si loo ogaado jebinta karantiilka.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: Dalwada Jermalka ayaa samaysan 48 saacadood daraasad kombuyuutarka algu sameeyay labadii maalmood ee fasaxa ahaa oo ay ka qayb galeen wax ka badan 42.000 oo ruux.
translated: Guddoomiyaha caafimaadka ee gobolka Talyaaniga Giulio Gallera ayaa sheegay in ay ku wargeliyeen hawl-wadeennada talefannada gacanta in "40% dadku ay sii wadaan inay si walba u socdaan".

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: Sidoo kale madaxweynaha Istooniyada, Kersti Kaljulaid, ayaa sameeyay baaq caalami ah oo xal loogu heleyo faafitaanka coronavirus/
translated: Dawladda Jarmalku waxay samaysay hackathon 48 saacadood usbuuca dhamaadkii iyada oo ay ka qaybqaateen in ka badan 42,000.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: Dadku way isku buuqi karaan inta ay ku jiraan karantiimada, xadidaada socdaalka, saamaynta caafimaad daro ee daawaynta ama iyaga oo ka baqanaya inay qaadaan.
translated: Sidoo kale madaxweynaha Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, wuxuu sameeyay baaq caalami ah oo ku saabsan xalal hal abuur leh oo ka dhan ah fiditaanka coronavirus.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: BBC-yada ayaa kasoo xigatay Rory O'Connor oo leh, "Korodhka aysoleeshinka dadka, kalinimada, warwarka, isku buuqa iyo xidhitaanka dhaqaale ayaa ah dabayl waxyeelo oo caafimaadka maskaxda iyo badqabka dadka ah."
translated: Shakhsiyaadka waxaa laga yaabaa inay la kulmaan murugo karantiil, xannibaado safar, saameynaha daawaynta ama cabsida caabuqa laftiisa.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: Waxaa dhici karta inay yareeto waxyeelada xanuunku oo calaamado yar ama aan la yeelanba, kuwaas oo u dhigma xanuunada kale ee neefsiga sida hargabka.
translated: BBC ayaa ka soo xigatay Rory O'Connor isagoo leh, "Kororka go'doominta bulshada, kelinimada, welwelka caafimaadka, walbahaarka iyo hoos u dhaca dhaqaalaha ayaa ah duufaan qumman oo waxyeello u geysan karta caafimaadka maskaxda iyo fayoobida dadka."

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: Xanuunada yaryar caadiga waxaa lagaga lafnaadaa laba todobaad, halka kuwa daran ama aadka u daran ay qaadan karaan ilaa lix todobaad ka ladnaanshahoodu.
translated: Cudurku wuxuu qaadan karaa koorsada khafiifka ah ee leh astaamo yar ama aan lahayn, oo u eg cudurrada kale ee caadiga ah ee neef-mareenka sida hargabka caadiga ah.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: Dumarka uurka leh ayaa khatar badan ku jiri kara inay qaadaan COVID-19 sida lagu ogaaday macluumaadka laga heley fayrusyada lamidka ah, sida SARS iyo MERS, laakiin macluumaadka COVID-19 weli way yar yihiin. Dadka qaar, COVID-19 waxa uu saamayn karaa sababka kaas oo keenaya xanuunada sanbabka.
translated: Kiisaska fudud waxay caadi ahaan ku soo kabtaan laba toddobaad gudahood, halka kuwa qaba cudurrada daran ama halista ah ay qaadan karaan saddex ilaa lix toddobaad inay ka soo kabtaan.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: Marka uu aadka u daran yahay, COVID-19 waxa uu noqon karaa xanuunka neefsiga oo aad u daran (ARDS) kaas oo keena xanuun neefsiga ah, xanuunka sumawga dhiiga oo loo miyir beelo ama unugyada oo istaaga.
translated: Haweenka uurka leh waxa laga yaabaa inay halis sare ugu jiraan infekshanka daran ee COVID-19 iyadoo lagu salaynayo xogta laga helay fayrasyada kale ee la midka ah, sida SARS iyo MERS, laakiin xogta COVID-19 ayaa maqan.Dadka qaarkood, COVID-19 waxa laga yaabaa inay saamayso sambabada oo sababa oof-wareen.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: Mushkilada la xidhiidha COVID-19 ee sumawga dhiiga, xinjiro aan caadi ahayn iyo waxyeelada wadnaha, kalyada, iyo beerka.
translated: Kuwa sida ba'an u saameeyay, COVID-19 waxa laga yaabaa inuu si degdeg ah ugu gudbo xanuunka neef-mareenka ee degdega ah (ARDS) oo keena hawlgab xagga neef-mareenka ah, shoog septic ama xubno badan oo hawlgab ah.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: Xinjirawga dhiiga ee aan caadiga ahayn waxa uu caadiyan kordhaa wakhtiga shaybaadhka dhiiga mudada ay qaadan kartaan xinjirawdy, waxaana la sheegey inay qabaan 6% dadka loo dhigay isbitaalka COVID-19, halka shaqada kalyada ee aan caadiga ahayn lagu arko 4% kooxdan.
translated: Dhibaatooyinka la xiriira COVID-19 waxaa ka mid ah sepsis, xinjiro aan caadi ahayn iyo dhaawac soo gaara wadnaha, kelyaha iyo beerka.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: Celcelis ahaan 20-30% dadka lagu arkay COVID-19 waxa ay leeyihiin enzymes beerka ah oo sare (transaminases).
translated: xinjirowga aan caadiga ahayn, gaar ahaan korodhka wakhtiga prothrombin, ayaa lagu sifeeyay 6% dadka cusbitaalka la dhigay COVID-19, halka shaqada kelyaha ee aan caadiga ahayn lagu arkay 4% kooxdan.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: Isla warbixintaasi waxay sheegtey, wakhtiga u dhaxeeya marka calaamaduhu bilaabmaan iyo dhimashadu inay tahay toban maalmood, iyada oo shan lagu jiro isbitaalka.
translated: Ku dhawaad 20-30% dadka qaba COVID-19 waxay muujiyaan enzymes beerka oo sarreeya (transaminases).

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: Laakiin, bukaanka loo wareejiyo ICU waxa ay isku jirtaa wakhtiga u dhaxaysa marka la dhigo isbitaalka ilaa dhimashadoodu todoba maalmood.
translated: Sida laga soo xigtay isla warbixinta, wakhtiga dhexdhexaadka ah ee u dhexeeya bilawga calaamadaha iyo dhimashada waxay ahayd toban maalmood, iyada oo shan la dhigay isbitaal.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay kiisaska hore, wakhtiga la arko calaamado yar ilaa dhimashadu waa 14 maalmood, kaas oo inta ugu dheerna tahay 41 maalmood.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, bukaannada loo wareejiyay ICU waxay lahaayeen waqti dhexdhexaad ah oo toddoba maalmood ah inta u dhaxaysa isbitaalka iyo dhimashada.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: Daraasad ay sameeyaan Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran (NHC) ee Jayna, raga waxay leeyihiin xadi dhimasho oo ah 2.8% halka dumarkana xadigooda dhimashadu ay tahay 1.7%.
translated: Daraasad ku saabsan kiisaska hore, wakhtiga dhexe ee laga soo bilaabo muujinta calaamadaha bilowga ah ilaa dhimashada waxay ahayd 14 maalmood, oo leh kala duwanaansho buuxda oo ah lix ilaa 41 maalmood.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: Shaybaadhka Histopathological ah ee muunada sanbabka ee lagu eegay waxyeeada alveolar ee fubromyxiod ee laga saaray ee sanbabka.
translated: Daraasad ay samaysay Komishanka Qaranka ee Caafimaadka (NHC) ee Shiinaha, ragga waxay lahaayeen heerka dhimashada 2.8% halka dumarka ay leeyihiin heerka dhimashada 1.7%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: Isbadalka fayruska ayaa la badalay oo lagu arkay xanuunka sababka.
translated: Baadhitaannada histopathological ee muunadaha sambabada ee dhimashada ka dib ayaa muujinaya burburka alveolar ee fidsan ee fibromyxoid-ka gacanta ee labada sambabada.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: Sawirka sanbabka waxaa lagu arkayay xanuunka aadka u daran ee neefsiga (ARDS).
translated: Isbeddellada cytopathic viral ayaa lagu arkay pneumocytes.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: 11.8% oo dhimashada ay soo sheegeen Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna, waxyeelada wadnaha ayaa lagu arkay inuu keeno korodhka troponin ama wadnaha oo shaqo gaba.
translated: Sawirka sambabku waxa uu u ekaa xanuunka neef-mareenka ee ku xumaaday (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: Sida uu dhigayo macluumaadka Maarso laga heley Maraykanka, 89% oo dadka isbitaalka la dhigay waxay qabeen xanuun hore. Khayraadka dawooyinka ee la heli karo iyo dhaqan dhaqaalaha deegaan ayaa saamayn ku yeelan kara dhimashada.
translated: 11.8% ee dhimashada ay soo sheegeen Komishanka Caafimaadka Qaranka ee Shiinaha, dhaawaca wadnaha ayaa lagu sheegay heerar sare oo troponin ah ama wadne istaag.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: Qiyaastii dhigashadu way kala duwan tahay maadaama oo ay ka jiraan xaaladuhu oo deegaanadu kala duwan yihiin, laakiin sidoo kale maadaama oo ay jirto qaabka oo adagi.
translated: Marka loo eego xogta March ee Maraykanka, 89% dadka cusbitaalka la dhigay waxay lahaayeen xaalado hore u jiray. Helitaanka ilaha caafimaadka iyo dhaqaalaha bulshada ee gobol ayaa sidoo kale saameyn kara dhimashada.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: Yaraynta tirada kiisaska yaryar ee keena dhimashada waa la buun buuniyay.
translated: Qiyaasta dhimashada ee xaaladdu way kala duwan tahay sababtoo ah kala duwanaanshiyaha gobolka, laakiin sidoo kale sababtoo ah dhibaatooyinka habka.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: Laakiin, maadaama oo dhimashada uu keenay in wakhti hroe la qaaday waxay ka dhignaan karka ain xadiga dhimashada ee wakhtigan tiradeeda la yareeyay.
translated: Tirinta-hoosaadka kiisaska fudud waxay sababi kartaa in heerka dhimashada la qiimeeyo.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: Dadka caba sigaarka waxay 1.4 jeer ay ka badan yihiin inay yeeshaan xanuuno badan oo COVID-19 ah iyo celcelis ahaan 2.4 jeer inay korodho daryeelkooda sare ama u dhintaan marka loo eego dadka aan cabin sigaarka ah. Walaac ayaa laga muujiyay xanuunka mudada dheeree xanuunkan.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, xaqiiqda ah in dhimashadu ay tahay natiijada kiisas la soo qaatay waqti hore waxay la macno tahay heerka dhimashada hadda waa la dhayalsaday.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: Maamulka Isbitaal Hong Kong ah ayaa ogaaday inay hoos u dhacday 20% ilaa 30% awooda sanbabka ee dadka ka ladnaaday xanuunka, oo sawir laga qaaday sanbabka waxaa lagu arkay in waxyeelo soo gaadhay unuga.
translated: Dadka sigaarka cabba waxay 1.4 jeer uga dhowaayeen inay yeeshaan astaamaha daran ee COVID-19 iyo ku dhawaad 2.4 jeer ayay u dhowdahay inay u baahdaan daryeel degdeg ah ama u dhintaan marka la barbardhigo kuwa aan sigaarka cabbin.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: Tani waxay sidoo kael horseedi kartaa waxyeelo kasoo ladnaanshaha ah.
translated: Maamulka Cisbitaalka Hong Kong ayaa helay hoos u dhac 20% ilaa 30% ah awoodda sambabada qaar ka mid ah dadka ka soo kabsaday cudurka, baaritaanada sambabada ayaa soo jeediyay waxyeelo soo gaartay xubnaha.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: Ilaa Maarso 2020, laga aqoon hadii xanuun kale iyo difaaca jidhka ee mudada dheer ah ee ka ladnaaday xanuunka uu keeno caabuq.
translated: Tani waxay sidoo kale u horseedi kartaa xanuunka daryeelka degdega ah ka dib soo kabashada.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: In aanu waxba yeelin ayaa dhici karta, taas oo ku salaysan habdhaqanka kale ee coronavirus, laakiin kiisaska ka ladnaaday COVID-19 waxaa daba socday shaybaadh laga heley coronavirus oo markii danbe la sheegey.
translated: Laga bilaabo Maarso 2020, lama garanayn haddii infekshankii hore uu ku bixiyo difaac waxtar leh oo waqti dheer ah dadka ka soo kabanaya cudurka.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: Kiisaskan waxaa loo arkayaa inay kasii daraan caabuqa kalka ay dib caabuq kale u noqon lahaayeen.
translated: Xasaanadda waxaa loo arkaa inay u badan tahay, iyadoo lagu saleynayo hab-dhaqanka coronaviruses-ka kale, laakiin kiisas ka soo kabashada COVID-19 ay raaceen baaritaanno togan oo coronavirus ah taariikh dambe ayaa la soo sheegay.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: Fayruska waxaa loo arkaa inuu yahay mid dabiici ah oo uu xayawaanka kasoo jeedo, oo uu yahay caabuq uga soo gudbay.
translated: Kiisaskan ayaa la rumeysan yahay inay ka sii darayaan caabuqa daahaya halkii ay dib u qaadi lahaayeen.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: Meesha rasmiga ah ee uu ka yimid lama garanayo, laakiin Diseember 2019 faafitaanka xanuunka ayaa gebi ahaanba isku gudbinayay dadka.
translated: Fayrasku waxa loo malaynayaa inuu yahay mid dabiici ah oo asal ahaan ka yimid xayawaan, iyada oo loo marayo caabuq ku daadanaya.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Daraasad lagu sameeyay 41 kiis ee ugu horeeyay ee la xaqiijiyay ee COVID-19, oo lagu baahiyay Janaayo 2020, The Lancet, waxaa lagu sheegey in taariikhda hore ee ay bilaabeen calaamaduhu ahayn 1 Diseember 2019.
translated: Lama garanayo asalka dhabta ah, laakiin Diisambar 2019 faafitaanka caabuqa ayaa ku dhawaad dhammaantood keenay isu gudbinta bini'aadamka iyo bini'aadamka.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: Warbixin rasmi ah oo ay soo saartay WHO ayaa lagu sheegey in calaamaduhu bilaabeen 8 Diseember 2019..
translated: Daraasad lagu sameeyay 41-kii kiis ee ugu horreeyay ee la xaqiijiyey COVID-19, oo lagu daabacay Janaayo 2020 ee The Lancet, ayaa shaaca ka qaaday taariikhda ugu horreysa ee calaamadaha bilawga ah sida 1 Disembar 2019.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: Dhawr cabiraad ayaa lagu sameeyay oo caan ah oo u qalanka dhimashada ah.
translated: Daabacaadaha rasmiga ah ee ka soo baxay WHO ayaa sheegay in calaamadaha ugu horreeya ay yihiin 8 Disembar 2019.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Tirooyinkan waxa ku kala duwan deegaamada iyo mudada oo waxa ay saamayn karaa cabirka shaybaadhka, nidaamyada tayada daryeelka caafimaad, ikhtiyaarada daawaynta, wakhtiga ilaa markii uu bilaabmay iyo qaabka dakda sida da'da, jinsiga iyo caafimaadka guud.
translated: Tallaabooyin dhowr ah ayaa caadi ahaan loo isticmaalaa in lagu qiyaaso dhimashada.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: Dhamaadkii 2019, WHO waxay ku qortay ICD-10 xanuunka xeerka U07.1 ee dhimashada iyada oo laga duulayo inta uu shaybaadhku xaqiijiyay ee SARS-CoV-2 ee caabuqa ah iyo U07.2 ee dhimashada xarunta caafimaadka ama shaybaadhka xanuunada safmarka ee COVID-19 oo lagu xaqiijyay shaybaadhka caabuqa SARS-CoV-2. Xadiga dhimashada ee kiisaska waxay ay ka muuqataa tirada dhimasho oo loo qaybiyay tidada kiis ee la heley wakhti gaar ah oo cayiman.
translated: Tirooyinkani way kala duwan yihiin gobol ahaan iyo wakhti ka dib waxaana saameeya mugga baadhista, tayada nidaamka daryeelka caafimaadka, doorashooyinka daawaynta, wakhtiga tan iyo markii uu dillaacay bilawga iyo sifooyinka dadweynaha sida da'da, jinsiga iyo caafimaadka guud.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Iyada oo laga duulayo tirakoobka Jaamacada Hopkins, xadiga dhimashada kiisaska caalanku waa 6.9% (153,822/2.240,191) markii la gaadhay 17 Abriil 2020.
translated: Dabayaaqadii 2019, WHO waxay u xilsaartay koodka cudurka degdega ah ee ICD-10 U07.1 ee dhimashada shaybaadhka la xaqiijiyay ee SARS-CoV-2 iyo U07.2 ee dhimashada bukaan-socod ahaan ama cudur-sidaha laga helay COVID-19 iyada oo aan la xaqiijin SARS-CoV- 2 infekshin

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: Tiradu waxaa ku kala duwanaan kara deegaamada. Talaabooyin kale oo ay ku jiraan xadiga dhimashada (CFR), taas oo ay ka muuqato tirada laga heley ee shakhsiyaad ka u dhintay xanuunka, iyo xadiga dhigasha xanuunka (IFR), kaas oo ay ka muuqato boqolkiiba inta ay yihiin shakhsiyaadka (laga baadhay ama aan la baadhin) ee u dhintay xanuunka.
translated: Iyada oo ku saleysan tirakoobka jaamacadda Johns Hopkins, saamiga dhimashada-kiis-kii adduunka waa 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) marka la eego 17-ka Abriil 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Tirakoobkan waxaa dhici karta in aanu wakhti lahayn oo aanu raacin muunad gaar ah oo kiisaska ladnaaday xanuunka.
translated: Tiradu waa ku kala duwan tahay gobol ahaan. Tallaabooyinka kale waxaa ka mid ah heerka dhimashada kiisaska (CFR), taas oo ka tarjumaysa boqolkiiba dadka la baaray ee u dhinta cudur, iyo heerka dhimashada caabuqa (IFR), taas oo ka tarjumaysa boqolkiiba dadka cudurka qaba (la ogaaday iyo kuwa aan la aqoonsan. ) kuwaas oo u dhinta cudur.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: In kasta oo dhamaan dadku ayna wada yeelan antiboodhi, jiritaanka antiboodhiga ayaa bixin kara macluumaad ku saabsan tirada dadka ee qaaday xanuunka.
translated: Tirakoobyadani waqti kuma xidhna waxayna raacaan dad gaar ah oo ka yimaada caabuqa iyada oo loo marayo xallinta kiiska.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: Meelaha uu ku badan yahay ee Talyaaniga, Castiglione d'Adda, tuulo yar oo ilaa 4600 ku nool yihiin, 80 (1.7%) ayaa u dhintay.
translated: Iyadoo dhammaan dadka cudurka qaba aysan yeelanin unugyada difaaca jirka, joogitaanka unugyada difaaca jirka ayaa laga yaabaa inay bixiyaan macluumaad ku saabsan inta qof ee cudurka qaaday.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: Galgelt, xanuunku waxa uu ku faafay munaasabad Kaarnifaal, oo waxa uu ku faafay dadka yaryar, kaas oo keenay marka loo eego tiro yar oo dhimasho, oo dhamaan dhimashada COVID-19 laguma wada sheegin inuu ka danbeeyay xanuunku.
translated: Xudunta u ah cudurka dilaaga ah ee Talyaaniga, Castiglione d'Adda, oo ah tuulo yar oo 4600, 80 (1.7%) ayaa hore u dhintay.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: Sidoo kale, nidaamka caafimaadka Jermalka muu harqin.
translated: Gangelt gudaheeda, cudurka waxaa ku faafay xafladaha Carnival, wuxuuna ku faafay dadka da'da yar, taasoo keentay dhimasho aad u yar, mana aha dhammaan dhimashada COVID-19 in si rasmi ah loo kala saarin.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: Needarlan, ilaa 3% ayaa yeeshay antiboodhi, sida lagu sheegey cida bixisay dhiiga.
translated: Intaa waxaa dheer, nidaamka caafimaadka Jarmalku maaha mid xad dhaaf ah.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: 69 (0.004% oo dadka ah) ayaa la xaqiijiyay inay u dhinteen COVID-19.
translated: Nederlaan, qiyaastii 3% ayaa laga yaabaa inay leeyihiin unugyada difaaca jirka, sida lagu qiimeeyay deeq-bixiyeyaasha dhiigga.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: Saamaynta xanuunka iyo xadiga u dhimatay ayaan wax badan ayna ku kala duwananayn raga iyo dumarku.
translated: 69 (0.004% dadweynaha) ayaa la xaqiijiyay inay u dhinteen COVID-19.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: Dhimashadu waxay ku badan tahay raga daraadan lagu sameeyay Jayna iyo Talyaaniga.
translated: Saamaynta masiibada iyo heerka dhimashadu waa ku kala duwan yihiin ragga iyo dumarka.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: Khatartu waxay kusii badan tahay raga ku jira 50yaadka, farqiga u dhaxeeya raga iyo dumarkuna ay tahay kaliya 90.
translated: Dhimashada ragga ayaa aad ugu sareysa daraasado lagu sameeyay Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: Jayna, xadiga dhimashada waxaa lagu sheegey 2.8 boqolkiiba inay tahay raga iyo 1.7 boqolkiiba dumarka.
translated: Khatarta ugu badan ee ragga waa da'da 50-ka, iyada oo farqiga u dhexeeya ragga iyo dumarka uu xirmo oo keliya 90.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: Sababta rasmiga ah ee jinsiyagu ugu kala duwan yihiin lama garanayo, laakiin hide sidaha iyo habdhaqanka ayaa noqon karan sabab keenta taas.
translated: Shiinaha, heerka dhimashadu waxay ahayd 2.8 boqolkiiba ragga iyo 1.7 boqolkiiba dumarka.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: Jinsiga oo ku salaysan kala duwanaanshaha difaaca jidhka, yaraanta cabista sigaarka ee dumarka iyo inay ragu yeeshaa xanuuno sida kacsanaan iyada oo yar marka loo eego dumarka ayaa markaa gacan ka gaysatay dhimashada badan ee raga.
translated: Sababaha dhabta ah ee kala duwanaanshahan jinsiga ah lama garanayo, laakiin arrimaha hiddaha iyo dhaqanka ayaa sabab noqon kara.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: Yurub, 57% shakhsiyaadka qaaday xanuunka ee raga ah iyo 72% oo kuwaas ah ayaa u dhintay COVID-19 ayaa ahaa rag.
translated: Kala duwanaanshaha difaaca jirka ee ku saleysan jinsiga, yaraanta sigaarka sigaarka ee haweenka iyo ragga oo ku soo koraya xaaladaha cudurada sida hypertension da'da yar marka loo eego dumarka ayaa wax ka geysan kara dhimashada sare ee ragga.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: Abriil 2020, dawlada Maraykanku lamay socon macluumadka dhimashada jinsiyada ee COVID-19.
translated: Yurub dhexdeeda, 57% dadka cudurka qaba waxay ahaayeen rag halka 72% kuwa u dhintay COVID-19 ay ahaayeen rag.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: Daraasad la sameeyay ayaa muujinaya in xanuunada fayruska ee sida Ebola, HIV, hargabka iyo SARS ay si kala duwan u sameeyaan raga iyo dumarka.
translated: Laga bilaabo Abriil 2020, dawladda Maraykanku ma daba gasho xogta la xidhiidha galmada ee caabuqyada COVID-19.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: Tirada sare ee shaqaalaha caafimaadka, gaar ahaan kaaliyayaasha caafimaadka, ayaa dumar ah, oo waxaana badan fursada ay ku qaadi karaan fayruska.
translated: Cilmi baaris ayaa muujisay in cudurrada fayraska sida Ebola, HIV, hargabka iyo SARS ay si kala duwan u saameeyaan ragga iyo dumarka.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunku waxay bayaamisay 11 Febraayo 2020 in magaca rasmiga ah ee xanuunku uu yahay "COVID-19".
translated: Boqolkiiba in ka badan shaqaalaha caafimaadka, gaar ahaan kalkaaliyayaasha caafimaadku, waa haween, waxayna leeyihiin fursad sare oo ay ku qaadaan fayraska.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: Madaxa WHO Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ayaa sheegey in CO ay u tagan tahay corona, VI ay u taagan tahay fayrus, D ay u xaagan tahay xanuun oo 19 ay u taagan tahay markii ugu horeeyay ee safmarka la arkay: 31 Diseember 2019.
translated: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqay 11-kii Febraayo 2020 in magaca rasmiga ah ee cudurka uu noqon doono "COVID-19".

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: Magaca waxaa loo doortay si la iskaga ilaaliyo in deegaan kaar ah lagu sheego xanuunka (sida Jayna), nooc xayawaan ama koox dad ah, gaas oo waafaqsan talooyinka caalami ee ujeedada magaga si loo baajiyo takoor. Fayruska keena COVID-19 waxaa weeye magiciisu coronaviruska xanuunka neefsiga ee daran 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: Madaxa WHO Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus wuxuu sharraxay in CO ay u taagan tahay corona, VI oo ah fayraska, D cudur, iyo 19 markii ugu horreysay ee cudurka dillaacay la aqoonsaday: 31ka Diseembar 2019.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: WHO waxay sidoo kale isticmaashaa "fayruska COVID-19" iyo "fayruska keena COVID-19" marka ay warbixinaha soo saarayso.
translated: Magaca ayaa loo doortay si looga fogaado tixraacyada goob juqraafiyeed gaar ah (tusaale Shiinaha), noocyada xoolaha ama koox dad ah, iyadoo la raacayo talooyinka caalamiga ah ee magacaabista loogu talagalay ka hortagga dhaleeceynta. coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: Xanuunka iyo fayruska labadaba waxaa loo yaqaan "coronavirus".
translated: WHO waxa kale oo ay isticmaashaa "fayraska COVID-19" iyo "fayras ka mas'uulka ah COVID-19" isgaarsiinta dadweynaha.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: Intii lagu jiray safmarka hore ee Wuhan, Jayna, fayruska iyo xanuuna waxaa loo yaqaanay "coronavirus" iyo "Wuhan coronavirus".
translated: Cudurka iyo fayrasku labadaba waxaa badanaa loogu yeeraa "coronavirus".

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: Janaayo 2020, WHO waxay ku talinaysay in 2019-nCov iyo 2019 nCoV xanuunka daran ee neefsiga uu noqdo magac ku meel gaadh ah oo fayruska ah iyo xanuunka si waafaqsan tilmaamaha 2015 ee in aan la isticmaalin ah meel marka la magacaabayo xanuun iyo fayrus.
translated: Intii lagu guda jiray dillaaca bilowga ah ee Wuhan, Shiinaha, fayraska iyo cudurka waxaa badanaa loogu yeeraa "coronavirus" iyo "Wuhan coronavirus".

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: Magaca rasmiga ah ee COVID-19 iyo SARS-CoV-2 waxaa la sameeyay 11 Febraayo 2020.
translated: Bishii Janaayo 2020, WHO waxay ku talisay 2019-nCov iyo 2019-nCoV cudurka neef-mareenka ba'an inay noqdaan magacyo ku meel gaar ah fayraska iyo cudurka iyadoo la raacayo hagida 2015 ee ka dhanka ah isticmaalka goobaha cudurada iyo fayraska.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: Maadaama oo ay jirtey xadidaad heerka iibka, warshadaha qaar dhijitaal ah ayaa daabacay waxyaabaha daryeelka caafimaad sida buushka lagu qaado muunada duufka iyo qaybaha uu ka kooban yahay qalabka neefsigu.
translated: Magacyada rasmiga ah ee COVID-19 iyo SARS-CoV-2 ayaa la soo saaray 11-kii Febraayo 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, marka isbitaalka Talyaanigu uu si dhakhso ah u dalbaday qababadaha mishiinka neefsiga, oo lana waayay agabkii wakhtigaa loo baahnaa, shirkad bilaw ah oo deegaan ah ayaa samaysay oo daabacday 100 qasabood habeen kaliya.
translated: Sababtoo ah xaddidnaanta awoodda ee silsiladaha sahayda caadiga ah, qaar ka mid ah soosaarayaasha dhijitaalka ah ayaa daabacaya walxaha daryeelka caafimaadka sida suufka sanka iyo qaybaha hawo-mareenka.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: Kadib markii uu soo baxay safmarkii COVID-19 ugu horeeyay, waxyaabo badan ayaa la iska dhax marayay, macluumaad khaldan iyo macluumaad been ah oo ah meesha uu ka yimid, inta uu le'eg yahay, kahortaga, daawaynta iyo dhinacyo kale oo xanuunka ah oo markaa si dhakhso ah ugu baahan online ahaan.
translated: Mid ka mid ah tusaale ahaan, markii isbitaal Talyaani ah uu si degdeg ah ugu baahan yahay valve hawo-mareenka, oo alaab-qeybiyehu uu awoodi waayay inuu keeno xilliga loo baahan yahay, bilawga maxalliga ah ayaa dib u rogay oo daabacay 100 valves ee loo baahan yahay habeenkii.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: Bilaa aadanka ayaad moodaa ainay awood u leeyihiin marka loo eego xayawaanada kale qaar.
translated: Ka dib markii uu dillaacay bilawgii COVID-19, aragtiyaha shirqoolka, macluumaadka khaldan iyo macluumaadka khaldan ayaa soo baxay ee ku saabsan asalka, miisaanka, ka hortagga, daaweynta iyo qaybaha kale ee cudurka oo si degdeg ah ugu faafay khadka.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: Daraadaha ayaan lagu ogaanin inuu yahay fayruska ka yimid doofaarka, xuurbadeeda, iyo digaaga.
translated: Bini'aadamku waxay u muuqdaan kuwo awood u leh inay ku faafiyaan fayraska xayawaanka kale qaarkood.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: Ma laha dawo ama talaal la ansixiyay oo lagu daweeyo.
translated: Daraasadu waxay ku guuldareysatay inay hesho caddaynta taranka fayraska ee doofaarka, shinbiraha, iyo digaagga.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: Daraasado caalami ah ayaa socda oo talaalka iyo dawooyinka COVID-19 ah oo ay wadaan hay'ado iyo dawladu, kooxda waxbarasho iyo waaxaha daraasada.
translated: Ma jiro daawo ama tallaal loo oggolaaday in lagu daweeyo cudurka.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: Maarso, Hay'ada Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa bilawday "Tijaabo WAJIR AH" oo lagu qiimaynayo wax ku oolnimada daawayn amar dawo oo fayrusyada ah oo markaa la sheegey inay waxtari karaan.
translated: Cilmi-baaris caalami ah oo ku saabsan tallaallada iyo dawooyinka COVID-19 ayaa waxaa socda hay'adaha dowladda, kooxaha tacliinta iyo baarayaasha warshadaha.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Malaha talaal, laakiin hay'ado kala duwan ayaa ka shaqaynaya sidii talaal loogu geli lahaa.
translated: Bishii Maarj, Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka waxa uu bilaabay "Tjaabada SOLIDARITY" si loo qiimeeyo saamaynta daawaynta ee afar xeryood oo ka hortag ah oo jira oo leh ballanqaad waxtar leh.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: Shaqooyinka hore ee SARS-CoV ayaa laga faa'ideeyay maadaama oo SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 labadaha loo isticmaalo qaadaha ACE2 oo gala unugada bilaa aadanka.
translated: Ma jiro tallaal la heli karo, laakiin hay'ado kala duwan ayaa si firfircoon u horumarinaya murashaxiinta tallaalka.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: Waxaa jira sadex marxaladood oo talaalka ah oo la baadhayo.
translated: Shaqadii hore ee SARS-CoV waa la isticmaalay sababtoo ah SARS-CoV iyo SARS-CoV-2 labaduba waxay isticmaalaan soo-dhoweynta ACE2 si ay u galaan unugyada aadanaha.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: Ta kowaad, cilmi baadhayaasha ayay tahay ujeedadoodu inay sameeyaan talaal fayruska ah oo dhan.
translated: Waxaa jira saddex xeeladood oo tallaal ah oo la baarayo.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: Isticmaalka fayruska noocan ah, oo aan firfircoonayn ama dhintay, waxaa loogu talo geley in jawaabta difaaca jidhka lagu carbiyo ee jidhka bilaa aadanka caabuqa cusub ee COVID-19.
translated: Marka hore, cilmi-baarayaashu waxay rabeen inay dhisaan tallaalka fayraska oo dhan.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: Khidada labaad, lasoo baxa talaalka, waxaa lagu doonayaa in lagu ogaado xasaasinimada nidaamka difaaca ee fayrusyada qaar lala soco baxay.
translated: Isticmaalka fayraskan oo kale, ha ahaado mid firfircoon ama dhintay, waxa uu ujeedkiisu yahay in la helo jawaab-celin degdeg ah oo ka hortag ah oo jidhka bini'aadamka ah caabuqa cusub ee COVID-19.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: Marka la eego SARS-CoV-2, daraasadaha noocan ah waxaa diirada lagu saarayaa korodhka-S ee borootiinta ee ka caawinaysa fayruska qaadaha enzyme ACE2.
translated: Istaraatiijiyad labaad, tallaallada hoose, ayaa ujeeddadeedu tahay in la abuuro tallaalka dareenka nidaamka difaaca qaybo gaar ah oo fayraska ah.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: Khidada sadexaad ee talaalka aysiidha nukuleeska (talaalka DNA ama RNA, farsamada novel ee lagu samaynayo talaalka).
translated: Marka laga hadlayo SARS-CoV-2, cilmi-baarista noocan oo kale ah waxay diiradda saartaa borotiinka S-spike kaas oo ka caawiya fayrasku inuu galo soo-dhoweeyaha ACE2 enzyme.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: Talaal tijaabo ah oo lagu sameeyay khidada wax ka mid ayaa la tijaabin doonaa amaanka iyo wax ku oolkiisa. 16 Maarso 2020, tijaabadii ugu horeysay ee caafimaadka ee talaalka ayaa ku bilaabantay afar ruux oo iskood u ogolaaday Seattle.
translated: Istaraatiijiyad saddexaad waa tan tallaallada aashitada nukliyeerka (talaalada DNA ama RNA, farsamada cusub ee abuurista tallaalka).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: Talaalka waxaa ku jira nuqul hide side ah oo aan waxyeelo alahyn oo fayruska keena ah xanuunka. Waxaa kordhaysa antiboodhiga taas oo sheegeysa inay jirto caqabad talaalka samayntiisa ah ee SARS-COV-2, laakiin waa la isku khilaafsan yahay.
translated: Tallaalka tijaabada ah ee mid ka mid ah xeeladahaan waa in lagu tijaabiyaa badbaadada iyo waxtarka. 16-kii Maarso 2020, tijaabadii caafimaad ee ugu horreysay ee tallaalku waxay ka bilaabatay afar tabaruceyaal Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: Waxaa jira wax ka badan 300 oo tijaabo caafimaad ah oo shaqaynaya oo socda ilaa Abriil 2020.
translated: Tallaalku waxa uu ka kooban yahay koodh hidde-side ah oo aan waxyeello lahayn oo laga soo minguuriyay fayraska keena cudurka. Kobcinta ku-tiirsanaanta antibody-ka ayaa la soo jeediyay inay caqabad ku noqon karto horumarinta tallaalka SARS-COV-2, laakiin tani waa muran.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: Dhawr tijaabo ayaa la qiimeeyay oo hore loogu ansixiyay malaatiyada, oo ay kujiraan daraasadaha hydroxychloroquine ama chloroquine.
translated: Waxaa jira in ka badan 300 oo tijaabo caafimaad oo firfircoon oo socda illaa Abriil 2020.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: Dib u isticmaalka dawooyinka fayruska ayuu ahaa daraasada Jayniisku, taas oo maratay sagaal wajiga iii ee tijaabada ee remdesivir ee dhawr dal warbixin la soo saaray dhamaadkii Abriil siday sheegeysay.
translated: Toddoba tijaabo ayaa qiimeynayey daawaynta hore loo ansixiyey ee duumada, oo ay ku jiraan afar daraasadood oo ku saabsan hydroxychloroquine ama chloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Naqdin baahsan oo lagu sameeyay samaynta xarunta caafimaadka ee COVID-19 talaalkiisa iyo dawooyinka la sameeyay, Abriil 2020. Dhawr dawo oo hore oo fayrusyada ah ayaa la eegey in lagu daweeyo COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan remdesivir, chloroquine iyo hyroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir iyo lopinavir/ritonavir lagu daray interferon beta.
translated: Daawooyinka ka hortagga fayraska ee dib loo soo celiyay ayaa ka kooban inta badan cilmi-baarista Shiinaha, iyada oo sagaal weji III tijaabo lagu sameeyay remdesivir dalal dhowr ah iyadoo ay ugu wacan tahay in la soo sheego dhammaadka Abriil.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: Cadaymayan waxaa lagu eegayaa hoos u dhaca remdesivir, ilaa Maarso 2020.
translated: Dib-u-eegis firfircooni leh oo ku saabsan horumarinta bukaan-socodka ee tallaalka COVID-19 iyo musharrixiinta daroogada ayaa jiray, laga bilaabo Abriil 2020. Dhowr dawooyin ka-hortagga fayraska ayaa lagu qiimeeyay daawaynta COVID-19, oo ay ku jiraan remdesivir, chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir iyo lopinavir/ ritonavir oo lagu daray interferon beta.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: Waxaa la arkay caafimaadka oo kasoo raynaya ee bukaanka markii la isticmaalay si naxariis leh remdesivir.
translated: Waxaa jira cadeymo hordhac ah oo ku saabsan waxtarka remdesivir, laga bilaabo Maarso 2020.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: Wajiga III tijaabada xarunta caafimaadka ayaa lagu sameeyay Maraykanka, Jayna, iyo Talyaaniga. Chloroquine, hore loogu isticmaalay daawanta maraaliyada, daraasad lagu sameeyay Jayna Febraayo, 2020, taas oo natiijadeeda hordhaca ahi ay soo baxday.
translated: Horumarin caafimaad ayaa lagu arkay bukaanada lagu daweeyay naxariis-isticmaalka remdesivir.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: Laakiin, waxaa jira baaq in an cilmi baadhayaasha dhigooda ahi ay eegaan.
translated: Tijaabooyin caafimaad oo Wajiga III ah ayaa lagu sameeyaa Maraykanka, Shiinaha iyo Talyaaniga.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: Maamulka Caafimaadka Kuuriya iyo Jayna waxay ku taliyaan isticmaalka chloroquine.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaa jira baaqyo ku saabsan dib u eegista asaaga ee cilmi-baarista.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: Laakiin, Hay'ada Wuhan ee Fayrusyada, in kasta oo ay ku taliso xadiga maalin kasta ee hal giraam, waxay sheegtay in laba jeer xadiga ah uu ka badan yahay khatarta ee waxyeelada keeni karta.
translated: Maamulka Caafimaadka Kuuriya iyo Shiinaha waxay ku talinayaan isticmaalka chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: Maarso 28 2020, FDA waxay soo saartay ogolaansho isticmaal xaalada degdeg ah oo hydroxychloroquine iyo chloroquine oo uu ogolaaday dhakhtarka daawaynaya dadka qaba COVID-19. Nuqulka 7aad ee tilmaamaha Jayna waxa sidoo kale ku jira interferon, ribavirin ama umifenovir in loo isticmaalo COVID-19.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, Machadka Wuhan ee Virology, isaga oo ku talinaya qiyaasta maalinlaha ah ee hal garaam, wuxuu xusay in laba jeer qiyaastaas ay aad khatar u tahay oo ay keeni karto dhimasho.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: Macluumaadka hordhaca ahi waxa uu muujinayaa in xadiga dare ee ribavirin lagu qaadanayo sanka ee SARS-CoV-2 ee vitro.
translated: Markay ahayd 28-kii Maarso 2020, FDA waxay soo saartay oggolaanshaha isticmaalka degdegga ah ee hydroxychloroquine iyo chloroquine iyadoo ay go'aaminayaan dhakhaatiirta daawaynaya dadka qaba COVID-19. Tilmaamaha daabacaadda 7-aad ee Shiinaha sidoo kale waxaa ku jira interferon, ribavirin ama umifenovir si loogu isticmaalo ka hortagga COVID-19.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: Nitrozoxanide ayaa lagu raliyay in mustaqbalka loo isticmaalo daraasada vivo kadib markii lagu arkay cuf yar oo neefsiga SARS-CoV-2 ah. Daraasado lagu sameeyay borootiinta hore ee kor u kacaysa ee protease-ka isku gudbinta xabka ee serane 2 (TMPRSS2) waxa uu daruuri u yahay gelitaanka SARS-CoV-2 ee isdhaxgalka qaadaha ACE2.
translated: Xogta hordhaca ah waxay muujineysaa in qiyaaso badan oo ribavirin ah ay lagama maarmaan u yihiin in la joojiyo SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Daraasada lagu sameeyay chloroquine iyo hydroxchloroquine iyada oo wadata ama aan wadan azithromycin waxa uu aad u xadiday in kahortaga bulshada caafimaadka ee lagu qadanaayo daawayntan iyada oo aan lagu samaynin daraasad. Oseltamivir ma xadido qaadashada SARS-CoV-2 vitro oo lama garanayo kaalinta ay ku leedahay daawaynta COVID-19.
translated: Nitazoxanide ayaa lagula taliyay in lagu sii dheeraado daraasadda vivo ka dib markii la muujiyey xakamaynta feejignaanta hoose ee SARS-CoV-2. Daraasaduhu waxay muujiyeen in borotiinka bilawga ah ee protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) uu muhiim u yahay gelitaanka SARS-CoV-2 iyada oo la is dhexgalka lala yeesho ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Cyrokine duufaanada ah waxa ay noqon karaan mushkilad heerarka danbe ee COVID-19 aad u daran.
translated: Daraasadaha chloroquine iyo hydroxychloroquine ee leh ama aan lahayn azithromycin waxay leeyihiin xaddidaadyo waaweyn oo ka horjoogsaday bulshada caafimaadka inay qaataan daawayntan iyada oo aan daraasad dheeraad ah la samayn.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: Waxaa jira cadaymo ah in hydroxychloroquine ay yeelan karto kacsanaan anti-cytokine ah. Tocilizumab waxaa ay sidoo kale ku jiraa daawayntii tilmaamaha Gudida Caafimaadka Qaran ee Jayna kadib markii ay daraasadu dhamaystirantay.
translated: Duufaanta Cytokine waxay noqon kartaa dhibka marxaladaha dambe ee COVID-19 ee daran.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: Hadii wajiga socda ee 2 aanu noqon shaybaadh loo quri tuuray oo heer qaran ah oo Talyaaniga kadib markii la arkay ahaan najiiyada laga heley ah ee dadka qaba xanuunka daran.
translated: Waxaa jira cadaymo muujinaya in hydroxychloroquine laga yaabo inay leedahay guryaha ka hortagga cytokine.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: Isku darka serum ferritin shaybaadhka dhiiga ee ah ee lagu ogaanayo cytokine duufaanka ah, waxa uu ka dhigan yahay shay lagula dagaalamo samaynsan, tas oo loo arko inay keento dhimasho dadka qaar qaaday.
translated: Waxay maraysa waji 2 tijaabo aan randomized oo heer qaran ah gudaha Talyaaniga ka dib markii ay muujisay natiijooyin wax ku ool ah dadka qaba cuduro daran.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: Interleukin-6 qaadaha ah ee antagonist waxa ansixiyay FDA taas oo ku salaysan waxa keena ee daraasada daawaynta waxa keena isteeroodh cytokine ee ay soo saarto ee markaa keena caabuqa, CAR T unug ah ee daawyanta, 2017.
translated: Marka lagu daro baaritaanka dhiigga serum ferritin si loo ogaado duufaannada cytokine, waxaa loola jeedaa in laga hortago horumarka noocaas ah, kuwaas oo loo maleynayo inay yihiin sababta dhimashada dadka ay saameeyeen qaarkood.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: Ilaa iminka, ma jiraan wax iska yimid, cadayno xakamayn ee tocilizuman ah oo daawaynta caabuqa ee CRS.
translated: Daawada interleukin-6 antagonist waxaa ansixiyay FDA iyada oo ku saleysan daraasado dib-u-eegis ah oo loogu talagalay daaweynta steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome oo ay keentay sabab kale, daaweynta unugyada CAR T, ee 2017.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: Gudbinta antiboodhiga nadiifta ah iyo ka cufan ee lagu sameeyay nidaamka difaaca ee dadka kasoo ladnaanaya COVID-19 ee dadka u baahan ayaa lagu baadhayaa qaab aan talaal ahayn oo difaaca socda ah.
translated: Ilaa hadda, ma jiraan caddaymo aan kala sooc lahayn, oo la kantaroolay oo sheegaya in tocilizumab ay tahay daawaynta waxtarka leh ee CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: Khidadan waxaa lagu daweeyey SARS oo ay ku jirto natiijada aan dhamaystirnayn.
translated: Ku wareejinta unugyada difaaca jirka ee la safeeyey ee xoogga la saaray ee ay soo saareen hab-dhiska difaaca ee kuwa ka soo kabsaday COVID-19 dadka u baahan waxaa loo baarayaa hab aan tallaal ahayn oo tallaal dadban ah.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: Muquuninta fayruska ee qaabka la doonayay ee ficilka daawaynta antiboodhiga hurda waxaa markaba loo gudbin karaa SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Istaraatiijiyadan waxaa la isku dayay SARS iyada oo natiijooyin aan la soo koobi karin.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Qaababka kale laakiin, sida antiboodhiga ku tiirsan cytotoxicity unuga iyo/ama phagocytosis, ayaa macquul ah.
translated: Ka-hortagga fayruusku waa habka la filayo ee ficilka kaas oo daawaynta antibody-ka dadban ay dhexdhexaadin karto difaaca ka dhanka ah SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: Noocyada kale ee daawaynta anti boodhiga, tusaale ahaan, iyada oo la isticmaalayo monoclonal antiboodhiga, ayaa la samaynayaa.
translated: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, habab kale, sida cytotoxicity unug ku-tiirsan antibody-ku-tiirsan iyo/ama phagocytosis, ayaa laga yaabaa inay suurtagal tahay.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: Waxyaabaha convalescent ee serum, taas oo ka kooban qayb dareere ah oo dhiiga ah laga qaaday bukaanka oo ay ku jirto antiboodhi gaar ah oo fayrus, waxa uu kordhin karaa samaysanka dhakhsaha ah.
translated: Noocyada kale ee daaweynta antibody-ka dadban, tusaale ahaan, isticmaalka unugyada difaaca jirka ee monoclonal, ayaa ku jira horumar.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: Xanuunka coronavirus, koox xanuuno ah oo aad iskugu dhaw
translated: Soo saarista serum convalescent, oo ka kooban qayb dareere ah oo dhiiga bukaanada bogsaday oo ka kooban unugyada difaaca jirka ee u gaarka ah fayraskan, waa la kordhin karaa si degdeg ah loo geeyo.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: Li Wenlian, dhakhtarka ka tirsan Isbitaalka Dhexe ee Wuhan, oo markii danbe qaaday una dhintay COVID-19 kadib markii uu sheegey safmarka fayruska.
translated: Cudurrada Coronavirus, koox ka mid ah cilladaha si dhow ula xiriira

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: Li Wenlian, dhakhtarka ka tirsan Isbitaalka Dhexe ee Wuhan, oo markii danbe qaaday una dhintay COVID-19 kadib markii uu sheegey safmarka fayruska.
translated: Li Wenliang, oo ah dhakhtar ka tirsan cisbitaalka dhexe ee Wuhan, kaas oo markii dambe qandaraas ku dhacay oo u dhintay COVID-19 ka dib markii uu kor u qaaday wacyiga fiditaanka fayraska.
